nanvevaṃ sati jātyādiśabdārthāḥ sarve lākṣaṇikā bhaveyuḥ, te 'pi hi svarūpeṇa kriyāṃ sādhayitumaparyāp‍tairjātyādibhiravinābhūtavyaktirūpatayopalakṣyante |
naivam; jātyādipravṛttinimittānāṃ kriyāsiddhiṣu X X X tīrādyarthānāmapi samanvayo dṛś‍yate | naivaṃ gaurālabhyatāṃ prokṣyatāṃ viśasyatāmityādau anapekṣitavyaktīnāṃ gotvādijātīnāmapi | etenāruṇayā krīṇāti, abhikrāmaṃ juhotītyādau guṇakriyayordravya— vyavadhānenāpi kriyāsamanvaye dravyāṇāmalākṣaṇikatvamevetyabhihitaṃ bhavati |
nanu ca jātiguṇakriyā X X X pākena jīvatīti |
naivamatra jātyādīnāṃ viśiṣyate / viśeṣyatā nadravyarūpatvāt | taduktam—
vastūpalakṣaṇaṃ yatra sarvanāma prayujyate |
dravyamityucyate so 'rtho bhedyatvena vivakṣitaḥ || 46 ||(vāpa. 3.4.3)
kṛdabhihitaśca bhāvo dravyavat prakāśata iti | evaṃ ca mukhyavṛttīnāṃ jaghanyavṛttīnāṃ ca śabdānāṃ prayoge so 'rthaḥ, yatra sambandhitvena upalambhaḥ yadyevaṃ yajeta svargakāma ityādau svargayāgayoḥ sambandhitvenānupalambhāt kathaṃ yogyatvenāvadhāraṇam, anavadhārita— yogyatayośca kathamanvitābhidhānam? ucyate—
sāmānyenaiva yogyatvaṃ loke yadavadhāritam |
tadanvitābhidhānasya vyutpattāvupalakṣaṇam || 47 || (pra.pa 8/ 9)
(6. sāmarthyam)
dṛṣṭaṃ ca sādhyasādhanayorle X X X X yātmakasāmarthyākhyasambandho mukhyatā (tayā ?) vyapekṣetyucyate | vyapekṣāvatāṃ padārthānāṃ mithaḥ sambandhirūpatā sāmarthyam|
tattridhā 1. bhedaḥ, 2. saṃsargaḥ, 3. ubhayaṃ ca | tatra —
(1) rājño bhṛtya ityādau yadā tāvadetadavadhṛtaṃ parāyattārthavṛttirayaṃ bhṛtyaśabdo na svatantrārtha— vṛttiḥ, tadā sāmānyena svāmisaṃsargasyāvagatatvāt 1svāmiviśeṣa— jñāpanāyopādīyamāno rājaśabdaḥ svāmyantarebhyo bhṛtyaśabdārthaṃ vyāvartayati | so 'yaṃ svāmyantaravyavacchedo bheda ityucyate |
1. ityeva rāghavaḥ |
(2) yadā tu rājapuruṣa ityādāvanavagatāparāyattabhāvasya puruṣasya svāmisambandhadyotanāya rājaśabdaḥ prayujyate, tadā viśeṣasaṃsargasya śabdopādānatvādanavakāśo viśeṣāntarasampātaḥ, tadā hyaśabdā svāmyantaranivṛttirarthādavasīyate | sa saṃsargaḥ |
(3) yadā tvarthāvagatasāmarthyayoḥ pratipattinibandhanayorabhedāpekṣāyāṃ samāp‍tāveva (samāsa iva ?) bhedasaṃsargeṇa sāmarthyaṃ bhavati, yathā nīlaṃ ca tadutpalaṃ ca nīlotpalamiti (tadubhayam) |
yatra tuṃ na sambandhayogyatā na tatra sāmarthyam, yathā— klidyate vastraṃ, nīlam utpalam, āli karṇe, neha kaścitpuruṣaḥ vyāghra sarati pallīm, paśya sakhe kaṣṭaṃ X X X, gaccha tvam yūpāya dāru śobhanaṃ śaile, nivartasva vyāghrād bhayaṃ devadattasya yajñadattāt, bhāryā rājñaḥ puruṣo brāhmaṇasya, saktastvam akṣeṣu śauṇḍaḥ pibati pānāgāre | ayaṃ daṇḍo harānena phalāni, antarā tvāṃ ca māṃ ca kamaṇḍaluḥ, antareṇa takṣaśilāṃ pāṭaliputraṃ ca srugh‍nasya prākāraḥ, odanaṃ paca tava bhaviṣyatīti | atra prathameṣvabhinnavākyatvāt 'tiṅṅatiṅa' (8.1.28) iti nighāto na bhavati |.
(sambandhaḥ)
kaḥ punarayaṃ sambandho nāma ? ahānirvyapekṣā vyatiṣaṅga iti | tathā hi— sampūrvo badh‍nāti ahānau vartate, tadyathā asti no gargaiḥ sambandhaḥ, asti no vatsaiḥ sambandha iti | tathā vyatiṣaṅge vartate, yo 'yasā rajjvā vā kīlādau vyatiṣakto bhavati sa sambandha ityucyate | tatra yadā sambandhasyāhānirarthaḥ tadā ūrīkaroti kārikākaroti śaklīkaroti paṭapaṭākaroti cakāsāñcakāra vidāṅkurvantu, lunīhi lunīhityevāyaṃ lunāti, bhrāṣṭramaṭa maṭhamaṭa dūramaṭa ityevāyamaṭati ityevamādayaḥ prayogā bhavanti | na hyete kadācidapyanyonyaṃ jahatīti |
yadā sambandhaśabdasya vyapekṣā arthaḥ tadā gurukulaṃ devadattasya, sūryamapi na paśyanti asūryampaśyā rājadārāḥ, kiṃñcidapi na kurvāṇaḥ akiṃcitkurvāṇaḥ, śaṅkulayā kṛtaḥ khaṇḍaḥ śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ, dadh‍nopasikta odano dadhyodanaḥ, aśreṇayaḥ śreṇayaḥ kṛtāḥ śreṇīkṛtāḥ, kaṇṭhe kālo 'sya kaṇṭhekālaḥ, keśeṣu keśeṣu ca gṛhītvā pravṛttaṃ yuddhaṃ keśākeśi ityādayaḥ prayogā bhavanti | etaiḥ samāsāvasthāyāmapi devadattādīnyapekṣyante |
yadā tu sambandhaśabdasya vyatiṣaṅgo 'rthaḥ tadā upakumbham, nīlotpalam, gogarbhiṇī, pūrvakāyaḥ, sap‍tarṣayaḥ, plakṣanyagrodhau, kaṣṭaśritaḥ, kāka X X X ca mitho viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena vyatiṣajyante |
yatra hi pūrvottarapadayoḥ saṅgatārthatā tatsāmarthyaṃ sambandhaḥ, sa ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva ityākhyāyate; tatra caikasya prādhānyamanyasyopasarjanatvam |
na hi pradhānayorupasarjanayoreva vā sambandhaḥ kalpate, pradhānasyā— parārthatvādupasarjanasya X X X X X lakṣita(?) parasparaṃ padadvayaṃ pradhānopasarjanabhāvena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamāsādayati |
sa ca pradhānopasarjanabhāvaḥ kadācicchabdanibandhanaḥ, kadācidaśabdopādānaḥ sāmarthyenāvasīyate |
śabdanibandhano yadā vaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ xxx upasarjanaśabdā hi pradhānopakārāya pariṇataṃ svārthamācakṣāṇāḥ xxx midadhānāḥ prathamayaiva saṃskriyante |
aśabdopādāno yadā sāmānādhikaraṇyam, aparārthatayā hi prātipadikasyāvyatireke vṛthā (yad ā—)virbhavati śabdaiḥ tadubhayordravyaśabdatāyāmupapadyate, sā ca guṇādīnāṃ matublopādinā bhavati |
so 'yaṃ vibhaktibhedataḥ sāmarthyataśca pradhānopasarjanabhāvo dviprakāraḥ mukhyavṛttyā upacāravṛttyā ca |
sambandhavibhaktyā yathā— 'rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ, yūpāya dāru |
kārakavibhaktyā tu śrūyamāṇakriyo 'śrūyamāṇakriyaśca |
śrūyamāṇakriyo yathā— kaṣṭaśritaḥ, vyāghrād bhayam |
aśrūyamāṇakriyo yathā— śaṅkulayā khaṇḍaḥ, akṣeṣu śauṇḍaḥ |
mukhyavṛttyā yathā— nīlamutpalam, vīraḥ puruṣaḥ |
upacāravṛttyā yathā— puruṣo vyāghraḥ, siṃho māṇavakaḥ |
viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayorupasarjanapradhānabhāvaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇye vibhaktyabhedādaśakyaḥ śabdato 'vadhārayitum, sambandhasāmarthyāttu pratīyate | na hi sambandhaḥ pradhānayoreva vā sambhavati |
nanu ca nīlamutpalamityekaikapadaprayogādanavacchinnā x x x prathamā na prāp‍noti yathā nīlaśabdastāvadayaṃ svārthasāmānyavacano 'vyatirekāt prātipādikārthasya prathamayaiva sambadhyate, tathaivotpalaśabdo 'pi | yadeva kevalamavyatirekārthābhidhāyi padaṃ padāntara—
sannidhāne 'pi tat tadeva | tato yamarthamabhidhātuṃ yogyamavadhṛtamasya rūpaṃ tameva padāntarasannidhāvapi pratyāyayati, rūpabhedāt | na hi rasanamasannidhau darśanasya madhurādivyañjakadarśanasannidhau nīlādivyaktisāmarthyaṃ labhate | kiṃtu padayoḥ paricchinnārthaḥ pumāṃstayoḥ sannidhau prayogasāmarthyādarthayoḥ parasparopaśleṣayogyatvādekavākya— rūpānugrahāc‍cānyonyaṃ pradhānopasarjanabhāvena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamupaiti | tathā hi — yatra viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ caikasminnarthe sambhedaṃ pratilabhate tatra yaśśabdaḥ sa pūrvottarapadādhiṣṭhānamenaṃ pratyāyayati | utpalaśabdo 'bhipravartamānaḥ sarvotpalāvagraharūpeṇa pravartate nīlaśabdaḥ pravartamāno viśiṣṭāvagraharūpeṇāvacchinatti |
yadi vā nīlamityetatpravartamānanyūnādhikabhāvamanapekṣamāṇamanenaiva dharmeṇa sarvayogyaṃ sadutpalamiti śabdāntareṇa viśiṣṭāyāṃ yogyatāyāṃ niyamyate |
athavā yathā kṛṣṇaḥ śuklaścāyaṃ mṛgaḥ sāraṅgaḥ śabala iti vā, tathā nīlotpala ityubhayarūpa evārthātmā hyubhayatra sanniveśyate nīlaṃ cotpalaṃ caikaṃ nīlotpalamiti; tau yasminnubhayaguṇamanu vibhāgamāpyamānau saṃmūrcchitāvivārthau bhavataḥ, tattayorekamadhikaraṇam |
yadi vā nīlaśabdaḥ pravartamāno nīlaguṇamātramupādāya pravartate, na tvanenotpalādaya upāttāḥ, nāpi parityaktāḥ | evamutpalaśabdo vijātiyogamātramupādāya pravartate, na nīlādīṃstyajati, nopādatte | tatra yadaiva bhinne 'rtharūpa idamiti sarvanām‍nā pratyavamṛśyamāne upaśliṣyate nīlamutpalaṃ cedaṃ dravyamiti, tadā śabdabhedād bhinnamekameva dravyaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyamadhika x x x ktaḥ padadvayasannidhānāyattatvād viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasya vākyārthatvaṃ, na padārthatā |
tadidamuktam—'yadatrādhikyaṃ vākyārthaḥ sa' iti (mabhā. 2.3.46 vā.) | nīlamutpalamiti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayorubhayasya ca viśeṣyatvādupasarjanatvāprasiddhiḥ, yathā hyutpalaśabdo nīlaśabdenābhisambadhyamāno viśeṣyavacanaḥ tathā nīlaśabdo 'pyutpala— śabdenābhisambadhyamāno viśeṣyavacanaḥ sambadhyate |
naivam; ekasyātra prādhānyaṃ vivakṣitaṃ, tad‌viśeṣaṇatvam aparasya, utpalasya cātra prādhānyaṃ vivakṣitaṃ nīlaśabdasyopasarjanatvamiti |
yadā tarhi nīlasya prādhānyena vivakṣā utpalasya copasarjanatvena tadā kartavyaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam; na hyasau dvandvaḥ, utpalaṃ ca nīlaṃ ceti; nāpi ṣaṣṭhīsamāsa utpalasya nīlamiti; api tu dvāvimau pradhānaśabdāvekasminnarthe yugapaduparudhyete | na ca
dvayoḥ pradhānayorekasminnartha yugapaduparodhe prayojanamastīti prayogasāmarthyād gamyate nūnamekamiha pradhānaṃ tadivaśeṣakaṃ cāparam |
etāvāṁstu sandehaḥ—kiṃ viśeṣyam, kiṃ viśeṣaṇamiti ? tatra
dravyaṃ viśeṣyaṃ guṇo viśeṣaṇaṃ, dravyasyānyānapekṣiṇaḥ sākṣātkriyāsūpayogena prādhānyāt |
nanu guṇasyāpi sākṣātkriyāsūpayogo dṛśyate, yathā 'śvetaṃ chāgamālabheta' iti ?
naivam; iha śvetābhāve kṛṣṇamapi chāgamālabhate, na tu śvetāṃ piṣṭapiṇḍīmālabhya kṛtī bhavati | evamupacārapravṛttāvapi puruṣavyāghra ityādau yadāntarbhūtopamāna— sambandhapratītabhedā, vyāghrādiśabdairupameyaḥ puruṣādiḥ abhidhīyate tadā sāmānādhi— karaṇyopapattau 'upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge' (2.1.56) iti samāso bhavati | evaṃ prapacati sādhu pacatītyādayo draṣṭavyāḥ |
kathaṃ punaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena kriyāviśeṣaṇatve sādhvādayo 'sattvavacanā bhavanti ?
ucyate—upasargāṇāmiva kriyāviśeṣaṇānāmapyasattvabhūtānāmeva kriyāṃ prati guṇabhāvo bhavati, yathā pacyādikaṃ viśeṣe sthāpayan asattvārthaḥ praśabdo viśeṣaṇatvaṃ labhate, evaṃ sādhuśabdo 'pi kriyātmabhūtaṃ dharmamutkarṣādikaṃ kriyāsthamasattvabhūtaṃ kriyānupraviṣṭamabhidadhānaḥ kriyānurodhādevāsattvabhāvamāpannaḥ kriyāviśeṣaṇatvaṃ labhate |
kathaṃ punaḥ prapacatītyādau prāderubhayaviśeṣaṇatve kriyābhāgenaiva sambandho bhavati ? sati vā kathamubhayaviśeṣaṇatvam ?
ucyate— yathā māso jātasyeti māsākhyaḥ kriyākalāpaḥ (kathaṃ) prathamakukṣiviyogākhyasya janmano 'vadhibhāvena paricchedako bhavati, janmapratilabdhāṃ vā sattāṃ samāvṛttyā parimimīte, yathā ca kaṣṭaśrita ityatropāttakriyāviśeṣaparicchinnaḥ kartā 'bhyantarīkṛtasādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ kriyāyoge śrayatikriyāsambandhāt kaṣṭe karmatvamiti śrayaṇakriyā kaṣṭena sambandhamanubhavati, yathā ca vṛkād bhīta ityupāttakriyāvacchinnaḥ kartā bhayakriyāsambandhād vṛkasyāpādānatvamiti bhayakriyāpūrvakaṃ vṛkena sambadhyate, tathehāpyupāttapacyādikriyāviśeṣaparicchinnaḥ kartā 'bhyantarīkṛtasādhya— sādhanasambandhaḥ kriyāyoge prādīnāmupasargatvam (mabhā. 14.49) iti kriyāpūrvakaṃ prādibhiḥ sambadhyata iti | sarve 'pi ca samudāyasambandhino 'vayavasparśenaiva tadvatā
samudāyena sambadhyante | taduktam—
samudāyena sambandho yeṣāṃ gurukulādinā |
saṃspṛśyāvayavāṁste tu yujyante tad‍vatā saha || 48 || (vāpa.3.48 vṛ.)
(7. anvayaḥ)
vyapekṣādibhirekārthaparatayopāttānāṃ padārthānāṃ mitho 'bhigrathanamanvayaḥ |
sa tridhā— 1. śāktaḥ, 2. vaibhaktaḥ 3. śaktivibhaktimayaśca | teṣu—
karmādiśaktibhirnirvṛttaḥ śāktaḥ,
sambandhādivibhaktibhirvaibhaktaḥ,
ubhābhyāṃ punaḥ śaktivibhaktimayaḥ |
(1. śāktaḥ)
tatrākhyātasubvibhaktibhyāṃ kartṛkarmaṇorabhidhāne śākto yathā—
adhyāsāmāsuruttuṅgahemapīṭhāni yānyamī |
tairūhe kesarikrāntatrikūṭaśikharopamā || 49 || (māgha. 2.5)
kṛdākhyātābhyāṃ bhinnakālasthakartṛśaktidvayābhidhāne subvibhaktibhiḥ karmakaraṇa— sampradānābhidhāne ca śākto yathā— (kāvyāda. 2.248)
ajitvā sārṇavāmurvīmaniṣṭvā vividhairmakhaiḥ |
adattvā cārthamarthibhyo bhaveyaṃ pārthivaḥ katham || 50 ||
ākhyātavibhakta‍yā hetuśaktyabhidhāne subbibhaktibhiśca karmakartrapādānā— dhikaraṇaśakta‍yabhidhāne yathā—
sa setuṃ bandhayāmāsa plavagairlavaṇāmbudhau |
rasātalādivottorṇaṃ śeṣaṃ svap‍nāya śārṅgiṇaḥ || 51 || (raghu. 12.70)1
(śārṅgiṇa iti) kartari ṣaṣṭhī na sambandhe, svap‍nāyeti bhāva eva caturthī na tādarthye | ākhyātena kartrabhidhāne taddhitena kṛtāṃ ca karmābhidhāne supā kathitākathitakarmābhidhāne ca śākto yathā— (māgha. 2.34)
vipakṣamakhilīkṛtya pratiṣṭhā khalu durlabhā |
anītvā paṅkatāṃ dhūlimudakaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate || 52 ||
1. mūlapāṭho 'smākaṃ kālidāsagranthāvalyā 1986 varṣīye saṃskaraṇe draṣṭavyaḥ |
(2. vaibhaktaḥ)
sambandhavibhakta‍yā vaibhakto yathā— (vārā. 6.83, 35)
yasyārthāstaspa mitrāṇi yasyārthāstasya bāndhavāḥ |
yasyārthāḥ sa pumān loke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ || 53 ||
śeṣavibhakta‍yā vaibhakto yathā—(manu. 1.96)
bhūtānāṃ prāṇinaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ prāṇināṃ buddhijīvinaḥ |
buddhimatsu narāḥ śreṣṭhā nareṣu brahmavādinaḥ || 54 ||
upapadavibhakta‍yā vaibhakto yathā—(harṣaca 1.1)
namastuṅgaśiraścumbicandracāmaracārave |
trailokyanagarārambhamūlastambhāya śambhave || 55 ||
sambodhanavibhakta‍yā ca vaibhakto yathā—
avanipavanavahnivyomatoyāntarātma— nnahimakarahimāṃśo ! viśva ! viśvaikayone ! |
hara ! bhava ! śiva ! śarva ! tryambakeśāna ! rudra ! trinayana ! vṛṣaketo 'nantamūrtte ! namaste || 56 ||
(3. śaktivibhaktimayaḥ)
kārakavibhaktibhiḥ sambandhopapadaśeṣasambodhanavibhaktibhiśca śaktivibhaktimayo yathā—
tīrtheṣu satsu dvijasattamebhyaḥ śriya dviṣadduṣṭajanānupāttām |
samādhinā mānamanitya/nidrameva kasya pradātuṃ tvadṛte 'sti śaktiḥ || 57 ||
yatra lup‍tāsvapi vibhaktiṣu śaktayo 'vabhāsante vibhaktayaśca sākṣādupalabhyante so 'pi śaktivibhaktimayaḥ| yathā—
vitrastaśatruḥ spṛhayālulokaḥ prapannasāmanta udūḍhasattvaḥ |
pratiṣṭhitaudāryaguṇo 'sipatrajitāvaniḥ ko 'tra bhavānivānyaḥ || 58 ||
yatraikataḥ śaktiranyato vibhaktisso 'pi śaktivibhaktimayo yathā—
ikṣudaṇḍasya maṇḍasya dadh‍na piṣṭakṛtasya ca |
vārāhasya ca māṃsasya saiṣa gacchati phālgunaḥ || 59 ||
yatra vyapekṣoktā vibhaktivipariṇāmādayaḥ pravartante so 'pi śaktivibhāktimayo
yathā— (kirātā 3.21)
nirīkṣya saṃrambhanirastadhairyaṃ rādheyamārādhitajāmadagnyam |
asaṃstuteṣu prasabhaṃ bhayeṣu jāyeta mṛtyorapi pakṣapātaḥ || 60 ||
atra yadi janikriyāto nirīkṣaṇakriyāyāḥ pūrvatvaṃ tadā kartṛbhedānnāsti ktvāpratyayaḥ | atha pakṣapātakriyātaḥ, tadā nirīkṣaṇapakṣapātayoḥ mṛtyuneti bhavati ktvāpratyayaḥ, abhidhāvyāpārastu vighaṭate; ṣaṣṭhyabhihitasya kartuḥ pakṣapātakriyayaiva sambandhaḥ, na nirīkṣaṇakriyayā | 'kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti' (2.3.65) iti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ 'na lokāvyayaniṣṭhākhalarthatṛnām' (2.3.69) iti pratiṣedhāt | sa ca vibhaktivipariṇā— mādhyāhāraviparyayavākyabhedavyavahitakalpanāguṇakalpanābhirupapadyate | tatra rādheyaṃ nirīkṣya mṛtyurapi bhayeṣu pakṣapātī bhavatīti vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ; rādheyaṃ nirīkṣya svasāmarthyaṃ vimṛśato mṛtyorapi bhayeṣu pakṣapāto jāyeteti vākyabhedaḥ; rādheyaṃ nirīkṣya mārayatīti mṛtyorapi bhayeṣu pakṣapāto jāyeteti vyutpattikālāśritāyā vyavahitāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ vyavahārakāle 'pyāśrayaṇāt vyavahitakalpanā; nirīkṣyeva nirīkṣyeti pakṣapātana— syācetanasyāpi cetanaguṇādhyāropeṇa guṇakalpanā | yadāha— 'mukhyābhāve sati prayojane nimitte ca satyupacāraḥ pravartate' (mabhā. 4.1.27) | dṛṣṭaśca acetane 'pi premādau cetanādikriyopacāro yathā—
'prema paśyati bhayānyapade 'pi || 61 ||' (kirātā. 9.70)
'avasthā vastūni prathayati ca saṅkocayati ca || 62 ||'
(anvitābhidhānamabhihitānvayavādau)
atha kimabhihitānāṃ padārthānāmanvaya utānvitānāmabhidhānam ?
'ucyate— astyatra matabhedaḥ;
tatra eke varṇayanti anvitānāmabhidhānamabhihitānāṃ cānvayaḥ |
(anvitānāmabhidhānam)
kecid bruvate nānvitānāmabhidhānaṃ, na cābhihitānāmanvaya iti |
tatrānvitābhidhānavādina evamāhuḥ — vyutpattibalena hi śabdo 'rthamavabodhayati, vyutpattiśca vṛddhavyavahārāt; vṛddhāśca vākyenaiva vyavaharanti na padenaḥ yac‍cārthaprakaraṇādigamya— padārthāntarasahakṛtaṃ padaṃ prayuñjate tadapi vākyameva |
yadapyekaṃ padaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ caritārthakriyaṃ k‍vacit |
vākyaṃ tadapi manyante sambodhanapadādivat || 63 ||
yac‍ca ko 'yamiti praś‍ne gauraśva iti vocyate |
tatra dṛśyata ityādiḥ praś‍noktaiva kriyeṣyate || 64 ||
(vāpa. 2.270, 271, 326)
vākyaṃ caikārthaparaḥ padasamūhaḥ, saṃhatyārthamabhidadhati(nti) vā padānyucyate | samūhaścaivamekārthaḥ syāt | evaṃ ca saṃhatyārthamabhidadhyuḥ padāni yadyekaikaṃ padamabhinna evārthe vyāpriyeta | tatra yathā trayo 'pi grāvāṇa ukhāṃ dhārayanti, catvāro 'pyudyantāraḥ śibikāmudyacchanti, sarvāṇyapi kārakāṇi pākaṃ sādhayanti, tathā padānyapi sarvāṇi vākyārthamanvavagamayanti | vākyārthaśca kriyākārakasaṃsargarūpaḥ | tatra kārakāṇāṃ kriyāsambandhonmukhatayā kriyāṇāṃ ca kārakavirahāsahiṣṇutvenānvitānāmeva svaśabdai— rabhidhānaṃ bhavati | evaṃ ca sati vākyārthasya sākṣādeva śābdatvamupapadyate, na tvabhihitānvayapakṣavat pāramparyeṇeti |
tadabhihitānvayavādino na mṛṣyante | te hyevamāhuḥ– anavagatapadārthakasya vākyārthasampratyayādarśanāt padārthapratipattipūrvikaiva (vākyārtha—)pratipattiḥ | padārthapratipattiścaivamavakalpate | yadi tāvāneva so 'rthaḥ padenābhidhīyate padārthāntarānvite tu tasminnabhidhīyamāne kadambakarūpārthapratipatteḥ padārthapravibhāgo na prakalpeta | asya padasya jātirartho 'sya dravyamasya guṇo 'sya kriyeti āvāpodvāpābhyāṃ tadavadhāraṇamiti cet naivam, tatrāpi kadambakarūpārthapratīteranapāyāt ||
kiṃca pratiyogināmanantatayānvayasyānantyāt tadanvayānantyenānvitābhidhāyinyāḥ sambandhagrahaṇamaśakyamiti duravagamaḥ padārthayoḥ sambandhagrahaḥ; tadanapekṣatve prathamaśrutādapi tadarthapratipattiḥ prāp‍noti | gāmānayeti vākyādaśvabandhananiyogaḥ pratīyeta, vṛddhavyavahāreṣu ca vākyādapi bhavantī vyutpattiḥ padaparyantaiva bhavati | itarathā hi prativākyaṃ vyutpattirapekṣyet, sā cānantyād‍durupapādeti śābdavyavahārocchedaḥ syāt | dṛśyate cābhinava—kavi—ślokāt vākyārthapratītiḥ; sā ca padapadārthayoreva vyutpattāvupapadyate na vākyavākyārthayoriti nāstyanvitābhidhānam ||
api cānvayasyānvitaviśeṣaṇatvāt tadabhidhānamantareṇānvito 'bhidhātuṃ na śakyata ityanvayābhidhānamaṅgīkaraṇīyam | na ca tadekayā śaktyā śakyate 'bhidhātumiti
śakatyantarakalpanāprasaṅgaḥ | api ca gāmānayetyatra yadā gośabdenānayatyarthaviśiṣṭaḥ svārtho 'bhidhīyate tadā gavārthasyāprādhānyam, yadā ca ānayatinā gavārthaviśiṣṭaḥ svārthaḥ tadā tadarthasyetyetasminvākye pradhānadvayopanipātād vākyabhedāpattiḥ | api ca prakṛtipratyayayoranyonyānvitasvārthābhidhānalabdhapadabhāvayoḥ padārthāntarānvitārthavācaka— tvamiti dvirabhidhānaṃ syāt | kiṃca padenānvitaḥ svārtho 'bhidhīyamānaḥ kimabhihitena padārthāntareṇānvito 'bhidhīyate, utānabhihitena ? anabhihitena cedekasmādeva padāt tadarthoparañjakadvitīyapadārthāvagateḥ padāntaroc‍cāraṇavaiyarthyam | evaṃ caikameva padamakhila— padābhidheyārthavādi sampannamiti tenaiva vyavahāraḥ syāt | na cāsau sampadyate | gauriti hyukte sarvaguṇakriyāvagamānna jñāyate kimupādīyatāmiti; niyataguṇakriyānurakta— svārthapratipādane tu na heturasti | padāntarasannidhānaṃ niyamaheturiti cet, tadapi japamantrādipadavat svarūpamātreṇa sannidhānānna viśiṣyate | athābhihitena, tarhi padamanvitābhidhāyitayā padāntarotthamarthābhidhānamapekṣate; tataś‍cetaretarāśrayamanavasthā cakrakaṃ vā prāp‍noti ||
atha dvitīyamananvitameva svārthamabhidhatte, prathamena kimaparāddham | evaṃ ca sarvapade svārthamātrābhidhānādabhihitānvaya eva bhavati ||
(anvitābhidhānam)
kiṃcāṅgulyagre hastiyūthaśatamiti nāstyanvayo yogyatvābhāvāt; anvitābhidhānavādināṃ tvanvitasyābhidhānāt tatrāpyanvayaḥ prāp‍noti | api cānvitābhidhānavādināṃ puruṣavākyādevamayaṃ puruṣo vedeti bhavati pratyayo naivamarthaṃ prati siddhāntaḥ | te hyevamāhuḥ— vākyāt kāryabhūtāt pratyayitasya vaktustadarthaviṣayaṃ pūrvavijñānaṃ kāraṇabhūtamanumīyate, tasya ca jñānasya jñeyāvyābhicāritvāt jñeyabhūtārthaniścaya iti na vācakaśakta‍yā 'rthāvagamaḥ | evaṃ ca vācakaśaktireva nāvadhāryate kuto 'nvitābhidhānamiti | tasmādabhihitānāṃ padārthānāmanvaya iti yuktam | padāni hi svamarthamabhidhāya nivṛttavyāpārāṇi |
athedānīṃ padārthā avagatā vākyārthaṃ gamayantīti |
atrānvitābhidhānapakṣe kadambakarūpārthapratipatteḥ pratiyogināṃ cānantatayā sambandhagrahaṇasyāśaktyā duravagamaḥ padārthapravibhāga iti; tadidaṃ vyutpattyanabhijñasya codyam | na hyevaṃ vyutpattiḥ gośabdasya śuklānvito 'rtha iti, sa hi vyabhicarati
kṛṣṇānvitasyāpi tadarthasyopalambhāt; nāpi sarvānvitaḥ, ānantyena duravagamatvāt; kintvākāṅkṣitasannihitayogyārthāntarānurakto 'syārtha iti | etāṃ ca vyutpattiṃ vākyānyeva padāvāpodvāpaviracanāvaicitryabhāñji sañjanayanti | yataḥ—
opyante coddhriyante ca svārthāḥ svānvayaśālinaḥ |
anvite sve ca sāmarthyaṃ padānāṃ tena gamyate || 65 ||(prapa.8)
tatra ca—
yadyadākāṅkṣitaṃ yogyaṃ sannidhānaṃ prapadyate |
tadanvitaṃ padenārthaḥ svakīyaḥ pratipādyate || 66 || (prapa.8/9)
padārthaparyantāpi ca bhavantī vyutpattirīdṛśī dṛśyate na śuddhapadārthaviṣayā |
(nyāyamaṃ.) tathā hi—
niyataṃ sādhanaṃ sādhye kriyā niyatasādhanā |
sa sannidhānamātreṇa niyamaḥ samprakāśate || 67 ||
guṇabhāvena sākāṅkṣaṃ tatra nāma pravartate |
sādhyatvena nimittāni kriyāpadamapekṣate || (vāpa. 2.47,48)
evaṃ ca sannihitayogyākāṅkṣitoparakte svārthe k‍vacid‍gṛhītasambandhaḥ sarvatra gṛhīto bhavatīti nānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ sambandhāgrahaṇam | na ca kadambakārthapratīteḥ padārthātpravibhāgaḥ | taduktam—
ākāṅkṣāsannidhiprāp‍tayogyārthāntarasaṅgatān |
svārthānāhuḥ padānīti vyutpattiḥ saṃśritā yadā || 69 || (prapa.8)
ānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ tadā doṣo na kaścana |
kadambakārtharūpāyāḥ pratīteśca na sambhavaḥ || 70 || (prapa.8/9)
iti | tataśca padapadārthayossambandhagrahaṇopapattau na prathama(ma)śrutāpi padādarthapratītiḥ, na gāmānayeti vākyādaśvabandhananiyogaḥ (nyāyamañjarī) na prativākyaṃ vyutpattyapekṣā, na cābhinavakaviślokavākyārthapratītirbhavatīti |
yadapi cānvitābhidhāne śaktidvayakalpanāgauravamāśaṅkitaṃ, tadapi nāsti | anvayavattā hyanvitatā | tadabhidhānenānvito 'bhihitaḥ syāt | na hi daṇḍītyatra daṇḍo nābhidhīyata iti | sambhavati paraṃ viśeṣaḥ; tatra prakṛtyā viśeṣaṇābhidhānam, iha tenaiva,
anyatastadalābhāt | ato 'nvitābhidhānaśaktyaivānvayo 'pyabhidhīyata iti nāsti śaktidvayakalpanāgauravam | taduktam—
vyatiṣaktārthabuddha‍yā hi vyatiṣaṅgo niśamyate |
aparaṃ tu na saṃsargapratīterasti kāraṇam || 71 ||
pratipattyā 'nvayaṃ yasmātpratīyādanvitaṃ pumān |
vyaktiṃ jātimivārtho 'sāviti samparikīrtyate || 72 || (prapa.17)
yo 'pi pradhānadvayaśaṅkayā vākyabhedalakṣaṇo doṣaḥ, so 'pi nopapadyate | yato 'nvitaḥ sambandha ucyate | tatra kaścit pradhānatayā sambandhaḥ kaścid guṇatayā; yaśca yathā sambandhaḥ sa tathaivocyata iti naikasmin vākye pradhānadvayaprasaṅgād vākyabhedalakṣaṇadūṣaṇotpattiḥ | taduktam—
pradhānaguṇabhāvena labdhānyonyasamanvayāt |
padārthā eva vākyārthaṃ saṅgirante vipaścitaḥ || 73 ||
pratipattirguṇānāṃ tu pradhānaikaprayojanā |
tatpratītyekakāryatvād vākyamapyekamucyate || 74 || (prapa.)
yac‍ca prakṛtipratyayayoḥ padasya cābhidhāne dvirabhidhānamuktaṃ, tadapi na samyak; prakṛtyānvitasyārtho vidhīyate, pratyayaśca prakṛtyarthānvitaṃ padārthānvitaṃ ca svārthaṃ bravīti, pratyayārthasya prakṛtyarthānvitasya padāntarārthāpekṣitvāditi kuto dvirabhidhānam |
nanvevaṃ padasyānvitābhidhāyitvaṃ na syāt, pratyayasyaiva prakṛtisahitasya padatvāt | kiṃcāyamabhihitānvayavādino 'pi tulyo doṣaḥ | tataśca—
yaścobhayoḥ samo doṣaḥ parihāro 'pi vā samaḥ |
naikaḥ paryanuyoktavyastādṛśyarthavicāraṇe || 75 ||
prakṛtipratyayau brūtaḥ pratyayārthaṃ saheti ca |
yadāhuḥ sūrayastena tad dvayaṃ padamiṣyate || 76 || (kāśikā 1.2.56)
yac‍cānabhihitapadārthāntarānvitasvārthābhidhānapakṣe padāntaroc‍cāraṇavaiyarthyamityādi, abhidhānapakṣe punaritaretarāśrayādidūṣaṇamuktaṃ, tadubhayapakṣānabhyupagamenaiva nirastam | yato nāsmākamayaṃ pakṣaḥ prathamaśrutānyeva padāni svārthānanyonyamanvitānabhidadhati, api tu yasya yāvanto 'rthāḥ sambhavanti tacchravaṇe tāvantaḥ smṛtāvupasthāpyante, tataścākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatādisampāditaniyatamithassamanvayāḥ padaireva smṛtyupārụ̄dhaira—
bhidhīyante | tathāhi—yastāvadagṛhītasambandho yasya ca sambandhagrahaṇasaṃskāro notpannaḥ pradhvasto vā sa vākyārthapratipattau nādhikriyate; yastvanavabhraṣṭasambandhagrahaṇasaṃskāraḥ sa padaṃ padaṃ śrutvā nūnaṃ tāvadidaṃ smarati—idamidamasyārthasyākāṅkṣitasannihita x x x tāśrayamādhārādheyasāmānyaṃ padadvayāt tu parasparopahitavyavacchedaṃ pratīyate, tata x x x |
(anu—)yogyapratiyogyanvitasya vācakatvamiti |
evaṃ ca smaratā smṛtameva ananvitamapi svarūpamanvayabhājāṃ bhavati |
nanu śrūyamāṇena padena yo 'rtho nāvabodhitaḥ sa kathamantarhite tasmin avabodhyate ?
ucyate — abhihitānvayavādino 'pi nāyaṃ niyamaḥ śrūyamāṇa eva pūrvavarṇajanita— saṃskārasahito 'ntyo varṇaḥ pratyāyaka iti | bāliśādhītāt prāganavadhṛtārthād aparijñāne saṃskṛtasya (aṅgaparijñānasaṃskārāt) paścāt śrutādapi bhedā(vedāda)rthāvagamadarśanāt, tena smṛtyārūḍhasyāvagamakatvamadoṣaḥ; śrūyamāṇena hi padena pratiyogisāpekṣatvādanvitā— bhidhānasya prāk sahakārivirahādartho 'nabhihitaḥ paścādabhidhīyata iti kimanupapannam ?
tathā cāha—
padajātaṃ śrutaṃ sarvaṃ smāritānanvitārthakam |
nyāyasampāditavyakti paścādanvitabodhakam || 77 || (prapa.12)
smṛtisannihitairevamarthairanvitamātmanaḥ |
arthamāha padaṃ sarvamiti nānyonyasaṃśrayaḥ || 78 || (prapa.15)
kathaṃ punaranvitābhidhāyinā padena svarūpamātraṃ smārayituṃ śakyate ? ucyate—'anvitasyāpyabhidhāne svarūpamātrasya vidyamānatvānnāyaṃ niyamaḥ yāvad gṛhītaṃ tāvat svakartavyaṃ smartavyam, api tvagṛhītaṃ tu na smaryata iti |
nanu ca śabdasya svarūpābhidhānaśaktyabhāvadaprāmāṇye kathaṃ śabdaśravaṇāt svarūpasmaraṇaṃ bhavati ? ucyate— na hi yatpramāṇaṃ tatsmṛtika(kā)raṇaṃ, kiṃtu (a)pramāṇameva tat | yasya tu yena saha kācit pratyāsattiḥ pratītapūrvā sa tatra saṃskārod‍bodhadvāreṇa śak‍notyeva smṛtimādhātum | asti ca svarūpasyāpi tadabhidheyāntargatyā śabdena saha pratyāsattiriti śak‍noti tatrāpi (śabdaḥ smṛtiṃ) janayitum | yathā nirvikalpakadaśāpratītamarthasvarūpamātrama(na)bhidheyamapi śabdaṃ smārayati tathā śabdo 'pyarthamiti na kiṃcidanupapannam | tathā cāhuḥ—(prakaraṇapañcikāyām)
anvitasyābhidhāne 'pi svarūpaṃ vidyate sadā |
tena svarūpamātre 'pi śabdo janayati smṛtim || 79 ||
yathārthenāpramāṇena svapadaṃ smāryate k‍vacit |
padenāpyapramāṇena tathārthaḥ smārayiṣyate || 80 ||(prapa.13–14)
nanveyaṃ yathā (dā)—smṛtisannihitamāśrityānvitābhidhānaṃ padaiḥ kriyate tathā(dā) smaraṇasya prattyāsattinibandhanatvādanekeṣāṃ ca (arthānāṃ) pratyāsattisambhavāt teṣu smṛtisannihiteṣvagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvād ukhāyāṃ pacatīti nokhā pacatyarthānvitaiva kevalābhidhīyeta, sā hi kulālanirvāpādyanvitāpi pratipanneti smaraṇāt tadanvitāpyukhābhidhīyeta, tathā pacatyartho 'pi piṣṭakādikarmako 'vagata iti tatsmaraṇannokhānvito 'bhidhīyeteti |
tanna; śabdaiḥ smāritānāmanvayabodhakatvād vṛddhavyavahāre 'pi tathā darśanād ya eva hi śabdena smārito 'rthastenaivānvitābhidhāna—(miti) kulālanirvāpādyanvitāpya— bhidhīyata iti ||
kiṃcānvitārthābhidhāna evedaṃ pratiniyatārthānvayitvamupapadyate | yatpadāntarā— bhidheyatayā smāryate tadanvitasyaiva vṛddhavyavahāre vācyatvadarśanāt, yatrāpi cādhyāhārastatrāpi sannidhāpakavaśena viśeṣānvitābhidhānalābha iti loka(ta)eva jñānamiti na kaściddoṣaḥ | api ca jñānaṃ tāvadanenāyamartho 'nvito vācya iti | tatra yadyanenāpyanvitābhidhānaṃ syāt vākyabhedo bhavet, na cāsāvekavākyatvasambhavo(ve) nyāyyaḥ | taduktam—
sambhavatyekavākyatve vākyabhedaśca neṣyate || 81 || (ś‍lovā. 1.1.1,9) iti |
yac‍coktamanvitābhidhānapakṣe 'nvitasyaiva padārthasyābhidhānādaṅgulyagrādivākye— ṣvapyanvayaḥ prāp‍noti | tatra smṛtānāmapyarthānāmayogyatvenānvayābhāvādanabhidhānameva, padārthapratipattistu smṛtyaivopapadyata iti | yatpunaḥ puṃvacasāmarthe prāmāṇyābhyupagamāt padānāṃ vācakaśaktireva nāvadhāryate | kuto 'nvitābhidhānamityukte x x x x deva tāvad vaktavyaṃ; na vayaṃ puruṣavākyānāmarthe prāmāṇyamabhyupagacchāmaḥ | yeṣāmapi cābhyupagamasteṣāmapi na doṣaḥ, yataḥ padamanvitābhidhāyakatvena vyutpannaṃ vyabhicārāśaṅkayā tu lokena tanniścāyakaṃ paścādāp‍tatvālocanayānumite 'rthe 'nuvādakaṃ taditi prāmāṇyameva nāsādayati || (prapa.)
nanu ca vācakatvamapi jahāti; paśya— 'bālo hi vyutpadyamānaḥ prayojyavṛddhavyavahārasya śabdaśravaṇānantarabhāvinīṃ viśiṣṭaceṣṭānumitām arthapratītiṃ śabdakaraṇikāṃ tāvadavagacchati | sa tathā vyutpannaḥ kadācidananvitārthapadaracanāmupalabhate | tatropalabhamānasya tasyaiṣa vimarśo jāyate sambhāvyamānānanvitārthapadaracanamidaṃ vākyaṃ kathaṃ vṛddhasyārthaniścayaṃ kṛtavat | vṛddhasyāpi hi puruṣāyatte vākye nānvitārthapadaracanāśaṅkā maṃmeva sambhavatīti | tasyaivaṃ vicikitsodaye punareṣa niścayo jāyate— kṛtam anenāyaṃ vaktā itthamavadhāritaḥ anvitārthānyeva padāni prayuṅkte iti | tathāvidhapadaprayogaśca nāsyānupalabdhe 'nvaya upapadyata ityevamanvayopalambhamanumāyānenānvayo niścitaḥ | niścite cānvaye vākyametadanuvādabhūtamadhyeti |
evaṃ ced anuvādakatayā tasyārthasya tadvākyaṃ vācakameveti pūrvavācakaśaktijñānaṃ nānarthakamiti manyate | yadi paraṃ mayā prāganumāpurassaro 'rthaniścayo 'syeti nāvagatam | yāpi ceyamasyāniścite 'nvaye viśiṣṭavak‍tṛjñānānumā, sāpi padānāṃ svarūpamātrāvagamādeva nopapadyate, kiṃ tu viśeṣāvagamāt | na ca śakteranyaḥ padānāṃ viśeṣo 'vakalpate | ato mayevānenāpyamīṣāṃ padānāṃ vācakaśaktiravadhāritā | tena viśiṣṭānvayavācakapadaprayogāt tat‍tad‍viṣayaṃ vaktuḥ pūrvavijñānamanumitavāniti ||
nanvanantapratiyogyanvitasvārthabodhanaviṣayā anantā eva śabdasya śaktayaḥ parikalpayitavyāḥ syuḥ | abhihitānvayavāde tvekasminnarthe śabdasyaikaikaiva śaktiriti (prapa.10) |
tanna | ekayaivākāṅkṣitasannihitayogyārthānvitasvārthābhidhānaśakta‍yā pratiyogi— bhedena cakṣurādīnāmiva kāryabhedopapatteḥ | yathaikayaiva darśanaśakta‍yā cakṣuḥ ghaṭādipratiyogisahāyabhedānnānājñānāni janayati, tathā śabdo 'pi pratiyogibhedāditi mantavyam | evaṃ ca—
padairevānvitasvārthamātropakṣīṇaśaktibhiḥ |
padārthā bodhitā buddhau vākyārtho 'pi tathā sati || 82 || (prapa.2) iti |
evaṃ caitadapyupapadyate saṃhatyā 'rthamabhidadhati padāni vākyam, ekārthaparaḥ padasamūho vākyamiti saṅghātārthapāratantryāt padānāṃ svārthābhidhānaṃ na sambhavati | na ca saṅghātakāryamakurvanti k‍vacidapi padāni dṛśyante, na hyeṣāṃ saṅghātakārye svakārye ca pṛthakprayogo vidyate, sarvathā saṅghātakārya eva prayogāt |
naivam | saṃhatānāṃ saṅghātakāryavat svakāryasyāpyupalambhāt, yathā śakaṭāṅgānāmayamaṃśo 'nena kṛto 'yamaneneti, na ca śakaṭāṅgānyapi pṛthakprayujyamānāni svakāryaṃ kurvanti dṛśyante |
kiṃ punaḥ padānāṃ svakāryam ?
yā 'sau svārthapratipattiḥ |
kiṃ vā saṅghātakāryam ?
yā 'sau vākyārthapratipattiḥ | tac‍ca padānāmekaikasya kṛtsnaphalaparyantavyāpāra— kāritvāt | tathā hyekaikasmin sati kṛtsnaphalaparyanto vyāpāro nirvartate, ekaikena vinā na nirvartata iti evaṃ kṛtsnakāri bhavati |
kimatra padāntareṇa kriyeta iti cet, sarvakārakeṣvapi tulyo 'yamanuyogaḥ | tatra yathā saṃhatya kurvanti kāraṇādīni kāryāṇyucyante tathā saṃhatyāpyabhidadhati padānya— bhidhāyakānyucyante ||
nanvākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatābhiścedanvayopapattirabhihitānvaya evāstu kimanvitā— bhidhānena ? padeṣu hyananvitamapi svaṃ svamarthamabhidhāyoparatavyāpāreṣvākāṅkṣādibhiḥ padārthānāmanvayapratītirbhaviṣyatīti |
ucyate, kasyeyamākāṅkṣā, śabdasyārthasya pramāturvā ? śabdārthayostāvada— cetanatvānnākāṅkṣā, phalataḥ pramātureveyam | tatra vācoyuktiḥ—'śabdaḥ śabdāntaramākāṅkṣatyartho 'rthāntaram | svatantrasyā ' 'kāṅkṣā na pramāṇaṃ, puruṣecchāyā vastusthiterayujyamānatvācchabdapramāṇapṛṣṭhabhāvitvena tvartheṣu puruṣasyākāṅkṣā bhavantī bhavatyarthānāṃ saṃsargaheturityevaṃ śabdasyaivāyamiṣoriva dīrghadīrgho vyāpāraḥ | uparatavyāpāre tu śabde puruṣasyākāṅkṣāmātraṃ na sambandhakāraṇam, aśābdatvaprasaṅgāt; sākṣāc‍ca śābdatvasambhave vyavadhānāśrayaṇasyāyuktatvāt | ato nānyadanvitābhidhānāt saṃsargapratīteḥ kāraṇamasti | na khalvānaya gāṃ śuklāmityādivākyeṣu saṃsargapadaṃ prayujyate yataḥ saṃsargapratyayaḥ syāt, prayujyamānamapi daśadāḍimādivākyavadananvitārthameva syāt | tasmāt 'padānānāmanvitābhidhānameva nyāyyami'—ti ||
(abhihitānvayavādaḥ)
abhihitānvayavādinaḥ punaritthamācakṣate —'svaṃ svamarthamabhidhāya nivṛttavyāpārāṇi padāni bhavanti | athedānīṃ padārthā avagatā ākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatābhiranvayamupayanto vākyārthamavagamayanti |
nanvevamaśābdaḥ syāt ?
naivam; pāramparyeṇāpi pratipādayatāṃ padānāṃ vākyārthe sāmarthyasyāvighātāt | taduddeśena ca prayuktānāṃ padārthapratipādanamavāntaravyāpāro bhaviṣyati | na cāvāntaravyāpārasya kārakāntareṣvapi vyavadhāyakatvamiṣyate | tadāha—
na vimuñcanti sāmarthyaṃ vākyārthe 'pi padāni naḥ |
tanmātrāvasiteṣveṣu padārthebhyaḥ sa gamyate || 83 || (ślokavā.)
vākyārthamitaye teṣāṃ prayukte nāntarīyakam |
pāke jvāleva kāṣṭhānāṃ padārthapratipādanam || 84 || (ś‍lokavā.) iti |
tatra ca kriyāpadāni kriyāmātramabhidadhati, kārakapadāni tu kārakamātram, kuto vaiṣāṃ mithassaṃsarga(jñāna—)m ? na hyekapadoc‍cāraṇakāle padāntarārthapratītirasti | na cāpratīyamānenāpi saṃsargapratītirasti |
na cāpratīyamānenāpi saṃsargapratītiprasaṅgaḥ |
nanu ca vṛddhavyavahārāt padānāṃ arthāvadhāraṇam, vṛddhāśca vākyenaiva vyavaharanti, na padena | vākye vānvitānāmeva padārthānāmupalambhāt kathamucyate kriyā x x x mātraṃ padebhyo 'vagamyata iti ?
ucyate—'satyaṃ vākyebhya eva padānāṃ vyutpattiḥ; sā tu kimekaghaṭanākāraka— saṃhatavākyārthaniṣṭhā, kiṃ vā padārthaparyanteti cintanīyam |
pūrvasmin pakṣe prativākyaṃ vyutpattirapekṣaṇīyā, sā cānantyavyabhicārā— dibhirbahupramādā | padārthaparyantāyāṃ ca vyutpattau nūnaṃ nirdhāraṇīyam 'iyānasya padasyārtha' iti | anvitārthābhidhānavādino 'pi niyataḥ x x x karaṇīyaḥ | padārthaniyamānapekṣaṇe hi gāmānayeti vivakṣuraśvapadamapi nimittatayopādadīta | na hi tasyānapekṣitapadapadārthapravibhāgo vaiyākaraṇavad vākyārthapratyaya udeti | tasmād yāvānāvāpodvāpaparyālocanayā padasyārtho nirdhāryate tāvāneva tasyārtha iti |
nanvākāṅkṣitayogyasannihitārthoparaktastasyārtho bhavatu, sarvadā saṃhatya vyāpriyamāṇatvāt |
naivam; sarvadā saṃhatya vyāpriyamāṇastu tāvān, yāvatyabhidhātrī tasya śaktiḥ |
kiyatī ca tasyābhidhātrī śakti ?
yāvantamarthamākāṅkṣitairyogyaiḥ sannihitaiśca saṃyujyamānaṃ viyujyamānaṃ ca na muñcati
kriyāmātraṃ kārakamātraṃ ca; atastāvatyevābhidhātrī śaktiranvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tasya nirdhāryate | taduktam, 'avyabhicārāddhi tanmātrameva tadartho nādhikaṃ vyabhicārāt' iti |
nanvatra śaktitrayakalpanāgauravalakṣaṇo doṣaḥ prāp‍noti | padārthānāṃ hi śabdādanyataḥ pramāṇādavabodhakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti śabdābhidheyānāṃ tadavabodhakatvaśaktiḥ kalpanīyā | tasyāścotpattau śabdasaṃsparśa eva heturityāśrayaṇīyam | śabdo hi viśiṣṭārtha— pratipattiparatayā loke prayujyamāno dṛṣṭaḥ, na cāsau sākṣād vākyārthapratipādane samartha iti padārthānavāntaravyāpārīkaroti | te ca yadyanyonyānvayabodhanasamarthāstadā teṣāmavāntara— vyāpāratā syāt, nānyathā | padārthānāmapi viśiṣṭārthāvabodhaparaśabdasaṃsparśādeṣā śaktirāvirbhavatīti śabdasyāpi padārthagataśaktyādhānaśaktiranumantavyeti |
syādetadevaṃ yadi mānāntarāvaseyānāṃ padārthānāmanyonyānvayāvagamasāmarthyaṃ nāvadhāryate | avadhāryate ca śvaityasyānavadhāritāśrayaviśeṣasyāpratyakṣopalabdhasyāśvasya cāpratipannaguṇaviśeṣasya heṣāśabdānumitasya śveto 'śvo dhāvatītyanvayaḥ | tadāha—
paśyataḥ śvetamārūpaṃ heṣāśabdaṃ ca śṛṇvataḥ |
padanikṣepaśabdaṃ ca śveto 'śvo dhāvatīti dhīḥ || 85 ||
dṛṣṭā vākyavinirmuktā (ś‍lo. vā.)|| 86 || iti |
ārūpamityavyaktarūpam | tena guṇaviśeṣo na pratyakṣeṇāvasīyata iti uktaṃ bhavati |
atredaṃ paryanuyujyate—'kiṃ yena puruṣeṇa śvaityasamānāśrayau heṣādhvanipada— nikṣepaśabdāvavagatau tasyaiveyaṃ śveto 'śvo dhāvatīti dhīḥ, uta yasyāpādānānadhyavasāya— stasyāpīti ?
kimataḥ ?
yadi tāvadapratyākalitaheṣādhvanipādavihāranirghoṣāpādānasyetyucyate, tadā pratīti— virodhaḥ; sa hyevaṃ pratipadyatebhavitavyamasmin deśe nūnamaśvena, bhāvyaṃ ca kenacid dhāvateti |
athāśvasambandhinameva khurapuṭaṭaṅkāraravamabhyāsapāṭavavaśādavaiti, tadāsāvaśvavartinīṃ vegavatīṃ gatimanuminoti, na punaḥ kevalāmevāvagamya tasyānvayaṃ padārthasāmarthyenāva— budhyate | yo 'pyasmin deśe nāstyanyo 'śvād iti niścitya pāriśeṣyādapādā— nādhyavasāye 'pi heṣādhvaneḥ śvaityasamānādhikaraṇamaśvatvamapyadhyavasyati tasyāpi gṛhābhāvadarśanamiva bahirbhāvāvagatāvarthāpattiḥ 'yo 'yaṃ śvetaḥ sa evāśva' iti pramāṇam | yastu śvetasamānādhikaraṇaheṣādhvanikhurapuṭaṭaṅkāraravāvadhyavasyati tasyāśvātve vegavati ca
gamane śvetadravyavartinyevānumānaṃ na svatantrayoḥ | ataḥ pramāṇāntareṇa asambandhāvagatārthānāṃ na k‍vacidanumānārthāpattivyatirekeṇānvayabodhakatvaṃ pratītam |
api ca yadi padārthāvagatimātrādevānvayāvagamastadā kasmin pramāṇe 'syāntarbhāva iti vācyam | na tāvacchābde, śabdābhāvāt; padārthābhidhānāvāntaravyāpāreṇa hi yacchabdādanvayajñānaṃ na tacchābdamityabhihitānvayavādināṃ siddhānta iti nāsya śābde 'ntarbhāvaḥ | pramāṇāntarābhyupame tu śābdasyocchedaḥ, śabdāvagatapadārthāviṣaye 'pi tasyaiva prāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt | tasmācchabdābhihitānāṃ padārthānāmanyatrādṛṣṭaṃ vākyārthāva— bodhanasāmarthyaṃ parikalpayitavyam | tadādhānaśaktiśca śābdānāmapīti kalpanālāghavā— cchabdānāmevānvitasvārthabodhanaśaktimātraṃ kalpayituṃ nyāyyam |
athocyate—'ākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatāvantaḥ padārthā eva vākyārthībhavanti, na punarvākyārthamavabodhayantīti, tadatimandam; vākyārthāvagateḥ kāraṇābhāvaprasaṅgāt | anupāyatve hi padānāmanvayapratītau padārthā api cenna kāraṇaṃ akāraṇyevānvaya— pratītirāpadyeta |
syānmatam—'kriyāpadena kārakapadena vā sākāṅkṣārthe pūrvābhihite yadeva padāntareṇa yogyaṃ pratiyogipadārthāntaraṃ sannidhāpyate, tadeva tatra sambandhitvenāvatiṣṭhata' iti |
satyamevam; avagatistu tatsambandhasya kiṃnibandhaneti vācyam ?
atha pūrvapadārthe sākāṅkṣe yatpadāntaramuc‍carati tat tatsambandhitayaiva svārthamupanayati, pratyayavat | yathā prakṛtyarthe pūrvapratīte pratyaya uc‍cāryamāṇaḥ svārthaṃ tadviśiṣṭamevābhidhatte tathā padāntaramapīti | taduktam—'prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūta'—iti (kāśikāyāṃ 1.2.56) | prakṛtiḥ svārthaṃ pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇatvenopanayantī pratyayena saha tadarthamāhetyarthaḥ | tathā coktam—
nityaṃ viśiṣṭa evārthe pratyayo yatat‌prayujyate |
tatpūrvataravijñātaprakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇāt || 87 ||(pra.pa.) iti |
aṅgīkṛtaṃ tarhi dvitīyasyānvitābhidhānaṃ, prathamasya tathāpi nāstīti cenna; vākye padānāṃ prayogakramaniyamābhāvāt | yadeva kadācit prathamaṃ tadeva kadācid dvitīyamiti sarvapadānāmanvitābhidhānamāpatitam | kiṃca pratyayaścedanvitābhidhāyī tadā tadaviśeṣāt padānāmanvitābhidhāyitā kimiti nābhyupeyate ? kimardhavaiśasena ?
atrābhidhīyate; lākṣaṇikā eva sarve vākyārthāḥ, tataśca na padārthānāmanvaya— bodhane śaktigauravam | ananvitāvastho hi padenārtho 'bhihito 'nvitāvasthāṃ svasambandhinīṃ lakṣayati | avasthāvasthāvatorhi saṃbandhādavasthāvatyavagate bhavatyevāvasthāpi buddhisthā sarvatra saṃbandhini dṛṣṭe sambandhyantare buddhirbhavatīti siddhameva | tena nāsti padārthānāmanvitabodhane śaktikalpaneti | tadāha—
vākyārtho lakṣyamāṇo hi sarvatraiveti lakṣyate || 88 || (prapa.) iti |
kathaṃ punariyaṃ lakṣaṇā ?
vācyasyārthasya vākyārthe sambandhānupapattitaḥ |
tatsambandhavaśaprāp‍tasyānvayāt lakṣaṇocyate || 89 ||1(prapa.10/11)
tadyathā— 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ prativasatītyādiśrautasya gaṅgārthasya vākyānvayāsambhavāt tat parityajya tatsambandhāllabdhasannidheḥ kūlasya vākyānvitatā 'dhyavasīyate | ata eva cāhuḥ—'anupapattyā sambandhena ca lakṣaṇā bhavati iha ca gāmānayetyādau na śrautasyānvayā— yogyatvaṃ, nāpyanvitāvasthasyānayanasambandhārhatā, anvitasyānvayāntarābhāvāt |
api ca sarvavākyārthānāṃ lākṣaṇikatve mukhya x x x |
atha mā bhūdeṣā lakṣaṇā | kiṃtu kriyāvagatakārakānvayinīmātmano daśāmavagamayatyavinābhāvitvāditi |
ucyate—'śābdatvaṃ tāvaditthamapahnutamanvayāvagamasya | kiṃtu sāmānyatoduṣṭā— numānagocaratā 'bhyugatā bhavati | tathā ca viśeṣāvagatiranupapannamūlā ' 'padyeta |
atha viśeṣānvayaṃ vinā vyavahārānavakalpanādanarthakaṃ śabdoc‍cāraṇamiti tadāśrayaṇam ?
evamapi prekṣāpūrvakāriṇāṃ sārthakamātraprayogiṇāṃ vacanād viśeṣānyayāvagamaḥ | vede tvānarthakyena na bhavitavyamiti pramāṇābhāvānna śakyate viśeṣānvayo vak‍tum |
na ca loke 'pyānarthakyamāpadyata ityetāvatā kāraṇenopāyān vināpi viśeṣā— dhyavasānaṃ yuktam | na hi dagdhukāmasyaudanasyaudakopādānamanarthakamiti jalasya dāhakaśaktirāvirbhavatīti kāmamānarthakyam | na punaḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya viśeṣānvayitā |
athākāṅkṣitasannihitayogyānvayaparatā vṛddhavyavahāreṇa padānāmavagatetyanvayāvagamaḥ |
tanna; vṛddhavyavahāra eva kathaṃ tatparatā tatpadānāmupāyābhāve nirvahatīti cintā |
1. netyālaṅkārikāḥ, lakṣaṇā—sāmagryā abhāvāt |
sā hi padānāṃ padārthānāṃ vā śaktikalpanāṃ vinānupapanneti manyāmahe | sā ca padānāmevocitā | yadāha—
prāthamyādabhidhātṛtvāt tātparyāvagamādapi |
padānāmeva sā śaktir varamityavagamyatām || 90 || (prapa.11)
prathamabhāvīni hi padānyatilaṅghya na padārtheṣu vākyārthāvabodhanaśaktirāśrayituṃ yuktā | kiṃca padāni tāvad abhidhāyakānīti nirvivādam | tena teṣā— mabhidhānaśaktissampratipannaiveti tasyā evānvayaparyantatā kalpayituṃ sukarā | padārthānāṃ tu bodhanaśaktireva kalpyā | tena dharmikalpanāto dharmakalpanā laghīyasīti anvitā— bhidhānaśaktiḥ padānāmeva kalpayitumucitā |
kiṃca padānyabhidhāyakānīṣyante | tatra yadi svarūpamātraviṣayāmeva buddhimāda— dhyurabhidhāyakatā hīyeta, tasyā buddheḥ sambandhagrahaṇasamupajātasaṃskāraprabhavatvāt | avaśyaṃ hi sambandhasmaraṇasiddha‍yarthaṃ sambandhibhūtārthasādhāraṇasaṃskārod‍bodho 'ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ | tasmāt sambandhagrahaṇasamayānadhigatānanvitārthapratipādanābhyupagama eva śabdānāmabhidhāyakateti tāmaṅgīkurvatā padānāmanvitābhidhāyitā ' 'śrayaṇīyā | yastu—
padamabhyadhikābhāvāt smārakānna viśiṣyate || 91 || (ś‍lovā. 5.107)
bhāvanāvacanastāvat tāṃ smārayati lokavat || 92 || (ś‍lovā. 7.248)
ityācāryavacanadarśanāt abhidhāvat smārakatāmeva padānābhidhāyakatāṃ manyate | nāpi tāvat padānāṃ vākyārthaparatābhyupagantavyā, anyathā vākyārthasyāśābdatvaprasaṅgāt |
evaṃ cet padānāmeva sākṣād vākyārthabodhane śaktirastu, kiṃ paramparāśrayaṇena ?
evaṃ ca padapadārtheṣu padānāṃ smārakatvātiriktaṃ ye 'bhidhāyakatvamāhusteṣāṃ śaktitrayakalpanā, ekā tāvat padānāmabhidhāna—(śaktiḥ, aparā ca padārthagatānvaya—) bodhaśaktyādhānaśaktiḥ, padārthānāmanvayajñāpanaśaktiriti | smārakatvavādināṃ tvabhidhāna— śaktiṃ hitvā śaktidvayakalpanā | anvitābhidhāne punarekaiva śaktiriti śaktikalpanā— lāghavādanvitābhidhāyīnyeva padānīti nyāyyaṃ, na punarabhihitānāmanvaya iti |
atrocyate—yat tāvat padārthānāmanvayabodhakatve śaktitrayakalpanāgauravamityuktaṃ, tanna samyak; pramāṇāntarāvagatānāṃ padārthānāmanvayāvabodhakatvadarśanāt | dṛśyate—
paśyataḥ śvetamārūpaṃ heṣāśabdaṃ ca śṛṇvataḥ |
khuranikṣepaśabdaṃ ca śveto 'śvo dhāvatīti dhīḥ || 93 || (ś‍lovā. 7.358)
na caitad vācyam; arthāpattyanumānayorayaṃ vyāpāraḥ, tadviṣayāyāḥ pratīteriha vivakṣitatvāt | yatra hyākāṅkṣāditrayopetāḥ padārthā evānyonyamanvayaṃ gamayanti, na tatrārthāpattyanumānayorvyāpāraḥ | yathā surabhi candanaṃ, svādu sahakāramiti | na cātra viśiṣṭapratipattau pratyakṣameva vyāpriyate; cakṣurādīnāṃ rūpādinaiyatyena parasparaviṣayeṇājñātatvāt | tathā hi na gandhādyupalabdhau cakṣuḥ vyāpriyate, nāpi rūpādyupalabdhau ghrāṇamiti | asti ca surabhi candanamityādau viśiṣṭārthapratipattiḥ, evaṃ śveto 'śvo dhāvatītyatrāpi draṣṭavyam |
yaccātroktaṃ 'kasmin pramāṇe 'syāntarbhāva' iti; tatra na kasmiṃścit pramāṇe 'ntarbhāvaḥ, kintu pramāṇaphalametat | yadi vā padārtha evātra pramāṇam, teṣāṃ ca śabda evāntarbhāvānna sap‍tamapramāṇāpattiḥ | padārthā hi śabdāt pramāṇāntarato vā pratipannā ākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatābhiḥ kriyākārakādirūpeṇa cet pratīyamānāḥ saṃsargabuddhiṃ janayanti śābdamevaitad bhavati |
yat punarākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatāvantaḥ padārthā eva vākyārthībhavantītyupanyasya dūṣitaṃ, tatra na vayamevaṃ brūmaḥ 'padārthā eva vākyārthībhavanti' |
kiṃ tarhi?
gamayanti |
yacca pratyayadṛṣṭāntena dvitīyapadasyānvitābhidhāyitve 'rdhavaiśasamuktaṃ, tadapi nāsti; prakṛtipratyayayorapi padavadevānvayavyatirekāvadhāritavyatiriktaśaktikayora— bhihitānvayasyaivopapatteḥ |
pākaṃ hi pacirevāha kartāraṃ pratyayo 'pyakaḥ |
pākayuktaḥ punaḥ kartā vācyo naikasya kasyacit || 94 || (prapa.)
prakṛtipratyayau brūtaḥ pratyayārthaṃ saheti ca |
bhedenaivābhidhāne 'pi prādhānyādevamucyate || 95 || (nyāma.)
lākṣaṇikavākyārthaviṣaye tu mṛṣaivopālabdhāḥ smaḥ |
1. manye bhojasyaiveyaṃ kārikā |
na hi gāmānayetyādau lakṣaṇāsmābhiriṣyate |
gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau na caiṣā pratiṣidhyate || 96 ||1
tena na mukhyalākṣaṇikavākyārthapravibhāgānupapattiḥ |
yadapi kriyā 'vagatā kārakānvayinīmātmano daśāmavagamayatyavinābhāvitvā— dityasmin pakṣe viśeṣānavadhāraṇamaśābdatvaṃ ca doṣa ityuktaṃ, tadapyanumatameva | na hyavinābhāvato viśiṣṭā vākyārthapratītiriti manyāmahe, api tvākāṅkṣāsanni— dhiyogyatābalena | ākāṅkṣādisadbhāve ca śābdatvaṃ bhavatyevetyabhihitaṃ purastāt |
yacca prāthamyādibhiḥ padānāmevānvayabodhanaśaktirastviti vāditaṃ, tatrābhidhāna— śaktiḥ padānāmiṣyata eva, anvayaparyantatā tu tasyā neṣyate, vākyārthapratīteranya— thāpyupapadyamānatvāt | vākyārthe hi tātparyaśaktiḥ padānāṃ vyāpriyate, nābhidhātrī | tāṃ ca pṛthagaviviñcatā bhavatānvitābhidhānamabhyupagatam | tacca na yuktam | sarvatrābhidhātryāḥ śakteraviśeṣeṇa pravṛttau padārthanaiyatyānavadhāraṇe padāntaroccāraṇavaiyarthyādidoṣaprasaṅgāt | padāntarānuccāraṇe trayeṇānvitamarthamabhidadhāti gośabdaḥ | sa nābhidhīyate, tatsaṃsargaścā— bhidhīyata iti vipratiṣiddham | tadabhidhāne tu tadvatsaṃbandhābhidhānamityekameva gopadaṃ sarvārthaṃ syāt | tasmānna sarvatrābhidhātrī śaktiḥ śabdasyopapadyata iti nānvitābhidhānam |
etena yaduktaṃ padārthānāṃ bodhanaśaktireva kalpyā, padānāṃ tu klṛp‍tānā— mevānvayaparyantateti dharmikalpanāto dharmakalpanā laghīyasīti anvitābhidhānameva yuktamiti, tadapi nirastaṃ bhavati | yaccoktaṃ sambandhasmaraṇāvagatasambandhipratipatti— siddhānvitārthagocaraivābhidhānaśaktirastviti, tadapyanupapannam | sambandhasmaraṇasavyapekṣasya padasyābhidhāyakatvāt | na cānvite sambandhasmaraṇaṃ bhavati | pratiyogināmānantyena sambandhasya grahītumaśakyatvāt | tasmānniṣkṛṣṭapadārthamātraviṣayatvamevābhyupagamanīyam |
yattvadhigataviṣayatvaṃ dūṣaṇamuktaṃ tadiṣyata eva | ata eva na padaṃ padārthe pramāṇam, adhigataviṣayatvāt, anadhigatārthagantṛ hi pramāṇaṃ bhavati | na ca padasya svārthe smārakatvameva | yadāha—
padamabhyadhikābhāvāt smārakānna viśiṣyate || 97 || (ś‍lovā. 5.107)
na tu smārakameva bhavati | tasmāt padānāmabhihitānvaya eva nyāyya iti |
(ubhayavādaḥ)
ubhayavādinastvevamāmananti, sāmānyato 'nvitābhidhānaṃ viśeṣato 'bhihitānvaya iti | gośabdo hi svārthamanavagataviśeṣaguṇakriyāsāmānyānvitamabhidhatte | tadetat sāmānyenānvitābhidhānam | śuklādiguṇaviśeṣastu padāntarādavagamyate | so 'yaṃ viśeṣeṇābhihitānvaya iti |
api ca kriyākārakasaṃsargarūpo vākyārthaḥ, kriyāsambandhamantareṇa kārakatvānupapatteḥ | viśeṣeṣu cānantyavyabhicārādidoṣāt kriyāsāmānyānvita eva kārake kārakapadānāṃ sambandhagrahaṇaṃ, saṃbandhānusāreṇa cābhidhānāt sāmānye 'nvitābhidhānameva ghaṭate | vyavahārakāle ca kriyāviśeṣānvitānāmeva kārakāṇāmupalambhāt | kriyāṇāmapi ca kārakaviśeṣānvitānāṃ pratīteḥ śabdavyāpārasya sāmānyānvayābhidhānenaiva parisamāp‍terviśeṣeṣvabhihitānvaya eva yujyate | evaṃ ca padāntaroccāraṇamapi na vyarthaṃ bhavati, apekṣitakriyākārakaviśeṣa— samarpakatvenārthavattvāt |
yadyapi cātra kriyākārakamātrānvayābhidhāne kriyākārakamātrasambandhitvaṃ kriyākārakasāmānyābhiprāyam, tathā 'pi svārthamātropādāyinaḥ sarvabhedān prati yogyatā; tadevā—(tadbhedā—)nuguṇyamātraṃ sāmānyam, na hi tathā, anyathā sarvathā veti sāmānyamavasthitarūpaṃ kiṃcidasti, sarva ete viśeṣā eva | tasyāstu sāmānyāvasthāyāṃ bhedasya kasyacidanirūpaṇādatyāgācca yā sarvabhedopagrahayogyatāyāṃ pariplavamānārthakalpanā tāṃ sambandho viṣayāntarādavacchidya viśiṣṭe viṣaye niyamayati | taduktam—
sarvabhedānuguṇyaṃ tu sāmānyamapare viduḥ |
tadarthāntarasaṃsargād bhajate bhedarūpatām || 98 || (vāpa. 2.44)
bhedānākāṅkṣatastasya yā pariplavamānatā |
avacchinatti sambandhastāṃ viśeṣe niveśayan || 99 || (vāpa. 2.45)
ata eva ca nānekavākyārthapratītiḥ | sarveṣāṃ kārakāṇāṃ karmādibhāvena vyavasthitānāmeva kriyāsambandhāt | na ca prathamaśrutādapyarthapratītiḥ, vidyamānasyāpyanvayasya sambandhagrahaṇamantareṇānupalabdheḥ | na caikapadoccāraṇakāle sakalavākyārthapratītiḥ, tadānīṃ viśeṣasamarpakapadaprayogāyogāt |
yadyevaṃ sāmānyenānvitābhidhānamevāstu, kiṃ viśeṣeṇābhihitānvayena |
vṛddhavyavahāraprasiddhasambandho hi śabdo 'rthasya vācakaḥ | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ca sambandhāvadhāraṇam | na ca viśeṣānvayaviṣayau tau sambhavataḥ | kriyāpadaṃ hi kāraka— sāmānyā 'vyabhicāriṇyā kriyayā sahānvayavyatirekau bhajate, viśeṣānvaye viśeṣāntaravyabhicārāt | evaṃ kārakapadamapi |
tanna; viśeṣānvaye 'pi ākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatvopādhivaśena sambandhagrahaṇaṃ sukaramiti tadabhidhāyitaiva yuktā padānām | yadi cāsau neṣyate tadā vākyārthapratipattireva nopapadyate, vākyārthasya viśeṣānvayarūpatvāt |
nanu ca sāmānyānvayo 'bhihito viśeṣānvayamākṣepsyati, nirviśeṣasya sāmānyasyaiva pratyetumaśakyatvāt |
naivam | yathā jātirvyaktimākṣipantyapi na pratiniyataṃ viśeṣamākṣipati, tathātrāpi niyatāviśeṣābhāvānniyataviśeṣātmakavākyārthapratītirupapannā |
nanu viśeṣamātrākṣepe 'pi ya ākāṅkṣitaḥ sannihito yogyaśca viśeṣaḥ padāntareṇa samarpyate sa eva gṛhyate, tadatikrame pramāṇābhāvāt (iti),
etadapi na samyak | sāmānyānvitābhidhānavādino hi mate padāni tāvat tanmātraparyavasitaśaktīni; padārthānāmapi cānvayabodhanaśaktirnāṅgīkriyate | na ca sāmānyākṣepo 'pi niyataviśeṣamāskandati | tenākāṅkṣite yogye ca viśeṣapadāntareṇa sannidhāpite tadanvayabodhakapramāṇābhāvādanvayo na pratīyate | ata ākāṅkṣāsannidhi— yogayatvānyanupayogīnyeva |
viśeṣānvitābhidhānavādinastu mate sambandhagrahaṇaṃ pratyupādhitvenānupraviṣṭāni vākyārthapratipattāvupayujyante | padāt padārthaḥ padārthāntarasambandho boddhavya ityasyāṃ vyutpattāvupādhitvena yogyatvādikarmānupraviśad‌viśeṣānvitābhidhānavādinaḥ pakṣamapākaroti, na sāmānyānvitābhidhānavādina iti | kiṃca kriyākārakasvabhāvālocanayāpi kārakamātreṇā— nvayasiddhervṛthā sāmānyamātrānvayābhidhāyakatā śabdasyāṅgīkriyate | tasmāt tadukta eva nyāyaḥ śreyān, sāmānyenānvitābhidhānaṃ, viśeṣeṇābhihitānvaya iti |
yuktaṃ caitat, padasya prakṛtipratyayātmakatvāt | pade hi pacatītyādau prakṛtyarthaḥ pratyayārthaśca sāmānyaviśeṣāvagamarūpamanyonyānvitaṃ pratīyate | tatra pacityeṣā prakṛtiḥ siddhasādhyatvādidharmavinirmuktaṃ pratyayārthamātrānvayayogyaṃ pākasāmānyamātramabhidadhāti |
atipratyayastu paurvāparyaniyamānna prakṛtivat svatantraḥ sāmānyamātre dhiyamādadhāti; api tu prakṛtārthāpekṣayā ' 'cakṣāṇaḥ svārthaṃ viśeṣameva samarpayatīti |
anubhayavādinaḥ punaritthaṃ samarthayante— nānvitābhidhānaṃ, na cābhihitānvayaḥ, kiṃ tarhi? samuditaiḥ padaireko vākyārthaḥ pratyāyyate | sa ca guṇabhūtetarapadārthasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ kaścit padārtha eveti |
nanu kimayamanvitābhidhānapakṣaḥ punarutthāpayitumiṣṭaḥ?
maivam; nedamanvitābhidhānam | kiṃ tarhi saṃhatyakāritā padānām?
ucyate— 'saṃhatyakāritāpyasti, na cānvitābhidhānam, anvitamarthaṃ padāni saṃhatya saṃpādayanti, na tvanvitamabhidadhati |
kimidānīṃ kurvanti vākyārthaṃ padāni, ghaṭamiva mṛdādīni?
etadapi nāsti, jñāpakatvāt teṣām |
kā tarhīyaṃ vācoyukteḥ saṃhatyakārīṇi padāni, na cānvitamabhidadhatīti?
padānyanvitaṃ pratyāyanti, nābhidadhatīti; iyaṃ nābhidhātrī śaktiranvitaviṣayā, kintvanvayavyatarekāvagataniṣkṛṣṭasvārthaviṣayaiva | tātparyaśaktistu teṣāmanvitāvagamaparyantā sahavyāpārāt, vyāpārasya tadīyanirākāṅkṣapratyayotpādanaparyantatvāt | tathā hi—
anyathaiva matiśśābdī viṣayeṣu vijṛmbhate |
pratipatturanākāṅkṣapratyayotpādanāvadhiḥ || 100 ||
ata eva padaṃ loke kevalaṃ na prayujyate |
na hi tena nirākaṅkṣā śroturādhīyate matiḥ || 101 ||(nyāyamaṃ.)
nanvabhidhānavyatiriktaḥ ko 'nyaḥ śabdasya kṛts‍naphalaparyantapratyāyanātmā vyāpāraḥ?
asti kaścid yaḥ sarvaireva saṃsargavādibhirapratyākhyeyaḥ | na hi saṃsargo 'bhidhīyate, pratīyate ca vākyāt |
nanu saṃsṛṣṭābhidhāne sati saṃsargaḥ pratīyate, nānyathā |
naitadevam, saṃhatyakāritvādeva saṃsargāvagamasiddheḥ | na hi saṃhatyakaraṇam asaṃsṛṣṭaṃ ca kāryaṃ kvacid dṛśyate |
api ca prakṛtipratyayau hi parasparasāpekṣamarthamabhidadhāte | na ca prakṛtyā pratyayārtho 'bhidhīyate, niyogasya dhātuvācyatvāt | na ca pratyayena prakṛtyartho 'bhidhīyate,
yajyāderliṅādyarthānupaṃpatteḥ | na ca tau pṛthak svakāryaṃ kurutaḥ | evaṃ padānyapi parasparāpekṣīṇi saṃhatya kāryaṃ kariṣyanti | na ca parasparasyārthamabhidhāsyanti, vākyānyapi prakaraṇapatitānyevameva | taduktam— (ś‍lovā.)
prakṛtipratyayau yadvadapekṣete parasparam |
padaṃ padāntaraṃ yad‍vad vākyaṃ vākyāntaraṃ tathā || 102 || iti |
ayameva ca pakṣaḥ śreyān | saṃhatyakāritvaṃ padārthānām asaṅkīrṇārthatvaṃ ca (nyāyamaṃ.)
nirapekṣaprayoge 'yaḥśalākā kalpanā bhavet |
tadanvitābhidhāne tu padāntaramanarthakam || 103 ||
saṃhatyakāripakṣe tu doṣo naiko 'pi yujyate |
tenāyamupagantavyo mārgo vigatakaṇṭakaḥ || 104 ||
abhidhātrī matā śaktiḥ padānāṃ svārthaniṣṭhitā |
teṣāṃ tātparyaśaktistu saṃsargāvagamāvadhiḥ || 105 ||
tenānvitābhidhānaṃ hi nāsmābhiriha mṛṣyate |
anvitapratipattistu bāḍhamabhyupagamyate || 106 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
saṃhatyakāritvācca padānāṃ na svārthābhidhitsayaiva samuccāraṇaṃ, api tu pradhānakāryameva kartum | taduktam—
vākyārthamitaye teṣāṃ pravṛttau nāntarīyakam |
pāke jvāleva kāṣṭhānāṃ padārthapratipādanam || 107 || (ś‍lovā.)
tasmānnānvitābhidhānaṃ nāpyabhihitānāmanvayaḥ | kiṃtu yathopanyastapakṣa eva śreyāniti ||
tadevamākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatāvantaḥ padārthāścatuṣprakāramanvayamanubhavanto vākyārthībhavanti |
nanu cāyogyatāyāmapyanvayo dṛśyate, pacati bhavati, paśya mṛgo dhāvatīti | na hi sādhyaikasvabhāvāyāḥ sādhyatvaṃ sādhanatvaṃ ca yujyata iti |
naivam; sādhyatvenaiva sādhanatvāt | kriyābhyupapattirūpeṇa bhavanasvabhāvā sādha yasvabhāvenaiva karmarūpā | yadeva cāsyā anidantānirdeśyamapariniṣṭhitaṃ bhavanaṃ sādhyaikarūpaṃ tenaivaiṣātra sādhyabhāvaṃ sādhanabhāvaṃ ca pratipadyata iti |
siddhatāvabhāsaḥ kuta iti cet, kartaryutpanno lakārastāṃ siddhatvenāvabhāsayati, yathā corasya rujatīti dhātvartha eva rogalakṣaṇaḥ, kartrantarāśravaṇāt sādhyarūpeṇaiva kartṛbhāvamanubhavasiddhatayāvabhāsate |
yadi vā padasya na padarūpādevādhikārthatā, kiṃ tarhi?, vākyarūpāt; tadyathā puruṣa iti padakāle puruṣo vyatirikta ucyate | yadā tu rājñaḥ puruṣa iti viśeṣasanni— dhiyogyastadā 'sya vyatireko bhavati, puruṣaviśeṣo 'yaṃ rājapuruṣa iti | evaṃ pacatīti naitasmāt padarūpādevādhikārthatvam | yadā tu bhavatīti padāntarasannidhiḥ, tadā vākyakāle puruṣasyeva vyatireka upajāyata iti |
yadi vā na kadācidaparā tadatirekiṇī bhavanakriyā, kaścidaparo vā kartā virodhaheturasti | api tu saiva vyapadeśivadbhāvanyāyena kriyārūpatāṃ bhavitṛtvaṃ ca darśayantī cakāsti |
api caikasyāpyarthasya viṣayabhedena dvidharmatvaṃ dṛśyate, yathā rājñaḥ puruṣasya putra iti puruṣaḥ śeṣī ca bhavati śeṣaśceti rājānaṃ prati śeṣī avicalitasvārthaḥ putrārthāntare śeṣatāmāpadyate | evaṃ bhavati pacatītyatra bhavato 'kartṛtvaṃ sādhyatvaṃ ca bhaviṣyati | paśya mṛgo dhāvatītyatra ca mṛge kartari sādhyabhāvaṃ prādhānyaṃ cājahatsaraṇaṃ dṛśāvaṅgatvaṃ sādhanatvaṃ ca gamiṣyatīti |
athavā 'ayamarthaḥ sādhanamayaṃ sādhyami'—ti rūpasiddhimātrametat, yathā pade ayaṃ prakṛtyartho 'yaṃ pratyayārtha iti, eka evāsāvartho viśiṣṭo vā (a)khaṇḍa eva pratīyate, yathā muṇḍayati carcayatīti | atra muṇḍayati māṇavakamiti muṇḍiḥ keśacchedanavacanaḥ | asya tu vyutpattiḥ muṇḍaṃ karotīti karotisāmānyapravṛttaṃ viśeṣe muṇḍaśabdo 'vasthāpayati | karotiviśeṣo 'yaṃ yasmiṇṇijutpadyate, na karotimātram | evaṃ carcāṃ karoti carcayatīti | ata eva kecinmuṇḍicarcādīn curādiṣu paṭhanti muṇḍa keśakhaṇḍaneṣu muṇḍayati carcayatīti |
evaṃ paśya mṛgo dhāvatīti 'idamatra sādhanapadamidaṃ sādhyami'—tyutprekṣaiṣā | idaṃ tvarthasatattvam—'nātra saraṇaṃ, na darśanaṃ, na mṛgaḥ, kiṃ tarhi? mṛgakartṛko dṛśikarmā saraṇaviśeṣo 'yam akhaṇḍo vākyārtha iti | etena putramicchati putrīyatītyādayo 'pi vyākhyātāḥ ||
(8. ekārthībhāvaḥ)
vyapekṣāvatāṃ samarthānāmanvitārthānāṃ ca padārthānāṃ tilataṇḍulavat kṣīranīravat pāṃsūdakavacca yadavibhāgarūpeṇa bhavanaṃ sa ekārthībhāvaḥ | lakṣaṇaṃ caitat samastaṃ vyastaṃ ca | tena sāpekṣāsamarthasamāsādīnāmupasaṅgrahaḥ |
kaḥ purasya vyapekṣāto bhedaḥ?
ucyate vyapekṣāyāṃ saṅkhyāviśeṣo vyaktābhidhānamupasarjanaviśeṣaṇaṃ cayogaḥ kramāniyamo vyavadhānaṃ yatheṣṭamanyatareṇābhisambandhaḥ śabdāntaraprayogaśca bhavati | ekārthībhāve tvaikapadyamaikaśabdyamaikasvaryamekavibhaktitvamekavadbhāva ekaśeṣaḥ aneka— vidhānāmaikyamekavidhānāṃ cānaikyamiti | tadyathā vyapekṣāyāṃ saṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ—'rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ, rājñoḥ puruṣaḥ, rājñāṃ vā puruṣaḥ |' ekārthībhāve tu tadabhāvo rājapuruṣaḥ | vyapekṣāyāṃ vyaktābhidhānaṃ rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ; ekārthībhāve tu rājapuruṣa ityatra loṇmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanaṃ vibhaktilopo veti nābhidhānavyaktiḥ | vyapekṣāyāmupasarjanasya viśeṣaṇaṃ ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ, ekārthībhāve tadabhāvaḥ, rājapuruṣaḥ | vyapekṣāyāṃ cayogaḥ, rājñaḥ puruṣo brāhmaṇasya ca, ekārthībhāve tu rājapuruṣaḥ | vyapekṣāyāṃ kramāniyamo rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ, puruṣo rājñaḥ, ekārthībhāve tu rājapuruṣa ityeva | vyapekṣāyāṃ vyavadhānamapi rājñaḥ, puruṣo 'yaṃ puruṣo 'yaṃ rājñaḥ; ekārthībhāve tu rājapuruṣa ityeva | vyapekṣāyāṃ yatheṣṭamanyatareṇābhisambandhaḥ, rājñaḥ puruṣo bhāryā veti; ekārthībhāve tu niyamataḥ puruṣeṇaiva sambandho na bhāryayā | vyapekṣāyāṃ śabdāntaraprayogo dadh‍nopasiktaṃ, pariglāno 'dhyayanāyaḥ ekārthībhāve tu naivam, dadhyodanaṃ paryadhyayana iti | ekārthībhāve aikapadyaṃ yathā—'ātmanātṛtīyaḥ kaṇṭhekāla'iti; ekaśabdyaṃ yathā— 'pitarau bhrātarāviti; aikasvaryaṃ yathā—'citraguḥ, brāhmaṇakambala' iti; ekavibhaktitvaṃ yathā— 'nīlotpalaṃ, rājapuruṣa' iti; ekavadbhāvo yathā— gavāśvaṃ, plakṣanyagrodhā iti | ekaśeṣo yathā— akṣā vṛkṣā iti | anekavidhānāmaikyaṃ yathā— putramicchatyātmanaḥ putrīyati, muṇḍaṃ karoti muṇḍayatīti | ekavidhānāmanaikyaṃ yathā— kaṃsavadhamācaṣṭe kaṃsaṃ ghātayati, puṣyacandrayogaṃ jānāti puṣyeṇa candraṃ yojayatīti | vyapekṣāyāṃ tu naivamiti ||
so 'yamekārthībhāvo vyapekṣāvailakṣaṇyena viprathamānassamānassamāsataddhitākhyādiṣu triṣu tridhā vikhyāyate — vākyatulyārthaḥ, vākyādhikārthaḥ, vākyānyārtha iti | teṣu—
vākyatulyārtho yathā— vīraḥ puruṣo vīrapuruṣaḥ, kaṣṭaṃ śritaḥ kaṣṭaśrita iti |
vākyādhikārtho yathā— 'guḍena miśrā dhānāḥ guḍadhānāḥ, śaṅkulayā kṛtaḥ khaṇḍaḥ śaṅkulākhaṇḍa' iti |
vākyānyārtho yathā— 'kuśaṃ lātīti kuśalaḥ, prakṛṣṭo vīṇāyāṃ pravīṇaḥ' ||
athāyaṃ triprakāro 'pyanekadhā bhidyate | tadyathā — nityasamāsaḥ, nityāsamāsaḥ, asamarthasamāsaḥ, aluksamāsaḥ, sāpekṣasamāsaḥ, nirapekṣasamāsaḥ, pūrvapadapradhānaḥ, uttarapadapradhānaḥ, ubhayapadapradhānaḥ, anyapadapradhānaḥ, anyathāpradhānaḥ, anyathopasarjanaḥ, tiṅsamāsaḥ, prātipadikasamāsaḥ, upapadasamāsaḥ, prādisamāsaḥ, nañsamāsaḥ, ekadeśisamāsaḥ, sāmānyasamāsaḥ, viśeṣasamāsaḥ, samānādhikaraṇaḥ, bhinnādhikaraṇaḥ, upamānasasamāsaḥ, upameyasamāsa iti | teṣu —
nityasamāso yathā— lohitaśāliḥ, gaurakharaḥ, uddālapuṣpabhañjikā, dantalekhaka iti |
nityāsamāso yathā— akiñcitkurvāṇaḥ, amāṣaṃ haramāṇaḥ, agādhamutsṛp‍tāḥ, chātrāṇāṃ pañcama iti |
asamarthasamāso yathā— asūryaṃpaśyā rājadārāḥ, apunargeyāḥ ślokāḥ, aśrāddhabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ, alavaṇabhojī bhikṣuriti |
aluksamāso yathā— stokānmuktaḥ, ātmanātṛtīyaḥ, paśyatoharaḥ, kaṇṭhekāla iti |
sāpekṣasamāso yathā— yajñadattasya bhrātṛbhāryā, viṣṇumitrasya gurukulam, cūtasya phalarasaḥ, priyāyāḥ stanasparśa iti |
nirapekṣasamāso yathā— varṣaśatamāyurasya śatāyuḥ, śākapradhānaḥ pārthivaḥ śākapārthivaḥ, aśvayukto ratho 'śvarathaḥ, aśreṇayaḥ śreṇayaḥ kṛtāḥ śreṇīkṛtā iti |
pūrvapadapradhāno yathā— upakumbham, nirmakṣikam, bahirgrāmam, pāregaṅgamiti |
uttarapadapradhāno yathā— ārūḍhavānaro vṛkṣaḥ, ūḍharatho 'naḍvān, citragurdevadattaḥ, mattamātaṅga vanamiti |
anyathāpradhāno yathā— unmattagaṅgaṃ, pañcakapālaḥ, dvitrāḥ, kṛṣṇaśāra iti |
anyathopasarjano yathā— śākaprati, prāp‍tajīvikaḥ, gogarbhiṇī, ag‍nistoka iti |
tiṅsamāso yathā— astikṣīrā, ehivaṇijā, aśnītapibatā, khādatamodateti |
prātipadikasamāso yathā— dadhisek, carmakrīti |
upapadasamāso yathā— kumbhakāraḥ, paṅkajam, uṣṭrakrośī, sahayuddheti |
prādisamāso yathā— niṣkauśāmbiḥ, utpaśyaḥ, durāsadaḥ, suprabodha iti |
nañ‌sa‌māso yathā— abrāhmaṇaḥ, anekaḥ, abhāryaḥ, apacasīti |
ekadeśisamāso yathā— candra iva mukhamasyāścandramukhī, mṛgīva capalā mṛgacapalā, śastrīva śyāmā śastrīśyāmā, ananyena sadṛśī ananyasadṛśī |
upameyasamāso yathā— 'vyāghra iva puruṣaḥ puruṣavyāghraḥ, karīva kalabhaḥ karikalabhaḥ, śārdūla iva rājā rājaśārdūlaḥ, candra iva mukhaṃ mukhacandra iti ||
(upamānamupameyañca)
kiṃ punarupamānaṃ kiṃ vopameyaṃ, kiṃ yadevopamānaṃ tadevopameyam, āhosvidanyadupamānamanyadupameyam?
kiṃcātaḥ?
yadi yadevopamānaṃ tadevopameyam, upamārtho na ghaṭate, na hi bhavati gauriva gauḥ; anyadupamānamanyadupameyaṃ, tathāpyupamārtho na ghaṭate, na hi bhavati gaurivāśva iti | evaṃ tarhi yatra kiṃcitsāmānyaṃ kaścicca viśeṣaḥ tatropamānopameye bhavataḥ |
kiṃ vaktavyametat? na hi | kathamanuktaṃ gamyate?
mānaṃ hi nāmānirjñātajñānārthamupādīyate | yathā prasthādimānamanirjñātasya dhānyādermeyasyātyantāvacchedāyopādīyate |
tatsamīpe yannātyantāya mimīte tadupamānaṃ, yathā gauriva gavayaḥ | gaurasya nirjñātaḥ gavayo 'nirjñātaḥ |
tarhi yasya gavayo nirjñātaḥ syāt gauranirjñātaḥ, kartavyaṃ tena gavaya iva gauriti |
bāḍhaṃ kartavyam, yathā bhedasādṛśyādhyāsitamūrtayaḥ padārthāḥ parasparamaniyamenopa— mānopameyabhāvamadhigacchanti, yathā candra iva mukhaṃ kāminyāṃ, mukhamiva candro
yāminyām | yatra punarbhedasādṛśyādhyāsitamūrtitvaṃ na, tatropamānopameyabhāvo 'pi na | yathā gauriva gauḥ, gaurivāśva iti |
nanu ya ete bhedasādṛśyādhyāsitāḥ padārthāste nāntareṇa deśakāla— kriyādisampāditaṃ virodhaṃ bhavitumarhantīti sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattiḥ?
naivam; yadyapyupamānamupameyaṃ ca paramārthato bhinnaṃ, tathāpyupamānaśabdā gauṇīṃ vṛttimāśrityopameye vartamānāstayorbhedaṃ tirodadhati | tathā hi — yadā vyāghrādayaḥ śauryādyatiśayanibandhanamupamānopameyasambandhamanubhūya tataḥ upamānopameyasambandhādhyā— ropitā bhedā upameye vartante vyāghrasadṛśo 'yaṃ vyāghra iti, tadā puruṣādiśrutibhirabhinnā— dhikaraṇāḥ samasyanta iti |
kiṃ punarupamānopameyapratipattinibandhanebhya eva śabdebhyaḥ sādṛśyapratipattiḥ? uta tebhyaścānyebhyaśceti?
kiṃ cātaḥ?
yadi tebhya eva, puruṣaṃ vyāghraṃ ca vīkṣasvetyatrāpi syāt | ivaprayogavaiyarthyaṃ ca | atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ, puruṣo vyāghra ivetyeva syāt, na puruṣavyāghra iti |
yathecchasi tathāstu |
astu tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ |
nanu coktaṃ puruṣaṃ vyāghraṃ ca vīkṣasvetyatrāpi sādṛśyapratipattiḥ syāt | iha hi puruṣavyāghrayorvīkṣaṇakriyāsamāveśamātraṃ vivakṣitam, na sādṛśyam |
nanu vivakṣāto 'pi sādṛśyapratipattāvivādiśabdopādānamanarthakam | yatra mukhyavṛttivyatikrameṇa gauṇīṃ vṛttimāśrityopamānaśabdā upameye prayujyante tatraiva ivādiśabdavikalāḥ sādṛśyaṃ gamayanti, yathā kaścidavyāghraṃ puruṣaṃ vyāghra ityāha, tena manyāmahe vyāghrasadṛśo 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ | tataḥ vyāghradharmāṇāṃ śauryabalavattvādīnāṃ vyāghraśabdāt puruṣe pratipattirbhaviṣyati | yadā punarupamānopameyaśabdā mukhyārthapratipattaye vivakṣitopamānopameya— bhāveṣu vākyeṣu svarūpābhedādaśaktāḥ sādṛśyamavagamayituṃ, tadā 'pekṣante dvitīyamivādiśabdaprayogamiti |
kiṃ punarihodāharaṇam?
śastrīva śyāmā śastrīśyāmeti |
nanu cātra śyāmāśabdopāttasya dharmasyopamānopameyayostulyatāvadyotanāyevaśabdaḥ prayujyate | vyāghra iva puruṣa ityatra tu sāmānyaprayogābhāvāt kasya puruṣavyāghrayo— ssādhāraṇyamivaśabdenāvadyotyata iti?
ucyate— śabdaḥ kvacidabhidhāvṛttyā arthaṃ bodhayati, yathā guḍaśabdo guḍadravyam; kvacid gamakavṛttyā, yathā guḍadravyāvinābhāvi mādhuryam, evamiha vyāghraśabdena vyāghrāvinābhāvi śauryādikaṃ gamitaṃ, tasya vyāghrapuruṣayossādṛśyasiddha‍yarthamubha— yādhikaraṇatāvadyotanamivena kriyata iti | etena śastrīśyāmetyapi vyākhyātam | atrāpyanupāttamapi devadattā iti gamyate |
k‍va punarayaṃ śyāmāśabdo vartate? śastryāmityāha |
kena tarhīdānīṃ devadattā gamyate?
samāsena | yadāha upamānāni sāmānyavacanaiḥ (2.1.55) samasyante; samānatvaṃ ca sādhāraṇye sati syāt | tattu devadattāmantareṇa nopapadyata iti |
yadyevaṃ śastrīśyāmo devadatta iti na siddha‍yati | upasarjanasya (1.2.48) iti hrasvatvaṃ bhaviṣyati |
yadi tarhi upasarjanānyevaṃjātīyakānyapi bhavanti, tittirikalmāṣī kumbhakapālalohinītyanupasarjanalakṣaṇa īkāro na prāp‍noti |
evaṃ tarhi śastryāmeva śastrīśabdo vartate, śyāmāśabdastu devadattāyām | evamapi guṇo 'nirdiṣṭo bhavati | bahavaśca śastryāṃ guṇāḥ— 'sūkṣmā ślakṣṇā pṛthuḥ śyāme'ti |
anirdiśyamānasyāpi guṇasya bhavati loke sampratyayaḥ | tadyathā— candramukhī devadatteti | bahavaścandre guṇāḥ, yā cāsau priyadarśanatā sā gamyate | yathā ca vyāghro 'yaṃ puruṣa iti bahuṣvapi vyāghraguṇeṣu śauryaṃ balavattā vā pratīyata iti | evamapi 'samānādhikaraṇena' iti vartate | vyadhikaraṇatvāt samāso na prāp‍noti |
kiṃ hi vacanānna bhavati?
yadyapi tāvad vacanāt samāsaḥ syāt, mṛgīva capalā mṛgacapaleti samānā— dhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvo na prāp‍noti | evaṃ tarhi tasyāmevobhayaṃ vartate | etaccātra yuktaṃ yattasyāmevobhayaṃ vartate; itarathā hi bahvapekṣyaṃ syāt | yadā tāvadevaṃ vigrahaḥ kriyate 'yathā śastrī śyāmā evaṃ devadattā' iti, tadā śyāmeti devadattāyāmapekṣyaṃ syāt | yadāpyevaṃ vigrahaḥ
kriyate śastrīśyāmā devadatteti, tadāpi śyāmeti śastryāpekṣyaṃ syāt | yadā tu śastrīśyāmā cāsau śyāmā ca śastrīśyāmeti, tadā na kiñcidapekṣyate, sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca bhavati |
nanvevaṃ sati śastrīśabdasya devadattāyāṃ pravṛttinimittamanirdiṣṭaṃ bhavati; pratīyamānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet, kiṃ taditi pṛcchāmi | yadi śyāmatvameva, śyāmeti śabdasyoktārthatvādaprayogaḥ prāp‍noti | na hi guṇavṛttyā pratipāditeṣu guṇeṣu tadabhidhānāya guṇavacanaḥ prayujyate, na hi bhavati puruṣo 'yaṃ vyāghraśūra iti | athānabhihitaṃ taikṣṇyādikamupādāya śastrīśabdo devadattāyāṃ vartate, tarhi tīkṣṇaśyāmaguṇavacanayoḥ khañjakūṇavat samāse 'upamānāni sāmānyavacanaiḥ' iti virudhyate, śyāmaśastrīti prayogaḥ prāp‍noti |
nanu pakṣatraye 'pi doṣadarśanāt pakṣāntarābhāvācca kinna bhavitavyamevopamāna— samāsena?
bhavitavyam, kintu pūrvottarapakṣau vyudasya madhyame pakṣe, śastrīva śyāmā devadatte— tyavaiyadhikaraṇye 'pi vacanasāmarthyāt |
nanūktaṃ tatra mṛgaṃcapaleti samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvo na prāp‍noti, naivam | neha pūrvapadaṃ śastrītvena (mṛgītvena) vivakṣitam, api tu mṛgatvajātimātreṇa, yathā mṛgakṣīraṃ kukkuṭāṇḍamiti | 'upāmānasamāse guṇavacanasya viśeṣabhāktvāt sāmānyavacanatvāprasiddhiḥ' | yataḥ śyāmāśabdo 'yaṃ sādṛśyasiddhaye śastrīśabdenābhi— sambadhyamāno viśeṣavacanaḥ sampadyate |
naivam; śyāmatvasya ubhayatra bhāvāt tad‍vācakatvācca śabdasya sāmānya— vacanatvaprasiddheḥ |
na cāvaśyaṃ sa eva sāmānyavacanaḥ | yo bahūnāṃ sāmānyamāha; dvayorapi yaḥ sāmānyamāha, so 'pi samānyavacanaḥ |
athavā 'sāmānyavacanaiḥ' ityetena sarvaśca śabdo 'nyenābhisabadhyamāno viśeṣavacanaḥ sampadyate | ta evaṃ vijñāsyāmaḥ — 'prāgabhisambandhādyaḥ sāmānyavacana' iti |
nanvevaṃ sati 'upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ' ityatra sāmānyāprayogagrahaṇamatiricyate |
vyāghrādayo 'pi bhedopanibandhanasyevādeḥ prayoge yadopamāna eva vartante tadā sāmānyaprayogamapekṣante— 'puruṣo 'yaṃ vyāghra iva śūraḥ, siṃha iva balavāniti |' abhedopakrame
cābhidhāne sambandhanimittasyopamānaśabdaireva antarbhāvitatvādaprayogaḥ sāmānyaśabdasyeti | aprayoge 'pi ca sāmānyadharmāvasāyaścandramukhavad‍bhaviṣyati | taduktaṃ— 'siṃho vyāghra iti pūjāyāṃ, śvā kāka iti kutsāyām' iti |
naivam, yadyantarbhūtopamā na kutsārthasambandhapratipad‍vyāghrādiśabdairupameyaṃ puruṣādi pūjārthaṃ cābhidhīyate |
tathāpi tannimittasyānekatvāniyamāya nimittatṛtīyāntaśauryādipadaprayogo na virudhyate, puruṣo 'yaṃ vyāghraḥ śauryeṇeti |
bhinne 'pi vastunyabhedopacāraḥ sārūpyamātraṃ gamayet, na tasyātmātiśayam; yathā hi sumanāyate durmanāyate abhimanāyata iti sudurabhīnāṃ bhavatyarthaviśeṣapakṣe pratyayenopāttārthānāmapi pratyayasya rūpābhedādanavasīyamānavibhāgamupasargārthamavacchettuṃ prayogaḥ | kathaṃ puruṣavyāghrādau tasyāḥ pūjāyā nimittabhedasambhave niyamāya sadṛśabhāgopanipātī śabdaḥ prayujyata iti |
(taddhitākhyātārthaikārthībhāvāḥ)
evamayamekārthībhāvastaddhitākhyātayorapi anantaprakāra eva draṣṭavyaḥ | tatra— (taddhite)
taddhite sāmānyena tridhā sambandhaviṣayaḥ, kārakaviṣayaḥ, svārthaviṣayaśca | teṣu— sambandho dvidhā— pradhānamapradhānaṃ ca |
pradhānaṃ yathā— 'gāvo 'sya santi gomān, salāturo 'syābhijanaḥ sālāturīya' iti |
apradhānaṃ yathā— 'vasiṣṭhasyāpatyaṃ vāsiṣṭhaḥ, cāṣāṇāṃ samūhaścāṣami' ti |
kārakaṃ dvidhā— pradhānamapradhānaṃ ca |
pradhānaṃ yathā— 'viṣeṇa vadhyo viṣyaḥ śatruḥ, padamasmin dṛśyaṃ padyaḥ kardama' iti |
apradhānaṃ yathā— vyākaraṇaṃ vetti adhīte vā vaiyākaraṇaḥ, akṣairdīvyatyākṣika' iti |
svārtho dvidhā—mukhya upacaritaśca |
mukhyo yathā—'yava eva yāvakaḥ (yavakaḥ), maṇireva maṇika' iti |
upacarito yathā— 'kuśāgrīyā buddhiḥ, kākatālīyamiva kākatālīyo nyāya' iti |
(ākhyāte)
ākhyāte 'pi tridhā kārakeṇa, sambandhinā prādibhiśca |
kārakeṇa yathā—'abhṛśo bhṛśo bhavati bhṛśāyate, śabdaṃ karoti śabdāyate, hastinā atikrāmati atihastayati, kaṣṭāya karmaṇe krāmati kaṣṭāyate, pāśān vimocayati vipāśayati, prāsāda ivācarita prāsādīyatīti |
sambandhinā yathā—'vyākaraṇasya sūtraṃ karoti vyākaraṇaṃ sūtrayati, kaṃsasya vadhamācaṣṭe kaṃsaṃ ghātayati, ā rātrervivāsamāste rātriṃ vivāsayati, puṣyeṇa candrasya yogaṃ jānāti puṣyeṇa candraṃ yojayati, māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryodgamaṃ prāp‍noti māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryamudgamayati, kālasya gamanamupaviṣṭaḥ pratipālayati kālaṃ gamayatīti |
prādayaḥ punaḥ ṣọdhā—vācakāḥ, dyotakāḥ, sahābhidhāyakāḥ, viśeṣakāḥ, kāryārthakāḥ nirarthakāśceti | te ca kriyayaiva sambadhyamānāḥ kriyāpradhānatvādākhyātasya tad‌vyapadeśabhājo bhavanti | tatropasargāṇāṃ vācakatvaṃ yathā— 'prādayo gatādyarthe prathamayā, prācāryaḥ, prāntevāsīti | atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitīyāya, atikhaṭvaḥ, atimāla iti | avādayaḥ kruṣṭādyarthe tṛtīyayā, avakokilam, avamayūramiti | paryādayo glānādyarthe caturthyā, paryadhyayanaḥ, paripravacana iti | nirādayaḥ krāntādyarthe pañcamyā, nirvārāṇasiḥ, niṣkauśāmbiriti | evaṃ prapatitaḥ parṇaḥ praparṇaḥ, prācīnaṃ palāśaṃ prapalāśaṃ, saṅgatā āpo 'sminniti samīpam, saṅgatamakṣeṇa samakṣamiti |
dhātulīnasyaivārthaviśeṣasya prakāśakatvaṃ dyotakatvam | dyotyāśca 'tadanyaḥ tatsadṛśastadviruddhastadabhāvastadutkarṣastadapakarṣa' iti ṣaḍarthā bhavantīti | teṣu
tadanyo yathā— 'pratīkṣate, upakramata' iti; tatsadṛśo yathā 'saṃvadati, anukarotī' ti;
tadviruddho yathā— 'pratiṣṭhate, unmajjatīti;
tadabhāvo yathā— 'viyujyante, prasmarantī' ti;
tadutkarṣo yathā— 'pragalbhate, atikrāmatīti;
tadapakarṣo yathā—vihasati, prāśnātīti |
atra ca yo 'sau kriyātmabhūto dharmaḥ kālaharaṇādistaddhātvabhihitamevā— sattvabhūtamanabhidadhat prādiravadyotayati | yathā 'kṣinikocādayo 'nabhidadhata evārthān pradarśayanti, evaṃ kriyāsthān prārambhādīnabruvanta eva prādayo 'vadyotayanti |
dhātorekākinaḥ kriyāviśeṣābhidhānāsāmarthye sahakāribhāvaḥ sahābhidhāyakatvam | tatrāntaraṅgo, bāhyaḥ, avyabhicārī, vyabhicārī, vyavahitaḥ, saviśeṣaśca sahābhidhāyako bhavati | teṣu—
antaraṅgo yathā— 'saṅgrāmayate, asaṅgrāmayata |
bāhyo yathā— anurudhyate, anvarudhyata |
avyabhicārī yathā— adhīte, adhyeti |
vyabhicārī yathā— ācāmati, saṃdhukṣayati |
vyavahito yathā— pucchamudasyatyutpucchayate, vyasyati vipucchayate |
saviśeṣo yathā— senayā abhiyāti abhiṣeṇayati, vīṇayopagāyati upavīṇayati |
sahārthābhidhāne tūpasargayorbhedapratipattiḥ katham?
yadyapi dhāturupasargaṃ na vyabhicarati, vyabhicaratyevopasargo dhātum | ataḥ śakyate 'nvavavyatirekābhyāṃ bhedaḥ kalpayitum | yāvānayaṃ samādirupasargo 'nyatra dṛṣṭaḥ ihāpi tāvāneva bhaviturbhavatīti |
sajātīyebhyo vijātīyebhyaścāvacchedako viśeṣakaḥ | sa ṣọdhā— prakṛtiviśeṣakaḥ, prakṛtyarthaviśeṣakaḥ, pratyayaviśeṣakaḥ, pratyayārthaviśeṣakaḥ, ubhayaviśeṣakaḥ, ubhayārthaviśeṣakaśceti | teṣu—
prakṛtiviśeṣako yathā— vijayate, parājayate |
prakṛtyarthaviśeṣako yathā— saṅkrīḍati, saṅkrīḍate |
pratyayaviśeṣako yathā— viśālam, viśaṅkaṭam |
pratyayārthaviśeṣako yathā— abhimanāyate, durmanāyate |
ubhayaviśeṣako yathā— anuvyacalat, prāvarṣat |
ubhayārthaviśeṣako yathā— upatiṣṭhati, upatiṣṭhate |
atra ca prādiḥ prakarṣadikamarthaṃ bruvāṇaḥ kriyāṃ sāmānyenopagṛh‍ṇāti, na tu kriyāsāmānyaviśeṣayorātmānaṃ niyamayati |
dhāturapi kriyāṃ bruvan prakarṣādikamarthaṃ sāmānyenopagṛh‍ṇāti, na tu sāmānyaviśeṣayorātmānaṃ niyamayati |
parasparopaśleṣe tu tayorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo nīlotpalādivad bhavati |
kāryārthatvaṃ yathā— prayuṅkte, parākaroti, abhiṣuṇoti, praṇamati, vittaṃ, samīpam iti |
ātmanepadaṃ, parasmaipadaṃ, ṣatvaṃ, ṇatvaṃ, tatvam, ītvaṃ ca kāryāṇyupasargayoge bhavanti |
nirarthakatvaṃ yathā—nihnute, nikhañjanti, pralambate, saṃśrayatīti | atra padopacayamātre prādiḥ prayukta iti nirarthakatvam | āhuśca—(vāpa. 2.188)
sa vācako viśeṣāṇāṃ sambhave dyotako 'pi vā |
śaktyādhānāya dhātorvā sahakārī prayujyate || 108 ||
kriyāviśeṣako vā syāt kāryārthaṃ vopadiśyate |
padopacayamātre vā 'narthakaḥ prādiriṣyate || 109 || iti
(vākyaikārthībhāvaḥ)
evamayamanekarūpaḥ padaikārthībhāvaḥ | evaṃ vākyaikārthībhāvo 'pi |
tatra 'ākhyātaṃ sāvyayakārakaviśeṣaṇaṃ vākyaṃ, ekatiṅ vākyam' ityādayo vikalpāḥ | tatra caikavākyasthāt padāduttarayostiṅāmantritapadayornighātaḥ | yuṣmadasma— dorvānnāvādaya ādeśāḥ | 'vākyasya ṭeḥ pluta udātta' iti tu vākyācāmantyasya pluta ityādīni prayojanānyabhidhīyante | kriyākārakāvyayaviśeṣaṇapadārthānāṃ ca parasparamupakāryopakārakabhāvenāvasthitānāṃ 'bhāvanā, vidhiḥ, pratibhā' veti vākyārthaḥ prathame | evaṃ vākyānāmapi parasparamupamānopameyabhāvādibhirivādiśabdaprayoge muktakādiṣvekārthībhāvo bhavati | etenaikakriyākārakābhiniveśinoryugalakasandānitaka— kalāpakakulakādayo vākyaviśeṣā vyākhyātāḥ | tatra—
dvābhyāṃ catuṣpadībhyāṃ yugalakam,
tisṛbhiḥ sandānitakam,
caturbhiḥ kalāpakam,
pañcādibhiḥ kulakamiti saṃjñā vijñāyate |
etenaikapraghaṭṭakopanibandhānāṃ subhāṣitānāṃ samūhaḥ saṅghātaḥ, anekapraghaṭṭakopanibaddhānāṃ tu kośa ityapi vyākhyātam |
nagarartūdyānacandrārkodayārṇavavarṇanādayastu saṅghātarūpā eva prabandhāntaḥpātino vākyasamūhāḥ prakaraṇavyapadeśabhājo 'vāntaravākyatāṃ labhante | tadarthāścaikārthībhāvamanu— bhavanti |
yastu tairupakriyamāṇo mahāvākyārthaḥ sargabandhādāvākhyāyikādau mukhapratimukhagarbha— vimarśanirvahaṇākhyaiḥ pañcasandhibhirupakṣepaparikarādibhiścatuṣṣaṣṭisandhyaṅgairaṅgaṣoḍaśakarūpa— bhāratyādirūpavṛtticatuṣṭayena ca yathāyogamupakṛtaḥ kṛtānyonyaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ subhadrāharaṇaṃ jānakīharaṇamityādinā mahāvākyārtharūpeṇa prathate, sa prabandhaikārthībhāvo 'para ityākhyāyate | yastu tadrūparāmāyaṇādiprabandhārthānāmavadhāraṇenopahitasaṃskārasya 'rāmavad‍vartitavyaṃ na rāvaṇādivad' ityādividhiniṣedhapratibhāviśeṣa upajāyate, sa samastāviśvavyāpi caturvargaikahetuḥ parā mahāvākyaikārtho 'rthamūrtyā vipariṇatamanādi— nidhanamakhaṇḍaṃ śabdabrahmetyucyate |
akhaṇḍaḥ saiṣa vākyārthaḥ śabdabrahmeti gīyate |
śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati || 110 ||
idamādyaṃ padasthānaṃ siddhisopānaparvaṇām |
iyaṃ sā mokṣamāṇānāmajihmā rājapaddhatiḥ || 111 || (vāpa. 1.16)
uktāścatastro 'tha punaścatastraḥ śabdārthasambandhabhidaḥ krameṇa |
catastra evātha vacoviśeṣe niṣeduṣīstāḥ parikīrtayāmaḥ || 112 ||
iti mahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe sāpekṣaśabdaśaktiprakāśo nāma
|| aṣṭamaḥ prakāśaḥ ||8||
sanātanaḥ śīlitasāhitīkaḥ sarvāṅgasampūrṇatayā yathārtham |
prakāśametaṃ supaṭhaṃ vidhāya prasāsadīti śritakāvyatattvaḥ ||
atha
śṛṅgāraprakāśe navamaḥ prakāśaḥ
doṣahānaguṇopādānaprakāśo nāma
tatra abhidhāvivakṣādibhirnirūpite śabdārthayoḥ sāhitye vākyasya prayogayogyatā prayogānarhatā ca niścīyate | yadāha—'ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyakprayuktaḥ svarge loke kāmadhugbhavati' (mabhā. 6.1.84) | duṣprayuktaḥ punaradharmāya sampadyate | samyakprayogaścāsya tadopapadyate yadā doṣahānaṃ guṇopādānamalaṅkārayogo rasāviyogaśca bhavati | teṣāṃ ca prathamaṃ doṣahānameva vidheyam | yataḥ kamanīyarūpādisampadupetamapi vapuḥ kuṣṭhabindunaikenāpi daurbhāgyamanubhavati | uktaṃ ca—(kāvyāda. 1.7)
tadalpamapi nopekṣyaṃ kāvye duṣṭaṃ kathaṃcana |
syād vapuḥ sundaramapi śvitreṇaikena durbhagam || 1 ||
kiṃ ca— (bhāmahā. 1.12)
nākavitvamadharmāya mṛtaye daṇḍanāya vā |
kukavitvaṃ punassākṣānmṛtimāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ || 2 ||
(9. doṣahānam)
doṣāstridhā 1. padadoṣāḥ, 2. vākyadoṣāḥ, 3. vākyārthadoṣāśca |
tatra ca vākyasya prayogayogyatāyāḥ prayogānarhatāyāśca niścayārthaṃ vimarśe padagatadoṣanirūpaṇamanipuṇopajñamiva vijñāyate | na hi vākyāvasthāyāṃ padāni padārthā vā vidyante | yathā hi citre nīlapītaraktādayaḥ. pānake guḍāmalakamarīcādayaḥ, grāmarāge ṣaḍjarṣabhagāndhārādayaḥ citrādibhyaḥ pṛthaktvena nāvabhāsante, tathā vākye 'pi kriyākārakaviśeṣaṇādipadāni tadarthā vā na vākyavākyārthābhyāṃ bhedenaiva pratīyante |
vākyārtho hi padaparyāyairakhaṇḍa evābhidhīyamāno dṛśyate | tadyathā— muṇḍaṃ karoti muṇḍayati, ś‍lokairupastauti upaślokayati, śrutvā cchando 'dhīte śrotriyaḥ, parasya
kṣetre 'ticaran cikitsyate kṣetriyaḥ, strughnamabhiniṣkrāmati dvāraṃ sraugh‍nam, kalāpiṣūd‌bhidyamānakalāpeṣu vigatakalāpeṣu vā deyamṛṇaṃ kālāpakam, keśeṣu keśeṣu ca gṛhītvā pravṛttaṃ yuddhaṃ keśākeśi, gauravāya hvāyakamicchati jihvāyakīyiṣati, aśnīta pibata iti sātatyena yasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ tāmātmanaḥ icchatyaśnītapibatīyati, dakṣiṇe pārśve lubdhena viṣadigdhena śareṇa marmaṇi nirmitaṃ vraṇaṃ yasya mṛgasya sa dakṣiṇermā, dakṣiṇāt samudrādadrirājaṃ himavantaṃ yāvad yojanānāṃ daśaśatīṃ vijayamānaḥ samastarat‍nānāṃ ya āyatanaṃ sa cakravartī | yo rājasūyayājī ya īśvaro maṇḍalasya sakalasya yaścājñayaiva rājñaḥ praśāsti saṃrāṭ sa vijñeya iti | api ca lalāṭaṃ paśyati lālaṭikaḥ, kukkuṭīṃ caratīti kaukkuṭikaḥ; tatra lalāṭadarśanena dūre avasthānaṃ lakṣyate, tenānupaśleṣakāryeṣu cānupasthānam; yaḥ sevakaḥ svāminaḥ kāryeṣu nopayujyate, lalāṭameva vā yaḥ kopaprasādasaṃrakṣaṇāya paśyati sa lālāṭika ityucyate | tathā kukkuṭīśabdena kukkuṭīpāto lakṣyate, tena deśasyālpatā; yo hi bhikṣuravikṣip‍tadṛṣṭiḥ pādavikṣepadeśe cakṣuḥ saṃyamya gacchaṃstāvatyeva deśe carati, yo vā tathāvidhamātmānamatathāvidho 'pi saṃdarśayati, kukkuṭīpātānāṃ dāmbhikānāṃ ceṣṭāṃ vācarati yassaḥ kaukkuṭika ucyate |
evaṃ loke lajjākaratvādaprakāśyatvena kūpe prakṣepaṇamivārhati yadakāryaṃ tatkaupīnam, tadiva yad‍gūhanīyamaṅga tadapi kaupīnam; tasya yadācchādakaṃ vastrakhaṇḍaṃ valkalādi tadapi kaupīnamevocyate | kiṃ ca siddhasyānnasya vardhanāyānāhūtāpi yopatiṣṭhate sā vadhrikā; tadvadaprārthito 'pi yaḥ parikarmaṇi vyāpriyate so 'pi nindyatvena vadhrikeva vadhrikā; praśasyo 'pi viruddhalakṣaṇayā hatabhag‍nādivad(?) yaḥ tad‍vyapadeśabhāgbhavati so 'pi vardhikā darśanīyo manuṣya iti vardhiketyevocyate | tathā—
'ardhaṃ jaratyāḥ kaścit kāmayate 'rdhaṃ pariharati, evaṃ kaścit kāryasyārdhamādriyate ardhamavajahāti, tatrārdhamiva jaratyā yadardhaṃ kāryasya tasya kāmina iva yadanuṣṭhānaṃ tadardhajaratīyamityucyate |' yathā cāvijānato 'pi ghuṇakīṭasya yadṛcchayā kāṣṭhamutkirataḥ kadācidakṣaramuttiṣṭhati, tadvadaśāstrajñasya yādṛcchikaṃ yadanavadyakarmanirmāṇaṃ tad‍ghuṇākṣarīyamityucyate |
evaṃ ca yathā padaparyāyavākyānāṃ akhaṇḍa evāvibhaktoddeśavibhāga eko 'rtho 'bhidhe— yastathā devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklāṃ daṇḍenetyevamādīnāṃ padaparyāyāṇāmapi vākyānāṃ sanniviṣṭe 'nekaśaktirūpaḥ sarvopādhiviśiṣṭakriyātmā naṣṭoddeśavibhāga eka eva
abhidheyo bhavati | padānāṃ tu prakṛtipratyayādivadavidvatpratipattyarthameva anvayavya— tirekābhyāṃ vyāvahāriko 'rthāpoddhāraḥ śabdāpoddhāraśca kriyate | apoddhṛtānāṃ ca viniviṣṭabhedānāmiva punaryogo vidhīyate | na caitāvatā tadgatadoṣaguṇanirūpaṇamapi vidheyaṃ bhavati | na hi darśanīyaṃ citraṃ svādu pānakaṃ śrāvyo grāmarāga iti vaktavye kaścidabhidhatte śobhanā nīladayo guḍādayaḥ ṣaḍjādayo veti |
ucyate— apyāyuṣmān padapadārthānāmiva vākyāvasthāyāṃ, vākyavākyārthā— nāmapyavāntaravākyāvasthāyāmasatyatvaṃ manyate? yathā duhyatāṃ gauḥ, upādhyāyastatpayasā bhuktvā māmadhyāpayatu, yena māmadhiyānaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitā tuṣyati, tuṣṭaśca modakānme dadātīti |
kiṃ cātaḥ?
yadi manyate, padaiḥ kimaparāddhaṃ, yena tad‌gatadoṣaguṇanirūpaṇaṃ na mṛṣyate ?
atha na manyate, tathāpi padaiḥ kimaparāddham, yena tulye 'pyārambhakatve padānāmevāsatyatvamabhyupagamyate, na vākyānām |
atha vākyānyapyavāntaravākyāvasthāyāmasatyāni? tarhi avāntaravākyānāmapi mahāvākyāvasthāyāṃ, mahāvākyānāmapi vidyāsthānāvasthāyāṃ, vidyāsthānānāmapi śabdabrahmāvasthāyāṃ, śabdabrahmaṇo 'pi parabrahmāvasthāyāṃ na satyatvamiti na kasyacit kiṃcidapi vicāryaṃ bhavati |
athābhedavādināmapi vyavahārārthamavaś‍yameva bhedo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ tadgatadoṣaguṇa— vicāraṇā cānuṣṭheyā |
tarhyasau padāt prabhṛtyevārabhyamāṇā śreyasīti nastarkaḥ | padeṣu hi nirdoṣeṣu guṇavatsu ca vākyamapi tadārabdhaṃ tathāvidhameva bhavati | yadāha—yādṛśād vai jāyate tādṛś‍yeva bhavati |
na ca padasyātyantamasatyatvaṃ bhavānapi manyate, yo 'bhidyamānāvapyavidva— tpratipattyarthamanvayavyatirekābhyāmapoddha‍ṛtya padapadārthau bhinnāviva punaryojayati | yadi ca sarvathaivāsatyatvamavācakatvaṃ ca padānāmabhyupeyate, tattadārabdhavākyānāmapi tathātve sarvavyavahārocchedaḥ prāpnoti ||
api cākhaṇḍavākyārthapakṣe ya ete padārthopanibandhanāḥ vākyārthaviśeṣa— pratipattihetavo vākyeṣu dharmāssaṃdṛś‍yante, te 'pi padānāmānarthakyāt na prāpnuvanti |
ke punarete?
(vākyadharmāḥ —48)
pradhānaṃ, śeṣaḥ, prayojakam, aprayojakam, nāntarīyakam, mukhyam, gauṇam, vyāpakam, laghu, guru, arthavādaḥ, anuvādaḥ, bhedavivakṣā, abhedavivakṣā, vyavahitakalpanā, upacārakalpanā, tad‌bhāvāpattiḥ, yogyatāpattiḥ, sambandhābādhanaṃ, vikalpaḥ, samuccayaḥ, niyamaḥ, niṣedhaḥ, pratinidhiḥ, ūhaḥ, bādhaḥ, tantram, prasaṅgaḥ, āvṛttiḥ, bhedaḥ, (atideśaḥ)1 sāmānyātideśaḥ, viśeṣātideśaḥ, adhikāraḥ, adhyāhāraḥ, vipariṇāmaḥ, vākyaśeṣaḥ, avadhiḥ, apoddhāraḥ, anirjñātapraśnaḥ, kriyāntaravyudāsaḥ, liṅgād vibhedaḥ, liṅgādibhedaḥ, śabdāntarādibhedaḥ, śaktyādibhedaḥ, śrutyādiviniyogaḥ, śrutyādibalābalam, śrutyādikramaḥ, kramasambheda iti |
(1—2 pradhānam, śeṣaḥ)
tatra sādhyamaparārthaṃ pradhānaṃ, siddhaṃ punaḥ parārthaṃ śeṣaḥ |
sa cāyaṃ pradhānaśeṣabhāvaḥ śabdaśaktermahimnā pravartamāno vastunastathātvamanapekṣyaiva prakāśate | tathā hi—
guruḥ pradhānaṃ paricaryamāṇaḥ śiṣyānuśiṣṭau sa guṇatvameti |
tadvad guḍo bhakṣayatau pradhānaṃ, prītau punaḥ syāt puruṣasya so 'ṅgam || 3 ||
iha tu sarvameva vākyajātamudāharaṇam | na hi pradhānaguṇabhāvamantareṇa vākye padānāṃ samanvayo bhavati | tatra sādhyatvāt pradhānaṃ kriyā, siddhatvādapradhānaṃ kārakāṇi |
kvacittu kiyāyā api śeṣatvaṃ bhavati | yathā—(māmā. 1.30)
stimitavikasitānāmullasad‌bhrūlatānāṃ masṛṇamukulitānāṃ prāntavistārabhājām |
pratinayananipāte kiñcidākuñcitānāṃ vividhamahamabhūvaṃ pātramālokitānām || 4 ||
yathā vā— (saka. 4.128)
1. mūle atideśasya sthāne 'sāmānyātideśaḥ viśeṣātideśa' iti lekhaḥ | rā. pṛ. 497, dra. atra pṛ.470
priyo 'si prājño 'si prabhurasi kulīno 'syasi yuvā yuvatyastvāmevaṃ kati na patimurvīśa! vṛṇate |
