ataścaitāṃ kīrtiṃ raghunahuṣamāndhātṛmahiṣīṃ parāmraṣṭuṃ vṛddhāmadhigatanayo nārhati bhavān || 5 ||
(3. prayojakam)
yena prayuktaḥ pravartate tat prayojakam (śābhā. 4.1.22)| tad yathā—'svargo yāgasya, gārhasthyamarthārjanasya, atithayaḥ pākasya, rājā chatracchāyāyā' (vāpa. 2) iti | tacca na kevalaṃ śreyasyeva pravartayati, api tvaśreyasyapi | yathā—(māmā.5.27)
tvatpādapaṅkajaparigrahapuṇyajanmā bhūyāsamityabhiniveśakadarthyamānaḥ |
bhrāmyannṛmāṃsapaṇanāya paretabhūmāvākarṇya bhīru ruditāni tavāgato 'smi || 6 ||
yathā vā—
asyāḥ snehabhṛtena vānarapatissetau mayā kleśito bhrātā mad‌vadanaikavīkṣaṇaparaḥ prāṇānayaṃ tyājitaḥ |
dāyādena saha pravṛttakalahe jātyaiva muktāyudhe nirvaire ca nirāgasi dviṣi tathā muktaḥ śaro vālini || 7 ||
(4. aprayojakam)
svayaṃ prayok‍tumasamartho 'nyaprayuktena karmaṇā yaḥ sambadhyate so 'prayojakaḥ | tadyathā māṃsaprayukte pāke ghṛtādibhirasthīnyaprayojakāni sambadhyante | snātṛprayuktena snānīyenā— prayojikā snānaśāṭī yujyate | rājaprayuktayā chatracchāyayā 'prayojako 'pi hastī saṅgacchata' iti | idaṃ cāprayojakatvamavāstavamapi kvaciduktimātreṇa dṛśyate | yathā—
ṇokkhī bhallī sa vaṃmaheṇa ṇimmia taïloke vi |
jehi vimukī te vi mua jaha ṇa laggī te vi || 8 ||
(navīnā bhallī sā manmathena nirmitā trailokye 'pi |
yebhyo vimuktāḥ te 'pi mṛtāḥ yebhyo na lagnā, te 'pi ||)
yathā vā—
muktāḥ kandharayā dhṛtāḥ, stanataṭenottuṅgatā kumbhayo— rūrubhyāṃ pariṇāhitā kramavatī hastasya, pad‍bhyāṃ gatiḥ |
etad vaḥ karighātinastu kaṭhinaṃ carmaiva, ko 'yaṃ haṭha— ścaṇḍīti tripurārikelivacanairāryāsmitaṃ pātu vaḥ || 9 ||
(5. nāntarīyakam)
yatsambandhamantareṇa kriyā pradhānena sambadhyate tannāntarīyakam | tadyathā— 'tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā, vājibhyo vājinam'; (vājinasya) punaranuniṣpāditvā— nnāntarīyakeṇa vājinena sambadhyate | odanārthe ca pāke nāntarīyakeṇa ācāmādinā makṣikādayo 'nugṛhyante, agnyarthe nirmathane nāntarīyakeṇa dhūmena hoturakṣiṇī upahanyete | tadetat kvacit kaviprayogeṣu vāstavamavāstavaṃ ca dṛśyate |
vāstavaṃ yathā— (raghu. 7.26)
haviḥśamīpallavalājagandhiḥ puṇyaḥ kṛśānorudiyāya dhūmaḥ |
karṇāntasaṃsarpiśikhassa tasyā muhūrtakarṇotpalatāṃ prapede || 10 ||
avāstavaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 3.15)
saccaṃ bhaṇāmi vālaa ṇiaaṃ cia vallahaṃ jīaṃ |
taṃ tui viṇā ṇa hoi tti teṇa kulaa/kuvia kuviaṃpasāemi ||
(satyaṃ bhaṇāmi bālaka niyatameva vallabhaṃ jīvitam |
tat tvayā vinā na bhavatīti tena kulajaṃ kupitaṃ prasādayāmi ||)
rụ̄dhyā yatrāsadartho 'pi loke śabdo niveśitaḥ |
sa mukhyastatra tatsāmyād gauṇo 'nyatra skhalad‍gatiḥ || 12 || (pra.vā.pratya.37)
(6. mukhyam)
tatra mukhyaṃ yathā— gauranubandhya iti | atra gośabdo mukhyavṛttyā sāsnādimatpadārthe vartate |
(7. gauṇam)
gauṇaṃ yathā— gaurvāhīka iti | atra gośabda eva tiṣṭhanmūtrādiguṇasampadā bāhīke vartamāno gauṇīṃ vṛttimanubhavati | tatra kaviprayoge mukhyaṃ yathā—
jayati bhujagarajjugranthiniṣpīḍitendustravadamṛtanivṛttapretabhāvaiḥ kapālaiḥ |
viracitanutibandho mūrdhni sadyaḥ purāreḥ pariṇatabahukalpabrahmaṇāṃ brahmaghoṣaḥ || 13 ||
gauṇaṃ yathā—(urāca. 1.38)
iyaṃ gehe lakṣmīriyamamṛtavartirnayanayo— rasāvasyāḥ sparśo vapuṣi bahulaścandanarasaḥ |
ayaṃ bāhuḥ kaṇṭhe śiśiramasṛṇo mauktikasaraḥ kimasyā na preyo, yadi paramasahyastu virahaḥ || 14 ||
(8. vyāpakam)
anekaviṣayaṃ vyāpakam | tadyathā— aāturānāturayorbhojanapraklṛptāvāturabhojana— manāturo 'pi pratipadyate | yathā— (gāsa. 3.25)
addhacchipecchiaṃ mā karajja sāhāiaṃ puloesu |
so vi sudiṭhṭho hohii tumaṃ pi muddhā kalijjihisi || 15 ||
(ardhākṣiprekṣitaṃ mā kuru svābhāvikaṃ pralokaya |
so 'pi sṛdṛṣṭo bhaviṣyati tvamapi mugdhā kalayiṣyase ||)
etena bahuviṣayamapi vyākhyātam | tad dvividhaṃ kriyāviṣayaṃ kārakaviṣayaṃ ca | tayorādyaṃ yathā— (kumā. 3.20)
dyūte paṇaḥ praṇayakeliṣu kaṇṭhapāśaḥ krīḍāpariśramaharaṃ vyajanaṃ ratānte |
śayyā niśīthakalahe hariṇekṣaṇāyāḥ labdhaṃ mayā vidhivaśādidamuttarīyam || 16 ||
dvitīyaṃ yathā—
sīse seharu khaṇu viṇimmavidukhaṇu kaṃṭhe pālaṃbu kidu raïe |
vihidu khaṇu muṃḍamālie jaṃ paṇaeṇa taṃ ṇamahu kusumadāma—kodaṃḍu kāmaho || 17 ||
(śīrṣe śekharaḥ kṣaṇaṃ vinirmāpitaḥ kṣaṇaṃ kaṇṭhe prālambaḥ kṛto ratyā |
racitā kṣaṇaṃ muṇḍamālikā yat praṇayena tannamata kusumadāmakodaṇḍaṃ kāmasya ||)
(9. laghu)
saṃkṣiptābhidhānaṃ laghu vīpsā, ekaśeṣaḥ, saṃjñā, karmadhārayād bahuvrīhiḥ ityādi |
(10. guru)
tad‍‍viparītaṃ guru, avīpsā, anekaśeṣaḥ, asaṃjñā, karmadhārayānmatvarthīya iti | teṣu— vīpsayā laghuryathā—(gāsa. 6.30)
jaṃ jaṃ puloemi disaṃ purao lihia vva dīsase tatto |
tuha paḍimāparipāḍiṃ vahaï va saalaṃ disāvalaaṃ || 18 ||
(yāṃ yāṃ pralokayāmi diśaṃ purato likhita iva dṛś‍yate tatra |
tava pratimāparipāṭī vahatīva sakalaṃ diśāvalayam ||)
avīpsayā gururyathā—(māmā. 1.43)
paś‍yāmi tāmita itaśca puraśca paścā— dantarbahiḥ purata eva ca vartamānām |
udbuddhamugdhakanakābjanibhaṃ vahantī— māsaṅga—tiryagapavartitadṛṣṭi vaktram || 19 ||
ekaśeṣeṇa laghu, anekaśeṣeṇa guru | tadubhayamekaśloke paryāyaparikṣepābhyāṃ yathā—
adyauvāvāṃ raṇamupagatau tātamambāṃ ca dṛṣṭā spṛṣṭastābhyāṃ śirasi vinato 'haṃ ca duśśāsanaśca |
tasminbāle prasabhamariṇā prāpite tāmavasthāṃ pārśvaṃ pitrorapagataghṛṇaḥ kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi gatvā || 20 ||(vesaṃ.4.15)
saṃjñayā laghu yathā—
khātmenduvahnimarudarkamahīpayobhi— raṣṭābhireva tanubhirbhavatā samaste |
graste jagatyaparamicchati yo 'tra vastu ko 'nyo hatatrapatayā sadṛśo 'sti tena || 21 ||
asaṃjñayā guru yathā— (śāku. 1.1)
yā sṛṣṭiḥ straṣṭurādyā bahati vidhihutaṃ yā haviryā ca hotrī ye dve kālaṃ vidhattaḥ śrutiviṣayaguṇā yā sthitā vyāpya viśvam |
yāmāhuḥ sarvabhūtaprakṛtiriti yayā prāṇinaḥ prāṇavantaḥ pratyakṣābhiḥ prapanna(nāṁ)stanubhiravatu vastābhiraṣṭābhirīśaḥ || 22 ||
ābhyāmubhayayoge gurulaghubhedo 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | yathā—
1. jalamucāṃ meghānāṃ yau pathyādhārau jalākāśau | pathyamaśanaṃ jalam, ādhāra ākāśaḥ | '॰hārāvi'ti— jośera—rāghavau | haraja॰ iti, dahavi॰ iti ca jo.
pathyādhārau1 hara! jalamucāṃ yau ca, yau paṅkajānāṃ mitrāmitrau, varada! haviṣāṃ dāyakagrāhakau ca |
yau gandhasya prajana—vahanau tāmahaṃ tuṣṭiheto— raṣṭau vande tribhuvanatanormūrtibhedāṁstavaitān || 23 ||
karmadhāraya bahuvrīhiṇā laghuryathā—
yakṣaścakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu
snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu || 24 || megha.
karmadhārayamatvarthīyena gururyathā—
ākailāsād bisakisalayacdedapātheyavantaḥ
saṃpatsyante nabhasi bhavato rājahaṃsāssahāyāḥ || 25 || megha.
ādigrahaṇāt samāsavākyādiṣu gurutvalaghutvābhyāṃ granthagauravalāghave pratipattigauravalāghave ca draṣṭavye | tatra samāsagurutve granthalāghavaṃ pratipattigauravaṃ ca yathā—
vilāsamasṛṇollasanmusalaloladoḥkandalī— parasparapariskhalad‌valayanisvanoddanturāḥ |
haranti kalahuṅkṛtiprasabhakampitorustana— truṭad‌gamakasaṅkulāḥ kalamakaṇḍanīgītayaḥ || 26 ||
samāsalaghutve granthagauravaṃ pratipattilāghavaṃ ca yathā—
sikatila—talāssāndracchāyāstaṭāntavilambinaḥ śiśiramarutāṃ līlāvāsāḥ k‍vaṇajjalaraṅkavaḥ |
avinayavatīnirvicchedasmaravyayadāyinaḥ kathaya murale ! kenāmī te kṛtā niculadrumāḥ || 27 ||
vākyalāghave pratipattigauravaṃ yathā—
patiśvaśuratā jyeṣṭhe patidevaratānuje |
madhyameṣu ca pāñcālyāstritayaṃ tritayaṃ triṣu || 28 ||
vākyagaurave pratipattilāghavaṃ yathā—
ācchidya priyataḥ kadambakusumaṃ yasyāridārairnavaṃ yātrābhaṅgavidhāyino jalamucāṃ kālasya cihnaṃ mahat |
hṛṣyadbhiḥ paricumbitaṃ nayanayornyastaṃ hṛdi sthāpitaṃ sīmante nihitaṃ kathaṃcana tataḥ karṇāvataṃsīkṛtam || 29 ||
etena k‍vacidvākyalāghave 'pi pratipattilāghavaṃ vyākhyātam | yathā—(seba.1.42)
taṃ daïāhiṇṇāṇaṃ jammi vi aṃgammi rāhaveṇa ṇa ṇimiaṃ |
sīāparimaṭṭeṇa va vụ̄dho teṇa vi ṇiraṃtaraṃ romaṃco || 30 ||
(taddayitābhijñānaṃ yasminnapyaṅge rāghaveṇa na sthāpitam |
sītāparimṛṣṭeneva vyūḍhastenāpi nirantaraṃ romāñcaḥ ||)
(11. arthavādaḥ)
stutinindārthamatiśayoktirarthavādaḥ | tadyathā— manojavo 'śvaḥ, viśvavyāpinī tṛṣṇā iti | yathā ca stutau—
kavīnāṃ mānasaṃ naumi taranti pratibhāmbhasi |
yatra haṃsavayāṃsīva bhuvanāni caturdaśa || 31 ||
yathā vā nindāyām—
yeṣāṃ prāṇivadhaḥ krīḍā narma marmacchado giraḥ |
parāpavādaḥ kartavyaste mṛtyorapi mṛtyavaḥ || 32 ||
(12. anuvādaḥ)
siddhasya vidhiniṣedhārthamuccāraṇamanuvādaḥ | tad yathā kathamīdṛśamanīdṛśo 'bhidadhīta, kathamevaṃvidhāyastavāyamevaṃvidhaḥ patiriti | yathā ca vidhau—
tadavitathamavādīryanmama tvaṃ priyeti priyajanaparibhuktaṃ yad‌dukūlaṃ dadhānaḥ |
madadhivasatimāgāḥ kāmināṃ maṇḍanaśrī— rvrajati hi saphalatvaṃ vallabhālokanena || 33 ||
yathā vā niṣedhe—
yadārtha kāmaṃ bhavatā sa yācyatāmiti kṣamaṃ naitadanalpacetasām |
kathaṃ prasahyāharaṇaiṣiṇāṃ priyāḥ parāvanatayā malinīkṛtāḥ śriyaḥ || 34 ||
(13. bhedavivakṣā)
yatrāṅgāṅgibhāvādinā bhedo vivakṣyate sā bhedavivakṣā | yathā— adhi brahmadatte pañcālāḥ, adhi pañcāleṣu brahmadatta iti | yathā ca— (ku.saṃ. 2.10)
ātmānamātmanā vetsi sṛjasyātmānamātmanā |
ātmanā kṛtinā ca tvamātmanyeva pralīyase || 35 ||
(14. abhedavivakṣā)
tadviparyaye abhedavivakṣā yathā— tāneva śālīn bhuñjmahe ye magadheṣu, tāneva śāṭakānācchādayāmaḥ ye pāṭalīputre, tadevedaṃ kārṣāpaṇaṃ yanmadhurāyāṃ dṛṣṭamiti | yathā—
rūpaṃ tadojasvi tadeva vīryaṃ tadeva naisargikamunnatatvam |
na kāraṇat‌svād vibhide kumāraḥ pravartito dīpa iva pradīpāt || 36 ||(raghu.3)
(15. vyavahitakalpanā)
yatra sannihitasyāyogyatāyāṃ vyavahitamāśrīyate sā vyavahitakalpanā, yathā ca praviśa piṇḍimiti praveśanakriyā sannihitāyāmapyayogyayāṃ piṇḍayāmasambhavantī vyavahitamapi yogyaṃ gṛhādikamapekṣate | evaṃ piṇḍīmityetadapi karmapadaṃ sannihitāyāmapi praveśanakriyāyāmayogyāyāmasambhavad vyavahitāmapi yogyāṃ bhakṣayetyādikāṃ kriyāmapekṣate | yathā ca meghadūtādyaś‍loke kaścid yakṣaḥ śāpenāstaṃgamitamahimā rāmagiryāśrameṣu vasatiṃ cakra iti |
(16. upacārakalpanā)
yatrānyadharmāḥ sati nimitte 'nyatropacaryante sā upacārakalpanā | yathā kālo 'tikrāmati, mañcāḥ krośanti | yathā vā—(vārā. 5.34.6)
kalyāṇī bata gātheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti mām |
eti jīvantamānando naraṃ varṣaśatādapi || 37 ||
(17. tad‌bhāvāpattiḥ)
viparyayāderatasmiṃstaditi vyapadeśastadbhāvāpattiḥ | yathā śuktikāyāṃ rajatamiti, mṛgatṛṣṇikāyāṃ jalamiti, rajjāvahiriti | yathā ca—
caṃdrahivapi vāvihi kūpi saripallati tallitalāi |
caṃdahakaca cakoḍiākeṇa haāse māi || 38 ||
(candravapuṣi vāpyāṃ kūpe sarasi palvale taṭākikāyāṃ taṭāke |
candrasya kṛto 'gniḥ kena hatāśena mātaḥ ||)
(18. yogyatāpattiḥ)
adhikāritvāpādanaṃ yogyatāpattiḥ | yathā darbhāṇāṃ sthāne śaraiḥ prastaritavyam,
'lohitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti' iti | yathā ca—(megha. 56)
śabdāyante madhuramanilaiḥ kīcakāḥ pūryamāṇāḥ saṃraktābhistripuravijayo gīyate kinnarībhiḥ |
nirhlādī te muraja iva cet kandareṣu dhvaniḥ syāt saṅgītārtho nanu paśupatestatra bhāvī samastaḥ || 39 ||
(19. sambandhābādhanam)
viśeṣaśrutyā sāmānyaśruterabādhaḥ sambandhābādhanam | yathā brāhmaṇā bhuñjatāṃ māṭharakauṇḍinyau pariveviṣṭāmiti | yathā ca—(kusaṃ.)
yaṃ sarvaśailāḥ parikalpya vatsaṃ merau sthite dogdhari dohadakṣe |
māsvanti ratnāni mahauṣadhīśca pṛthūpadiṣṭāṃ duduhurdharitrīm || 40 ||
(20. vikalpaḥ)
dvayostulyabalayoḥ paryāyeṇa prāp‍tirvicāraṇā vā vikalpaḥ | yathā vrīhibhirvā yavairvā juhuyāt, 'hantāhaṃ pṛthivīmimāṃ ni dadhānīha veha vā' (ṛve. 10.119.9) iti | yathā ca paryāyaprāp‍tau—(vesaṃ. 2.3)
gup‍tyā sākṣānmahānalpaḥ svayamanyena vā kṛtaḥ |
karoti mahatīṃ prītimapakāro 'pakāriṣu || 41 ||
yathā vā vicāraṇāyām—(kusaṃ. 5.78)
vibhūṣaṇod‌bhāsi pinaddhabhogi vā gajājinālambi dūkūladhāri vā |
kapāli vā syādathavenduśekharaṃ na viśvamūrteravadhāryate vapuḥ || 42 ||
(21. samuccayaḥ)
tulyabalānāmavirodhināṃ bhinnaprayojanānāmekārthaparatayopādānaṃ samuccayaḥ | yathā devadattaṃ bhojaya, lavaṇena sarpiṣā śākeneti | guṇādisamuccayaḥ punarabhedena bhedena ca dṛś‍yate | abhedena yathā—
ślādhyānvayeti nayanotsavakāriṇīti nirvyūḍhasauhṛdabhareti guṇojjvaleti |
ekaikamatra hi vaśīkaraṇaṃ garīyo yuṣmākamevamiyamityatha kiṃ bravīmi || 43 ||
bhedena yathā—
kulamamalinaṃ bhadrā mūrtirmatiḥ śrutiśālinī bhujabalamalaṃ sphītā lakṣmīḥ prabhutvaprakhaṇḍitam |
prakṛtisubhagā hyete bhāvā madasya ca hetavo vrajati puruṣo yairunmādaṃ ta eva tavāṅkuśāḥ || 44 ||
(22. niyamaḥ)
anekaprāp‍tāvayogānyayogavyavacchedenāvadhāraṇaṃ niyamaḥ | yathā śaṅkhaḥ pāṇḍara eva, pārtha eva dhanurdhara iti | sa ca k‍vacit sārvakālikaḥ k‍vacinniyatakālaḥ | yathā— (kusaṃ. 3.19)
asmin surāṇāṃ vijayābhyupāye tavaiva nāmāstragatiḥ kṛtī tvam |
apyaprasiddhaṃ yaśase hi puṃsāmananyasādhāraṇameva karma ||45||
yathā ca— (kusaṃ. 5.67)
tvameva tāvat paricintaya svayaṃ kadācidete yadi yogamarhataḥ |
vadhūdukūlaṃ kalahaṃsalakṣaṇaṃ gajājinaṃ śoṇitabinduvarṣi ca || 46 ||
(23. niṣedhaḥ)
prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ paryudāso vā niṣedhaḥ | tayoryatrāsāmarthyaṃ vākyabhedaśca sa prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ | yathā asūryaṃpaśyā rājadārāḥ, abrāhmaṇako deśaḥ, 'suḍanapuṃsakasya' (1.1.43) iti | yatra sāmarthyamekavākyatā ca sa paryudāsaḥ | yathā abrāhmaṇaḥ, anekaḥ, apacasi tvaṃ vṛṣaleti | sa cobhayarūpo 'pi prāgabhāvādibhedād bhidyate | yathā—(raghu. 18.43)
paryantasañcāritacāmarasya kapolalolobhayakākapakṣāt |
tasyānanāduccarito 'pavādaścaskhāla velāsvapi nārṇavānām || 47 ||
yathā ca— (raghu. 18.48)
anaśnuvānena yugopamānamalabdhamaurvīkiṇalāñchanena |
aspṛṣṭakhaḍgatsaruṇāpi cāsīd rakṣāvatī tasya bhujena bhūmiḥ || 48 ||
(24. pratinidhiḥ)
mukhyābhāve tadarthakāriṇaḥ sadṛśasya pratinidhānaṃ pratinidhiḥ | yathā vrīhyabhāve nīvārāḥ, kuśābhāve kāśāḥ pratinidhīyanta iti |
nanu ca kriyāsu sāmarthyamātreṇa prāp‍tā vrīhyādayaḥ punaḥ śrutyādibhirniyamyamānā nīvārādīnāṃ nivartakā vijñāyante | tatra yathaivānyāni dravyāṇi ayajñīyāni ca
palāṇḍvādīni satyapyarthitve 'dṛṣṭe 'pi sāmarthye śāstreṇāparyudastasyādhikāro yukta' iti nyāyād vacanāntarābhāvācca na pratinidhīyante; tathā nīvārādīnāmapi vrīhyādirniyamairniṣiddha— tvād vacanāntarābhāvācca nāstyeva pratinidhiriti kimidaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ pratinidhirna prāpnotīti |
ucyate — 'yajeteti yāge dravyatvameva yajatikriyārūpaikadeśabhāvādaṅgatvena prāp‍tasannidhānaṃ, vrīhitvādayastu sāmānyaviśeṣāḥ sāmarthyaprāp‍tasannidhānā api kriyārūpeṇānupādānād dravyatvavadaṅgabhāvena pratīyante | tatra vrīhiśabdo hi adhikārthā— dhyāvāpāyopādīyamāno dravyatvasahacāriṇo nīvārādīnna bādhate | na hi tannivṛttau tasya vyāpāro 'sti, nāpyabhyanujñāyām | ataḥ śiṣṭācarito lokaprasiddhaśca pratinidhirastyeveti |
yadi tarhi vrīhiśrutirna niyamārthā, nīvārādīnāṃ vikalpaḥ prāpnoti |
naivam, asambhavo nāmāyaṃ niyamasadṛśaphalo 'nya eva bādhaviśeṣaḥ, yamasambhavaniyama ityāmananti | tatra vrīhitvamadhikaṃ śabdenāṅgabhāvamāpadyate; ato 'pratiṣiddhānyapi śrutyā nīvāratvādīni viruddhaikārtha samavāyitvānna sambhavanti | sambhave 'pi kāmamavirodhāt sāmarthyaprāp‍tasannidhānāni vinā śabdavyāpāreṇa samuccīyeran, na tu vikalpyeran |
tatraitat syāt yathā dravyatvaṃ niyatasannidhānaṃ kriyāpadārthaikadeśabhūtameva kriyāśabdena lakṣyate, tathā sarve 'pi vrīhitvādayo dravyatvasahacāriṇo viśeṣāḥ kriyāpadārthaikadeśabhūtā eva kriyāśabdena kasmānna lakṣyante?
naivam, na hi sarveṣāṃ vastutvena satāmarthānāṃ śabdo 'bhidhāyako bhavati | vivakṣānibandhanaṃ hi vastusatāmapyarthānāmabhidhānaṃ, vivakṣā ca śabdasāmarthyanibandhanā; tatra yathaiva dravyatvasahacāriṇo niyatasannidhānā api śuklādayo guṇāḥ satyapi dravyavadupayoge śabdaśakta‍yanurodhāt kriyāśabdenāṅgatvena pratyāyayitumaśakyatvāda— vivakṣitāḥ, tathaiva śabdaśakta‍yanurodhādvrīhitvādīnāṃ dravyatvasahacāriṇāmupayogavatāṃ bhedānāmaṅgatvenāvivakṣāyā niyamābhāvācchāstreṇa (a)paryudaste viśeṣāntarasahacāriṇi dravyatve nityasya karmaṇo 'ṅgamātrāsannidhāne mā bhūdapravṛttiḥ, kāmyasya vā sannihiteṣvaṅgeṣu pravṛttasya mā bhūdaṅgabhreṣe viccheda iti śāstreṇāparyudastaḥ pratinidhiḥ prathamakalpābhāva upādīyate | sa tu padārthasad‍bhāva eva yujyate | yasya tu putrīyatītivat kriyāviśeṣa eva śaktidravyasaṃsargabhinna eko vākyārthaḥ, tasya avibhaktaśabdārthatvādabhreṣe 'pi tasminnarthātmanyavikale nivṛtteraṅgāntarapratinidhāne 'pi paṭīyatītivadavidyamānoddeśavibhāgaṃ kriyāntaraṃ pratinihitaṃ syāt | apratinidheyā ca kriyeti |
nanu vrīhitvādayo 'pyapratinidheyā eva | yadāha—(vāpa.jā. 78)
jātīnāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca tulye 'ṅgatve kriyāṃ prati |
guṇāḥ pratinidhīyante chāgādīnāṃ na jātayaḥ || 49 ||
maivaṃ vocaḥ | kartāpi nāma nāpratinidheyaḥ, kiṃ punaranye | tadyathā—(raghu. 15.61)
ślāghyastyāgo 'pi vaidehyāḥ patyuḥ prāgvaṃśavāsinaḥ |
ananyajānerāsīd yat saiva jāyā hiraṇmayī || 50 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca. 1.15)
ayaṃ ca yajamānena yakṣyamāṇasya me gṛhāt |
prahitastena vātsalyādanujanmā kuśadhvajaḥ || 51 ||
kriyāyāstu pratinidhirnāstyeva, yadi ca syād vākyāntarameva tat syāditi |
(25. ūhaḥ)
prakṛtau samarthānāṃ mantravākyānāṃ vikāreṣu sāmarthyābhāvāt sarvalopa ekadeśānivṛttāvapi kriyāyāṃ mukhyavṛttivyatikrameṇa vārthāntaropādāne prasakte śabdāntarasyārthāntaravṛtteḥ samarthasyopādāne prakṛtirūpaliṅgavibhaktivacanāntarāṇāṃ vimṛśyopādānam ūhaḥ | tadyathā— 'āgneyamaṣṭākapālaṃ puroḍāśaṃ nirvaped' iti prakṛtiyoge 'agnaye tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi' ityatrāgniśabdaḥ samartho dṛṣṭaḥ | sa 'sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvapet brahmavarcasakāma' iti vikṛtiyāge samarthaḥ; tatra yadi tūṣṇīmevopādānaṃ kriyeta, śabdavatī prakṛtiraśabdo vikāraḥ syāt | atha devatā naivopādīyeta, prakṛtau devatāyāḥ śravaṇād dvaiguṇyaṃ prasajyeta | tatra dravyadevatātyāgo yāgo na syāt |
athāgniśabda evopādīyeta, mukhyārthe vṛttaḥ sūryārthaṃ na pratyāyayet |
athāpyasya guṇādarthāntare sūrye mukhyavṛttivyatikrameṇa prayoga āśrīyet, prakṛtiviparītā śabdapravṛttirāśritā syāt | syācca vikṛtiḥ kartavyā; tasmādatra śabdāntarameva tad‍‌vibhaktikamupādīyate, 'sūryāya tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi' iti | āśrayabhedācca liṅgavacanamūhaḥ | tadyathā— devīrāpaḥ śuddhā yūyaṃ' 'deva ājyaṃ śuddhaṃ tvam' |
vibhakta‍yantarāṇāmapi—'āyurāśāste, 'ūha āyurāśāsāte āyurāśāsata' iti | yeṣāṃ tu prakṛtāveva sāmarthyaṃ nāsti tadyathā—'vāyavaḥ stha' iti, prakṛtāveva bahuvacanenaiko
vatso 'bhidhīyate, teṣāmasāmarthyād vikṛtāvūho na bhavati; tathaikasminneva prakṛtipāśe pāśāniti bahuvacanāntaḥ śrūyate 'aditiḥ pāśān pramumoktu' iti | vājasaneyināṃ tvekeṣāṃ ekavacanāntaḥ paṭhyate, 'aditiḥ pāśam' iti, teṣāmūhaḥ prāpnoti yadi, etannāsti aditiraśanāpāśeṣu noha iti | k‍vacit punarūhaḥ prāp‍to 'pi niṣidhyate |
aṅgāni jñātināmāni upamā indriyāṇi ca
etānyūhaṃ na gacchanti adhrigau viṣamaṃ hi tat || 52 ||
tatrādhrigoranyatrāṅgānāmanūho yathā— 'yatpaśurmāyumakṛtoro vā padbhirāhate, agnirmā tasmādenaso viśvānmuñcatvaṃhasaḥ' ityūhe yatpaśū māyumakṛṣātāmuro vā padbhirāhasātāṃ, yatpaśavo māyumakṛṣatoro vā padbhirāhasata iti | jñātināmnāmanūho yathā —'anu tvā mātā manyatāmanu pitānu bhrātānu sakhā sayūthya' ityūhe 'anu vāṃ mātā manyatāmanu vo mātā manyatāmi'ti | upamānāmanūho yathā 'kaśyapevāsāṃ cchidre śreṇī' 'śyenamasya vakṣaḥ kṛṇutāt' ityūhe śyenamanayoḥ vakṣaḥ kṛṇutāt, śyenameṣāṃ vakṣaḥ kṛṇutāditi | indriyāṇāmanūho yathā—'sūryaṃ cakṣurgamayatāt, vātaṃ prāṇamanvavasṛjatāt, antarikṣamamuṃ diśaḥ śrotraṃ pṛthivīṃ śarīram', 'ekadhāsya tvacamācchyatāt', 'purā nābhyā apiśaso vapāmutkhidatāt', 'antarevoṣmāṇaṃ vārayatāt' ityūhe ekadhānayostvacamācchyatāt ekadhaiṣāṃ tvacamācchyatāditi | tadidamuktam—(māgha. 14.23)
nāñjasā nigaditaṃ vibhaktibhirvyaktibhiśca nikhilābhirāgame |
tatra karmaṇi viparyaṇīnaman mantramūhakuśalāḥ prayogiṇaḥ || 53 ||
ūhaśca mantrādanyatrāpi bhāṣāyāṃ bhavati | tadyathā—(urāca. 4.20)
cūḍācumbitakaṅkapatramabhitastūṇīdvayaṃ pṛṣṭhato bhasmastokapavitralāñchanamuro dhatte tvacaṃ rauravīm |
maurvyā mekhalayā niyantritamadhovāsaśca māñjiṣṭakaṃ pāṇau kārmukamakṣasūtravalayaṃ daṇḍo 'paraḥ paippalaḥ || 54 ||
ityuttaracarite lavamekamuddiśya bhavabhūtirjanakametacch‌lokaṃ pāṭhitavān | tameva paścād vīracarite dhattastvacaṃ rauravīmityūhayitvā rāmalakṣmaṇau dvāvuddiśya kuśadhvajamapīpaṭhat | atrāpyuraḥ pāṇivāsaḥ kārmukādīnāmūho na bhavati, sambandhibhedenaiva bhedasiddheḥ; bhedena hi pratipattavye 'rthe na yāvadabhede 'pi bhavati tāvanna bhidyate |
(26. bādhaḥ)
arthitvāt sāmānyopadeśābheda sati pravṛttisambhave vacanādasamīvāccaritārthatvāt phalābhāvād viśeṣe pratyakṣaśruteḥ parisaṅkhyādibhyaśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu tulyabalānāṃ virodhināmavirodhināṃ vārthānāmaprāp‍tyanumānaṃ bādhaḥ | tadyathā — arthitvāt sāmānyena pravṛttasya māṃsabhakṣaṇasya vacanād bādhaḥ abhakṣyo grāmyakukkuṭa iti; tathā guruvad guruputre vartitavyamiti sāmānyopadeśāt pravṛttasyocchiṣṭabhojanasya anyatrocchiṣṭa— bhojanāditi | evam 'aṣṭāśriryūpo bhavati' iti sāmānyopadeśāt pravṛttamaṣṭāśritvaṃ 'caturaśro vājapeyayūpa' iti dvayorasambhavāt tad‍‌virodhī bādhyate | 'vrīhīnavahanti' iti sāmānyopadeśādarthitvācca pravṛttaṃ prākṛtamavahananaṃ nakhanirbhinnānāṃ nakhāvapūtānāṃ carurbhavatīti vikṛtau nakhaireva avaghātaprayojanasya kṛtatvāccaritārthatvena avirodhyapi bādhyate | evaṃ 'śatakṛṣṇalaścarurbhavati' iti kṛṣṇaleṣu phalābhāvādeva nāvaghātaḥ kriyate | brāhmaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāmiti sāmānyopadeśāt kauṇḍinye 'pi prasaktaṃ dadhidānamaniṣiddhaṃ sambhāvya caritārthaṃ phalavadaviruddhaṃ ca, takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti viśeṣe pratyakṣaśrutestakradānena bādhyate | arthitvāt pañcanakhānāmapañcanakhānāṃ ca bhakṣaṇaṃ prasaktaṃ, bhakṣaṇamaviruddhamapi 'pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā' iti parisaṅkhyayā bādhyate | ādigrahaṇād 'vāmenākṣṇaiṣa paśyati', 'kāṭhinyamasyāḥ kucayoḥ kimasad yanna rocate', ityādiviśeṣasya vācakamavagantavyam | bhūyāṃśca bādhasya kavivākyeṣvapi prayogaḥ | so 'rthitvāt pravṛttau vacanato yathā—
mṛtyo! kiṃ martumicchurbhagavati! bhavatī na kṣamā, śakra! cakrī vāryaḥ, kāryo na pūṣannasadṛśakalaho, nanvayaṃ kālakūṭaḥ |1
ityādāveva devān damayitumanasaḥ pāntu vaścandramaule— strailokyā 'kāṇḍa—caṇḍa—pralaya—kara—gara—grāsa—gṛgh‍norvacāṃsi || 55 ||
sāmānyaśruteḥ pratītau vacanato yathā—
pad‍bhyāmūruyugaṃ vibhajya bhujayormadhyaṃ nipīḍyorasā pārśveṣu prasabhaṃ prahṛtya nakharairdantairvilūyā 'dharam |
sup‍tānapyavabodhya yuṣmadahitān bhūyo 'pi bhuṅkte vane kiṃ kāntā surataiṣiṇī? na hi na hi vyāghrī karālānanā || 56 ||
1. atra rāghavaḥ — mṛtyuḥ kiṃ kartumicchurbhagavati bhavatī na kṣamā, śakra cakrī vāryāḥ(rya) kāryo na pūṣannasadṛśakalaho, nanvayaṃ kālakūṭaḥ | 2. kāṭhā = kaṭhā, śatapathikā(?), 3. samājeṣvaneka(?) x x x,
(27. tantram)
yatrārthinaḥ sarve prayojakābhedenāvṛttyā vā pratipattavyamarthaṃ sambhavāllāghavā— ccaikameva prayojayanti, tat tantram | tadyathā— kāṭhādhyayanaṃ śatapathikāyāṃ2, śālāyāmekaṃ pradīpaṃ vyākaraṇādhyāyinaḥ, samājeṣvanekacetanam(tejanam)3 vādyakarmatūryopajīvinaḥ | abhedaikatvasaṅkhyāṃ saṅkhyāntareṣu tantriṇīṃ manyante yathā āsyate bhavad‍bhyāṃ, āsyate bhavaddhiḥ | praś‍ne tu bahutvasaṅkhyā pūrvasaṃkhyāṃ1 yathā— kati bhavataḥ putrāḥ | napuṃsakaṃ strīnapuṃsayoḥ | yathā— kiṃ jātamasya | sāmānyaviśeṣasambandhayorvibhaktiryathā — gosvāmī vrajatīti | dvitīyā karmākhyaṃ sambandhaviśeṣama—bhidadhānā 'viśiṣṭa—sambandhipadaprayoge tantreṇa niyate sambandhinī prakṛte vartamānaṃ śeṣasambandhamupagṛh‍ṇāti | yadi tu gavāṃ svāmī vrajatīti ṣaṣṭhyā sambandhamātramucyeta nirjñāte svasvāmibhāve vrajikriyākartāniyamena pratīyeta tadā iṣyate grāmo gantum, paktvā (atra) odano bhujyata iti pradhānakriyāviṣayād dhātorutpadyamānaḥ pratyayastantreṇa guṇakriyāviṣayāmapi śaktimabhyantarīkaroti | anabhihitā vā guṇaviṣayā śaktiḥ pradhānānurodhādabhihitavat prakāśata iti |
yaccaikameva padaṃ, vākyaṃ, prakaraṇaṃ, prabandho vā dvayorarthayoḥ prayujyate tadapi tantram | tatra— padaṃ yathā— (kāvyāda. 2.311)
asāvudayamārūḍhaḥ kāntimān raktamaṇḍalaḥ |
rājā harati lokasya hṛdayaṃ mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ || 57 ||
vākyaṃ yathā—
dvāraṃ khaḍ‌gibhirāvṛtaṃ bahirapi praklinnagaṇḍairgajai— rantaḥ kañcukibhiḥ sphuranmaṇidharairadhyāsitā bhūmayaḥ |
ākrāntaṃ mahiṣībhireva śayanaṃ tvad‍‌vidviṣāṃ mandire rājan! saiva cirantanapraṇayinī śūnye 'pi rājyasthitiḥ || 58 ||
kaḥ punarasya pūrvasmād viśeṣaḥ?
ucyate—pūrvatra rājeti padamubhayārthamupāttaviṣayāvacchinnamarthadvayena sambadhyate | iha tu 'tvadvidviṣāṃ mandire rājan saiva cirantanapraṇayinī śūnye 'pi rājyasthitiḥ', ityekārthameva vākyaṃ 'dvāraṃ khaḍ‌gibhirāvṛtam' ityādivākyairupāttenārthadvayena sambadhyata iti |
1. saṃkhyāpūrve pūrve saṃkhye
prakaraṇaṃ yathā śiśupālavadhe— (māgha. 16.2)
abhidhāya tathā tadapriyaṃ śiśupālo 'nuśayaṃ paraṃ gataḥ |
bhavato 'bhimanāḥ samīhate saruṣaḥ kartumupetya mānanām || 59 ||
ityādi dūtavacanaṃ sandhyarthena ca vigrahārthena ca saṅgacchata iti | prabandho yathā—
udāramahimā rāmaḥ prajānāṃ harṣavardhanaḥ |
dharmaprabhava ityāsīt khyāto bharatapūrvajaḥ || 60 ||
rāmāyaṇamahābhāratayordaṇḍidvisandhānamiti | etena bahuviṣayamapi vākyādikaṃ vyākhyātam; tadyathā— (kusaṃ. 2.18)
svāgataṃ svānadhīkārān prabhāvairavalambya vaḥ |
yugapad yugabāhubhyaḥ prāp‍tebhyaḥ prājyavikramāḥ || 61 ||
ityādi prakaraṇaṃ bhagavatā caturmukhena caturbhirapi mukhairyugapaduccāritaṃ catasṛṣvapi dikṣvavasthitairindrādibhiḥ sambadhyamānaṃ caritārthatāmāpādayati |
(28. prasaṅgaḥ)
yatra sambhavinā kāryeṇa dvayorarthinoḥ prayojakatvena nirjñātasāmarthya— yoranyataraprayuktenāpyaparo 'pi sambadhyamānaḥ kṛtārthatvāt pṛthakprayojakatāṃ na pratipadyate tatprāsaṅgikam | tadyathā ayamupādhyāyo 'smābhirātmādhyāpanārthamānītaḥ, tvamapyatraivādhīṣva; etena dhanavantaḥ kāntāreṣu gṛhītānuyātrikāḥ pratiṣṭhante, tadetaireva kṛtarakṣāsaṃvidhāno gaccha; ayaṃ catuṣpathe kenacid balipradīpa upahṛtaḥ, etaduddyotenaiva santamase rathyāmatikrāma; ayaṃ devatārthaḥ pradīpaḥ, anenaiva vyākhyānaṃ cintaya; tathā 'vatsa makaranda anenaiva mālatīnaipathyenāpavāritaḥ pravartasva pariṇayāyātmānamātmanaḥ' iti | evam 'āmrāśca siktāḥ pitaraśca prīṇitā' iti yaccānyadācakṣāṇo 'nyadapyācaṣṭe tadapi prāsaṅgikam | tadyathā kumārasambhave kāmasaṃsthānaṃ kathayan dhanuśśikṣāmupadiśati—
sa dakṣiṇāpāṅganiviṣṭamuṣṭiṃ natāṃsamākuñcitasavyapādam |
dadarśa cakrīkṛtacārucāpaṃ prahartumabhyudyatamātmayonim || (kusaṃ.3.70)
evaṃ bhaṭṭikāvye rāmakathāṃ varṇayan śabdānuśāsanamudāharati— (bhakā. 11.18)
bhremurvavalgurnanṛturjagarjurjaguḥ samutpupluvire niṣeduḥ |
āsphoṭayāñcakrurabhipraṇemū rejurnanandurviyayussamīyuḥ || 63 ||
evaṃ dharmābhyudayādau dharmaśāstram; mudrārākṣasādāvarthaśāstram; mālatīmādhavādau kāmaśāstram; antarātmacaritādau mokṣaśāstram; mahābhāratādau dharmārthakāmamokṣaśāstrāṇi prāsaṅgikānītyalamatiprasaṅgena |
(29. āvṛttiḥ)
ekasya kārakakriyādeḥ padārthasyābhinnarūpasyaiva paryāyeṇānekatra vartanam āvṛttiḥ | tatra yathaikaṃ pātramasahabhujāṃ bhujikriyāyāmadhikaraṇabhāvamāvṛttyā pratipadyate, ekaṃ vastramābharaṇaṃ vā raṅgabhūmiṣu naṭānāmupayogāya kalpate, evaṃ vyāyāmāḍgamāyujīvinā— mabhyāsaṃ pratyupakaroti, yathā ca sahasramṛṣaya ekāṃ kapilāmāvṛttyā dattvā sarve sahastradakṣiṇā babhūvuḥ, tathaikaṃ kriyāpadaṃ kārakapadaṃ vā prativākyamāvartamānamākāṅkṣāṃ nirākaroti | tayoḥ —
kriyāpadāvṛttiryathā—
śaśinā ca niśā niśayā ca śaśī śaśinā niśayā ca yathā gaganam |
bhavatā ca sabhā sabhayā ca bhavān bhavatā sabhayā ca vibhāti jagat ||
kārakapadāvṛttiryathā—
sītāveśma yato nirīkṣya harate dṛṣṭiṃ jhaṭityākulā— manyonyārpitacañcudattakabalaiḥ pārāvatairdūyate |
indordūrata eva naśyati viśatyantargṛhaṃ duḥkhitaḥ pracchādyānanamañcalena rajanīṣvastatrapaṃ roditi || 65 ||
(30. bhedaḥ)
yatra abhedenāpyupātto 'rthaḥ śabdo vā svarūpasāmarthyādibhiranekatvamāpadyate sa bhedaḥ |
tatra arthabhedo yathā— brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pādyamācamanīyaṃ bhojanaṃ ca dīyatāmityabhedenāpi śrutāni pādyācamanabhojanāni svarūpasāmarthyād bhedena vyavatiṣṭhante | yathā 'pitṝṇāṃ rājataṃ pātraṃ devānāṃ tu hiraṇmayam' ityabhedenāpi upādāne bhinnānyeva pātrāṇi brāhmaṇānāṃ sahabhujāṃ bhujikriyāyāmadhikaraṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyante | gṛhasthān pat‍nya āryāvarte sambhogasampādanāya bhedenaivopāsata iti | atha kaviprayogeṣu kriyābhede yathā—
lavaṅgamālākalitāvataṃsāste nālikerāntarapaḥ pibantaḥ |
āsvāditārdrakramukāḥ samudrādabhyāgatasya pratipattimāpuḥ || 66 ||(māgha.3.81)
kārakabhedo yathā—(māgha. 10.39)
sparśabhāji viśadacchavicārau kalpite mṛgadṛśāṃ suratāya |
sannatiṃ dadhati peturajastraṃ dṛṣṭayaḥ priyatame śayane ca || 67 ||
atha śabdabhedaḥ | sa dvidhā— vākyabhedaḥ padabhedaśca |
tayorvākyabhedaḥ prākṛto vaikṛtaśca | prākṛto yathā paśya mṛgo dhāvati, ayaṃ daṇḍo harānena phalāni iti | atra prathamodāharaṇe paśyetyekaṃ vākyaṃ mṛgo dhāvatīti dvitīyam, dvitīye ayaṃ daṇḍa ityekaṃ, harānena phalānīti ca dvitīyam, prakṛtistha eva sandarbhe pṛthak kriyate | anyathaikavākyatāyāṃ paśyeti kriyāyāḥ karmapadābhāvādaprayogārhatā, haretyasyāśca 'tiṅṅatiṅaḥ' iti nighātaḥ prāpnoti | kaviprayogeṣvapi caitad dṛśyate, tadyathā— (kusaṃ. 8.64)
paśya pārvati! payodapaṅktibhirvyastapaṅkamiva jātamekataḥ |
khaṃ hṛtātapajalaṃ vivasvatā bhāti kiṃñcidiva śeṣavat saraḥ || 68 ||
vaikṛtastu loke śāstre vede ca | yathā— 'ṛtāṣāḍṛtadhāmāgnirgandharvastasyauṣa— dhayo 'psarasa ūrjo nāma sa idaṃ brahma kṣatraṃ pātu tā idaṃ brahma kṣatraṃ pāntu tasmai svāhā tābhyaḥ svāhā (tai.saṃ. 3.4.7)| atraikameva tād vākyaṃ, ṛtāṣāḍṛtadhāmāgnirgandharvassa idaṃ brahma kṣatraṃ pātu tasmai svāhā, tasyāpsarasa ūrjo nāma tā idaṃ brahma kṣatraṃ pāntu tābhyaḥ svāhā | atra liṅgavibhaktivipariṇāmād vaikṛtatvaṃ śāstre yathā—(mabhā. paspaśā)
yastu prayuṅkte kuśalo viśeṣe śabdān yathāvad vyavahārakāle |
so 'nantamāpnoti jayaṃ paratra vāgyogavid duṣyati cāpaśabdaiḥ || 69 ||
atra vāgyogaviditiparyantamekaṃ vākyaṃ, duṣyati cāpaśabdairiti dvitīyam |
kiṃ vāgyogavideva duṣyati ?
naivam, avāgyogavidityasya vaikṛtatvād vākyaviśeṣaḥ kriyate |
kiṃ kāraṇam ?
yo vāgyogavit sa nāpaśabdaṃ karoti, yadāha jñānaṃ tasya śaraṇamiti (mabhā. paspa.)|
nanvavāgyogavido 'pyajñānaṃ śaraṇaṃ yadā hyasau jānannapaśabdaṃ prayuṅkte tadā duṣṭaḥ syāt, na punarajānannevam |
nājñānamatyantāya śaraṇaṃ bhavitumarhati | yo hi ajānan brāhmaṇaṃ hanyāt so 'pi manye patitaḥ syāditi |
atha loke vaikṛto vākyabhedaḥ prākṛtaśca padabhedaḥ | yathā—
jaṃ tujjha saī jāā asaīo jaṃ ca suhaa amhe vi |
tā kiṃ phuṭṭaü pillaṃ/bīaṃ tujja samāṇo juā ṇatthi || 70 ||
(yattava satī jāyā asatyo yacca subhaga vayamapi |
tat ki sphuṭatu bilvaṃ/bījaṃ tava samāno yuvā nāsti ||)
jāyante ca mriyante ca madvidhāḥ kṣudrajantavaḥ |
parārthabaddhakakṣyāṇāṃ tvādṛśāmudbhavaḥ kutaḥ || 71 || (nāgā. 4.15)
atrādyodāharaṇe tatkiṃ sphuṭatu bilvamityetatparyantamekaṃ vākyam | tatra bilvasphuṭanenātra rahasyabhedo 'bhimataḥ, yathā bilvamasphuṭitamantaḥ pak‍vamapak‍vaṃ madhura— mamadhuraṃ surabhi na surabhīti vā na jñāyate, evaṃ yat tava jāyā satī vayamasatya ityetad rahasyamabhinnaṃ na jñāyate |
sa kiṃ rahasyabhedo bhavatu?
bhavatvityukte dvitīyaṃ vākyaṃ tava samāno yuvā nāsti | yadi hyasmākamapi tvattulyo bhartā bhavet tvajjāyeva vayamapyasatyo na syāmeti | dvitīyodāharaṇe tu 'kṣudrajantava' ityetat padaṃ bhidyate kṣudreti jantava iti ca | anyathā hi rājñā lup‍taśāsanagrāmaḥ syādagrajanmanaḥ, taṃ pratyetad vaco na bhavatīti ||
(31. sāmānyātideśaḥ, 32. viśeṣātideśaḥ)
anyadharmāṇāmanyatra prāpaṇamatideśaḥ | dvidhā— sāmānyātideśo viśeṣātideśaśca | tayoryatra anyatra rūḍhasambaddhā dharmāḥ prasiddheranumeyabhedasambhavaiḥ sambandhibhirvyapadiṣṭā nirjñātabhedeṣvartheṣu prāpyante sa sāmānyātideśaḥ| yathā— brāhmaṇavadasmin kṣatriye vartitavyamiti | tatra yāvantamarthaṃ brāhmaṇaśabdo na vyabhicarati tāvatyarthe yāni prasiddhasambandhāni kāryāṇyagrabhojanādīni tānyatyantamalabdhabrāhmaṇavyapadeśe kṣatriye— 'tidiśyante | tatra sāmānyabrāhmaṇaśabdo na vyabhicarita, māṭharatvādīṃstu vyabhicarati | na hi kaṭhe māṭharatvamasti | sannihiteṣvapi ca nirjñāteṣu vā viśeṣeṣu kaścidevārthātmā kenacicchabdena saṃspraṣṭuṃ śakyate, viśiṣṭabhāgābhiniveśīni hi rūpaviśeṣayuktānya— bhidhānāni iti | sāmānyena ca brāhmaṇaśabdasya pratyakṣo 'bhisambandhaḥ, ānumānikastu viśeṣaiḥ | māṭharavadasmin kaṭhe vartitavyamityayamapi sāmānyātideśa eva | na hyatrāpi māṭharasyābhirūpyādayo viśeṣā āśrīyante | evaṃ viśiṣṭavadasmin vartitavyamityatrāpi
yad‍‌viśiṣṭeṣu viśiṣṭatvaṃ tadāśrīyate | so 'pi sāmānyātideśo, na viśeṣātideśaḥ |
tadāha—
sāmānyamātraṃ śabdārtho viśeṣā vyabhicāriṇaḥ |
sāmarthyamantareṇāto viśeṣo nātidiś‍yate || 72 || (vāpa.)
yatra tu sāmarthyād viśeṣadharmāṇāmanyatra prāpaṇaṃ sa viśeṣātideśaḥ | tadyathā— brāhmaṇavadasmin brāhmaṇe vartitavyamiti | tatra hi sāmānyakāryapratipattirbrāhmaṇādeva siddhā; yainaiva hetunopamāne kāryaviśeṣasiddhiraviśiṣṭo 'sau hetu 'rupameye 'pi | tasmād viśiṣṭabrāhmaṇaviṣayāṇi kāryāṇyatidiś‍yante | ye ca brāhmaṇeṣu brāhmaṇavadeva vartante tān prati ayamevaṃbhūto 'tideśo vijñāyate | yeṣāṃ tu buddhisambhedāt pramādād vā pravṛttisaṅkarasteṣu niyama eva kriyate | tathā ca brāhmaṇamarhati vṛttamiti 'tadarham' (5.1.117) iti sūtreṇācāryeṇāyamevārtho bhedena nidarśanāyānyathaiva prakrāntaḥ | sa ca taddhiteṣu vatyarthaprastāve nirṇītaḥ purastāditi ?
atha yatra brāhmaṇavadasmin kṣatriye vartitavyamityatideśaḥ, kiṃ tena kṣatriyeṇa tadvati grāme abrāhmaṇako grāma iti vyapadeśaḥ kriyate ?
netyāha, vyapadeśamātramapi kāryamatideśasyeti |
atha tadvadeva brahmahatyādiprāyaścittaṃ kartavyaṃ,
netyāha; yāvati hi viṣaye tasyātideṣṭari siddhaṃ tāvattatrānuṣajyate; na hyasmādatideśād brāhmaṇyupayamanapratipattirbhavati |
evaṃprakāreṣu hyatideśasyātideṣṭuḥ na kāmacāraḥ, smṛtyadhīnatvāt | yadi tu smṛtirevaṃbhūtā syāt tadapi tadānuṣṭhīyeta, yadā/thā kṣatriyavaiś‍yau savanagatau hatvā brahmahatyāprāyaścittaṃ kuryāditi |
kiṃ punarayamatideśo vatyādimantareṇāpi bhavati ?
bāḍham | yathā abrahmadatte 'pyeṣa brahmadatta iti | tatra bhūtānāṃ vā brahmadattaviṣayāṇāṃ kriyāguṇānāmabrahmadatte samāropād bhāvināṃ vā rūḍhasambandhānāmiva buddha‍yādibhiḥ saṃbandhāt tannimittamupāmānopameyalakṣaṇaṃ sambandhamabhyantarīkṛtyopacāreṇa brahmadattaśabdaḥ prayujyate |
nanu ca uśīnaravan madreṣu yavā iti nātra anyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ (mabhā. 1.1.57), api tu yavā eva madreṣu santi na santīti vā gamyate | tathā hi— yadyuśīnareṣu tanniṣpattiḥ nirjñātā tadā santīti gamyate | athāniṣpattistadā na santīti gamyate |
naivam | atrāpyanyadharmāṇāmevānyatra prāpaṇaṃ yāvevośīnarayavānāṃ bhāvābhāvau prasiddhau tāveva madrayaveṣvatidiś‍yete |
kathaṃ punaramabhinnarūpo vatiḥ k‍vacit prakṛtyarthadharmānanyatrātidiśati k‍vacit sambandhidharmān ?
ucyate yatra 'tena tulyaṃ kriyā cedvatiḥ' tatra prakṛtyarthadharmān; yatra tu 'tatra tasyeva' tatrādheyasambandhidharmāniti |
tadevamupamāneṣu prasiddhā dharmāḥ upameyeṣvāropyanta ityatideśārthaḥ | prasiddhiśca k‍vacillokāpekṣayā, k‍vacitprayoktrapekṣayā, k‍vacitpratyakṣādipramāṇāpekṣayeti | tatra lokapekṣayā yathā—
joṇhāe vva miaṃkaṃ kittīeṁ suarisaṃ pahāe vva raïṃ |
selaṃ mahāṇaī va sirīa ciraṇiggaāi vi amuc‍caṃtaṃ || 73 ||
(jyots‍yayeva mṛgāṅkaṃ kīrttyeva supuruṣaṃ prabhayeva ravim |
śailaṃ mahānadyeva śriyā ciranirgatayāpyamucyamānam ||)
yathā vā— (māgha. 14.16)
yastaveha savane na bhūpatiḥ karma karmakaravat kariṣyati |
tasya neṣyati vapuḥ kabandhatāṃ bandhureṣa jagatāṃ sudarśanaḥ || 74 ||
prayoktrapekṣayā yathā—
ahamiva śūnyamaraṇyaṃ vayamiva tanutāṃ gatāni toyāni |
asmākamivocch‌vāsā divasā dīrghāśca tap‍tāśca || 75 ||
pratyakṣādipramāṇāpekṣayā yathā—(ama.śa. 160)
dṛṣṭe locanavanmanāṅ mukulitaṃ pārśvasthite vaktrava— n‍nyagbhūtaṃ bahirāsitaṃ pulakavat sparśaṃ samātanvati |
nīvībandhavadāgataṃ śithilatāṃ sambhāṣamāṇe tato mānenāpasṛtaṃ hriyeva sudṛśaḥ pādaspṛśi preyasi || 76 ||
(33. adhikāraḥ)
kriyāsu yogyatvam adhikāraḥ |
kaḥ punaryaugyaḥ ?
arthī samarthaḥ śāstreṇāparyudasta iti | tathā arthitvamadhikārakāṇam; paraṃ hi
puruṣārthaṃ mokṣamācakṣate, tasmādapyanarthī jugupsate pramādyati ca | tadyathā—
api bṛndāvane śūnye sṛgālatvaṃ parīpsati |
na tu nirviṣayaṃ mokṣaṃ kadācidapi gautamaḥ || 77 ||
satyapi cārthitve sāmarthyamadhikārakāraṇaṃ, samutpannāyāmatiśayena didṛkṣāyām asamarthatvena andhā rūpadarśane nādhikriyante | arthinaḥ khalvapi k‍vacit samarthāśca karmasu śāstreṇa paryudāsāt kṣudraśūdrāḥ kṣotriyādayaḥ trayyādiṣu nādhikriyante | adṛṣṭārthaviṣaye hi sāmarthyāsāmarthye śāstrādeva samadhigamyete | tasmāt pradhānamadhikārakāraṇaṃ śāstropadeśamācakṣate | tatrodāharaṇ— (ma.vī.ca. 1.31)
sādhāraṇyānnirātaṅkaḥ kanyāmanyo 'pi yācate |
kiṃ punarjagatāṃ jetā prapautraḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ || 78 ||
yathā ca—(māgha. 1.38)
upaplutaṃ pātumado madoddhataistvameva viśvambhara ! viśvamīśiṣe |
ṛte raveḥ kṣālayituṃ kṣameta kaḥ kṣapātamaskāṇḍamalīmasaṃ nabhaḥ || 79 ||
(34. adhyāhāraḥ)
vākyasya nyūnatāyāmākāṅkṣānivṛttaye viśiṣṭakriyākārakapadāderupādānam adhyāhāraḥ | yathā dvāraṃ dvāramityukte saṃvriyatāmapāvriyatāṃ vetyadhyāhriyate; tathā varṣatyudetītyukte devaḥ sūrya iti | yathā ca—
yaśca nimbaṃ paraśunā yaścainaṃ madhusarpiṣā |
yaścainaṃ gandhamālyābhyāṃ sarvasya kaṭureva saḥ || 80 || iti |
yathā vā—
yo na dadāti na yajate na jayati na juhoti nātti nādhīte |
na dhinoti nādhitiṣṭhati na cakāsti na śāsti kiṃ tena || 81 ||
(35. vipariṇāmaḥ)
liṅgavibhaktivacanāderanyathopāttasyārthāntarānurodhādapunaruc‍cāritasyaivānyathābhi— sambandho vipariṇāmaḥ | teṣu liṅgavipariṇāmo yathā— (māmā. 1.30)
mā mūmuhat khalu bhavantamananyajanmā mā te malīmasavikāraghanā matirbhūt |
ityādi nanviha nirarthakameva yasmin kāmaśca jṛmbhitaguṇo navayauvanaṃ ca ||
vibhaktivipariṇāmo yathā—(kirātā. 1.1)
śriyaḥ kurūṇāmadhipasya pālinīṃ prajāsu vṛttiṃ yamayuṅkta veditum |
sa varṇiliṅgī viditassamāyayau yudhiṣṭhiraṃ dvaitavane vanecaraḥ || 83 ||
vacanavipariṇāmo yathā—(ma.vī.ca. 1.45)
sarvaprāṇapravaṇamaghavanmuktamāhatya vakṣa— statsaṅghaṭṭād vighaṭitabṛhatkhaṇḍamuc‍caṇḍarociḥ |
evaṃ vegāt kuliśamakarod vyoma vidyutsahastrai— rbharturvajrajvalanakapiśāste ca roṣāṭṭahāsāḥ || 84 ||
(36. vākyaśeṣaḥ)
sarvavākyānāṃ vidhiniṣedhaparyavasāyitvāt sākṣādaśrutāvapi tadupakalpanaṃ vākyaśeṣaḥ | tadyathā — āryanivāso 'yaṃ deśa ityukte ihaiva sthātavyaṃ, madhyāhno vartata ityukte ihaiva bhoktavyaṃ, sacoraḥ, panthā ityukte na gantavyaṃ, grāhāḥ sarityasyāmityukte na s‍nātavyamiti vākyaśeṣo bhavati | yathā ca— (urāca. 3.26)
tvaṃ jīvitaṃ tvamasi me hṛdayaṃ dvitīyaṃ tvaṃ kaumudī nayanayoramṛtaṃ tvamaṅge |
ityādibhiḥ priyaśatairanurudhya mugdhāṃ tāmeva śāntamathavā kimataḥ pareṇa || 85 ||
yathā vā— (bā.rā. 2.41)
vandyaḥ piteva sa bhavānnalakūbarasya rambhā s‍nuṣā dhanapateriva sā tavāpi |
yattvanyadatra hṛdayānna tadeti kaṇṭhaṃ doṣāstathāpi yadi tatsmṛta eṣa rudra || 86 ||
kaḥ punaradhyāhāravākyaśeṣayorviśeṣaḥ ?
śabdākāṅkṣānivartako 'dhyāhāraḥ, arthākāṅkṣānivartako vākyaśeṣa iti |
yadyevamanantaraślokayoradhyāhārodāharaṇatāprasaṅgaḥ | tathā hi — tāmeva tvaṃ tathāg‍nau viśuddhāmāhitagarbhāmanāgasaṃ vistrabdhāṃ ca dharmapatnīmatyākṣīriti prathamaśloko,
kāmayamānāyāmapi ca s‍nuṣāyāṃ akāmato 'pi yatpradharṣaṇaṃ tanmahāpātakeṣu prakṛṣyate, kimaṅga ! punarakāmayamānāyāḥ śapantyāḥ krośantyāśca haṭheneti dvitīyaśloke vākyasyaivāparipūrṇabhāvenākāṅgitamadhyāhriyate |
tanna; 'śāntamathā kimataḥ pareṇa', 'yattvanyadatra hṛdayānna tadeti kaṇṭham', ityanena śabdākāṅkṣāyā nivartitatvāt |
arthākāṅkṣā tu vidyate | tatra tu yathokta eva vākaryaśeṣo bhavati athaiva pratyukṣānumānopamānaśabdairanupalabhyamānaḥ kiṃpramāṇaviṣayaḥ syāt ?
adhyāhāravacchutārthāpattiprameya iti |
nanu śrutārthāpattirnāma vākyaikadeśaviṣayaṃ vākyaśeṣaviṣayaṃ vā kiṃcit pramāṇamasti ?
astu vā, tathāpi tatpravartamānamarthānupapattyā prapatsyati | arthānupapattiścā '— rthāntaramantareṇa nopaśāmyatīti tadeva kalpanīyaṃ bhavati |
atha śabdasyānupapattyā śabda eva kalpyate ?
tanna, śrotrapratyakṣasamadhigatasya svarūpeṇānupapatterabhāvādarthānupapattinibandhanamevānu— papadyamānatvam, tac‍cārthakalpana evopapadyate |
na caitad vācyam, kalpyamānasyārthasyāvaidikatvaṃ prāp‍noti | śrūyamāṇasyaiva hi śabdasyāyamiṣoriva dīrghadīrgho vyāpāraḥ | aviratavyāpāra eva hi śabde sā pratītirudayate; tad‍vyāpāraviratau nodeti, tadutpādakāraṇānupalabdheḥ | lokaśca vṛddhavyavahārataḥ śabdārtheṣu vyutpadyamānastathābhūtavākyavyavahāriṇo vṛddhān paś‍yan vākyasyaiva tādṛśi vākyārthe sāmarthyamavadhārayati | vākyārthaśceha vidhiniṣedhādirūpa ākhyātādyarthaḥ | tadanuvartīni tu padāni tasminnaimittike nimittāni bhavanti | naimittikānukūlatayā ca k‍vacidaśrūyamāṇānyapi tāni viśvajidādau svargakāmādipadavannimittabhāvenādriyante, k‍vacicchrūyamāṇānyapyananukūlatayā 'yasyobhayaṃ havirārtimārcched' ityādivat parihriyante | k‍vacidanyathāsthitāni 'prayojaśeṣeṇa havīṃṣyabhighārayati' itivad vidhyanurodhāt prayojaśeṣaṃ havīṃṣyabhidhārayedityanyathāvasthāpyate | tasmād yathā prathamāvagataghanākāra— vākyārthānusāreṇa satāmasatāṃ vā padārthānāṃ nimittabhāvavyavasthā tathaivāśrūyamāṇatathā— vidhaikadeśādapi vākyāt tadarthāvagatirbhaviṣyatīti kiṃ śrutārthāpattyā ?
evaṃ ca na vākyaśeṣādhyāhārasopānavyavahitasyārthasya śābdatvam, api tu sākṣādeva bhavati |
nanvevamaśrūyamāṇeṣu nimitteṣu kutastadarthamavagacchāmaḥ ? anavagacchantaśca kīdṛśaṃ naimittikamavakalpayāmaḥ ?
ucyate—'śruteṣvapi padeṣu teṣāṃ nimittabhāvo na svamahim‍nā 'vakalpate |
kiṃ tarhi ?
naimittikānusāreṇa | sa cāśruteṣvapi bhaviṣyati | tathā hi— na yajau karaṇavibhaktiḥ śrūyate, na svarge karmavibhaktiḥ, atha cārthaḥ pratīyate | evaṃ 'viśvajitā yajeta' iti naimittikabalādeva svargakāmādipadādhyāhārārthamuktaślokayośca yathopanya— stavākyaśeṣārthaṃ pratyeṣyāma iti |
atra samādhīyate, yattāvaduktamarthānupapattyārthāntarameva kalpanīyamiti, tatra nārthamātrasyānupapattiḥ |
kiṃ tarhi ? śabdārthasya |
sa ca śabdakalpanāpūrvakārthapratipattivyatirekeṇa nopapan‍no bhavati | yac‍coktaṃ na svarūpeṇa śabdasya kācidanupapattiriti, satyaṃ tat | kiṃ tu sārthadvārikāpi śabdānupapattirna śabdāntarakalpanāṃ vinopaśāmyati | na hyodanaṃ pratyakṣeṇāpi pratiyataḥ pacatītyukte karmapadāpekṣā na bhavati |
yac‍coktaṃ kalpyamānasyārthasyāvaidikatvaṃ mā bhūditi śrūyamāṇasyaiva śabdasyāyamiṣoriva dīrghadīrgho vyāpāra iti, tadapi na samyak, tasya tathāvidhārthapratyāyanāsāmarthyāt | sa hi tamarthaṃ pratyāyayannabhidhāśaktyā vā pratyāyayet tātparyaśaktyā vā ?
na tāvadabhidhāśakta‍yā, tasyāḥ padārthapratipādanamātra evopakṣīṇatvāt |
nāpi tātparyaśaktyā | tātparyaśaktirhi pratīyamānārthaviṣayā tatraiva prakāśate, yatra vākyavākyārthayoḥ paripūrṇatvaṃ bhavati; yathā 'viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣva, mā cāsya gṛhe bhukthā' iti | atra tu paripūrṇe vākye nārthaḥ paripūrṇa iti tātparyaśakteravakāśaḥ | na hi tāṃ tathāvidhāṃ tvamatyākṣīrityādipadaprayogaṃ vinā vākyārthasya paripūrṇatvaṃ bhavati, tasmādavaśyamevārthasya śābdatvasiddhaye 'dhyāhāravākyaśeṣādiśabdakalpanā abhyupeyā | tasyāṃ ca satyāṃ tata evārthasiddheḥ kimarthakalpanayeti |
na ca śrūyamāṇasyaiva śabdasyāyamartha iti śakyamabhidhātum, tasya hyanupapadyamāna evārtho, na punarupapādakaḥ | kiṃca padārthānāmeva vākyārthatvāt, kalpyamāna— vākyārthagatapadārthābhidhāyināṃ padānāṃ sattvamabhidhātavyam | na ca śrūyamāṇe vākye tāni
tathābhūtāni santi | api cāyamevaṃvidho bodhastiraścāmanupajāyamānatvānnāśabdajñasya bhavati | tadasya savikalpakajñānāt pūrvakālabhāvinā śabdavijñānena bhāvyam |
na cehārthāpatteḥ śabdaviṣayatvaṃ na abhyupeyate | na cehārthāpattivyatirekeṇa savikalpakapratyakṣādipramāṇavacchabdasahacaritārthadarśanādinimittakaṃ smṛtyādyupāyāntaraṃ śabdāvagatāvasti | tasmādarthāpattyā pūrvaṃ śabda eva pratyetavyaḥ | tasmiṃśca pratipanne tata evārthāvagamo 'pi bhaviṣyatīti na tātparyataḥ śrūyamāṇa eva śabdaḥ parikleśanīyaḥ | yadi ca śrutārthāpatteḥ śabdaviṣayatvaṃ nābhyupeyate tad 'upadeśe yathopadeśa kāryamatideśe tu yathākāryamupadeśa (nyā.ma.) iti nyāyādatideśāgatāgnyādipadārthānupapattau 'ag‍naye tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi' ityādivākyeṣu sūryāyetyādipadānāmūho na syāt | tasmādavaśyameva adhyāhāravākyaśeṣādisiddhaye śrutārthāpattirabhyupagantavyeti |
(37. avadhiḥ)
asyaitāvataḥ śabdasyāyamartho 'sminnarthe cāyametāvāñchabda iti buddhinibandhanam avadhiḥ | tadyathā— kāle nadanti nāgāḥ, śveto dhāvati, alambusānāṃ yātā iti | yadā padānāmavadhiḥ tadā samaye śabdāyante phaṇinaḥ, śuklo dhāvati, alambusānāṃ gantetyarthaḥ pratīyate | yadā tu 'kālena dantinā agāḥ', 'śvā itaḥ dhāvati', 'alaṃ busānāṃ yātā' iti, tadā 'kṛṣṇena kariṇā gatavānasi', 'kauleyako 'tra vegena sarati', 'samartho busānāṃ gantā' ityarthāntarapratītiḥ | tamimamalaṅkāreṣu tadvidaḥ śabdaśleṣamāmananti; yathā—
yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto yo gaṅgāṃ ca dadhe 'ndhakakṣayakaro yo barhipatrapriyaḥ |
yasyāhuśśaśimacchiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ so 'vyādiṣṭabhujaṅgahāravalayastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ || 87 ||
(38. apoddhāraḥ)
padārthasamavāyino 'rthaviśeṣasya śabdāntareṇa pṛthakkaraṇam apoddhāraḥ | yathā—'vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta, vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā' iti | evaṃ ca vṛtticchannasya sarvanām‍nānusandhānaṃ bhavati | tadyathā— (kusaṃ. 7.19)
patyuḥ śiraścandrakalāmanena spṛśeti sakhyā parihāsapūrvam |
sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīrmālyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna || 88 ||
atrāneneti sarvanām‍nā rañjayitveti śrutau samavetaścaraṇarāgaḥ pṛthagapod‍dhriyate |
(39. anirjñātapraś‍naḥ)
prasiddhapadārthāvadhāraṇe 'prasiddhapadārthaparyanuyogaḥ anirjñātapraś‍naḥ | yathā vanāt pika ānīyatāṃ, jīrṇavarāsī vṛṣalāya dīyatāmityukte ko 'yaṃ piko nāma yo vanādāneyaḥ, kā vā varāsī yā vṛṣalāya dātavyeti | etena prasiddhābhidhānārthāvadhāraṇe aprasiddhābhidhānārthaparyanuyogo vyākhyātaḥ | yathā— (śāku. 5.13)
kāsvidavakuṇṭhanavatī nātiparisphuṭaśarīralāvaṇyā |
madhye tapodhanānāṃ kisalayamiva pāṇḍupatrāṇām || 89 ||
(40. kriyāntaravyudāsaḥ)
sāmarthyārthitvādeḥ k‍vacidayogyatā kriyāntaravyudāsaḥ, yathocyate—'k‍vacit kaścit pragalbhate', 'na sarvaḥ sarvaṃ jānāti'; 'kimapi kasmaicidrocate', 'bhinnarucirhi loka' (raghu. 6.30) iti | yathā ca—(śāku. 5.28)
kumudānyeva śaśāṅkaḥ savitā bodhayati paṅkajānyeva |
vaśināṃ hi paraparigrahasamparkaparāṅmukhī vṛttiḥ || 90 ||
(41. liṅgād bhedaḥ)
śabdāntaropalabdhavastusāmarthyāt sāmānyākṣip‍tasya viśeṣe 'vasthāpanaṃ liṅgād bhedaḥ | yathā 'aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti, tejo vai ghṛtam' iti śarkarāṇāṃ ghṛtāktatvaṃ pratīyate | yathā ca—
na tvaṃ putra ! piturbibheṣi na ca me kiṃcid vidhatse vacaḥ k‍vedaṃ bālaviruddhasāhasamiti vyāhṛtya sāvegayā |
uttīrṇasya jayanti dāntabhujagasyāśliṣya mātrā hare— rnirdhūtāścalakākapakṣaśikharavyāsaṅgino 'mbhaḥkaṇāḥ || 91 ||
atra dāntabhujagasyetyambhaḥ kaṇā iti ca liṅgād yamunāhradāduttīrṇasyeti viśeṣo gamyate |
(42. liṅgādibhedaḥ)
liṅgamarthaḥ prakaraṇamaucityaṃ deśaḥ kāla iti liṅgādayaḥ | tebhyaḥ sāmānyaśabdānāṃ viśeṣādhyavasāyo liṅgādibhedaḥ | sa
liṅgād yathā— dhenurānīyatāṃ savatsā sabarkarā sakiśoreti, gaurajā baḍabā ca pratīyate |
arthād yathā— añjalinā sūryamupatiṣṭhate, añjalinā payaḥ pibati, añjalinā lājān juhotīti arthānurodhāt tathātathā pāṇisanniveśaḥ pratīyate |
prakaraṇādyathā— saindhavamānaya, gopālakamānayetyukte bhojane lavaṇaṃ, prayāṇe 'śvaḥ, adhyāpane putraḥ, pāśupālye tu gopaviśeṣaḥ pratīyate |
aucityād yathā— karabhorūḥ śikharadaśanā puṇḍarīkamukhī iti; upameyaucityāt karabhādiśabdairdhanuṣkoṭikundakuṭmala—kamalāni pratīyante, noṣṭrācalāgracchatrāṇi |
deśato yathā— hariraraṇye, harirdvārakāyāṃ, hariramarāvatyāmiti siṃhaviṣṇuvāsavāḥ pratīyante |
kālato yathā— 'divā hasto 'yamityukte pāṇiḥ pratīyate, na nakṣatram, rātrau pataṅga ityukte śalabho, na sūryaḥ, tretāyāmarjuna ityukte kārtavīryo na kaunteya iti |
asya copalakṣaṇatvāt sāhacaryādibhirapi padārthāvacchedo bhavati | tadyathā—
lakṣmaṇānugato bhāti śaśī rāma ivāparaḥ |
kausalyeva bibharti dyaurabhiṣekojjvalāṃ śriyam || 92 ||
yathā ca—(kāvyāda. 1.6)
gaurgauḥ kāmadughā samyakprayuktā smaryate budhaiḥ |
duṣprayuktā punargotvaṃ prayoktuḥ saiva śaṃsati || 93 ||
(43. śabdāntarādibhedaḥ)
śabdāntaramabhyāsaḥ saṅkhyā saṃjñā guṇaḥ prakaraṇamiti śabdāntarādayaḥ; tebhyaḥ kriyādīnāmanekatvaṃ śabdāntarādibhedaḥ | teṣu śabdāntarāt kriyābhedo yathā—
ārohatyavanīruhaḥ praviśati śvabhraṃ nagaḥ spardhate khaṃ vyālẹdhi viveṣṭate kṣititale kuñjodare līyate |
antarbhrāmyati koṭarasya visaratyālambate vīrudhaḥ kiṃ tad yanna karoti mārutavaśaṃ yātaḥ kṛśānurvane || 94 ||
abhyāsāt kriyābhedo yathā—(gā.sa. 902)
jāṇimi kaāvarāhaṃ jāṇimi aliāi bhaṇaï saalāiṃ |
aṇuṇeṃte uṇa jāṇe kaāvarāhaṃ va appāṇaṃ || 95 ||
(jānāmi kṛtāparādhaṃ jānāmi alīkāni bhaṇati sakalāni |
anunayati punarjāne kṛtāparādhamivātmānam ||) iti |
saṅkhyāyā dravyabhedo yathā—
trayo 'g‍nayas‍trayo vedās‍trayo devās‍trayo guṇāḥ |
trayo daṇḍiprabandhāśca triṣu lokeṣu pūjitāḥ || 96 ||
saṃjñāto dravyabhedo yathā—(ma.vī.ca. 1.20)
lāṅgalollikhyamānāyā yajñabhūmeḥ samudgatā |
sīteyamūrmileyaṃ tu dvitīyā janakātmajā || 97 ||
guṇād dravyabhedo yathā—
indranīlanibhaḥ pṛṣṭhe kroḍe kumudapāṇḍaraḥ |
gaṅgāyamunayoreṣa sāraṅgassaṅgamopamaḥ || 98 ||
prakaraṇāt kriyāviśeṣabhedo yathā—(raghu. 12.45)
eko dāśarathiḥ kāmaṃ yātudhānāḥ sahastraśaḥ |
te tu yāvanta evājau tāvaddhā dadṛśe sa taiḥ || 99 ||
(44. śaktyādibhedaḥ)
śaktiḥ śaktivyāpāraḥ kriyāphalaṃ kriyāsambandhinaḥ sahacāriṇa iti śaktyādayaḥ | teṣāṃ vāstava aupādhiko vā bhedenāvabhāsaḥ śaktyādibhedaḥ | tatra
vāstavaḥ śaktibhedo yathā— ag‍niḥ kāṣṭhāni dahati, odanaṃ pacati, padārthān prakāśayati, sarpirag‍niṃ dīpayati, pittaṃ śamayati, śarīramāpyāyayatīti |
vāstavaḥ śaktivyāparo yathā— ābhyāṃ labdham; ābhyāṃ krītam, ābhyāṃ pak‍vaḥ, ābhyāṃ dattamityatrābhyāmityasya labdhādipadasannidherapādānakaraṇakartṛsampradāna— viṣayo 'bhidhāvyāpāro bhidyate | evaṃ payaḥ payo jarayati (mabhā. 1.2.64) iti kartṛkarmaviśeṣaviṣayaḥ, gāvau gāvau śrayete iti sa eva dvitvāvacchinnaḥ, payaḥ(yāṃsi) payo 'nveṣayati iti bahutvaikatvāvacchinnaḥ | evaṃ kārmādhikaraṇādiviṣayo 'pi kuṇḍe kuṇḍe nidhehītyādiravagantavya iti |
vāstavaḥ kriyāphalabhedo yathā— ekasminneva yāge yajamānasya dharmaḥ, ṛtvijāmarthaḥ, annabhujāṃ kāmaḥ, paśūnāṃ mokṣaḥ; ekasminnapi saṅgrāme bhṛtyānāṃ dharmaḥ, rājñāmarthaḥ, kravyādāṃ kāmaḥ, abhimukhahatānāṃ mokṣa iti |
aupādhikaḥ kriyābhedo yathā— uṣṭrāsikā āsyante, hataśāyikāśśayyante, raipoṣaṃ puṣyati, samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati; yathā ca bhavedapi bhavet syādapi syāditi |
aupādhikaḥ sambandhibhedo yathā—sampanno yavo yavaneṣu, śuṣkasturuṣkeṣu, vinaṣṭaḥ surāṣṭreṣu; parut bhavān paṭurāsīt paṭutara aiṣamaḥ, anya evāsi sampanna iti |
yathā ca—(raghu. 6.5)
tāsu śriyā rājaparamparāsu prabhāviśeṣodayadurnirīkṣaḥ |
sahasradhātmā vyarucad vibhaktaḥ payomucāṃ paṅ‌ktiṣu vidyuteva || 100 ||
aupādhikaḥ sahacāribhedo yathā—
magadheṣu stanau pīnau kaliṅgeṣvakṣiṇī śubhe |
bāhū pralambāvaṅgeṣu vaṅgeṣu caraṇau dṛ̣dhau || 101 ||
yathā ca—(māgha. 3.14)
daityādhipaprāṇamuṣāṃ nakhānāmupeyuṣāṃ bhūṣaṇatāṃ kṣatena |
prakāśakārkaśyaguṇau dadhānāḥ stanau taruṇyaḥ parivavrurenam || 102 ||
(45. śrutyādiviniyogaḥ)
śrutiḥ liṅgaṃ vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ sthānaṃ samākhyeti śrutyādayaḥ | taiḥ pradhānāṅgatvāpādanaṃ śrutyādiviniyogaḥ | sa
śrutito yathā— paśunā rudraṃ yajate; atra paśuneti tṛtīyāśrutyā rudrayāge paśoraṅgabhāvaḥ pratipādyate |
liṅgato yathā— 'barhirdevasadanaṃ dāmi' iti; atra dāmīti lavanaliṅgādanena mantreṇa bahīṃṣi lunīyāditi pratīyate |
vākyato yathā— śvetaṃ chāgamālabheta; atraikavākyopādānācch‌vetaguṇasya chāgāvacchedakatvena kriyāṅgabhāvo ava gamyate |
prakaraṇato yathā— samidho yajati, tanūnapātaṃ yajati, iḍo yajati, barhiryajati, svāhākāraṃ yajati, iti prayājānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe paṭhitānāṃ tadaṅgatvamavagamyate |
sthānato yathā— mārjanāghamarṣaṇopasthānajapahomādisthāneṣu paṭhitānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ tatraivāṅgabhāvo bhavati |
samākhyāto yathā— hautraṃ karma, ādhvaryavaṃ karma, audgātraṃ karmetyanvarthasaṃjñā— balāddhautrādīnāmeva teṣvaṅgabhāvo bhavati |
śrutyādayaśca k‍vacitsamastāḥ k‍vacidva‍yastā eva viniyojayanti |
samastā yathā—(raghu. 6.63)
anena kalyāṇi! kare gṛhīte mahākulīnena mahīva gurvī |
rat‍nānuviddhārṇavamekhalāyā diśaḥ sapat‍nī bhava dakṣiṇasyāḥ || 103 ||
vyastā yathā—(kirātā 3.48)
sa kṣatriyastrāṇasahaḥ kṣatād yastat kārmukaṃ karmasu yasya śaktiḥ |
vahan dvayīmapyaphale 'rthajāte karotyasatkārahatāmivoktim || 104 ||
(46. śrutyādibalābalam)
'śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ samavāye pāradaubailyamarthaviprakarṣād' (pū. mī. 3.3.14) iti śrutyādibalābalaṃ tadapyakhaṇḍavākyārthapakṣe asamarthitameva bhavati | yataḥ— (vāpa. 2.72)
akhaṇḍameva vākyaṃ cedavibhaktārthamiṣyate |
tat sarvaṃ śrutibhūtatvānna śrutyaiva virotsyate || 105 ||
na ca śrutirliṅgavākyādi na viruṇaddhi | tatra śrutyā liṅgavirodho yathā—'aindrayā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhate' (mai.saṃ. 3.24); aindrayā ṛcā indraprakāśanasāmarthyalakṣaṇā— lliṅgādindropasthānaviniyogo gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāśrutyā bādhyate; tenaindrayāpyetayā gārhapatyasyaivopasthānaṃ bhavati | śrutyā vākyavirodho yathā—'payasā bhuṅktāṃ devadattaḥ śṛtena |' atra viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena vākyaprāpitasya payoviṣayasya śrapaṇasyāsambhave 'pi śrutiprāpitaṃ payasa upasecanatvaṃ na nivartate | na copasecanatvena yadaprasiddhamudakādikaṃ, tena śṛtena śrapaṇasyānugraho bhavatviti yujyate | śrutivākyārthavikalpasambhave śrutyartha eva kriyate, na vākyārthaḥ, arthaviprakarṣāt | nanu ca śṛtenetyapi tṛtīyāntameva | tatra yathā 'aruṇayaikahāyanyā piṅākṣyā somaṃ krīṇāti' ityāruṇyādayaḥ svāśrayamavacchindantaḥ śrutyā krayeṇa sambadhyante, tathā śrapaṇamapi śrutyaiva bhojanena sambhantsyata iti |
viṣama upanyāsaḥ | tatra hi 'aruṇayaikahāyanyā piṅgākṣyā' iti praśastagavīviṣayāṇi viśeṣaṇānyeva śrūyante, na viśeṣyaṃ śābaleyādi | tataśca yairevā— sādhāraṇaviśeṣaṇairaruṇādibhirnīlagrīvatrilocanārdhanārīśvarādibhiriva maheśvarādi viśeṣyaṃ śābaleyādi yadavagamyate, naiva teṣāṃ bādho bhavati | tadagrahe tasyāgrahaṇāt | nāpi
vikalpaḥ, samuditānāmevāvacchedanimittatvāt | iha tūbhayaṃ śrūyate, viśeṣyaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ ca, payaseti viśeṣyaṃ, śṛteneti viśeṣaṇam | viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayośca vikalpasambhave viśeṣyamevopādīyate, na viśeṣaṇamiti mṛṣaivopālabdhāḥ smaḥ |
api ca dvividha ihānuṣṭheyaḥ śabdārthaḥ dṛṣṭaviṣayo 'dṛṣṭaviṣayaśca | tatrādṛṣṭaviṣaye yathoktākaraṇena mā bhūd viphala iti nivāpāñjalipradānavadanyūnādhika eva anuṣṭhīyate | dṛṣṭaviṣaye punaradṛṣṭaniyamābhāvena śakyate śaktirullaṅaghayitum | tatra nāyaṃ niyamo yaduta śṛtenaiva payasā bhoktavyaṃ, na cāśṛtena payasā bhujikriyā na nirvartate | na ca nirvṛttā phalaṃ na nirvartayati | tasmād aśṛtamapi paya evopādīyate, na tu śṛtamapyudakādīti ||
nanu ca liṅgenāpi śrutibādho dṛśyate | tadyathā— pacyatāṃ piṣyatāmavahanyatā— matithirāyāta iti | atra hi pākapeṣaṇāvaghātāḥ śrutyātithiviṣayatayopasthāpitā liṅgena pākapeṣaṇāvaghātārhavrīhyādiviṣayatayopasthāpyante |
atrāpi brūmaḥ—kāmaṃ punarihātithiviṣayāṃ śrutimāyuṣmān manyate pacyatāmatithirāyāta iti | tatra yadi pūrvām, uttarasyā viṣayo vaktavyaḥ | athottarām, kathamādyāḥ pākādayo 'tithiviṣayā iti?
kiṃ bravīṣi? atithiviśeṣaṇānukāritvenaikavākyabhrāntikāriṇā āyāta iti padena vipralabdho 'si |
kiyadidaṃ te, yato 'dyāpi śrutyarthamapi nā(va)budhyase | śrutirhi nāmānekapadanibandhana eva śabdaviṣayo vidhyādirarthaḥ | sa ca svārthasiddhaye karmakaraṇakartra— dhikaraṇādikaṃ yadākṣipati sa sarvaḥ śrutyartho bhavati | tadyathā avahanyatāmityukte vrīhyādi, 'somaṃ krīṇāti' ityuk‍te gavādi, varṣatītyukte devādi, sūrya udetītyukte prācyādi | tacca dravyameva na guṇaḥ | sa tvarthasāmarthyāt sannihito 'pi śrutipadānākṣip‍taḥ śrutāruṇādiśabdasannidhāne vyāpāravān pratīyata iti yat‍nāntaraprāpitatvācchutyarthavilakṣaṇo vākyārthaviṣayatā kriyāṅgabhāvamanubhavati |
taduktam — (vāpa. 2.73, 74)
sāmarthyaprāpitaṃ yacca vyaktyarthamanuṣajyate |
śrutirevānuṣaṅge sā bādhikā liṅgavākyayoḥ || 106 ||
anākṣip‍to 'ruṇādiryaḥ sannidhānena gamyate |
sa yat‍naprāpito vākye śrutidharmavilakṣaṇaḥ || 107 || iti |
etena liṅgādyanupāttayāpi śrutyā liṅgādibādho vyākhyātaḥ |
tadyathā—(kusaṃ. 5.64)
yathāśrutaṃ vedavidāṃ vara! tvayā jano 'yamuccaiḥpadalaṅghanotsukaḥ |
tapaḥ kiledaṃ tadavāp‍tisādhanaṃ manorathānāmagatirna vidyate || 108 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 5.82)
alaṃ vivādena yathāśrutastvayā tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḥ |
mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitaṃ na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate || 109 ||
(47. śrutyādikramaḥ)
śrutyarthapāṭhasthānamukhyapravṛttyādibhiḥ padārthānāṃ yāgādikarmasu paripāṭ‍yāvasthāpanaṃ śrutyādikramaḥ | tatra—
śrutikramo yathā— 'adhvaryurgṛhapatiṃ dīkṣayitvā brahmāṇaṃ dīkṣayati' |
arthakramo yathā— 'ag‍nihotraṃ juhoti, yavāgūṃ pacati' |
pāṭhakramo yathā— 'dharmārthakāmānāṃ samavāye pūrvaḥ pūrvo garīyān' (kāmasū. 1.2) |
sthānakramo yathā— 'bhūrbhuvaḥsvarlokāṁstarpayati' |
mukhyakramo yathā— 'devānṛṣīn manuṣyānarcayati' |
pravṛttikramo yathā— 'prāgvadano 'ghamarṣaṇādīni japati' |
(48. kramasambhedaḥ)
eṣāmanyonyasaṅkaraḥ kramasambhedaḥ| tatra— śrautārthakramasaṅkaro yathā—
prathamamaruṇacchāyastāvattataḥ kanakaprabha—
stadanu virahottāmyattanvīkapolataladyutiḥ |
prabhavati punardhvāntadhvaṃsakṣamaḥ kṣaṇadāmukhe
sarasabisinīkandacchedacchavirmṛgalāñchanaḥ || 110 ||
sthānārthasaṅkaro yathā— (kusaṃ. 5.64)
sthitāḥ kṣaṇaṃ pakṣmasu tāḍitādharāḥ payodharotsaṅganipātacūrṇitāḥ |
valīṣu tasyāḥ skhalitāḥ prapedire cireṇa nābhiṃ prathamodabindavaḥ|| 111 ||
pāṭhasthānasaṅkaro yathā—
hṛtkaṇṭhavaktraśrotreṣu kasya nāvasthitaṃ tava |
śrīkhaṇḍahārakarpūradantapatraprabhaṃ yaśaḥ || 112 ||
śrautārthaprāvartikakramasaṅkaro yathā—(māgha. 9.29)
prathamaṃ kalābhavadathārdhamatho himadīdhitirmahadabhūduditaḥ |
dadhati sphuṭaṃ kramaśa eva na tu prathitaujaso 'pi sahasopacayam || 113 ||
śrautārthapāṭhasaṅkaro yathā—
k‍vāpyastādridarīṣu pūṣṇi patite sāndhye ca dhām‍ni kramāt
kiṃcitkiṃcidudañcati pratikalaṃ mandāsu dṛkchaktiṣu |
etāḥ pakvaparūṣakacchavimuṣaḥ pūrvaṃ tatastyāyatā
jāyante tamasā diśaḥ pariṇamajjambūphalaśyāmalāḥ || 114 ||
śrautārthamukhyasaṅkaro yathā—
śrutvā yaṃ sahasā ' 'gataṃ nijapurāt trāsena nirgacchatāṃ
śatrūṇāmavarodhanairjalalavaprasyandatimyatpuṭāḥ
śubhre sadmani pallavinyupavane vāpyāṃ navāmbhoruhi
krīḍādrau ca saśādvale vivalitagrīvairvimuktā dṛśaḥ || 115 ||
śrautārthasthānamukhyasaṅkaro yathā—
āyāte dayite marusthalabhuvāṃ sañcintya durlaṅghatāṃ
gehinyā paritoṣabāṣpataralāmāsajya dṛṣṭi mukhe |
dattvā pīluśamīkarīrakabalān svenāñcalenādarā—
dunmṛṣṭaṃ karabhasya kesarajaṭābhārāgralag‍naṃ rajaḥ || 116 ||
śrautārthapāṭhapravṛttisaṅkaro yathā—
dṛṣṭe locanavanmanāṅ mukulitaṃ pārśvasthite vaktratav || 117 || (dra.pṛ. 472)
ādigrahaṇādviprakarṣādibhirapi śrutyādikramasambhedo yathā—(māgha. 1.3)
cayastviṣāmityavadhāritaṃ purā tataḥ śarīrīti vibhāvitākṛtim |
vibhurvibhaktāvayavaṃ pumāniti kramādamuṃ nārada ityabodhi saḥ || 118 ||
prādhānyādibhirapi yathā—kusaṃ. 7.46
kampena mūrdh‍naḥ śatapatrayoniṃ vācā hari vṛtrahaṇaṃ smitena |
ālokamātreṇa surānaśeṣān sambhāvayāmāsa yathāpradhānam || 119 ||
aucityādibhirapi yathā—(raghu. 13.72)
durjātabandhurayamṛkṣaharīśvaro me
paulastya eṣa samareṣu puraḥ prahartā |
ityādareṇa kathitau raghunandanena
vyutkramya lakṣmaṇamubhau bharato vavande || 120 ||
vayaḥśrutādibhirapi yathā—(rāca. 15.36)
mūrdh‍nā jāmbavato 'bhivādya caraṇāvāpṛcchya senāpatī—
nāśvāsyāśrumukhānmuhuḥ priyasakhān preṣyān samādiśya ca |
ārambhaṃ jagṛhe mahendraśikharādambhonidherlaṅghane
raṃhasvī raghunāthapādarajasāmuccaiḥ smaran mārutiḥ || 121 ||
tadevamete ye purastādupavarṇitāḥ ye caivaṃprakārāḥ samāhāretaretarayogaika— śeṣānvācyādayo vākyagatānāṃ padārthānāmanugrāhiṇo dharmāḥ te sarve 'pyavidyamāne— ddeśavibhāgena ekena vākyākhyena śabdenābhidhīyamāne 'vayavābhāvād anapoddhārya— śaktimātraparigrahe kriyātmanyeva kevale pratijñāya māne na sambhavanti | tasmāt pravibhaktarūpāṇāmapyavyabhicaritāvādhi vibhāgānāṃ caturṇāṃ pañcānāṃ vā padajātānām asaṅkīrṇairvācyadyotyagamanīyairarthairbhavitavyamiti | yasyāpyekaḥ sanniviṣṭānekaśaktirūpa— sarvopādhiviśiṣṭaḥ kriyātmā vyāvahārikābhyāṃ anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ prakalpitoddeśa— vibhāgenaikena vākyākhyena śabdenābhidhīyate, tasyāpi yāvānayaṃ padaśrutirūpabhedena padārtharūpabhedena ca vyavahāraḥ purastādupanyastaḥ sa sarva ekasmādarthāt śrutirūpāṇi buddha‍yantaraiḥ kṛtapravibhāgānyapoddha‍ṛtyāyoddha‍ṛtya prakṛtipratyayādivat śrutirūpapravibhāge kriyamāṇe na virudhyate | tatra ca—
rūpanāśe padānāṃ syāt kathaṃ cāvadhikalpanā |
agṛhītāvadhau śabde kathaṃ cārtho vivicyate || 122 ||
tathā hi bhāge sādṛśyaṃ bhāge bhedo 'vasīyate |
bhāgābhāve 'pi vākyānāmatyantaṃ bhinnadharmaṇām || 123 ||
ekasya bhāge sādṛśyaṃ bhāge bhedaśca lakṣyate |
nirbhāgasya prakāśasya nirbhāgenaiva cetasā || 124 ||
aprasiddhaṃ tu yaṃ bhāgamadṛṣṭamanupaśyati |
sarvatrāsaṃvidaṃ mūḍhastāvati pratipadyate || 125 ||
yataḥ pikādiyogena vākye 'tyantavilakṣaṇe |
sadṛśasyeva saṃjñānamasato 'rthasya manyate || 126 ||
gavaye narasiṃhe vāpyekajñānāvṛte yathā |
bhāgaṃ jātyantarasyaiva sadṛśaṃ pratipadyate || 127 ||
yathaivaikasya gandhasya bhedena parikalpanā |
puṣpādiṣu tathā vākye 'pyarthabhedasya kalpanā || 128 ||
ato 'khaṇḍe 'pi vākyārthe śaktibhedādapoddha‍ṛte |
vākyāntaravibhāgena yathoktaṃ na virudhyate || (vāpa. 2.88–95)
tasmād yuktaiva padagatadoṣaguṇanirūpaṇeti |
(padadoṣāḥ —16)
tatra padavākyavākyārthadoṣeṣu padadoṣāḥ ṣoḍaśa—
asādhu, aprayuktaṃ, kaṣṭam, anarthakam, anyārthakam, apuṣṭārthakam, asamartham, apratītaṃ, kliṣṭaṃ, gụ̄dhārthaṃ, neyārthaṃ, sandigdhaṃ, viruddham, aprayojakaṃ, deśyaṃ, grāmyamiti | teṣu —
1. śabdānuśāsanaviruddhamasādhu, yathā—
bhūribhārabharākrānte bādhati skandha eṣa te |
na tathā bādhate skandho yathā bādhati bādhate || 130 ||
2. kavibhiranibaddhamaprayuktam, yathā—
kāmacīkamathāḥ ke 'mī tvāmajihvāyakīyiṣam |
sa sasti kiṃ vacantīme kambaḥ śambaṃ dhariṣyati || 131 ||
3. śrutivirasaṃ kaṣṭam, yathā—(bhāmahā. 1.53)
varvarṣṭi jalado yatra yatra dardharṣṭi cātakaḥ |
yatrāśvakarṇaḥ pophulti sa kālo māmajihladat || 132 ||
4. pādapūraṇamātrārthamanarthakam, yathā—
bibharti yaśca dehārdhe priyāminduṃ tu mūrdhani |
sa vai devaḥ khalu tvāṃ hi punātu madanāntakaḥ || 133 ||
5. rụ̄dhicyutamanyārthakaṃ, yathā—
te duḥkhamuccāvacamāvahanti ye prasmaranti priyasaṅgamānām |
atrāṅprapūrvau vahatismṛdhātū svārthe prayuktau na ca tatra rụ̄dhiḥ || 134 ||
6. tucchābhidheyamapuṣṭārtham, yathā—
śatārdhapañcāṃśabhujo dvādaśārdhārdhalocanaḥ |
viṃśatyardhārdhamūrdhā vaḥ punātu parameśvaraḥ || 135 ||
7. avācakamasamarthaṃ, yathā—
jalaṃ jaladhare kṣāramayaṃ varṣati vāridhiḥ |
idaṃ bṛṃhitamaśvānāṃ kakudmāneṣa heṣate || 136 ||
8. śāstramātraprayuktamapratītam, yathā—
kiṃ bhāṣitena bahunā rūpaskandhasya santi me na guṇāḥ |
guṇanāntarīyakaṃ ca premeti na te 'styupālambhaḥ || 137 ||
9. vyavahitārthapratyayaṃ kliṣṭam, yathā—(kāvyāda. 3.120)
vijitātmabhavadveṣigurupādahato janaḥ |
himāpahāmitradharairvyāp‍taṃ vyomābhinandati || 138 ||
10. aprasiddhārthaprayuktaṃ gụdhārthaṃ, yathā—
sahasragorivānīkaṃ bhavato dussahaṃ paraiḥ |
gośabdasyākṣivācitvādihendro hi sahasraguḥ || 139 ||
11. saṅekatakalpitābhidheyaṃ neyārtham, yathā—
sapadi paṅ‌ktivihaṅgamanāmabhṛttanayasainyamulūkajitā jitam |
ayamihārtha ulūkajidindrajid balamanena ca dāśaratherjitam || 140 ||
12. aniścayakṛt sandigdham, yathā—
nīlalohitamūrtiryo dahatyante jagattrayam |
sa eṣa hi mahādeva ityukte hi na niścitam |
vibhāvasurvivasvānvā vṛṣāṅko vā pratīyate || 141 ||
13. viparītakalpanaṃ viruddham, yathā—
akāryasuhṛdo 'smākamapūrvāstava kīrtayaḥ |
iti stutyarthamevaitadastutyarthe vikalpyate || 142 ||
14. aviśeṣādhāyakamaprayojakam, yathā—
tamālaśyāmalaṃ kṣāramatyacchamatiphenilam |
kālena laṅghayāmāsa hanūmāneṣa sāgaram || 143 ||
15. avyutpattimaddeśyam, yathā—
gallau lāvaṇyatallau te laḍahau maḍahau bhujau |
netre vosaṭṭakaṃdoṭṭamoṭṭāyitasakhe sakhi! || 144 ||
16. aślīlāmaṅgalaghṛṇāvadarthaṃ grāmyam |
tatrāsabhyamasabhyārthāntaramasabhyasmṛtihetuścāślīlam tatrāsabhyaṃ yathā—
chatrākāraśirāḥ sirālasaralasthūlaprakāṇḍo mahān
madhyesūryasutābhrasindhu—vipulābhogo vaṭaḥ pātu vaḥ |
kāyaikye vikaṭaprasāritamahājaṅghaṃ mahīsup‍tayo—
ryaḥ khaṇḍendukirīṭakaiṭabhajitoḥ kāṭaśriyaṃ karṣati || 145 ||
asabhyārthāntaraṃ yathā—
vidyāmabhyasyato rātrāveti yā bhavataḥ priyā |
vanitā guhyakeśānāṃ kathaṃ te pelavaṃ dhanam || 146 ||
asabhyasmṛtiheturyathā—(bhāmahā. 1.59)
utkampayasi māṃ cūta! pikavākkaṭavena kim |
kṛtaḥ kṛkāṭikāyāṃ te pādaḥ prāṇena yāsyatā || 147 ||
apraśastamapraśastārthāntaramapraśastasmṛtihetuścāmaṅgalārtham | teṣu— apraśastaṃ yathā—
kheṭake bhaktasūpasya valabhyāṃ pattanasya ca |
atṛp‍to 'haṃ mariṣyāmi hehale bhāṣitasya ca || 148 ||
apraśastārthantaraṃ yathā—
pravāsayati yā kāntaṃ vasante gṛhasaṃsthitam |
vināśapathadānena piśācī sā na sā 'ṅganā || 149 ||
apraśastasmṛtiheturyathā—
mārīco 'yaṃ muniryasya kṛtyāḥ kālāntakālaye |
pat‍nyāṃ saṅkrandanādīnāṃ sutānāmāp‍taye 'bhavan || 150 ||
ghṛṇāvad ghṛṇāvadarthāntaraṃ ghṛṇāvatsmṛtihetuśca |
ghṛṇāvadarthaṃ yathā—
pardate hadate stanyaṃ vapatyeṣa stanandhayaḥ |
muhurutkauti niṣṭhīvatyāttagarbhā punarvadhūḥ || 151 ||
ghṛṇāvadarthāntaraṃ yathā—
bāṣpaklinnāvimau gaṇḍau vipūyāpāṇḍarau tava |
priyo 'gre viṣṭitaḥ putri! smitavarcobhirarcati || 152 ||
ghṛṇāvatsmṛtiheturyathā—
pratyārdrayanto rụ̄dhāni madaneṣuvraṇāni naḥ |
hṛdayaṃ kledayantyete purīṣaṇḍamahādrumāḥ || 153 ||
(vākyadoṣāḥ —16)
vākyadoṣāḥ ṣoḍaśa— śabdahīnaṃ, punaruktimat, apakramaṃ, bhinnavṛttaṃ, yatibhraṣṭaṃ, visandhi, vyākīrṇaṃ, saṅkīrṇaṃ, garbhitam, apadam, aśarīram, ūnopamam, adhikopamam, bhinnaliṅgaṃ, bhinnavacanaṃ, śleṣādiguṇaviparītaṃ ceti | teṣu—
1. apaśabdavacchabdahīnaṃ yathā— (kirātā. 8.24)
samucch‌vasatpaṅkajakośakomalairupāhitaśrīṇyupanīvi nābhibhiḥ |
dadhanti madhyeṣu valīvibhaṅgiṣu stanātibhārādudarāṇi namratām || 154 ||
2. abhinnapadapadārthaṃ punaruktimad, yathā—(kāvyāda. 4.13)
utkāmunmanayantyete gambhīrāḥ stanayit‍navaḥ |
ambhodharāstaṭitvanto gambhīrāḥ stanayit‍navaḥ || 155 ||
3. kramabhraṣṭamapakramam, yathā—
kāntipratāpau bhavataḥ sūryācandramasoḥ samau |
turaṅgamatha mātaṅgaṃ prayacchāsmai madālasam || 156 ||
4. chandobhaṅgavadbhinnavṛttaṃ, yathā—(bṛ.u. 5.5.17)
yasminpañca pañcajanā ākāśaśca pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ || 157 ||
5. asthānaviratiryatra tat yatibhraṣṭam, yathā—
brahmondropendrādigīrvāṇavandyo bhaktānāṃ bhūyācchriye candracūḍaḥ |
strīṇāṃ saṅgītaṃ samākarṇayanketūdastāmbhodaṃ sado 'dhyāsta īśaḥ || 158 ||
6. visaṃhitaṃ virūpasandhi ca visandhi, yathā—yathā—kāvyāda. 4.37
meghānilena amunā etasminnadrikānane |
maññaryudgamagarbhāsau tarvālyurvī vidhūyate || 159 ||
7. vighaṭitavibhakti vyākīrṇam, yathā—(kāvyāda. 3.110)
daṇḍe cumbati padminyā haṃsaḥ karkaśakaṇṭake |
mukhaṃ valguravaṃ kurvan tuṇḍenāṅgāni ghaṭṭayan || 160 ||
8. vākyāntarapadavyāmiśraṃ saṅkīrṇam, yathā—
kāaṃ khāaï khuhio kūraṃ phellei ṇibbharaṃ ruṭṭho |
suṇaaṃ goṇhāi kaṃṭhe hakkei a ṇattiaṃ ṭhero || 161 ||
(kākaṃ khādati kṣudhitaḥ krūraṃ kṣipati nirbharaṃ ruṣṭaḥ |
śvānaṃ gṛh‍ṇāti kaṇṭhe bhīṣayate nap‍tāraṃ sthaviraḥ ||)
9. vākyāntaragarbhaṃ garbhitam, yathā—(rudraṭa. 644)
yogyo yaste putraḥ so 'yaṃ daśāvadana lakṣmaṇena mayā |
rakṣainaṃ yadi śaktirmṛtyuvaśaṃ nīyate vivaśaḥ || 162 ||
10. bhinnabhāṣaprakṛtyādikamapadam | yathā—
āujjhia piṭṭiae jaha kukkuli ṇāma majjha bhattāle |
pecchaṃ/kkhaṃtaha lāulakaṃṇiāha hā kasya kaṃdemi || 163 ||
(āvārjya tāḍyate yathā kurkarī nāma mama bhartā |
prakṣante rājakulabhṛtyā hā kasya krandāmi ||)
11. niṣkriyamaśarīraṃ, yathā—
selasuāruddhaddhaṃ muddhāṇābaddhamuddhasasiḷehaṃ |
sīsapaḍicchiagaṃgaṃ saṃjhāpaṇaaṃ pamahaṇāhaṃ || 164 ||
(śailasutāruddhārdhaṃ mūrdhābaddhamugdhaśaśilekham |
śīrṣapratiṣṭhitagaṅgaṃ sandhyāpraṇataṃ pramathanātham ||)
12. ūnopamānaviśeṣaṇamūnopamam, yathā—(rudraṭa. 1.36)
saṃhaacakkāa—juā viasia—kamalā muṇālasaṃchaṇṇā |
vāvī vahu vva roaṇa—vilitta—thaṇaā suhāvei || 165 ||
(saṅgatacakrāhvayugā vikasitakamalā mṛṇālasaṃchanā |
vāpī vadhūriva rocanāvilip‍tastanī sukhayati ||)
13. adhikopamānaviśeṣaṇamadhikopamam, yathā—
ahiṇava—maṇahara—viraïa—valaa—vihūsā vihāi ṇavavahuā |
kuṃdalae vva samupphullagucchapariliṃtabhamaragaṇā || 166 ||
(abhinavamanoharaviracitavalayavibhūṣā vibhāti navavadhūḥ |
kundalateva samutphullagucchaparilīyamānabhramaragaṇā ||)
14. bhinnaliṅgopamaṃ bhinnaliṅgam, yathā—(bhāmahā. 2.53)
avigāhyo 'si nārīṇāmananyamanasāmapi |
viṣamopalabhinnormirāpagevottitīrṣatām || 167 ||
15. bhinnavacanopamaṃ bhinnavacanam, yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.55)
sarāṃsīvāmalaṃ vyoma kāśā iva sitaḥ śaśī |
śaśīva dhavalā haṃsāḥ haṃsīva dhavalā diśaḥ || 168 ||
guṇaviparyayastridhā—śabdapradhānaḥ, arthapradhānaḥ, ubhayapradhānaśca | tatra śleṣasamatā—
16. saukumāryaviparyayaḥ śabdapradhānaḥ | teṣu—
śleṣaviparyayācchithilaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.43)
ālīyaṃ mālatīmālā lolālikalilā manaḥ |
nirmūlayati me mūlāt tamālamaline vane || 169 ||
samatāviparyayo viṣamam yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.55)
kokilālāpavācālo māmeti malayanilaḥ |
uc‍calacchīkarācchācchanirjharāmbhaḥ kaṇokṣitaḥ || 170 ||
saukumāryaviparyayo 'sukumāram, yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.48)
asitartitugadricchitsvaḥkṣitāṃ patiradvidṛk |
amidbhiḥ śubhradṛgdṛṣṭairdviṣo jegh‍nīyiṣīṣṭa vaḥ || 171 ||
prasādārthavyaktikāntiviparyayo 'rthapradhānaḥ | teṣu—
prasādaviparyayo 'prasannam, yathā—
anaṅgakamalañcake mayamānā marālikā |
paś‍ /yasyānatyarjunābjanmasadṛśāṅko valakṣaguḥ || 172 || (kāvyāda.1.44)
arthavyaktiviparyayo neyārtham, yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.74)
mahī mahāvarāheṇa lohitāduddhṛtodadheḥ |
itīyatyeva nirdiṣṭe neyā lauhityahetavaḥ || 173 ||
kāntiviparyayo grāmyam, yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.61)
kanye kāmayamānaṃ māṃ tvaṃ na kāmayase katham |
iti grāmyo 'yamarthoktiḥrvairasyāyaiva kalpate || 174 ||
ojomādhuryaudāryaviparyaya ubhayapradhānaḥ | teṣu —
ojoviparyayaḥ khaṇḍitarītirasamastaṃ, yathā—
smaraḥ kharaḥ khalaḥ kāntaḥ kāyaḥ kopaśca naḥ kṛśaḥ |
cyuto māno 'dhiko rāgo moho jāto 'savo gatāḥ || (kāvyāda. 1.59)
mādhuryaviparyayaḥ khaṇḍitarītiranirvyūḍham, yathā—
nakhināṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca śṛṅgiṇāṃ śastriṇāṃ tathā |
viśvāso nopagantavyaḥ strīṣu rājakuleṣu ca || 176 ||
audāryaviparyayaḥ khaṇḍitarītiranalaṅkāram | yathā—
dīrghapucchaścatuṣpādaḥ kakudyān lambakambalaḥ |
gorapatyaṃ balīvardastṛṇānyati mukhena saḥ || 177 ||
(vākyārthadoṣāḥ —16)
vākyārthadoṣā api ṣoḍaśauva—
apārthaṃ, vyartham, ekārthaṃ, saṃsaśayam, apakramaṃ, khinnam, atimātraṃ, paruṣaṃ, virasaṃ, nyūnopanam, adhikopanam, asadṛśopanam, aprasiddhopamam, niralaṅkāram, aślīlaṃ, viruddhaṃ ceti | teṣu —
1. samudāyārthaśūnyamapārtham, yathā—
jarad‍gavaḥ kambalapādukābhyāṃ dvāri sthiti gāyati madrakāṇi |
taṃ brāhmaṇī pṛcchati putrakāmā rājan rumāyāṃ lavaṇasya ko 'rghaḥ || 178 ||
2. niṣprayojanaṃ gatārthaṃ ca vyartham, yathā—(bhaṭṭi 4.4)
āṃhiṣātāṃ raghuvyāghrau śarabhaṅgāśramaṃ, sa ca |
ahauṣīt svatanuṃ vahnau dṛṣṭāp‍tau rāmalakṣmaṇau || 179 ||
3. uktābhinnārthamekārtham, yathā—(māgha. 3.12)
prasādhitasyātha madhudviṣo 'bhūdanyaiva lakṣmīriti yuktametat |
vapuṣyaśeṣe 'khilalokakāntā sānanyakāntā hyurasītarā tu || 180 ||
ityuktārthamevāha—(māgha. 3.13)
kavāṭavistīrṇamanoramoraḥ sthalasthitaśrīlalanasya tasya |
ānanditāśeṣajanā babhūva sarvāṅgasaṅginyaparaiva lakṣmīḥ || 181 ||
4. aniścayakṛtsaṃśay, yathā—(kāvyāda. 4.17)
manorathapriyālokarasalolekṣaṇe sakhi ! |
ārādvṛttiriyaṃ mātā na kṣamā draṣṭumīdṛśam || 182 ||
5. kamacyutamapakramam, yathā—
kārāviūṇa khaüraṃ gāmaüḍo majjio a jimio a |
ṇakkhattattihivāre joisiaṃ pucchiuṃ calio || 183 ||
(kārayitvā kṣauraṃ grāmavṛddhau majjitaśca bhuktavāṃśca |
nakṣatratithivārān jyautiṣikaṃ praṣṭuṃ calitaḥ ||)
6. jātyādyuktāvanirvyūḍhaṃ khinnam, yathā—
vevāhiūṇa vahuā sāaraaṃ doliāe ṇijjaṃtī |
roaï diaro taṃ saṃṭhavei pāseṇa vac‍caṃto || 184 ||
(vivāhya vadhūḥ śvāśurakaṃ dolikayā nīyamānā |
roditi devarastāṃ saṃsthāpayati pārśvena vrajam ||)
7. lokātītārthamatimātram, yathā—
bhṛṅgeṇa kalikākośastathā bhṛśamapīḍayata |
vavarṣa vipinotsaṅge goṣpadapraṃ yathā madhu || 185 ||
8. atikrūrārthaṃ paruṣam, yathā—(sa. ka. 1.58)
khāhi visaṃ, muttaṃ pia ṇijjasu mārīe paḍaü de vajjo |
daṃtakkhaṃḍiathaṇiā khiviūṇa suaṃ savaï māā || 186 ||
(khāda viṣaṃ, mūtraṃ piba nīyasva māryā patatu te vajrama |
dantakhaṇḍitastanī kṣip‍tvā sutaṃ śapati mātā ||)
9. aprakṛtarasaṃ virasam, yathā—(rudraṭasya 11.13)
tava vanavāso 'nucitaḥ pitṛmaraṇaśucaṃ jahīhi kiṃ tapasā |
saphalaya yauvanametannanvanuraktena sutanu mayā || 187 ||
10. hīnopamānaṃ hīnopamam, yathā—(bhāmahā. 2.54)
k‍vacidagre prasaratā k‍vacidāpatya nigh‍natā |
śuneva sāraṅgakulaṃ tvayā bhinnaṃ dviṣāṃ balam || 188 ||
11. adhikopamānamadhikopamam, yathā—(bhāmahā. 2.55)
ayaṃ padmāsanāsīnaścakravāko virājate |
yugādau bhagavān brahmā vinirmitsuriva prajāḥ || 189 ||
12. atulyopamānamasadṛśopamam, yathā—
ṇamaha haraṃ rosāṇala—ṇiddaddha—viaddha—mammaha—sarīraṃ |
vitthaa—ṇiaṃba—ṇiggaa—gaṃgāsottaṃ va himavaṃtaṃ || 190 ||
(namata haraṃ roṣānalanirdagdhavidagdhamanmathaśarīram |
vistṛtanitambanirgatagaṅgāstrotasamiva himavantam ||)
13. aprasiddhopamānamaprasiddhopamam, yathā—
kumudamiva mukhaṃ tasyā gauriva mahiṣaḥ śaśīva kāvyamidam |
śaradiva vibhāti taruṇī vikasatpulakotkareyamiti || 191 ||
14. alaṅkārahīnaṃ niralaṅkāram, yathā—
kolā khaṇaṃti motthaṃ khāaṃti maaamaṃsāiṁ |
uluā haṇaṃti kāe kāā ulue vi vāhaṃ/yaṃti || 192 ||
(kolāḥ khananti mustāṃ gṛdhrāḥ khādanti mṛtakamāṃsān |
ulūkā gh‍nanti kākān kākā ulūkānapi vādhante ||)
15. asabhyārthamaślīlam, yathā—(bhāmahā. 1.51)
udyatasya paraṃ hantuṃ stabdhasya vivaraiṣiṇaḥ |
patanaṃ jāyate 'vaś‍yaṃ kṛcchreṇa punarunnatiḥ || 193 ||
16. virodhastridhā— pratyakṣavirodho 'numānavirodha āgamavirodhaśca | tatra— deśakālalokādipratītaḥ pratyakṣavirodhaḥ | teṣu —
deśaviruddhaṃ yathā—
surāṣṭreṣvasti nagarī madhurā nāma viśrutā |
akṣoṭa nārikelāṅkā yasyāḥ paryantabhūmayaḥ || 194 ||
kālaviruddhaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 4.45)
padminī naktamunnidrā sphuṭatyahni kumudatī |
madhurutphullaniculo nidogho medhadurdinaḥ || 195 ||
lokaviruddhaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 4. 50)
ādhūtakesaro hastī tīkṣṇaśṛṅgasturaṅgamaḥ |
gurusāro 'yameraṇḍo nistāraḥ khadiradrumaḥ || 196 ||
yuktyaucityapratijñādikṛto 'numānāvirodhaḥ | tatra—
yuktiviruddhaṃ yathā—
surahi—mahu—pāṇa—laṃpaḍa—bhamara—gaṇābaddha—maṃḍalībaṃdhaṃ |
kassa maṇaṃ ṇāṇaṃdaha kummīpuṭṭaṭhṭhiaṃ kamalaṃ || 197 ||
(surabhimadhupānalampaṭabhramaragaṇābaddhamaṇḍalībaddham |
kasya mano nānandayati kūrmīpṛṣṭhasthitaṃ kamalam ||)
aucityaviruddhaṃ yathā—
paṭṭaṃsuuttarijjeṇa pāmaro pāmarīe varimusaï |
aïgarua—kūra—kuṃbhībhareṇa seolliaṃ vaaṇaṃ || 198 ||
(paṭṭāṃśuktottarīyeṇa pāmaraḥ pāmaryāḥ proñchati |
atigurukakūrakumbhībhareṇa svedārdritaṃ vadanam ||)
pratijñāviruddhaṃ yathā—
yāvajjīvamahaṃ maunī brahmacārī ca me pitā |
mātā ca mama vandhyāsītsmarābho 'nupamo bhavān || 199 ||
dharmārthakāmādiśāstrakṛta āgamavirodhaḥ | tatra—
dharmaśāstraviruddhaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 4.56)
asāvanupanīto 'pi vedānadhijage guroḥ |
svabhāvaśuddhaḥ sphaṭiko na saṃskāramapekṣate || 200 ||
arthaśāstraviruddhaṃ yathā—
kāmopabhogasāphalyaphalo rājñāṃ mahījayaḥ |
ahaṅkāreṇa jīyante dviṣantaḥ kiṃ nayaśriyā || 201 ||
kāmaśāstraviruddhaṃ kālaśāstraviruddhaṃ kāmaviruddham, yathā—
tavottaroṣṭhe bimboṣṭhi ! daśānāṅko 'tiśobhate |
pūrṇasap‍tasvaraḥ so 'yaṃ bhinnamārgaḥ pravartate || 202 ||
(10. guṇopādānam)
nirdoṣasya ca kāvyasya śarīravastunaḥ (śarīrasyeva) kāmanīyakopapattā— vayamupāyo yaduṇopādānamalaṅkārayogaśca | tadāha—
yuvateriva rūpamaṅga ! kāvyaṃ svadate śuddhaguṇaṃ tadapyatīva |
vihitapraṇayaṃ nirantarābhiḥ sadalaṅkāravikalpakalpanābhiḥ || 203 ||
tatra ca guṇopādānālaṅkārayogayorguṇopādānaṃ garīyaḥ | atastadeva prathamamucyate | tadāha—
yadi bhavati vacaś‍cyutaṃ vapuriva yauvanavandhyamaṅganāyāḥ |
api janadayitāni durbhagatvaṃ niyatamalaṅkaraṇāni saṃśrayante || 204 ||
ayameva guṇālaṅkārayorviśeṣo yaduṇopādāne niyamo 'laṅkārayoge tu kāmacāra iti |
guṇāśca yuvatyāḥ śarīreṣu trividhāstadarthināmādarātiśayahetavo bhavanti bāhyā āntarā vaiśoṣikāśca | tatra—
anvavāyavayorūpalāvaṇyādayo bāhyāḥ,
śīlavaidagdhyamāhābhāgyasaubhāgyādayaścāntarāḥ,
ye tu doṣā apyāśrayaviśeṣāvasthāviśeṣādyupādherguṇatvamāśrayante te vaiśoṣikāḥ |
yathācyate—
sāmaṇṇasuṃdarīṇaṃ vibbhamamāvaïha aviṇao c‍cea |
dhūmo c‍cia pajjaliāhi bahumao surahidārūṇaṃ || 205 ||
(sāmānyasundarīṇāṃ vibhramamāvahatyavinayaṃ eva |
dhūma eva prajvalitānāṃ bahumataḥ surabhidārūṇām ||)
(1. śabdaguṇāḥ —24)
kāvyaśarīre 'pi te tridhaiva | tatra —
bāhyaśśabdaguṇāḥ, te hyanvavāyādivad bāhyatvenāvabhāsante |
āntarā arthaguṇāḥ, te sauśīlyādivadvimarśena jñāyante |
vaiśeṣikā doṣaguṇāḥ, te hi pātraviśeṣādyupādheḥ doṣā api guṇatvena vikhyāyanta iti | tatra
śabdaguṇāścaturviṃśatiḥ—
śleṣaḥ, prasādaḥ, samatā, mādhuryaṃ, saukumāryam, arthavyaktiḥ, kāntiḥ, udāratā, udāttatvam, ojaḥ, aurjityaṃ, preyaḥ, suśabdatā, samādhiḥ, saukṣmyaṃ, gāmbhīryaṃ, vistaraḥ, saṃkṣepaḥ, saṃmitatvaṃ, bhāvikatvaṃ, gatiḥ, rītiḥ, uktiḥ, praụdhiriti | teṣu—
1. suśliṣṭapadatā śleṣaḥ, yathā—(māgha. 3.8)
ubhau yadi vyom‍ni pṛthakpravāhāvākāśagaṅgāpayasaḥ patetām |
tenopamīyeta tamālanīlamāmuktamuktālatamasya vakṣaḥ || 206 ||
2. prasiddhārthapadatā prasādaḥ, yathā—(śāku. 2.6)
gāhantāṃ mahiṣā nipānasalilaṃ śṛṅgairmuhustāḍitaṃ chāyābaddhakadambakaṃ mṛgakulaṃ romanthamabhyasyatu |
vistrabdhaṃ kriyatāṃ varāhatatibhirmustākṣatiḥ pallave viśrāmaṃ labhatāmidaṃ ca śithilajyābandhamasmad‌dhanuḥ || 207 ||
3. mṛdusphuṭonmiśravarṇabandhānāmavaiṣamyaṃ samatā yathā—
yac‍candrakoṭikarakorakabhārabhāji babhrāma babhruṇi jaṭāpaṭale harasya |
tad vaḥ punātu himaśailaśilānikuñjajhātkāraḍambaravirāvi surāpagāmbhaḥ ||
4. pṛthakpadatā mādhuryaṃ, yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.24)
sthitāḥ kṣaṇaṃ pakṣmasu tāḍitādharāḥ payodharotsedhanipātacūrṇitāḥ |
valīṣu tasyāḥ skhalitāḥ prapedire cireṇa nābhiṃ prathamodabindavaḥ ||
5. aniṣṭhurākṣaraprāyatā saukumāryama, yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.70)
maṇḍalīkṛtya barhāṇi kaṇṭhairmadhuragītibhiḥ |
kalāpinaḥ pranṛtyanti kāle jīmūtamālini || 210 ||
6. sampūrṇavākyatvamarthavyaktiḥ, yathā—(raghu. 1.1)
vāgarthāviva sampṛktau vāgarthapratipattaye |
jagataḥ pitarau vande pārvatīparameśvarau || 211 ||
7. bandhojjvalatā kāntiḥ, yathā—
nirānandaḥ kaunde madhuni vidhuro bālavakule na sāle sālambo lavamapi lavaṅge na ramate |
priyaṅgau nāsaṅgaṃ racayati na cūte vicarati smaran lakṣmīlīlākamalamadhupānaṃ madhukaraḥ || 212 ||
8. bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, yathā—
ārohatyavanīruhaḥ praviśati śvabhraṃ nagaiḥ spardhate khaṃ vyālẹdhi viveṣṭate kṣititale kuñjodare līyate |
antarbhrāmyati koṭarasya visaratyālambate vīrudhaḥ kiṃ tagdyanna karoti mārutavaśaṃ yātaḥ kṛśānurvane || 213 ||
9. ślāghyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvaṃ, yathā—
śrutvā yaṃ sahasā ' 'gataṃ nijapurāttrāsena nirgacchatāṃ śatrūṇāmavarodhanairjalalavaprasyandatimyatpuṭāḥ |
śubhre sadmani pallavinyupavane vāpyāṃ navāmbhoruhi krīḍādrau ca saśādvale vivalita grīvairvimuktā dṛśaḥ || 214 ||
10. samāsabhūyastvamojaḥ, yathā—
jayati bhujagarajjugranthiniṣpīḍitendustravadamṛtanivṛttapretabhāvaiḥ kapālaiḥ |
viracitanutibandho mūrgh‍ni sadyaḥ purāreḥ pariṇatabahukalpabrahmaṇāṃ brahmaghoṣaḥ ||
11. bandhagāḍhatvamaurjityaṃ, yathā—
asminnīṣad‍valitavitatastokavicchinnabhug‍na kiñcillīlopacitavitataḥ puñcitaścocchritaśca |
dhūmod‍gārastaruṇamahiṣaskandhanīlo davāg‍neḥ svairaṃ sarpan sṛjati gagane gatvarān patrabhaṅgān || 216 ||
12. vārtābhidhānavarṇanādau manaḥpriyārthapadopākhyānaṃ preyaḥ, yathā—(bhojasya)
saujanyāmbunidhe ! budhapriya ! guṇaprākāra ! dharmadruma prāroha ! pratipannavatsala ! mahātyāgin ! vivekāśraya ! |
lakṣmyāvāsa ! manasvinīmanasijavyāpāralīlāgure ! śrīmanmuñja ! kimityamuṃ janamupaspraṣṭuṃ dṛśā nārhasi || 217 ||
13. sup‍tiṅvyutpattiḥ suśabdatā, yathā—
tasyājīvanirastu mātaravamā jīvasya mā jīvato bhūyād vā jananiḥ kimamba ! janinā jantorvṛthā janmanaḥ |
yastvāmeva na vandate na yajate nopaiti nālokate nopastauti na manyate na manute nādhyeti no dhyāyati || 218 ||
14. anyadharmasyānyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ, yathā—
pratīcchatyāśokīṃ kisalayaparāvṛttimadharaḥ kapolaḥ pāṇḍutvādavatarati tālopariṇatim |
parimlānaprāyāmanuvadati dṛṣṭiḥ kamalinīṃ navīnastanvaṅgyā manasijavikāro vijayate || 219 ||
15. śabdānāmantaḥ sañjalparūpatā saukṣmyam, yathā—(māgha. 18.66)
kevalaṃ dadhati kartṛvācinaḥ pratyayāniha na jātu karmaṇi |
dhātavaḥ sṛjatisaṃhṛśāstayaḥ stautiratra viparītakārakaḥ || 220 ||
16. dhvanimattā gāmbhīryam, yathā—
maulau dhāraya puṇḍarīkamamitaṃ tanvātmano vikramaṃ cakrāṅkaṃ vaha pādayugmamavanīṃ doṣṇā samabhyuddhara |
lakṣmīṃ bhrūnikaṭe niveśaya bhava jyāyān divaukaspateḥ viśvāntaḥkaraṇaikacora ! tadapi jñāto hariḥ khalvasi || 221 ||
17. vyāsābhidhānaṃ vistaraḥ yathā—
janaḥ puṇyairyāyājjaladhijalabhāvaṃ jalamucaḥ tathāvasthaṃ cainaṃ nidadhatu śubhaiḥ śuktivadane |
tatastāṃ śreyobhiḥ pariṇatimasau vindatu yayā ruciṃ tanvan pīnastani ! hṛdi tavāyaṃ viluṭhati || 222 ||
18. samāsābhidhānaṃ saṃkṣepaḥ, yathā—(raghu. 12.78)
sa mārutisamānītamahauṣadhihatavyathaḥ |
laṅkāstrīṇāṃ punaścakre vilāpācāryakaṃ śaraiḥ || 223 ||
19. yāvadarthapadatā sammitatvam, yathā—
kecid vāstuni no vāci, kecid vāci na vastuni |
vāci vastuni cāpyanye, nānye vāci na vastuni || 224 ||
20. bhāvato vākpravṛttirbhāvikatvam, yathā—(ma.vī.ca. 1.55)
ehyehi vatsa! raghunandana! rāmacandra! cumbāmi mūrdhani ciraṃ ca pariṣvaje tvām |
āropya vā hṛdi divāniśamud‍vahāmi vande 'thavā caraṇapuṣkarakadvayaṃ te ||
21. ārohāvarohakramo gatiḥ, yathā—
varāhaḥ kalyāṇaṃ vitaratu sa vo yasya śaśabhṛ— tkalākoṭīkāntaṃ kramavigaladabhyuddha‍ṛtibhiyā |
mithaḥ saṃmūrchadbhiścaturudadhi—kallola—paṭalai— ranāmṛṣṭaṃ daṃṣṭrāśikharamadhiśete vasumatī || 226 ||
22. upakramābhedo rītiḥ, yathā—
grāvṇā nāsi gireḥ kṣatā na payasā nārtāsi na mlāpitā na śvāsaiḥ phaṇino 'si na tvadanugā nāyāsitā kāpi na |
svaṃ veśma prati gacchatoriti muhuḥ śrīśārṅgiṇoḥ saspṛhaṃ sā praśnottarayugmapaṅktirubhayoratyāyatā pātu vaḥ || 227 ||
23. bhaṇitiviśeṣa uktiḥ, yathā—
kuśalaṃ tasyāḥ jīvati, kuśalaṃ pṛcchāmi, jīvatītyuktam |
punarapi tadeva kathayasi, mṛtāṃ nu kathayāmi yā śvasiti || 228 ||
24. uktiparipākaḥ praụdhiḥ, yathā—
abhyuddha‍ṛtā vasumatī dalitaṃ ripūraḥ kṣip‍takramaṃ kabalitā balirājalakṣmīḥ |
atraikajanmani kṛtaṃ tadanena yūnā janmatraye yadakarot puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ ||
(2. arthaguṇāḥ —24)
arthaguṇā apyeta eva caturviṃśatiḥ | teṣu —
1. saṃvidhāna(su)sūtratā śleṣaḥ, yathā—
dṛṣṭvaikāsanaṅgate priyatame paścādupetyādarā— dekasyā nayane pidhāya vihitakrīḍānubandhacchalaḥ |
īṣad‍vakritakandharaḥ sapulakaṃ svedollasanmānasā— mantarhāsalasatkapolaphalakāṃ dhūrto 'parāṃ cumbati || 230 || (amaru.)
2. arthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, yathā—
ayamudayati mudrābhañjanaḥ padminīnāmudayagirivanālībālamandārapuṣpam |
virahavidhurakokadvandvabandhurvibhindan‌kupitakapikapolakroḍatāmrastamaṃsi ||
3. kramavatāmavaiṣamyaṃ samatā, yathā—(vikra. 2.7)
agre strīnakhapāṭalaṃ kuravakaṃ śyāmaṃ dvayorbhāgayo— rbālāśokamupoḍharāgasubhagaṃ bhedonmukhaṃ tiṣṭhati |
