īṣad‍braddharajaḥkaṇāgrakapiśā cūte navā mañjarī mugdhatvasya ca yauvanasya ca sakhe madhye madhuśrīḥ sthitā || 232 ||
4. krodhādāvapyatīvratā mādhuryam, yathā—(ratnāva. 2.19)
bhrūbhede sahasodgate 'pi vadanaṃ nītaṃ parāṃ namratā— mīṣanmāṃ prati bhedakāri hasitaṃ noktaṃ vaco niṣṭhuram |
antarbāṣpajaḍīkṛtaṃ prabhutayā cakṣurna viṣphāritaṃ kopaśca prakaṭīkṛto dayitayā muktaśca na praśrayaḥ || 233 ||
5. aniṣṭhuratā saukumāryam, yathā—(bā.rā. 6.34)
sadyaḥ purīparisare 'pi śirīṣamṛdvī gatvā jayāt tricaturāṇi padāni sītā |
gantavyamadya kiyadityasakṛd bruvāṇā rāmāśruṇaḥ kṛtavatī prathamāvatāram ||
6. svarūpābhidhānamarthavyaktiḥ, yathā—
pṛṣṭheṣu śaṅkhaśakalacchaviṣu cchadānāṃ rājībhiraṅkitamalaktakalohitābhiḥ |
gorocanāharitababhrubahiḥ palāśamāmodate kumudamambhasi palvalasya ||
7. dīp‍tarasatvaṃ kāntiḥ, yathā—
mā garvamudvaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvastalikhitā mama mañjarīti |
anyāpi kiṃ sakhi na bhājanamīdṛśānāṃ vairī na ced bhavati vepathurantarāyaḥ ||
8. vribhavotkarṣa udāratā, yathā—(śāku. 7.12)
prāṇānāmanilena vṛttirucitā satkalpavṛkṣe vane toye kāñcanapadmareṇukapiśe puṇyābhiṣekakriyā |
dhyānaṃ ratanaśilātaleṣu vibudhastrīsannidhau saṃyamo yad vāñchanti tapobhiranyamunayastasmiṃstapasyantyamī || 237 ||
9. āśayotkarṣa udāttatvam, yathā—
pātre purovartini viśvanāthe kṣodīyasi kṣmāvalaye ca deye |
vrīḍāsmitaṃ tasya tadā tadāsīccamatkṛto yena sa eva devaḥ || 238 ||
10. arthādhyavasāyaviśeṣa ojaḥ, yathā—(mavīca. 2.34)
tānyeva yadi bhūtāni tā eva yadi śaktayaḥ |
tataḥ paraśurāmasya na pratīmaḥ parābhavam || 239 ||
11. rụ̄dhāhaṅkārataurjityam, yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.82)
umā vadhūrbhavān dātā yācitāra ime vayam |
varaḥ śambhuralaṃ hyeṣa tvatkulodbhūtaye vidhiḥ || 240 ||
12. arthasyābhīṣṭatā preyaḥ, yathā—
rasavadamṛtaṃ kassandeho madhūnyapi nānyathā madhuramadhikaṃ cūtasyāpi prasannarasaṃ phalam |
sakṛdapi punarmadhyasthassan rasāntaravijjano vadatu yadihānyat svādu syāt priyādaśanacchadāt || 241 ||
13. dāruṇārthasyādāruṇārthaparyāyassuśabdatā, yathā—
devavrate vāñchati dīrghanidrāṃ droṇe ca karṇe ca yaśo 'vaśeṣe |
lakṣmīsahāyasya tavādya vatsa! vātsalyavān drauṇirayaṃ sahāyaḥ || 242 ||
14. vyājāvalambanaṃ samādhiḥ, yathā—(śāku. 2.13)
darbhāṅkureṇa caraṇaḥ kṣata ityakāṇḍe tanvī sthitā katicideva padāni gatvā |
āsīd vivṛttavadanā ca vimocayantī śākhāsu valkalamasaktamapi drumāṇām || 243 ||
15. sūkṣmārthadṛṣṭiḥ saukṣmyam, yathā—
anyonyasaṃvalitamāṃsaladantakānti sollāsamāviralasaṃ valitārdhatāram |
līlāgṛhe pratikalaṃ kilakiñciteṣu vyāvartamānavinayaṃ mithunaṃ cakāsti ||
16. śāstrārthasavyapekṣatā gāmbhīryam, yathā—(māgha. 4.55)
maitryādicittaparikarmavido vidhāya kleśaprahāṇamiha labdhasabījayogāḥ |
khyātiṃ ca sattvapuruṣānyatayādhigamya vāñchanti tāmapi samādhibhṛto niroddha‍um || 245 ||
17. arthavikāso vistaraḥ, yathā—
saṃgrāmāṅgaṇasaṅgatena bhavatā cāpe samāropite devākarṇaya yena yena sahasā yad yatsamāsāditam |
kodaṇḍena śarāśśarairariśirastenāpi bhūmaṇḍalaṃ tena tvaṃ bhavatā ca kīrtiratulā kīrtyā ca sap‍tābdhayaḥ || 246 ||
18. arthasaṅkocaḥ saṅkṣepaḥ, yathā—
śrūyatāṃ dharmasarvasvaṃ śrutvā caivāvadhāryatām |
ātmanaḥ pratikūlāni pareṣāṃ na samācaret || 247 ||
19. tulyaśabdārthavibhāgaḥ sammitatvam, yathā—
indurmūrghni śivasya śailaduhiturvakro nakhāṅkaḥ stane deyād vo 'bhyudayaṃ dvayaṃ tadupamāmālambamānaṃ mithaḥ |
saṃvādaḥ praṇavena yasya dalatā kāyaikatāyāṃ tayo— rūrdhvadvāravicintitena ca hṛdi dhyātaḥ svarūpeṇa ca || 248 ||
20. sābhiprāyoktiḥ bhāvikatvam, yathā—
dṛṣṭiṃ he prativeśini kṣaṇamihāpyasmad‍gṛhe dāsyasi prāyeṇāsya śiśoḥ pitā na virasāḥ kaupīrapaḥ pāsyati |
ekākinyapi yāmi tad varamitaḥ strotasstamālākulaṃ nīrandhrāḥ punarālikhantu jaṭharacchedā nalagranthayaḥ || 249 ||
21. arthādarthāntarāvagamo gatiḥ, yathā—
śubhe ko 'yaṃ vṛddho gṛhaparibṛḍhaḥ kiṃ tava pitā na me bhartā rātrau vyapagatadṛganyacca badhiraḥ |
huhuṃhuṃ śrānto 'haṃ śiśayiṣurihaivāpavarake k‍va yāminyāṃ yāsi svapihi nanu nirdaṃśamaśake || 250 ||
22. arthotpattyādikriyākramo rītiḥ, yathā—
prathamamaruṇacchāyastāvattataḥ kanakaprabha— stadanuvirahottāmyattanvīkapolataladyutiḥ |
prabhavati punardhvāntadhvaṃsakṣamaḥ kṣaṇadāmukhe sarasabisinīkandacchedacchavirmṛgalāñchanaḥ || 251 ||
23. bhaṅgyā iṣṭābhidhānamuktiḥ, yathā—
tvamevaṃsaundaryā sa ca ruciratāyāṃ paricitaḥ kalānāṃ sīmānaṃ paramiha yuvāmeva bhajathaḥ |
api dvandvaṃ diṣṭyā taditi subhage saṃvadati vā— mataḥ śeṣaṃ cet syājjitamiha tadānīṃ guṇitayā || 252 ||
24. vivakṣitārthanirvahaṇaṃ praụdhiḥ, yathā—
tvadvaktrenduvilokanākuladhiyā dhātrā tvadīyāṃ śriyaṃ nikṣipya pratirājakeṣu viduṣāṃ lakṣmyā tvamāpūritaḥ |
tenaite niyataṃ daridrati gṛheṣveṣāmiyaṃ dṛśyate naināmādriyase tvamicchasi tu tāṃ tvāmeva sā dhāvati || 253 ||
(3. doṣaguṇāḥ)
padādidoṣāṇāmanukaraṇādiṣu guṇatvāpattaye doṣaguṇāḥ | te 'pi prāgvadeva trividhā api pratyekaṃ caturviṃśatidhā | tatra — padadoṣeṣu —
(padadoṣānāmadoṣatvam)
1. asādhormliṣṭamlecchitāderanukaraṇe guṇatvaṃ, yathā—
unnamayya sakacagrahamāsyaṃ cumbati priyatame haṭhavṛttyā |
huṃhuṃ muñca mamameti ca mandaṃ jalpitaṃ jayati mānavatīnām || 254 ||
2. anukaraṇa evāprayuktasya guṇatvaṃ, yathā—(mabhā. 3.1.48)
divaṃ patkāṣiṇo yānti ye 'cīkamata bhāṣiṇaḥ |
patkāṣiṇo 'pi no yānti ye vacanti prayuñjate || 255 ||
3. śrutivirasaṃ kaṣṭam; tasya durvācakānuprāse guṇatvaṃ, yathā—
tvāṣṭrāstvāṣṭrārirāṣṭre na bhrāṣṭre nādaṃṣṭriṇo janāḥ |
dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ surāṣṭre na mahārāṣṭre tu noṣṭriṇaḥ || 256 ||
4. pādapūraṇādyarthamanarthakam; tasya yamakādau guṇatvaṃ, yathā—
'yoṣitāmatitarāṃ nakhalūnaṃ gātramujjvalatayā na khalūnam |'
'babhau mukhenāpratimena kācana śriyādhikā tāṃ prati menakā ca na || 257 ||'
5. rụ̄dhicyutamanyārtham; tasya prahelikādiṣu guṇatvaṃ, yathā—
khātayaḥ kani kāle te sphātayaḥ sphārhavalgavaḥ |
candre sākṣādbhavantyatra tāyavo mama dhāriṇaḥ || 258 ||
6. tucchābhidheyamapuṣṭārtham; tasya chando 'nurodhādau guṇatvaṃ, yathā—
'dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtimenamarthināmuśanti kalpopapadaṃ mahīruham || 259 ||'
'yamindraśabdārthaniṣūdanaṃ harerhiraṇyapūrvaṃ kaśipuṃ pracakṣate || 260 ||'
7. avācakamasamartham; tasya sītkṛtādau guṇatvaṃ, yathā—(māgha. 10.64)
āśu lambitavatīṣṭakarāgre nīvimardhamukulīkṛtadṛṣṭyā |
raktavaiṇikakarāhatatantrīmaṇḍalak‍vaṇitacāru cukūje || 261 ||
8. śāstramātraprasiddhamapratītam; tasya tadvidyasambhāṣaṇādau guṇatvaṃ, yathā—(māgha. 2.28)
sarvakāryaśarīreṣu muktvāṅgaskandhapañcakam |
saugatānāmivātmānyo nāsti mantro mahībhṛtām || 262 ||
9. vyavahitārthapratyayakṛt kliṣṭam; tasya jhaṭityarthapratītau guṇatvaṃ, yathā— (raghu.13.1)
'athātmanaḥ śabdaguṇaṃ guṇajñaḥ padaṃ vimānena vigāhamānaḥ || 263 ||'
'pituḥ padaṃ madhyamamutpatantī' || 264 || (vikra. 1.20)
kāñcīguṇasthānamaninditāyāḥ' || 265 || (kusaṃ. 1.27)
10. aprasiddhārthaprayuktaṃ gụ̄dhārtham; tasya tada‌‌vyākhyānādau guṇatvaṃ, yathā—
amhārisā vi kaïṇo kaïṇo halibụdh‌ḍhasālipamuhā i |
maṃḍukkamakkaḍā vi hu hoṃti harī—sappa—sīhā vi || 266 ||
(asmādṛśā api kavayaḥ kavayo harivṛddhaśālipramukhā api |
maṇḍūkamarkaṭā api khalu bhavanti hariḥ sarpasiṃhā api ||)
11. saṅketakalpitābhidheyaṃ neyārtham; tasya prahelikādiṣu guṇatvaṃ, yathā—
moru kalāveṇa vahaï taha ṇāmaha sariṇāu |
ussīsā pāaṃtigao aṇuṇattihiṃ jaṇu ṇāu || 267 ||
(mayūraḥ kalāpena vahati tasya nāmnaḥ sadṛśanāmā |
ucchīrṣāt pādāntagato 'nunaktaṃ yathā naukā ||)
12. aniścayakṛt sandigdham; tasya prakaraṇādibhirviśeṣāvagame guṇatvaṃ, yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.27)
'mahībhṛtaḥ putravato 'pi dṛṣṭistasminnapatye na jagāma tṛp‍tim || 268 ||'
'sa śārṅgacakrāsigadābjapāṇirmeghacchaviḥ pātu jaganti śauriḥ || 269 ||'
13. viparītakalpana viruddham; tasya tadvidhābhidhāne guṇatvaṃ, yathā— (māgha. 16.2)
abhidhāya tadā tadapriyaṃ śiśupālo 'nuśayaṃ paraṃ gataḥ |
bhavato 'bhimanāssamīhate saruṣaḥ kartumupetya mānanām || 270 ||
14. aviśeṣābhidhāyakamaprayojakam; tasya svarūpābhidhānādau guṇatvaṃ, yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.36)
'ta ākāśamasiśyāmamutpatya paramarṣayaḥ || 271 ||'
'sāgraṃ varṣasahastraṃ sa tapastepe mahāmanāḥ || 272 ||'
15. avyutpattimaddeśyam; (tasya) kavibhiraṅgīkṛtatve guṇatvaṃ, yathā—(māmā. 5.22)
ṣaṇḍeṣūddaṇḍapiṇḍītagarataralanāḥ prāpire yena velā— mālambyottālatallasphuṭitapuṭakinībandhavo gandhavāhāḥ |
pātālapratimallagallavivaraprakṣip‍tasap‍tārṇavaṃ vande nanditanīlakaṇṭhapariṣad‍vyaktarddhi vaḥ krīḍitam || 273 ||
'kirantaḥ kāverīlaḍahalarīśīkarakaṇān || 274 ||'
16. aślīlāmaṅgalaghṛṇāvadarthaṃ grāmyam; tasya saṃvītagup‍talakṣitādau na doṣaḥ |
saṃvītasya hi loke tu na doṣānveṣaṇaṃ kṣamam |
śivaliṅgasya saṃsthāne kasyāsabhyatvabhāvanā || 275 ||
tatrāsabhyamasabhyārthāntaramasabhyasmṛtihetuścāślīlam | tatra—
17. ādyasya tu guṇatvaṃ, yathā—
tasmai himādreḥ prayatāṃ tanūjāṃ yatātmane rocayituṃ yatasva |
yoṣitsu tadvīryaniṣekabhūmiḥ saiva kṣametyātmabhuvopadiṣṭam || (kusaṃ. 3.16)
18. dvitīyasya guṇatvaṃ, yathā—
'sudustyajā yadyapi janmabhūmiḥ' || 277 ||,
'janairasambādhamayāṃbabhūve || 278 ||'
'sa te 'nuneyaḥ subhago 'bhimānī' || 279 ||,
'bhaginyayaṃ naḥ prathamābhisandhiḥ || 280 ||'
19. tṛtīyasya guṇatvaṃ, yathā—
brahmāṇḍakāraṇaṃ yo 'psu nidadhe vīryamātmanaḥ |
upasthānaṃ karomyeṣa tasmai śeṣāhiśāyine || 281 ||
amaṅgalārthamamaṅgalārthāntaramamaṅgalasmṛtihetuścāmaṅgalārtham; tatra—
20. ādyasya guṇatvaṃ, yathā—
bhadre! māri praśastaṃ vada sadasi mudā nṛtya kṛtye! muhūrtaṃ mṛtyo! ratnaiścatuṣkaṃ viracaya racayārātrikaṃ kālarātri! |
cāmuṇḍe! muṇḍamālāmupanaya vinayasvāyatāṃ bhairavīrṣyā— mevaṃ deve bhavānīṃ vahati parijanavyāhṛtistrāyatāṃ va || 282 ||
21. dvitīyasya guṇatvaṃ, yathā—(vesaṃ. 1.6)
satpakṣā madhuragiraḥ prasādhitāśā madoddhatārambhāḥ |
nipatanti dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kālavaśānmedinīpṛṣṭhe || 283 ||
22. tṛtīyasya guṇatvaṃ, yathā—
ko 'bhipretaḥ susaṃsthānastasyā iti na niścayaḥ |
āśāpiśācikaiṣā tu kumārī māṃ variṣyati || 284 ||
23. ghṛṇāvad ghṛṇāvadarthāntaraṃ ghṛṇāvatsmṛtihetuśca ghṛṇāvadartham |
niṣṭhyūtodgīrṇavāntādi gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayam |
atisundaramanyatra grāmyakakṣyāṃ vigāhate || 285 || (kāvyāda. 1.24)
yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.96)
padmānyarkāśuniṣṭhyūtāḥ pītvā pāvakavipruṣaḥ |
bhūyo vamantīva mukhairudgīrṇāruṇareṇubhiḥ || 286 ||
kiñcidāśrayasaundaryāddhatte śobhāmasādhvapi |
kāntāvilocananyastaṃ malīmasamivāñjanam || 287 || (kāvyāda. 1.55)
yathā—(ma.vī.ca. 1.35)
āntraprotabṛhatkapālanalakakrūrak‍vaṇatkaṅkaṇa— prāyapreṅkhitabhūribhūṣaṇaravairāghoṣayantyambaram |
pītocacharditaraktakardamaghanaprārabhāraghorollalad— vyālolastanabhārabhairavavapurbandhoddhataṃ dhāvati || 288 ||
sanniveśaviśeṣācca duruktamapi śobhate |
nīlaṃ palāśamābaddhamantarāle srajāmiva || 289 || (bhāmahā. 1.54)
yathā—(māmā. 5.18)
āntraiḥ kalpitamaṅgalapratisarāḥ strīhastaraktotpala— vyaktottaṃsabhṛtaḥ pinahya sahasā hṛtpuṇḍarīkastrajaḥ |
etāḥ śoṇitapaṅkakuṅkumajuṣaḥ saṃbhūya kāntaiḥ piba— ntyasthisnehasurāḥ kapālacaṣakaiḥ prītāḥ piśācāṅganāḥ || 290 ||
24. etena dvitīyatṛtīyayorapi guṇatvaṃ vyākhyātam |
yathā—
mukhamāpāṇḍugaṇḍaṃ te madaklinnakaṭaḥ karī |
viśāṃpate! viśiṣṭo 'pi saphalaṃ brahmavarcasam || 291 ||
yathā ca—
varṣiṣṭhāya yaviṣṭhāya pravīryāya pracetase |
namaḥ kapardine nīlalohitāyāgniretase || 292 ||
(vākyadoṣāṇāmadoṣatvam)
atha vākyadoṣāṇāmadoṣaḥ, tatra
1. śabdahīnasya k‍vacid vivakṣāto guṇatvam | yathā—
ākṣipantyaravindāni mugdhe tava mukhaśriyam |
kośadaṇḍasamagrāṇāṃ kimeṣāmasti duṣkaram || 293 || (kāvyāda. 2.361)
idaṃ hi śāstramāhātmyadarśanālasacetasām |
apabhāṣaṇavadbhāti na ca saubhāgyamujjhati || 294 || (kāvyāda. 4.28)
anukampādyatiśayo yadi kaścidvivakṣyate |
na doṣaḥ punarukto 'pi pratyuteyamalaṅkriyā || 295 || (kāvyāda. 4.14)
yathā—(kāvyāda. 4.15)
hanyate sā varārohā smareṇākāṇḍavairiṇā |
hanyate cārusarvāṅgī hanyate mañjubhāṣiṇī || 296 ||
2. yatnaḥ sambandhanirjñātahetuḥ ko 'pi kṛto yadi |
kramalaṅghanamapyāhurnirdoṣaṃ sūrayo yathā || 297 || (kāṃvyāda. 4.23)
bandhutyāgastanutyāgo deśatyāga iti triṣu |
ādyantāvāyatakleśau madhyamaḥ kṣaṇikajvaraḥ || 298 || (kāvyāda. 4.24)
yadā tīvraprayatnena saṃyogāderagauravam |
na cchandobhaṅgamapyāhustadadoṣāya sūrayaḥ || 299 ||
jaha ṇhāuṃ oiṇṇe abbhantamulhāsiamaṃsuaddhantaṃ |
taha aṇa ṇhāo si tumaṃ sacche golāṇaītūhe || 300 ||
(yathā snātumavatīrṇe ārdrībhūtamullāsitamaṃśukārdhāntam |
tathā ca na snāto bhavasi tvaṃ svacche godānadītīrthe ||)
3. asthānaviṃrati yatibhraṣṭam—
svarasandhyakṛte prāyo dhātubhede tadiṣyate |
nāmabhede ca śeṣeṣu na doṣa iti tadvidaḥ || 301 ||
yathā—
'śobhāṃ puṣyatyayamabhinavaḥ sundarīṇāṃ prabodhaḥ' || 302 ||
'kiñcid bhāvālasamasaralaprekṣitaṃ kāminīnām || 303 ||
kāryākāryāṇyayamavikalānyāgamenaiva paś‍yan |
vaś‍yāmurvīṃ vahati nṛpa ityasti caivaṃ prayogaḥ || 304 || (kāvyāda. 4.30)
atra ca— (kāvyāda. 4.31)
lup‍te padānte śeṣasya padatvaṃ niścitaṃ yathā |
tathā sandhivikārāntaṃ padameveti varṇyate || 305 ||
4. virūpasandhi visandhi— (kāvyāda. 4.36)
na saṃhitāṃ vivakṣāmītyasandhānaṃ padeṣu yat |
tad visandhīti nirdiṣṭaṃ na pragṛhyādihetukam || 306 ||
yathā—(kāsūvṛ. 2.2.8)
'kamale iva locane ime anubandhāti vilāsapaddhatiḥ || 307 ||'
'sa ito 'nya ṛtāvṛtapriyo
na ṛcastvaṃ na yajūṃṣi ūhase || 308 ||'
padānāṃ vyutkramo yatra krameṇa vyutkrameṇa vā |
tad vyākīrṇaṃ vidustasya na doṣaḥ ko 'pi tad yathā || 309 ||
jugupsata smainamaduṣṭabhāvaṃ maivaṃ bhavānakṣatasādhuvṛttaḥ |
itīva vāco nigṛhītakaṇṭhaiḥ prāṇairarudhyanta maharṣisūnoḥ || (jāha. 1.85)
5. paryāyeṇa dvayoryatra vākyaṃ praś‍nottarādiṣu |
saṅkīrṇaṃ tanna doṣāya vākovākyavido viduḥ || 311 ||
(yathā)— (amaruka. 57)
bāle! nātha! vimuñca mānini! ruṣaṃ roṣānmayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ
khedo 'smāsu na me 'parādhyati bhavān sarve 'parādhā mayi |
tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā, kasyāgrato rudyate
nanvetanmama, kā tavāsmi, dayitā, nāsmītyato rudyate || 312 ||
6. vākyāntarasagarbhaṃ yat tad vākyaṃ garbhitaṃ viduḥ |
rasāntaraviraskāre tadiṣṭaṃ neṣṭamanyathā || 313 ||
yathā—
diṅ‍mātaṅgaghaṭāvibhaktacaturāghāṭā mahī sādhyate. (pṛ. 362)
7. deśabhāṣāprabhedena prakṛtyādibhidāpi vā |
apadaṃ tasya cānujñā bhāṣācitreṣu tadyathā || 314 ||
hā to jo jjaladeu naiva padanaḥ sākṣādayaṃ bhūtale
tatkiṃ dīsaï saccamā hatavapuḥ kāmaḥ kila śrūyate |
ai pacchā kialeu bhūtapatinā gaurīvivāhotsave
aiseṃ sacca ji bollu hastakaṭakaḥ kiṃ darpaṇenekṣyate || 315 ||
8. aśarīraṃ kriyāhīnaṃ kriyāpekṣā na yatra tu |
yatrāstyāderapekṣā vā na doṣastatra tadyathā || 316 ||
kiyanmātraṃ jalaṃ vipra jānudagh‍naṃ narādhipa |
tathāpīyamavasthā te na sarvatra bhavādṛśāḥ || 317 ||
yatropamāne dharmāḥ syurnopameyena sammitāḥ |
tadūnopamamityāhustatprasiddhau na duṣyati || 318 ||
yathā— (bhāmahā. 2.41,42,43,44)
sa mārutākampitapītavāsā bibhrat salīlaṃ śaśibhāsamabjam |
yadupravīraḥ pragṛhītaśārṅgaḥ sendrāyudho megha ivābabhāse || 319 ||
śakracāpagrahādatra darśitaṃ kila kārmukam |
vāsaḥ śaṅkhānupādānādūnamityatra cocyate || 320 ||
sarvaṃ sarveṇa sārūpyaṃ nāsti bhāvasya kasyacit |
yathopapatti kṛtibhirupamānaṃ prayujyate || 321 ||
akhaṇḍamaṇḍalaḥ k‍venduḥ k‍va kāntānanamadyuti |
yatkiṃcitkāntisāmyāttu śaśinevopamīyate || 322 ||
9. tenādhikopamaṃ vyākhyātam | yathā—(bhāmahā. 2.58, 59)
sa pītavāsāḥ pragṛhītaśārṅgo manojñabhīmaṃ vapurāpa kṛṣṇaḥ |
śatahradendrāyudhavānniśāyāṃ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ śaśineva meghaḥ || 323 ||
śaśino grahaṇādetadādhikyaṃ kila na hyayam |
nirdiṣṭa upameye 'rthe vācyo vā jalajo 'tra tu || 324 ||
na sarvasārūpyamayaṃ vistareṇodito vidhiḥ |
abhiprāyātkavervātra vidheyā jalaje matiḥ || 325 || (bhāmahā. 2.60)
bhinnaliṅgatvamapyāhurupamādūṣaṇaṃ tathā |
vacobhedo na doṣāya yatrodvogo na dhīmatām || 326 || (kāvyāda. 2.51)
tatra liṅgabhede na doṣo yathā—
anyadā bhūṣaṇaṃ puṃsaḥ śamo lajjeva yoṣitaḥ |
parākramaḥ paribhave vaiyātyaṃ surateṣviva || 327 || (māgha. 2.44)
vacanabhede na doṣo yathā—
ājñā iva jaganmṛtyoḥ prāṇā iva nayaśriyaḥ |
gṛhā iva tapassiddherdārā iva vibhorgatiḥ || 328 ||
10. śliṣṭamaspṛṣṭaśaithilyaṃ śithilaṃ tadviparyayaḥ |
gauḍīyairiṣyate tattu bandhaprāśastyagauravāt || 329 || (kāvyāda. 1.43)
yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.44)
līlāvilolalalanālalitālakalālasāḥ |
vilup‍tamālatīmālā jalakālānilā vavuḥ || 330 ||
11. anālocyaiva vaiṣamyamarthālaṅkāraḍambarau |
avekṣamāṇā vavṛdhe paurastyā kāvyapaddhatiḥ || 331 || (kāvyāda. 1.50)
yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.49)
candanapraṇayodgandhirmando malayamārutaḥ |
spardhate ruddhamaddhairyo vararāmānanānilaiḥ || 332 ||
dīp‍tamityaparairbhūm‍nā kaṭhoramapi badhyate |
nyakṣeṇa pakṣaḥ kṣapitaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kṣaṇāditi || 333 || (kāvyāda. 1.72)
12. āvidvadaṅganābālaprasiddhārthaṃ prasādavat |
viparyayo 'syāprasannaṃ citrādau tanna duṣyati || 334 || (bhāmaha. 2.3)
yathā—(devīśa.)
yāśritā pāvanatayā yātanācchidanīcayā
yācanīyā dhiyā māyāyāmāyāsaṃ stutā śriyā || 335 ||
13. adhyāhārādigamyārthe neyārthamiti tadviduḥ |
prasiddhergamyate yasminna ca taddoṣavadyathā || 336 ||
mā bhavantamanalaḥ pavano vā vāraṇo madakalaḥ paraśurvā |
vāhinījalabharaḥ kuliśaṃ vā svisti te 'stu latayā saha vṛkṣa || 337 ||
14. asabhyārthaṃ mataṃ grāmyaṃ tad grāmyok‍tyaiva duṣyati |
vidagdhoktau tu tasyāhurguṇavattvaṃ manīṣiṇaḥ || 338 ||
yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.64)
kāmaṃ kandarpacaṇḍālo mayi vāmākṣi nirdayaḥ |
tvayi nirmatsaro diṣṭ‍yetyevamādi yathoditam || 339 ||
15. ojaḥ samāsabhūyastvaṃ taddīp‍tārtheṣu badhyate |
viparyayo 'syāsamastaṃ dīp‍tārthaṃ cainna doṣabhāk || 340 ||
yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.22)
yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti svabhujagurumadaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ
yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśuradhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā |
yo yastatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaśca yaśca pratīpaḥ
krodhāndhastasya tasya svayamapi jagatāmantakasyāntako 'ham || 341 ||
16. samastamasamastaṃ vā na nirvahati yad vacaḥ |
tadanirvyūḍhamasyāpi na doṣaḥ kvāpi tadyathā || 342 ||
prasīda caṇḍi! tyaja manyumañjasā janastavāyaṃ purataḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ |
kimarthamutkampitapīvarastanadvayaṃ tvayā lup‍tavilāsamāsyate || 343 ||
17. analaṅkāramityāhuralaṅkārojjhitaṃ vacaḥ |
pūrvottarānusandhāne tasya sādhutvamiṣyate || 344 ||
yathā—(māgha. 2.68)
niśamya tāḥ śeṣagavīrabhidhātumadhokṣajaḥ |
śiṣyāya bṛhatāṃ patyuḥ prastāvamadiśad dṛśā || 345 ||
(vākyārthadoṣāṇāmadoṣaḥ)
atha vākyārthadoṣāṇāmadoṣaḥ | tatra ca —
1. samudāyārthaśūnyaṃ yat tadapārthaṃ pracakṣate |
tanmattonmattabālānāmukteranyatra duṣyati || 346 || (kāvyāda. 4.5)
yathā—
k‍vākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ k‍va ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛś‍yeta sā
doṣāṇāṃ praśamāya me śrutamaho kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham |
kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalpaṣāḥ katadhiyo rekhaiva sānyādṛśī
cetaḥ svāsthyamupaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ pāsyati || 347 ||
2. yadaprayojanaṃ yacca gatārthe vyarthameva tat |
tasyāpi k‍vāpi nirdoṣaḥ prayogo dṛś‍yate yathā || 348 ||
gītā viduravākyāni dharmāḥ śāntanaveritāḥ|
na śrutā bhārate yena tasya janma nirarthakam || 349 ||
hṛtkaṇṭhavaktraśrotreṣu kasya nāvasthitaṃ tava |
śrīkhaṇḍahārakarpūradantapatraprabhaṃ yaśaḥ || 350 ||
3. aviśeṣeṇa pūrvoktaṃ yadi bhūyo 'pi kīrtyate |
tadekārthaṃ rasākṣip‍tacetasāṃ tanna duṣyati || 351 ||
yathā—(māmā. 5.30)
asāraṃ saṃsāraṃ parimuṣitarat‍naṃ tribhuvanaṃ
nirālokaṃ lokaṃ maraṇaśaraṇaṃ bāndhavajanam |
adarpaṃ kandarpaṃ jananayananirmāṇamaphalaṃ
jagajjīrṇāraṇyaṃ kathamasi vidhātuṃ vyavasitaḥ || 352 ||
4. saṃśayāyaiva sandigdhaṃ yadi jātu prayujyate |
syādalaṅkāra evāsau na doṣastatra tadyathā || 353 ||
katto lambhaï paṃthia sattharaaṃ ettha gāmaṇigharammi |
uṇṇaapaohare pekkhiūṇa jaï vasasi tā vasasu || 354 || (gāsa.ve. 879)
(kuto labhyate pathika srastarakamatra grāmaṇīgṛhe |
unnatapayodharān prekṣya yadi vasasi tad vasa ||)
5. vākye prabandhe cārthānāṃ paurvāparyaviparyayaḥ |
doṣaḥ so 'pakramo nāma citrahetau na duṣyati || 355 ||
yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.257)
paścātparyasya kiraṇānudīrṇaṃ candramaṇḍalam |
prāgeva hariṇākṣīṇāmudīrṇo rāgasāgaraḥ || 356 ||
6. yasmin rīteranirvāhaḥ khinnaṃ tadabhidhīyate |
na doṣastasya tu k‍vāpi yatra cchāyā na hīyate || 357 ||
yathā—
abhinavavadhūroṣasvāduḥ karīṣatanūnapā—
dasaralajanāśleṣakrūrastuṣārasamīsṇaḥ |
galitavibhavasyājñevādya dyutirmasṛṇā rave—
rvirahivanitāvaktraklaibyaṃ bibharti niśākaraḥ || 358 ||
7. lokātīta ivārtho yaḥ so 'timātra iheṣyate |
vārtādau tena tuṣyanti vidagdhā netare janāḥ || (kāvyāda. 1.85, 89)
tacca vārtābhidhāneṣu varṇanāsvapi vidyate |
kāntaṃ sarvajagatkāntaṃ laukikārthānatikramāt || 360 || (kāvyāda. 1.89)
vārtābhidhāne yathā—
gṛhāṇi nāma tānyeva taporāśirbhavādṛśaḥ |
sambhāvayati yānyevaṃ pāvanaiḥ pādapāṃsubhiḥ|| 361 || (kāvyāda. 1.86)
varṇanāyāṃ yathā—
anayoranavadyāṅgi stanayorjṛmbhamāṇayoḥ |
avakāśo na paryāp‍tastava bāhulatāntare || 362 || (kāvyāda. 1.87)
iti saṃbhāvyamevaitadviśeṣākhyānasaṃskṛtam |
kāntaṃ bhavati sarvasva lokasīmānu vartinaḥ || 363 || (kāvyāda. 1.88)
tadatikrame vārtābhidhānaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.90)
devadhiṣṇayamivārādhyamadyaprabhṛti no gṛham |
yuṣmatpādarajaḥ pātadhautaniśśeṣakalmaṣam || 364 ||
varṇanā yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.91)
alpaṃ nirmitamākāśamanālocyaiva vedhasā |
idamevaṃvidhaṃ bhāvi bhavatyāsstanajṛmbhaṇam || 365 ||
8. idamatyuktirityuktametadgauḍopalālitam |
prasthānaṃ prākpraṇītaṃ tu sāraṃ vaidarbhavartmanaḥ || 366 || (kāvyāda. 1.92)
paruṣaṃ niṣṭhurārthaṃ yadatīva hi vigarhitam |
viruddhalakṣaṇādyāsu taduktiṣu na duṣyati || 367 ||
yathā—
hālāhalaṃ viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣva sakhi mā tatra viśvasīḥ |
yadvā na dahyase kāṣṭhaiḥ svalpaistvamiti me matiḥ || 368 ||
9. aprastutarasaṃ prāhurvirasaṃ vastu sūrayaḥ |
iṣṭaṃ tasyāpyanujñānamaprādhānye tayoryathā || 369 ||
kṣip‍to hastāvalag‍naḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadānoṃ 'śukāntaṃ
gṛh‍ṇan keśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa |
āliṅgan yo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ
kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāg‍niḥ || (amaruka. 2)
10. hīnaṃ yatropamānaṃ syādupameyaṃ guṇādhikam |
hīnopamaṃ tadapyāhurna doṣaḥ k‍vāpi tadyathā || 371 ||
tataḥ kumudanāthena kāminīgaṇḍapāṇḍunā |
netrānandena candreṇa māhendrī digalaṅkṛtā || (mahābhā. droṇa. 184.46)
yatropamānamutkṛṣṭamupameyaṃ nikṛṣyate |
jñeyaṃ tadadhikaupamyamasyāpi k‍vāpyadoṣatā || 373 ||
yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.50)
kāntyā candramasaṃ dhām‍nā sūryaṃ dhairyeṇa cārṇavam |
rājannanukaroṣi tvaṃ saubhāgyenāpi manmatham || 374 ||
11. upamānena vaiṣamyād bhavedasadṛśopamam |
tasyābhyanujñāmicchanti vyatirekopamādiṣu || 375 ||
prahitaḥ pradhanāya mādhavānahamākārayituṃ mahībhujā |
na pareṣu mahaujasaśchalādapakurvanti malimlucā iva || (māgha. 16.52)
yasyopamānaṃ lokeṣu na prasiddhaṃ tadiṣyate |
aprasiddhopamaṃ nāma tatkavacinnaiva duṣyati || 377 ||
yathā—
ud‍garbhahūṇaramaṇīramaṇopamardabhag‍nonnatastananiveśanibhaṃ himāṃśoḥ |
bimbaṃ kaṭhorabisakāṇḍakaḍāragaurairviṣṇoḥ padaṃ prathamamagrakarairvyanakti || 378 ||
12. niralaṅkāramityāhuralaṅkārojjhitaṃ vacaḥ |
arthaurjityeṣu tasyāpi k‍vacinnirdoṣatā yathā || 379 ||
yāñcāṃ dainyaparābhavapraṇayinīṃ nekṣvākavaḥ śikṣitāḥ
sevāsaṃvalitaḥ kadā raghukule maulau nibaddho 'ñjaliḥ |
sarvaṃ tad vihitaṃ tadāpyudadhinā naivoparodhaḥ kṛtaḥ
pāṇiḥ samprati me haṭhāt kimaparaṃ spraṣṭuṃ dhanurvāñchati || 380 ||
13. asabhyārthaṃ yadaślīlaṃ yadarthāntaravāci vā |
tasyeha dṛś‍yate bhūm‍nā prayogo nāpi dṛṣyati || 381 ||
yathā—
adyāpi tatkanakakuṇḍalaghṛṣṭagaṇḍaṃ
vaktraṃ smarāmi viparītaratābhiyoge |
āndolanaśramavaśasphuṭagharmabindu—
muktāphalaprakaravicchuritaṃ priyāyāḥ || 382 || (caupa.12)
14. deśo 'drivanarāṣṭrādiḥ kālo rātriṃdivartavaḥ |
nṛttagītaprabhṛtayaḥ kalāḥ kāmārthasaṃśrayāḥ || 383 || (kāvyāda. 4.40—42)
carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ pravṛttirlokasaṃjñitā |
hetuvidyātmako nyāyaḥ sasmṛtiśrutirāgamaḥ || 384 ||
teṣu teṣvayathārūḍhaṃ yadi kiñcit pravartate |
kaveḥ pramādāddeśādivirodhītyetaducyate || 385 ||
virodhaḥ sakalo 'pyeṣa kadācit kavikauśalāt |
vyutkramya doṣagaṇanāṃ guṇavīthīṃ vigāhate || (kāvyāda. 4.57)
tatra deśaviruddhasya guṇabhāvo yathā—
tasya rājñaḥ prabhāveṇa tadudyānāni jajñire |
ārdrāṃśukapravālānāmāspadaṃ suraśākhinām || 387 ||(kāvyāda. 4.58)
kālaviruddhasya yathā—
rājñāṃ vināśapiśunaścacāra kharamārutaḥ |
dhūnvan kadambarajasā saha sap‍tacchadodgamān || 388 || (kāvyāda. 4.59)
lokaviruddhasya yathā—
aindavādarciṣaḥ kāmī śiśiraṃ havyavāhanam |
abalāvirahak‍leśavihvalo gaṇayatyayam || 389 || (kāvyāda. 4.61)
yuktiviruddhasya yathā—
sa saṅkocaścandrādiva kumudarāśeraśaraṇaḥ
sa sūryāt kokānāṃ viraha iva lup‍tapratividhiḥ |
guṇebhyaste khedapraśamanaparebhyo 'pi yadayaṃ
khalānāmud‍vegastadidamamṛtādeva maraṇam || 390 ||
aucityaviruddhasya yathā—(rā.ca.19.89)
tenātha nātha durudāharaṇātapena
saumyāpi nāma paruṣatvamabhiprapannā |
jajvāla tīkṣṇaviśadāḥ sahasodgirantī
vāgarciṣastapanakāntiśileva sītā || 391 ||
vacanaviruddhasya yathā—(kāvyāda. 4.10)
asti kācidavasthā sā sābhiṣaṅgasya cetasaḥ |
yasyāṃ bhavedabhimatā viruddhārthāpi bhāratī || 392 ||
paradārābhiṣaṅgo me kathamāryasya yujyate |
pibāmi taralaṃ tasyāḥ kadā nu daśanacchadam || (kāvyāda. 4.11)
dharmaviruddhasya guṇībhāvo yathā—(kāvyāda. 4.63)
pañcānāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ pat‍nī pāñcālakanyakā |
satīnāmagraṇīścāsīddaivo hi vidhirīdṛśaḥ || 394 ||
arthaviruddhasya guṇībhāvo yathā—
nītirāpadi yadgamyaḥ parastanmānimo hriye |
vidhurvidhuntudasyeva pūrṇastasyotsavāya saḥ || 395 || (māgha. 2.61)
kāmaviruddhasya guṇībhāvo yathā—
dolātipreraṇatrastavadhūjanamukhod‍gatam |
kāmināṃ layavaiṣamyād geyaṃ rāgamavardhayat || 393 || (kāvyāda. 4.60)
evamanye 'pi draṣṭavyāḥ | tadyathā śiraśśekharaḥ, karṇāvataṃsaḥ, śravaṇakuṇḍalaṃ, puṣpamālā, dhanurjyā, ṭaṅkāradhvaniḥ, karikalabha ityādinā puṣṭārthatvamarthaviśeṣapratīteḥ | tathā hi—śiraśśekharādīnāṃ prabhṛtiyogaḥ(?), puṣpamālāyāṃ vaiśā x x x diprāśastyaṃ, dhanurjyāyāmārụ̄dhiḥ, karikalabhe karipramāṇatā pratīyate | bhuvanaśiraśśekharaḥ, pṛthvīkarṇāvataṃsaḥ, sarasvatīśravaṇakuṇḍalaṃ, rat‍namālā, dhanurjyā, ṭaṅkāradhvaniḥ, kucakumbhaḥ, karikalabhakaḥ ityādiṣūpacāraḥ |
nanu ca guṇakalpaneyaṃ nopacārakalpanā | tathā hi—viśeṣyeṣu guṇakalpanā viśeṣaṇeṣūpacārakalpaneti pradarśitaṃ purastāt |1 na ca guṇavṛttirupacāravṛttāvantarbhavati, api tūpacāravṛttirguṇavṛttau | dvidhā hi gauṇī, guṇanimittā upacāranimittā ca | satyametat | kiṃtu vyavahitapratipattisādhanatvasādharmyādadūraviprakarṣeṇa gauṇīmapyupacaritāmevācakṣate |
akṣapādastu 'sahacaraṇasthānatādarthyādibhyastadvadupacāra' iti bruvāṇo (nyāyasū. 2.2) yaṣṭīḥ praveśaya, mañcāḥ krośanti, mallikā pradīpa ityādiṣu lakṣaṇāmapyupacārapakṣe pratikṣipati | na ca lakṣaṇāgauṇyorabheda iti vaktavyam | yadāha bhaṭṭaḥ —
abhidheyāvinābhūtapratītirlakṣaṇeṣyate |
lakṣyamāṇaguṇairyogād vṛtteriṣṭā tu gauṇatā || 397 || (tavā. 14.22)
1. pṛṣṭha 44 |
tatra lakṣaṇāyāṃ yathaivākṛtivacanaḥ śabdaḥ tatsahacaritāṃ vyaktiṃ lakṣayati tathaiva yaṣṭimañcapradīpādayastatsambaddhapuruṣādilakṣaṇārthāḥ prathante | gauṇyāṃ punarag‍nirmāṇavakaḥ, siṃho devadattaḥ, gaurbāhīkaḥ, ityādiṣu nāg‍nitvādyavinābhāvena māṇavakādayaḥ pratīyante | kiṃ tarhi—
vahnitvalakṣaṇādarthād yatpaiṅgalyādi gamyate |
tena māṇavake buddhiḥ sādṛś‍yādupajāyate || 398 || (tavā. 14.22)
nanu ca na gauṇamukhyayorviveko yujyate | tathā hi— eka evāyaṃ gośabdo vākye k‍vacijjātiviśeṣābhidhāyī gauranubandhya iti, k‍vacijjātyupasarjanadravyamātravācī gaurānīyatāmiti, k‍vacitparicchinna eva dravyaviśeṣe vartate, astyatra kāṃcid gāṃ paś‍yasīti (mabhā. 1.2.58); k‍vacittu rūḍhasambandheṣu kriyāguṇeṣu gośabdaḥ prayujyamāno dṛś‍yate, yathā— jāḍyādaucchiṣṭyāt sarvasahatvānmahāśanatvād vā gaurbāhīka iti | tadevaṃ sarvaśaktergośabdasyārthaprakaraṇādibhiravacchidyamānasāmarthyasya pṛthivyādāviva bāhīke 'pi vartamānasya na gauṇatvamupapadyate | tadāha—(vāpa. 2.253)
sarvaśaktestu tasyaiva śabdasyānekakarmaṇaḥ |
prasiddhibhedād gauṇatvaṃ mukhyatvaṃ vā prakalpyate || 399 ||
tathā hi— (vāpa. 2.252)
yathā sās‍nādimān piṇḍo gośabdenābhidhīyate |
tathā jāḍyādiguṇavān bāhīko 'pyabhidhīyate || 400 ||
yatra svaviṣaya eva śabdaḥ prayujyate tatra mukhyaḥ | yatra tu kutaścinnimittāt pravṛttinimittamarthāntare 'dhyasya prayujyate tatra gauṇaḥ |
yadyapi jātiśabdaḥ tayā jātyā svanibandhanabhūtayā vinātyantānabhidheye kriyāguṇamātradvāreṇa nānyatra vartitumarhati, na ca śabdenāpravartamānena gaurbāhīka iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogo ghaṭate, tathāpi yathā— kathaṃcit sammohād rajjudravye prāp‍te buddhiviparyayāṃdarthāntare 'rthārarūpamadhyāropya svaviṣaya eva sarpaśabdaṃ prayuṅkte tathā kasyacideva sadṛśasya dharmasya bhūtasya darśanād bhāvino vā bhūtāsaṅgāt prāp‍tarūpaviparyāsāyāṃ buddhau bāhīke gotvamāsajya gośabdaṃ sās‍nādimatyeva piṇḍe prayuṅkte |
evamapyartharūpamātraviparyayaḥ, śabdasya tu svaviṣayavyabhicāro na vidyate |
na cādhyāropaḥ śakyate kartum | tathā hi — yadā tāvad bhrāntyā mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ toyaṃ śuktikāyāṃ rajatamadhyāropya tacchabdaṃ prayuṅkte tadobhayoḥ pratipādyapratipādakayo— rmukhyādhyavasānarūpeṇaiva toyādipratītestadbhāvāpattirmukhyatvam; athāpi vaktā vivekī san itaravañcanārthaṃ prayuṅkte, śrotā ca na viviṅkte, tadā tu ekasya vivekenā— dhyāropābhāvāditarasya ca viparyayamukhyatvānnaikamapi prati gauṇatvopapattiḥ |
yadā tu dvāvapyabhrāntau tadobhayoḥ sādṛś‍yādinimittāt tannimittavatya— rthādhyavasānādadhyāropābhāvaḥ | yathaiva hyasadṛśānāmarthānāṃ tiktamadhurādīnāṃ na kathaṃcidapi pratītyabhāvāt parasparādhyāropaṇam, evaṃ sadṛśānāmapi vivekajñānāt nopapadyate | na ca pratītiviparītaṃ jñānaṃ vyavahārāṅgaṃ bhavati |
na ca pravṛttinimittamantareṇa śabdo na pravartate, buddhistu viṣayamantareṇāpi pravartata iti vaktumucitam |
na cārtharahitā buddhirātmākāramātramanubhaviṣyatīti vaktavyam | nīlamida— mityādibuddhiṣu grāhyasya bāhyatvenaivāvabhāsāt |
api cāyaṃ gauṇamukhyāvibhāgaḥ śrotṝṇāmarthaviśeṣāvadhāraṇe vyāpriyate | te ca padaśravaṇavelāyāmanadhyāropitasvārthavṛttyaiva gavādipadamadhyavasāya bāhīkādipadasāmānā— dhikaraṇyānyathānupapattyā gauṇatāṃ parikalpayanti | tatra caiṣāṃ svayamanadhyāropyaiva gotvaṃ, tatsādṛś‍yapratītirbhavati | sā ca kiṃ śabdād arthād vetyanvicchatāmanvayavyati— rekābhyāmarthāditi niścayo jāyate |
katham?
siṃhaśabde hyanukte 'pi siṃhārthasadṛśī matiḥ |
jāyate na tvabuddhe 'rthe siṃhaśabde śrute 'pi naḥ || 401 || (tavā. 1.4.25)
yadā ca śrotṝṇāṃ svayamevādhyāropābhāvastadā vaktaryapi naivaiṣāmiyaṃ kalpanā bhavati; yathā kṛtamanena siṃhatvamadhyāropitamiti |
kathaṃ tarhi siṃhatvāvinābhūtānekakriyāguṇasamudāyo 'nena devadatte vivakṣitaḥ?
yat‍nagauravabhayānna svairabhidhānairbravīti | na cāsya samastasya kiṃcidekaṃ vācakaṃ
1. pṛṣṭha 334
padamasti | tenāvinābhāvitayā kathaṃ tu siṃhatvāt tatpratītirbhavediti tattāvadabhidhīyate yataḥ sthitayā śabdaśak‍tyā puṃsāṃ vyavahāro na tadvaśena śak‍tyantaropajana iti | kiṃca—(tavā. 1.4.22)
yadadhyāsena vaktṝṇāṃ gauṇī vṛttiḥ prakalpyate |
vede sā na kathaṃcit syādadhyāropayiturvinā || 402 ||
evaṃ tarhi sarva ete gavādiśabdā jātidravyaguṇakriyāsamudāyavācinaḥ samastārthāsambhave sās‍nādimadādau prayujyamānā mukhyāḥ bāhīkādau tu katipayaguṇakriyāyogāt pravartamānā gauṇatāṃ labhante | tatrābhidhīyate—
samudāyārthavācitve naikadeśe bhaved gatiḥ |
śataśabdānna pañcāśanmukhyarūpeṇa gamyate || 403 ||(tavā.)
bhavati tu jātimātre dṛṣṭe sarvakriyāguṇapratyastamaye 'pi prayogaḥ pratyayaśca mukhyātmanaiva, na bāhīkādiṣviva gośabdādupacaritaḥ | aprasahyakāryapi hi kadācid rogeṇopahataḥ siṃhyāḥ putraḥ siṃha eva | jātivācitā ca gavādiśabdānāṃ 1purastāduktā bādhyeta | kriyāguṇānāṃ tvānantyānna śakyaṃ prativyakti guṇasambandho 'nubhavitum |
ekasyāmeva ca vyaktau bālyādiṣu guṇakriyāḥ |
anyāścānyāśca śakyante nābhidhātumasaṅgateḥ || 404 || (tavā.)
na cānyat sāmānyaṃ śakyate kalpayitum, jātyantare 'pi k‍vacit kāsāṃcitsambhavāt | na cānabhihitaṃ gotvaṃ guṇakriyāṇāṃ vyavacchedakaṃ bhavati, apratīteḥ | abhihitaṃ cet tatpratyayādevāśeṣaguṇakriyāvagamādabhidhānaśak‍tayanavasara iti | (tantravā.)
anye tu śaktipramāṇādibhirnyūnaṃ gauṇam, atiśayavantaṃ sampūrṇaṃ mukhyamityācakṣateṃ nyūnā hi devadatte śaktiḥ sampūrṇā siṃhe, alpaṃ pramāṇaṃ kūpe mahat samudra iti | (vāpa. 2.253)
tatrāpare bruvate (tavā.)—śabdābhidheyatayā nyūnamadhikaṃ vā vijñāyate, na tu śaktipramāṇādyupacayāpacayena | yo hi śabdo yenārthenāvabaddho 'rthāntaraṃ nīyate tadupacitamapyartharūpaṃ tacchabdaṃ prati nyūnameva | tathā hi—'kūpaḥ samudraḥ pāṭalīputraḥ svarga' ityādau alpapramāṇaśaktyādāvapi svārthe kūpādiśabdānāṃ mukhyatvameva | ataḥ 'svārthe pravartamāno mukhyo 'rthāntare tu gauṇa' iti nyāyyam |
tatra jātiḥ gavādiśabdānāṃ pravṛttinimittaṃ, jātau hi svārthe prāp‍tasvarūpāṇya— bhidhāṃnāni tatsahacaritāṃstadvāreṇaiva dharmān saṃspṛśanti | tatra rūḍhasambandhasya prasiddhasāhacaryasya kriyāguṇāderdharmāntarasya darśanādatajjātīyeṣu jātiśabdaḥ prayujyamāno gauṇa ityucyate | ḍitthāḍiṣvapyanāśritākṛtiṣu kriyāguṇanimittāyāṃ śabdapravṛttāvarthāntara— samudbhavād gavādivadeva gauṇamukhyatve |
atrāhuḥ—ajahatsvārthāḥ sarvā vṛttayaḥ pūrvaśak‍tyanusārasambhave śak‍tyantarakalpane pramāṇābhāvāt; sambhaviṣyati cātra gotvāvagatavyak‍tyupasthāpitajāḍyādyaneka— dharmapratyayād bāhīke pratyaya iti pūrvaiva śaktirnimittam | ato na saṃśayahetutvena vyavahārocchedakāraṇaṃ prasiddhahānāprasiddhakalpanamāśrayaṇīyam |
api ca yathā gaurbāhīka iti kṛtapratyayalopo gośabdo bāhīkārthāntare pravartamāno gauṇa ityucyate, tathā gargasyāpatyāni bahūni gargāḥ, vidā iti pratyayalopāt prakṛtiśabdāḥ pratyayārthe vartamānā arthāntaravacanatvād gauṇā bhaveyuḥ (vāpa. 2.221) tasmādeka eva śabdo 'nekamarthaṃ yaugapadyena paryāyeṇa vābhidhatte, na tu svārthamutsṛjyārthāntare pravartate | prasiddhyaprasiddhibhyāṃ ca tasya mukhyagauṇavyapadeśo jāyate (vāpa. 2.263) | tatra yaugapadye 'pi yadā prasiddhenārthenāvacchidyate śabdastadā mukhyavyapadeśaṃ labhate | aprasiddhena tvarthena prāp‍tāvacchedasya gauṇavyapadeśo bhavati | paryāyeṇāpi yasmin vākye prasiddhārthaḥ śabdastastra mukhyaḥ anyatra tu gauṇaḥ | tadāha—
viparyāsādivārthasya yatrārthāntaratāmiva |
manyate sa gavādistu gauṇa ityucyate k‍vacit || 405 || (vāpa. 2.274)
tasmāllabdhvā bhavatu so 'yamiti vā saṃbandhaḥ kriyatām | sarvathā yatrārthāntaravācī śabdaḥ kutaścinnimittāt parityajyaiva svārthamarthāntare vartate, 'yaugapadyamatikramya paryāye vyavatiṣṭhate |' (vāpa. 2.251) iti prasiddhiḥ, tasya tathābhūto 'rtho gauṇa iti vyapadiś‍yate | yatra tu loke 'rthāntaratvena prasiddhistatra mukhyatvameva | yathaiva rūpādeva kecit padārthāḥ keṣucit karmasu yogyatvenāśritaśaktayaḥ sādhanatvena prasiddhasambandhāḥ, te ca darśanamātrādeva viśiṣṭaviṣayāstatratatrāvyabhicāreṇa pratīyante | tadyathā— sīrāsimusalādayaḥ kṛṣivadhāvahananādiṣu prayogaikadeśarūpatvamiva pratipannā gṛhyante (vāpa. 2.275) |
na caiṣāṃ karmāntareṣu śaktayo na prabhavanti | prasiddhā tu rūpaparikalpitameṣāṃ niyatakriyāviṣayasādhanatvaṃ vyavasthitaṃ loke | teṣu karmāntareṣūpādīyamānāḥ sādhayanto 'pi tadarthaṃ na tadaṅgatvena vyapadeśaṃ labhante | tathaivaite gavādayaḥ śabdāḥ pratyāyakatvasya vicchedābhāvād rūpaparigraheṇa pratyāyanaśaktimātraparigraheṇa ca keṣucidartheṣu loke prasiddhasambandhāḥ śrutimātrādeva tad‌viṣayatvenāvatiṣṭhante | pratyāyanaśaktimātraṃ tūpādāyānyatra prayujyamānāḥ pratyāyayanto 'pi tānarthān tatsaṃbandhitvena lokavyavasthāprasiddhiṃ na labhante |
tasmācchutimātreṇa śabdānāṃ yeṣvartheṣu tādarthyamavasīyate tameṣāṃ prasiddhaṃ mukhyamarthamācakṣate (vāpa. 2.278)| yatra tu śrutimātraviṣayaṃ kṛtaṃ yat‍namabhikramya nimittāntarataḥ pratītiḥ tamaprasiddhaṃ gauṇamityāhuḥ (vāpa. 2.266)| atrāpyucyate— 'prasiddhirnāma prajñānaṃ, na ca prajñāne kaścid viśeṣo 'sti | taduktam—
prasiddhiriti vijñānaṃ na cāsyonātiriktatā |
tasmānna tatkṛtaḥ śakyo viśeṣo vak‍tumañjasā || 406 || (tavā. 3.2.1)
api ca purārātprabhṛtīnāmākhyātasarūpāṇāṃ ca prasiddhārthābhidhāyināṃ gauṇumakhyapravibhāgaḥ prasajyeta yathā— 'purā vidyotate, naḍena sma purā brāhmaṇā adhīyate (kāśikā3.2.118) ārāddavīyo apasedha śatrūn (maisaṃ. 3.163), ārācchatrumapa vādhasva dūraṃ (ṛve.10.42.7), vāyurvāyuraśvo 'śvastena teneti (mabhā.dī. 160)|
kiṃ ca gavādiśabdānāmapi vāgādiṣvaprasiddhargauṇatāprasaṅgaḥ | tasmācchrotragata— prasiddhermūlaṃ tadvaktṛgataṃ bahvalpaprayogitvaṃ mukhyagauṇapravibhāgāya prakalpate | yasya bahuśaḥ prayogaḥ sa mukhyaḥ, alpaśastu prayujyamāno gauṇa iti |
tadapi na samyak | alpaśo 'pi prayujyamāno nāsati sāmarthye pratyāyayed, ataḥ so 'pi śabdāt pratīyata iti mukhya eva | atrāpi ca gavādīnāṃ vāgādiṣu gauṇatāprasaṅgo vaktavyaḥ | na ca bahvalpaprayogitā mukhyagauṇatve hetuḥ | tathā hi—
maṇḍakairbuhuśastṛp‍tiḥ kadācit‌khaṇḍamodakaiḥ |
na tasya maṇḍakā mukhyā gauṇā vā khaṇḍamodakāḥ || 407 || (tavā.3.2.1)
evaṃ tarhi kevalādeva śabdād yo 'rthaḥ pratīyate sa mukhyo, yastu sopapadāt
sa gauṇaḥ (śābhā. 3.2.1) na hi yathā kevalādag‍niśabdād jvalanapratyayo bhavatyevaṃ māṇavakapratyayaḥ, padāntarādhīnatvāt | yatrāpi padāntaraṃ na śrūyate tatrāpyarthaprakaraṇāpekṣaṃ tadeva vyāpriyate (tavā.) | taduktam—(vāpa. 2.264)
arthaprakaraṇāpekṣo yo vā śabdāntaraissaha |
prayukto gamayatyarthaṃ sa gauṇa iti gīyate || 408 ||
etadapyayuktaṃ— 'yasya hi śabdasya yadrūpaṃ kasyacidarthasya nimittaṃ sopapadasyāpi tattadeva | na ca śakyaṃ nimitte sati naimittikena na bhavitum | upapadaṃ tu vidyamānamapi dyotakatavenāpekṣyate | yathaiva cakṣuṣaḥ prakāśānugrahāpekṣitve rūpamartho, yathā vā muktasaṃśayasya mukhyasya varṇakramamātrā 'grahaṇasaṃskārasmṛtisambandhānubhavādyapekṣitvaṃ tathātropapadamapi naiva vinā sāmarthyenāpekṣituṃ śakyate | apekṣyamāṇamapi dyotakatveneti— kartavyatāsthānīyatvānna mukhyatāṃ vihanti | tena vināpyupapadena sa tasyārtho bhavatyeva, kathaṃcittu nābhivyajyate, tadyathā gavādiśabdānāṃ pṛthivyādiḥ |
evaṃ tarhi nityaṃ māṇavakāg‍niśabdasamudāyādasyārthasya pratīteḥ aśvakarṇādivat samudāyavācyatve satyagnyāderavayavasya tatra gauṇatvamiti |
tadapi nāsti | anvayavyatirekābhyāmarthabhedapratītestatra samudāyapratītirbhavati | yatrāvayavārthau tirodhāya tyaktabhedaḥ samudāyārtha (bheda) eva pratīyate, gamayate tvatrāg‍niśabdasya paiṅgalyaṃ, māṇavakaśabdasya tu piṇḍasvarūpaṃ viviktaṃ vācyam | ataḥ prātyātmikayorubhāvapi vācyatvānmukhyāviti |
tatraitatsyāt anugatasvārthapadadvayagamyatvānnīlotpalavat vākyārtho 'yam | ataśca tasyāvayavāpekṣayā gauṇatvamiti |
tadapi na | na hyatrāg‍nipadārtheg‍nitvamasti; na cānanvitapadārtho vākyārthaḥ sambhavati |

atraike varṇayanti— nimīlitākṣasya bahirvṛttinirodhādantaḥsaṃvilīnendriyavṛttiḥ pakṣmaṇoreva chāyāṃ gṛh‍ṇātīti |
na ca golakaśauklyasyāpi grahaṇamasti, sāmīpyāt | andhasyāpi ca tamaḥ—pratipatternaitadevamiti cet tanna jānīmaḥ | ta evātra praṣṭavyāḥ |
anye tvāhuḥ yathā visphāritākṣasyedamidamīdṛśaṃ ceti spaṣṭarūpatayāvagatiḥ, naiva nimīlitākṣasya, tasya na kiṃcitpaśyāmīti, pratipattipratyastamayāt | yadyapi cātra pratibhāsaḥ, tathāpi nimittaparyālocanayā tasya mithyātve, andhasya kimāyātam? na hi svap‍ne rajatajñānamithyātve 'nyadāpi rajatajñānaṃ mithyā bhavitumarhati | ata eva conmīlitākṣasya bādhakaṃ vijñānamutpadyate, na punastamasīti |
mūrtadravyacchāyā ca tamaḥ; pārthivaṃ hi dravyaṃ yasyāṃ diśyālokastadanyataḥ chāyāmārabhate | sā ca sarvairapi vastutvena pratīyate, vyapadiśyate ca iyaṃ chāyā gamyatām, asyāṃ chāyāyāmupaviśāmaḥ, chāyā madhuraśītaleti | tadevamakhilavastu— sādharmyeṇaiva cakṣuṣopalakṣyamāṇe kṛṣṇarūpe tamasi kathamabhidhīyate na tamo nāma kiṃcid vasturūpamastīti?
ucyate—'astyetat, kiṃtu yuktyā na saṃgacchate | tathā hīdaṃ tama iti sākṣātkāreṇa pratibhāsālliṅgādanya evāyam |
yadi paraṃ pratyakṣametad vijñānaṃ syāt?
tattu tredhā—ātmapratyakṣaṃ manaḥpratyakṣamindriyapratyakṣaṃ ceti | tatra vinaiva grāhakāntaramātmano yadaparokṣalakṣaṇaṃ vijñānaṃ tadātmapratyakṣam | taccānubhavasyeva svaprakāśatayā vā syād, viṣayasyeva anubhūyamānatayā (vā) | na tāvat svaprakāśatayā,
tamaso 'nubhūyamānatvena pratibhāsāt | nāpyanubhūyamānatayā, vinaivendriyairayogino viṣaye grahaṇāyogāt |
kevalamanassahāyasyātmano yadvijñānaṃ tanmanaḥpratyakṣam; tadapyantaranubhūyamāna— sukhaduḥkhādiviṣayaṃ vā syāt, bahiranubhūtapriyastragādiviṣayaṃ vā | na tāvadāntaram, idamiti bahīrūpatayā tamasaḥ pratipatteḥ | nāpi bāhyam, indriyāntaranirapekṣasya manaso bahirviṣayeṣu grahaṇāsāmarthyāt |
indriyārthamanassannikarṣajamātmana eva yadvijñānaṃ tadindriyapratyakṣam | tatra ca cakṣureva rūpaṃ gṛh‍ṇātīti niyamaḥ | na caitaccakṣuṣaiva gṛhyate, nimīlitākṣasyāpi kṛṣṇarūpatamaḥpratibhāsāt |
nimīlitākṣasya na kiṃcit paśyāmīti pratipattipratyastamaya iti cet, tanna | kimakṣiṇī nimīlyāndhakāraṃ karoṣītyādipravādānāmupalabdheḥ |
nanu ca yadi cakṣuridaṃ vijñānaṃ nādhigacchati tad varamindriyāntarakalpanā, na punarupalabdhasyāpalāpaḥ?
tanna | kṛṣṇarūpagrāhakendriyāntarakalpanāyāmacakṣuṣo 'pi rūpopalabdhiprasaṅgāt | tasya tamasyeva śaktiriti cet rūpāviśeṣe ko 'tra vyavasthāhetuḥ? tataśca dūrasthitatamodarśināṃ nimīlitākṣāṇāmapi taddarśanaprasaṅgaḥ | visphārite ca cakṣuṣi cakṣuṣā paśyāmīti pratīteraprasaṅgaḥ | na ca k‍vacidapi pravāde manaso 'nyat ṣaṣṭhamindriyaṃ dṛśyate |
(chāyā + tamaḥpadārtha)
yatra tannimīlitākṣapakṣmacchāyāyāṃ gṛh‍ṇātīti, tadācaṣṭāmāyuṣmān keyaṃ chāyā nāmeti?
nanuktaṃ pārthivaṃ dravyaṃ yasyāṃ diśyālokastadanyataśchāyāmārabhate |
tanna, tasyāstadārabdhatve tad‍guṇayogaprasaṅgāt | tataśca rūpamanekaprakāraṃ śuklādi | rasaḥ ṣaḍivadho madhurādiḥ | gandho dvividhaḥ surabhirasurabhiśca | sparśo 'nuṣṇāśītatve sati pākajaḥ | 'sarpirjatumadhūcchiṣṭānāṃ pārthivānāmag‍nisaṃyogād dravatā 'dbhissāmānyam' (vai.sū. 2.1.1) iti naimittikadravatvam, anye 'pi ca gurutvakaṭhinatvādayaḥ pṛthivīdharmāḥ chāyāyāṃ prasajyeran |
kathaṃ tarhi chāyā āgacchati, asyāṃ chāyāyāmupaviśāmaḥ, chāyā madhuraśītaleti ca vyapadeśo bhavati?
ucyate—'yatra yatra cārakadravyeṇa tejaḥprasaro nirūpyate tatra tatra tejodravyābhāve chāyeti viparyayapratīterudayaḥ | chāyā madhuraśītaleti tasyāmevopacarito vyavahāraḥ | yathā— 'ānando brahmaṇo rūpam' (nyāyabhūṣaṇam) iti | etenaitadapi nirastam | tasya mithyātve 'nyasya kimāyātamiti | uktanyāyena dvayorapi mithyāpratyayatvāt | yadi hyamithyaiva tamo nāma vastuviśeṣaḥ syāt tadālokasadbhāve 'pyanyavastuvad gṛhyeta |
virodhitvādālokasya tadagrahaṇamiti cet kimasya virodhinālokena kriyate, tirodhānam, apasāraṇaṃ, vināśo vā?
na tāvat tirodhānaṃ, rūpavastugrahaṇe tasyānugrāhakatvādato 'nyanīladravyavadāloke sutarāṃ tamaso 'pi grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ | yadi ca vidyamānameva tamastirodhīyate tasya padārthācchādakasvabhāvatvāt tamasīvāloke 'pi na kaścit kañcanāpi paśyet | tamasā hi sarve padārthāḥ pihitāstamo 'pyālokeneti |
na copalabhyamānānāmeva tirodhāyakatvaṃ, śabdatirodhāyakeṣu stimiteṣu vāyuṣu rūpapidhāyakeṣu paṭalādiṣu ca vyabhicārāt |
athāpasāraṇam?
tadapi na; pradīpārciṣāntargṛhamapasārite tamasi bahirandhakāraprasaṅgāt |
nāpi vināśaḥ, ālokena hi vināśite ālokāpasārasamanantaramutpatti— kāraṇābhāve kutastamasāmupalabdhiḥ?
na cālokābhāva eva kāraṇam, abhāvasya śūnyarūpatvena anākārakatvāt | na cānyadutpāde kāraṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ |
nanvevamālokābhāvamātrameva tama iti syāt |
naivam; na hyalokābhāva evātra gṛhyate, abhāvasyāprameyatvāt | ālokajñānapratyastamayamātrādeva cālokābhāvavyavahārasiddheḥ | yadi vātrābhāvaḥ pratibhāsata ityucyate, tato yasyābhāvo yatra cābhāvastatpadārthadvayapurassaramatra pratibhāsena
bhavitavyam, anavacchinnasyābhāvasyāpratipatteḥ | na ca tamasi gṛhyamāṇe niyamenāloka— smaraṇam, asmaryamāṇasya na vyavacchedakatvam | pratibhāsānuguṇaṃ cālambanaṃ parikalpyate, na cābhāvasyātadrūpasya kṛṣṇarūpaviśeṣāvabhāsinyā tamassañcityānuguṇyamasti |
api cāsmin pakṣe ālokābhāvaparyāyatā tamaśśabdasya | tataśca hastakaraśabdayoriva tadarthapratibhāsabhedo na syāt | tasmānna kiṃcidanugṛhyate | kintvagrahaṇa evāyaṃ grahaṇābhimānaḥ, mithyājñānasya viparyayasvarūpatvāt | āha ca viparyayodāharaṇaṃ praśastapādaḥ 'vyapagataghanapaṭalamacalajalanidhisadṛśavapurambaratalamañjanacūrṇapuñjaśyāmalaṃ śārvaraṃ tama' (prapābhā.) iti |
nanvevamandhakārapratīterviparyayatve viparyayātmikāyāstadbhāvāpatteridamudāharaṇaṃ yujyate, na tu pravādātmikāyāḥ | pravādātmikāyāṃ tvidamudāhṛtaṃ purastāt (ṛpra. 357)|
tadyathā— (śṛpra. 357)
gandharvapurasurāyudhakuraṅgatṛṣṇāndhakārarūpāṇi |
asatāmasatyadurgrahadurāpamalināni vṛttāni || 434 ||
ucyate—(vāpa. 2.296)
deśakālendriyagatairbhedairyaid dṛśyate 'nyathā |
yathā prasiddhirlokasya tathā tad‍vyapadiśyate || 435 ||
tatra prasiddhārthaviparyayahetubhyo madyaviṣapānamarudeśāvasthānādibhyaḥ prasiddhā— kāreṣvartheṣu darśanaviparyāso jāyate | niśāyāṃ raktakambalahastivanādiṣu varṇapramāṇa— saṃhatyādibhedo dṛśyate | timiropaghāta—kāca—kāmalādibhyaḥ keśoṇḍukadvicandrā— diṣvayathārthā pratītirudayate | ardhanimīlite cakṣuṣi rūpabhedapratipattirbhavati | bhramaṇāvasthānanauyānādiṣu ca pṛthivīparvatādīnāmanyathākramaḥ upalabhyate | kāraṇāpagame ca punaryathārthaiva pratipattirudeti | tatra sandehe sati yadyat samadhigatanimittamanyatrāviparyaye dṛṣṭasāmarthyaṃ prasiddhaṃ loko hi sarveṣāṃ viduṣāmaviduṣāṃ ca vyavahāravyavasthā— heturalaṅghanīyaḥ pramāṇam | tadatikramāt sarvatra vairasyaṃ labhate | loke ca keśoṇḍukadvicandraśuktikārajatādīnāmeva viparyayatvena prasiddhiḥ, gandharvanagarendrāyudhamṛga— tṛṣṇāndhakārādīnāṃ viparyayatve 'pi vā gandharvanagarādipravādo 'bhyadhikaṃ rūpameteṣāmiti ||
tadetad doṣahānaṃ ca guṇopādānameva ca |
jñātvā kurvan kaviḥ kāvyaṃ pretya ceha ca nandati || 436 ||
nirdoṣaṃ guṇavad yasya sālaṅkāraṃ rasānvitam |
satāṃ vasati cetassu vacaḥ sa divi modate || 437 ||
ityeṣa doṣaparivarjanayā guṇānā—
māvarjanena ca kilobhayathāntaraṅgaḥ |
kāvye yathāyathamalaṅkṛtiyoga ukta—
statraiva bāhyamatha taṃ kramaśo 'bhidhāsye || 438 ||
iti mahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe doṣahānaguṇopādānaprakāśo nāma
|| navamaḥ prakāśaḥ ||9||
darśanāntaragokṣīramidaṃ bhojopapāditamṃ |
sāhityatattvajijñāsuṣvalaṃ dṛgupaśodhane ||
atha
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe daśamaḥ prakāśaḥ
śabdārthobhayālaṅkāraprakāśo nāma
(11. alaṅkārayogaḥ)
atha apāstadoṣasya upāttaguṇasya ca kāvyaśarīrasya cārutvotkarṣasiddha‍ye prāp‍takālaḥ alaṅkārayoga ucyate | yataḥ—
dīrghāpāṅgaṃ nayanayugaḷaṃ bhūṣayatyañjanaśrīḥ
tuṅgābhogau prabhavati kucāvarcituṃ hārayaṣṭiḥ |
madhyakṣāme vapuṣi labhate sthāma kūrpāsalakṣmīḥ
śroṇībimbe guruṇi raśanādāmaśobhāṃ bibharti ||1||
alaṅkārāśca tridhā— bāhyāḥ, ābhyantarāḥ, bāhyābhyantarāśca | teṣu —
bāhyā vastramālyavibhūṣaṇādayaḥ |
āntarā dantaparikarmanakhacchedālakakalpanādayaḥ |
bāhyābhyantarāḥ s‍nānadhūpavilepanāñjanamukhavāsatāmbūlopayogādayaḥ śarīre |
kāvyaśarīre 'pi —
1. vastramālyabhūṣaṇādisthānīyā jātyādayaḥ śabdālaṅkārāḥ|
2. dantaparikarmādisthānīyāḥ svabhāvākhyānādayaḥ arthālaṅkārāḥ|
3. s‍nānadhūpavilepanādisthānīyā upamādayaḥ ubhayālaṅkārāḥ bāhyābhyantarobhayālaṅkāravyapadeśaṃ labhante |
(1. śabdālaṅkārāḥ —24)
ye śabdameva vyutpattyādinā bhūṣayanti te śabdālaṅkārāḥ caturviṃśatiḥ —
'jātiḥ, gatiḥ, rītiḥ, vṛttiḥ, racanā, ghaṭanā, mudrā, chāyā, yuktiḥ, uktiḥ, bhaṇitiḥ, paṭhitiḥ, śravyatvaṃ, prekṣyatvam, abhineyatvam, adhyeyatvaṃ, vākovākyaṃ, praś‍nottaraṃ, prahelikā, gūḍhaṃ, citraṃ, śleṣaḥ, yamakam, anuprāsa' iti | teṣu —
(1. jātiḥ —6)
saṃskṛtaprākṛtādirjātiḥ | sā ṣọdhā— śuddhā, miśrā, saṅkīrṇā, sādhāraṇī asādhāraṇī, apabhraṣṭā ceti | tatra — śuddhā yathā—
sa eṣa bhuvanatrayaprathitasaṃyamaśśaṅkaro
bibharti vapuṣādhunā virahakātaraḥ kāminīm |
anena kila nirjitā vayamiti priyāyāḥ karaṃ
kareṇa paritāḍayan jayati jātahāsaḥ smaraḥ || 2 ||
miśrā yathā—
iti stutaguṇaḥ śivo hariviriñcinārāyaṇaiḥ
karotu bhavatāṃ vibhurbhavasamudrapotāyitam |
umāa uvaṇe avo saalakajjakallāṇiṇī
sivā sivaparā paraṃ paramamaṅgalā maṅgalam || 3 ||
saṅkīrṇā yathā—
akaṭa—gumaṭī candrajyots‍nā kalaṃ kila koilo
lavaï a muhuryāmyo vāyurnivāara vāi a |
avi sakhi alā raktāśokastavāpi manomude
nakajanakajaṃ mānenādya priyaṃ prati jāhudā || 4 ||
(aho manojñā candrajyots‍nā kalaṃ kila kokilo
lapati ca muhuryāmyo vāyuḥ nirvārako vāti ca |
api sakhi āgato raktāśokastavāpi manomude
nārthonārtha mānenādya priyaṃ prati yāmaḥ ||)
sādhāraṇī yathā—(rudraṭa. 4.21)
krīḍanti prasaranti madhu kamalapraṇayi lihanti |
bhramarā mitra suvibhramā mattā bhūri rasanti || 5 ||
asādhāraṇī yathā—
bhīṣmaproktāni vākyāni vidvadvaktreṣu śerate |
gose tiviñchiriccholī talla tūhe vivallidā || 6 ||
apabhraṣṭā yathā—
muddhe gahaṇaa geṇhaü taṃ dhari muddaṃ ṇie hatthe |
ṇic‍caü sundari tuha uvari mama suraappahā atthi || 7 ||
(mugdhe grahaṇakaṃ (ratamūlyaṃ) gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dhāraya mudrāṃ nije haste |
niścayaḥ sundari tavopari mama surataspṛhā asti ||)
asyā api hyanukaraṇe sādhutvamiṣyate ||
(2. gatiḥ —6)
gadyapadyamiśrādirgatiḥ | sā ṣọdhā—
drutā, madhyā, vilambitā, drutamadhyā, drutavilambitā, madhyavilambiteti | tatra— padye drutā yathā—
ayi vijahīhi dṛ̣dhopagūhanaṃ tyaja navasaṅgamabhīru ! vallabham |
aruṇakarodgama eṣa vartate varatanu ! sampravadanti kukkuṭāḥ || 8 ||
madhyā yathā—
āsīddaityo hayagrīvaḥ suhṛdveś‍masu yasya tāḥ |
prathayanti balaṃ bāhvoḥ sitacchatrasmitāḥ śriyaḥ || 9 ||
vilambitā yathā— (praprābhā. maṅgalaś‍lokaḥ)
praṇamya hetumīśvaraṃ muniṃ kaṇādamannataḥ |
padārthadharmasaṃgrahaḥ pravakṣyate mahodayaḥ || 10||
drutamadhyā yathā—(raghu. 9.67)
atha turagasamīpādutpatantaṃ mayūraṃ na sa rucirakalāpaṃ bāṇalakṣmīcakāra |
sapadi gatamanaskaścitramālyānukīrṇe rativigalitabandhe keśapāśe priyāyāḥ || 11 ||
drutavilambitā yathā—
avatu vaḥ savitusturagāvalī samabhilaṅghitatuṅgapayodharā |
sphuritamadhyagatāruṇanāyakā marakataikalateva nabhaḥśriyaḥ || 12 ||
madhyavilambitā yathā—(rāca. 11.116)
dundubhayo divi dadhvanuruc‍cairuc‍cakarāḥ kapayaśca vavalguḥ |
siddhanikāyakarābjavimuktaṃ mālyamathāṅgadamūrdh‍ni papāta || 13 ||
evaṃ gadye 'pi laghugurumiśravarṇavinyāsabhūyastvena drutavilaṃmbitamadhyādigatayo gaveṣaṇīyāḥ ||
(3. rītiḥ —6)
vidarbhādīnāṃ vākyaracanāvartma rītiḥ | sā ṣọdhā—
vaidarbhī, pāñcālī, gauḍīyā, āvantikā, lāṭīyā, māgadhī ca | tāsu — asamastapadā vaidarbhī, yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.4)
manīṣitāḥ santi gṛheṣu devatāstapaḥ k‍va vatse k‍va ca tāvakaṃ vapuḥ |
padaṃ saheta bhramarasya pelavaṃ śirīṣapuṣpaṃ na punaḥ patatriṇaḥ || 14 ||
samastapañcaṣapadā pāñcālī, yathā—
gātrābhighātadalitāṅgadajarjarāṇāṃ gaṇḍasthalīluṭhitakuṇḍalatāḍitanām |
kṣobhasphuṭanmukuṭakoṭivighaṭṭitānāṃ nādo 'bhavajjhaṇajhaṇāmukharo maṇīnām || 15 ||
yathāśakti samastapadā gauḍīyā, yathā—
yasyāvaskandalīlācalitabalaparispandakharvīkṛtorvī— saṃrambhastambhanāgronnamitabharanamatkandharāsandhirāsīt |
śeṣo visphāraphullasphuṭapṛthulaphaṇāphūtkṛtāg‍nisphuliṅga— sphūrjatsandohasandehitavikaṭaśikhāmaṇḍalīrat‍nakhaṇḍaḥ || 16||
vaidarbhādīnāmantarālarītirāvantikā, yathā
etāni nissahatanorasamañjasāni śūnyaṃ manaḥ piśunayanti padāni tasyāḥ |
ete ca mārgataravaḥ prathayanti tāpa— mālambitojjhitapariglapitaiḥ pravāleḥ || 17 ||
miśrarītirlāṭīyā, yathā—
ayamudayati mudrābhañjanaḥ padminīnāmudayagirivanālībālamandārapuṣpam |
virahavidhurakokadvandvabandhurvibhindan kupitakapikapolakroḍatāmrastamāṃsi || 18 ||
khaṇḍarītirmāgadhī, yathā—
karikabalanaśiṣṭaiḥ śākhiśākhāgrapatrairaruṇasaraṇayo 'mī sarvato bhīṣayante |
calitaśabarasenādattagośṛṅgacaṇḍadhvanicakitavarāhavyākulā vindhyapādāḥ || 19 ||
(4. vṛttiḥ —6)
vikāsavikṣepavistarasaṅkoceṣu cetaso varttayitrī vṛttiḥ | sā ṣọdhā—
kaiśikī, ārabhaṭī, bhāratī, sātvatī, madhyamārabhaṭī, madhyamakaiśikī ca | tāsu sukumārasandarbhārthā kaiśikī, yathā—
śaśiruciṣu daleṣu nāgavallyā vicakiladāmani candane ca hṛdye |
kuvalayini purāṇasīdhupātre taraladṛśāmapatan dṛśaḥ priye ca || 20 ||
prauḍhasandarbhārthā ārabhaṭī, yathā—(pṛ. 341 (vesaṃ. 3.32) )
'yo yaśśastraṃ bibharti svabhujagurumadaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnām' ityādi |
sukumāre 'rthe nātiprauḍhasandarbhā bhāratī, yathā—(vesaṃ. 1.3)
uttiṣṭhantyā ratānte bharamuragapatau pāṇinaikena kṛtvā dhṛtvā cānyena vāso vigalitakabarībāramaṃsaṃ vahantyāḥ |
bhūyastatkālakāntidviguṇitasurataprītinā śauriṇā vaḥ śayyāmālambya nītaṃ vapuralasalasad‍bāhu lakṣmyā punātu || 21 ||
praụdhe 'rthe nātisukumārasandarbhā sātvatī, yathā—
vandyau dvāvapi tāvanāryacaritaprāp‍tapratiṣṭhodayau bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ sa ca munirbhāsvatkuṭhārāyudhaḥ |
ekenāmṛtavad vidārya karajaiḥ pītānyasṛñji dviṣā— manyenāpi hatāhitāstrasarasi s‍nātaṃ krudhaḥ śāntaye || 22 ||
sukumāre 'rthe praụdhoktiḥ madhyamakaiśikī, yathā—
kiṃ dvāri daivahatike ! sahakārakeṇa saṃvardhitena viṣapādapa eṣa pāpaḥ |
asmin manāgapi vikasavikārabhāji bhīmā bhavanti madanajvarasannipātāḥ || 23 ||
praụdhe 'rthe sukumāroktirmadhyamārabhaṭī, yathā—(kāmī.)
tvaṃ nāgarāja ! bahuśo 'sya nitambabhāgaṃ bhogena gāḍhamabhiveṣṭaya mandarādreḥ |
sọdhāviṣahyavṛṣavāhanayogalīlā— paryaṅkabandhanavidhestava ko 'tibhāraḥ || 24 ||
(5. racanā —6)
yathāvacchabdārthayorniveśo racanā | sā ṣọdhā —
śabdaracanā, artharacanā, paryāyaracanā, padaracanā, vākyaracanā, kramaracanā ceti | tāsu— śabdaracanā yathā—
tavābhiṣeke madanāturāyā hastāc‍cyuto hemaghaṭo yuvatyāḥ |
sopānamāsādya karoti śabdaṃ ṭaṃṭaṃ ṭaṭaṃṭaṃ ṭaṭaṭaṃ ṭaṭaṃṭam || 25 ||
artharacanā yathā—
dik‍kālātmasamaiva yasya1 vibhutā, 2yastatra vidyatate, yatrā 'muṣya sudhībhavanti kiraṇā3, rāśoḥ sa yāsāmabhūt4 |
yastatpittamuṣaḥsu5 yaś‍ca 6haviṣe, yaś‍cāsya* jīvātave7 vọdhā yad‍guṇameṣa8 manmatharipostāḥ pāntu vo mūrttayaḥ || 26 ||1
paryāyaracanā yathā—
kaṇaïlli c‍cia jāṇaï kuṃtapalappāi kīrasaṃlavaï |
pūsaabhāsaṃ muṃcasu ṇa hu re haṃ dhavvavāạ̄dhī || 27 ||
(śuk‍yeva jānāti śukapralapitāni kīrasaṃlāpini !
kīrabhāṣāṃ muñca na khalu re ahaṃ dhṛṣṭaśukī ||)
padaracanā yathā—(kāmī.)
lolallāṅgulavallīvalayitavakuvalānokahaskandhalolai— rgolāṅgulairnadadbhiḥ pratirasitajaratkandarāmandireṣu |
khaṇḍeṣūddaṇḍapiṇḍītagarataralanāḥ prāpire yena velā— mālambyottālatallasphuṭitapuṭakinībandhavo gandhavāhāḥ || 28 ||
vākyaracanā yathā—
patiśvaśuratā jyeṣṭhe patidevaratānuje |
madhyameṣu ca pāñcālyāḥ tritayaṃ tritayaṃ triṣu || 29 ||
1. vyoma 2. sūrya 3. candraḥ 4. āpaḥ 5. ag‍ni 6. yajamānaḥ 7. vāyuḥ 8. pṛthivī | * jyośerarāvaghayostu pāṭhaḥ— yattatpittamuṣaḥ sa yasya haviṣe dra.sa.ka. 2.53. u. rat‍neś‍varaḥ |
kramaracanā yathā—
nīlābjānāṃ nayanayugaladrāghimā dattapatraḥ kumbhāvaibhau kucaparikaraḥ pūrvapakṣīcakāra |
bhrūvibhrāntirmadanadhanuṣo vibhramānanvavādīd vaktrajyots‍nā śaśadhararucaṃ dūṣayāmāsa yasyāḥ || 30 ||
(6. ghaṭanā —6)
padārthānāṃ parasparamupaśleṣo ghaṭanā | sā ṣọdhā—
prakrāntaghaṭanā, aprakrāntaghaṭanā, atikrāntaghaṭanā, padaghaṭanā, vākyaghaṭanā, prakīrṇaghaṭanā ceti | tāsu —
prakrāntaghaṭanā yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.3)
sa tatheti pratijñāya visṛjya kathamapyumām |
ṛṣīñ jyotirmayān sap‍ta sasmāra smaraśāsanaḥ || 31 ||
aprakāntaghaṭanā yathā—
atrāpyudāharantīmamitihāsaṃ purātanam |
niṣādasya ca saṃvādamṛṣeḥ saṃvaraṇasya ca || 32 ||
atikrāntaghaṭanā yathā—(rāca.1.18)
tasya cakruścamatkāraṃ vyatītasamayā api |
smitārdramukulodbhedāḥ kadambabanarājayaḥ || 33 ||
padaghaṭanā yathā—
chinnena patatā vahnau yanmukhena haṭhātkṛte |
sveti heti hareṇokteḥ svāhā ' 'sīt saiṣa rāvaṇaḥ || 34 ||
vākyaghaṭanā yathā—(vikra. 4.33)
haṃsa prayaccha me kāntāṃ gatistasyāstvayā hṛtā |
vibhāvitaikadeśena deyaṃ yadabhiyujyate || 35 ||
prakīrṇaghaṭanā yathā—(māgha. 3.74)
sāṭopamurvīmaniśaṃ nadanto yaiḥ plāvayiṣyanti samantato 'mī |
tānyekadeśānnibhṛtaṃ payodheḥ so 'mbhāṃsi meghān pibato dadarśa || 36 ||
(7. mudrā —6)
sābhiprāyavacanaviniveśo mudrā | ṣọdhā—
padamudrā, vibhaktimudrā, vacanamudrā, vākyamudrā, samuc‍cayamudrā, saṃvṛtimudrā ceti | tāsu padamudrā yathā—(bārā. 1.40)
nirmālyaṃ nayanaśriyaḥ kuvalayaṃ vaktrasya dāsaḥ śaśī bhrūyugmasya sanābhi ganmathadhanurjyots‍nā smitasyāñcalaḥ |
saṅgītasya ca mattakokilarutānyucchiṣṭameṇīdṛśaḥ sarvāṅgīṇamaho vidheḥ pariṇataṃ vijñānacitraṃ cirāt || 37 ||
vibhaktimudrā yathā—(visā. 1.8)
śriyaḥ prasūte vipado ruṇāddhi yaśāṃsi sūte malinaṃ pramārṣṭi |
saṃskāraśaucena paraṃ punīte śuddhā hi buddhiḥ kila kāmadhenuḥ || 38 ||
vacanamudrā yathā—(urāca. 1.9)
viśvambharā bhagavatī bhavatīmasūta rājā prajāpatisamo janakaḥ pitā te |
teṣāṃ vadhūstvamasi nandini ! pārthivānāṃ yeṣāṃ kuleṣu savitā ca gururvayaṃ ca || 39 ||
vākyamudrā yathā—
yat svacche salilātmani pratiphaleddeve triyāmāpatau pīyūṣākṛti paryavasyati kila jyots‍neti tattvāntaram |
tigmaṃ dhāma ciraṃ cakāsti divi yat tatrāsti divyaḥ pumān yaṃ vijñātavatāṃ truṭanita nikhilā bhūyo bhavagranthayaḥ || 40 ||
samuc‍cayamudrā yathā—(hava.)
jātaścāyaṃ mukhenduste bhrukuṭīpraṇayī puraḥ |
gataṃ ca vasudevasya kulaṃ nāmāvaśeṣatām || 41 ||
saṃvṛtimudrā yathā—
maṇirat‍naṃ prasenasya tac‍cānāryeṇa viṣṇunā |
labdhaṃ yenādya yogena kiṃ kīrtitena vaḥ || 42 ||
(8. chāyā —6)
anyoktīnāmanukaraṇaṃ chāyā | sā ṣọdhā—
lokokticchāyā, chokokticchāyā, mugdhokticchāyā, poṭokticchāyā, skhalitokticchāyā, asamañjasokticchāyā ceti | tāsu—
lokokticchāyā yathā—(megha.107)
śāpānte me bhujagaśayanādutthite śārṅgapāṇau māsānanyān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā |
paścādāvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tamātmābhilāṣaṃ nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇataśarac‍candrikāsu kṣapāsu || 43 ||
chekokticchāyā yathā—
yo hi dīrghāsitākṣasya vilāsavalitabhruvaḥ |
kāntāmukhasyāvaśagastasmai nṛpaśave namaḥ || 44 ||
mugdhokticchāyā yathā—
kiṃ sa svarge taruḥ ko 'pi yasya puṣpaṃ niśākaraḥ |
te vṛkṣāḥ kīdṛśā mātaryeṣāṃ muktāphalaṃ phalam || 45 ||
poṭokticchāyā yathā—
tilakamasahāmmi sọdhuṃ ghanasāreṇātisāradoṣo me |
lambhayati ca daurvarṇyaṃ kuṅkumarāgo mamāṅgāni || 46 ||
skhalitokticchāyā yathā—
pipi priya sasa svayaṃ mumu mukhāsavaṃ dehi me tata tyaja dudu drutaṃ bhabhabha bhājanaṃ kāñcanam |
iti skhalitajalpitaṃ madavaśātkuraṅgīdṛśaḥ prage hasitahetave sahacarībhiradhyaiyata || 47 ||
asamañjasokticchāyā yathā—
dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ sutanu kiṃ kurute kimasmad— vārtā sa pṛcchati śṛṇoti nivedyamānām |
āstāṃ kimasya kathayā kathayāśu tāva— datrāgamiṣyati na vā khalu so 'bhimānī || 48 ||
(9. yuktiḥ —6)
śabdasyārthasya vā parasparamayujyamānasya yojanaṃ yuktiḥ | sā ṣọdhā—
padaviṣayā, padārthaviṣayā, vākyaviṣayā, vākyārthaviṣayā, prakaraṇaviṣayā, prabandhaviṣayā ceti | tāsu —
yogavṛttiparamparā aṅgāṅgibhāvaparamparā paryāyaparamparetyādi | padaviṣayā yathā—(sūśa.)
jambhārātībhakumbhod‍bhavamiva dadhataḥ sāndrasindūrareṇu |
raktāḥ siktā ivaughairudayagiritaṭīdhātudhārādravasya || 49 ||
lakṣmīmākraṣṭukāmā iva kamalavanoddhāṭanaṃ kurvate ye |
bhaktiprahvāya dātuṃ mukulapuṭakuṭokoṭarakroṭarakroḍalīnām || 50 || (sūśa.)
turaṅgakāntāmukhahavyavāhajvāleva bhittvā jalamullalāsa || 51 || (māgha. 3.33)
jātikriyāguṇadravyāṇāṃ yuktiḥ, padārthaviṣayā yathā—
strīpuṃnapuṃsamanaghaṃ bhavamānato 'smi || 52 ||
śailādhirājatanayā na yayau na tasthau || 53 || (kusaṃ. 5.85)
sābbhre 'hnīva sthalakamalinīṃ na prabuddhāṃ na sup‍tām || 54 || (megha. 89)
pāyādekaṃ madanavijayadveṣiṇastad vapurvaḥ || 55 ||
vāk‍yagarbho vākyasamuc‍cayaḥ vākyasaṃvṛtirityādiḥ vākyaviṣayā, yathā—
diṅ‍mātaṅgaghaṭāvibhaktacaturāghāṭā mahī sādhyate (dra. 7.148)
kriyāsamuc‍cayasamabhivyāhārābhyāsādibhiḥ vākyārthaviṣayā, yathā—(māgha. 1.51)
purīmavaskanda lunīhi nandanaṃ muṣāṇa rat‍nāni harāmarāṅganāḥ |
vigṛhya cakre namucidviṣā balī ya itthamasvāsthyamaharniśa divaḥ || 56 ||
aśraddheyaparvatādivarṇanotpattihetuḥ prakaraṇaviṣayā, yathā—(māgha. 4.10)
mude murāreramaraiḥ sumerorānīya yasyopacitasya śṛṅgaiḥ |
bhavanti noddāmagirāṃ kavīnāmucchrāyasaundaryaguṇā mṛṣodyāḥ || 57 ||
prabandhavyāpivastūpapattihetuḥ prabandhaviṣayā, yathā—(megha.5)
dhūmajyotissalilamarutāṃ sannipātaḥ k‍va megha— ssandeśārthāḥ k‍va paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ |
ityautsukyādaparigaṇayan guhyakastaṃ yayāce kāmārtā hi prakṛti(praṇaya)kṛpaṇāścetanācetaneṣu || 58 ||
(10. uk‍tiḥ —6)
vidhiniṣedhāderabhidhām uktiḥ | ṣọdhā—
vidhiḥ, niṣedhaḥ, adhikāraḥ, parisaṅkhyā, vikalpaḥ, niyama iti | teṣu— aprāp‍tau prāpaṇavacanaṃ vidhiḥ, yathā—(śāku. 4.18)
śuśrūṣasva gurūn kuru priyasakhīvṛtiṃ sapat‍nījane || 59 || ityādi prāp‍tau nivāraṇaṃ niṣedhaḥ, yathā—(śāku. 4.18)
bharturviprakṛtāpi roṣaṇatayā mā sma pratīpaṃ gamaḥ || 60 ||
vidhineṣedhayogyatādhikāraḥ, yathā—(śāku. 4.18)
bhūyiṣṭhaṃ bhava dakṣiṇā parijane bhāgyeṣvanutsokinī |
yāntyevaṃ gṛhiṇīpadaṃ yuvatayo vāmāḥ kulasyādhayaḥ|| 61 ||
vidhiniṣedhābhyāṃ śeṣapratiṣedhābhyanujñāne parisaṅkhyā, yathā—
pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā vāmenākṣṇā na paś‍yati |
kāṭhinyamasyāḥ kucayoḥ kimasadyanna rocate || 62 ||
jātikriyāguṇadravyeṣu ubhayāvalambī vikalpaḥ, yathā—(manu. 6.6)
putreṣu dārānnikṣipya vanaṃ gacchet sahaiva vā || 63 ||
dharmārthakāmān dharmaṃ vā brahma vā brāhmaṇaścaret || 64 ||
ayogānyayogātyantāyogavyavacchedo niyamaḥ, yathā—
vivādo 'pārtha evāyaṃ pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ |
yo na kevalamātmīyaiḥ parairapyabhinandyate || 65 ||
(11. bhaṇitiḥ —6)
uktereva prakārāntarākhyānaṃ bhaṇitiḥ | sā ṣọdhā—
sambhāvanābhaṇitiḥ, asambhāvanābhaṇitiḥ, kalpanābhaṇitiḥ, āścaryabhaṇitiḥ, saṃvṛtibhaṇitiḥ, viśeṣabhaṇitiriti | tāsu —
sambhāvanābhaṇitiḥ—(visā. 3.14)
sadyodrāvitaketakodaradalastrotaḥśriyaṃ bibhratī yeyaṃ mauktikadāmagumphanavidheryogyacchaviḥ prāgabhūt |
utsekyā kalaśībhirañjalipuṭaiḥ peyā mṛṇālāṅkurai— rmātavyā ca śaśinyamugdhavibhave sā vartate candrikā || 66 ||
asambhāvanābhaṇitiryathā—(visā. 1.20)
k‍va peyaṃ jyots‍nāmbho vadanabisavallīsaraṇibhi— rmṛṇālītantubhyaḥ sicayaracanā kutra bhavati |
k‍va vā pārīmeyo bata bakuladām‍nāṃ parimalaḥ kathaṃ svap‍naṃ sākṣāt kuvalayadṛśaṃ kalpayatu tām || 67 ||
kalpanābhaṇitiḥ yathā—
dṛś‍yaṃ dṛśāṃ sahastrairmanasāmayutairvibhāvanīyaṃ ca |
sukṛtaśatakoṭibhogyaṃ kimapi vayaḥ subhruvaḥ svadate || 68 ||
āścaryabhaṇitiryathā—
jyotirbhyastadidaṃ tamassamuditaṃ jāte 'yamada‍bhyaśśikhī pīyūṣādidamutthitaṃ viṣamayaṃ chāyāp‍tajanmā ' 'tapaḥ |
ko nāmāsya vidhiḥ prasāntiṣu bhaved gāḍhaṃ drạdhīyānayaṃ granthiryat priyato 'pi vipriyamidaṃ sakhyaḥ kṛtaṃ sāntvanaiḥ || 69 ||
saṃvṛtibhaṇitiryathā—(vikra. 2.3)
ābharaṇasyābharaṇaṃ prasādhanavidheḥ prasādhanaviśeṣaḥ |
upamānasyāpi sakhe ! pratyupamānaṃ vapustasyāḥ || 70 ||
viśeṣabhaṇitiryathā—(māgha. 2.16)
revatīvadanocchiṣṭaparipūtapuṭe dṛśau |
vahan halī madakṣībaḥ pānagoṣṭhyāṃ punātu vaḥ || 71 ||
(12. paṭhitiḥ —6)
kāk‍vādinā vākyoc‍cāraṇaṃ paṭhitiḥ | sā ṣọdhā—
kākuḥ, svaraḥ, viccheda, kāntiḥ, abhinayaḥ, apadeśa iti | tāsu— kākuryathā—(vesaṃ. 2.20)
myastā na bhrukuṭirna bāṣpasalilenācchādite locane nītaṃ nānanamanyataḥ saśapathaṃ nāhaṃ spṛśan vāritaḥ |
tanvyā mag‍napayodharaṃ bhayavaśādāviddhamāliṅgitaṃ bhaṅktāsyā niyamasya bhīṣaṇamarunnāyaṃ vayasyo mama || 72 ||
svaro yathā—
subhru! tvaṃ kupitetyapāstamaśanaṃ tyaktā kathā yoṣitāṃ || || 73 || (pṛ.360)
vicchedo yathā—(dhvanyāloka 2.22/23)
yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛtaḥ || 74 ||
kāntiryathā—(kīva. 1.10)
yasyārijātaṃ nṛpaterapaśyadavalambanam |
yayau nirjharasambhogairapaśyadabalaṃ vanam || 75 ||
abhinayo yathā—
eddahamettatthaṇiā || 76 || (pṛ॰ 364)
apadeśo yathā—
itaḥ sa daityaḥ prāp‍taśrīḥ || 77 || (kusaṃ. 2.55)
(13. śravyam —6)
śrutisukhamātrajananaṃ śravyam | tatṣọdhā—
āśīḥ, nāndī, namaskṛtiḥ, vastunirdeśaḥ, dhruvā, ākṣip‍tiketyādi | tatra liṅloḍvācyo 'rthaviśeṣa āśīḥ, yathā—
bhūyād vaḥ śreyase devaḥ pārvatīdayito haraḥ || 78 ||
pātu vaḥ paramaṃ jyotiravāṅ‌manasagocaram || 79 || (kāvyāda. 2.357)
raṅgamaṅgalāntasvastyayanaṃ nāndī, yathā—(kama. 1.1)
bhaddaṃ bhodu sarassaīa kaïṇo ṇaṃdaṃtu vāsāiṇo aṇṇāṇaṃ pi paraṃ paaṭṭhadu varā vāṇī chaïllappiā |
vacchomī taha māahī phuradu ṇo sā kiṃ a paṃcāliā rīdīyo vilihaṃtu kavvakusalā joh‍ṇaṃ caorā via || 80 ||
(bhadraṃ bhavatu sarasvatyāḥ kavayo nandantu vyāsādayaḥ anyeṣāmapi paraṃ pravartatāṃ varā vāṇī vidagdhapriyā |
vaidarbhī tathā māgadhī sphuratu naḥ sā kiṃ ca pāñcālikā rītikā vilihantu kāvyakuśalā jyotsnāṃ cakorā iva ||)
stutirnamovākyaṃ vā namaskriyā, yathā—
jayati brahmabhūḥ śambhuḥ || 81 ||
vandemahi maheśvaram || 82 ||
idaṃ gurubhyaḥ pūrvebhyo namovākaṃ praśāsmahe || 83 || (urāca. 1.1)
kathāśarīravyāpino nāyakāderabhidhānaṃ vastunirdeśaḥ, yathā—
astyuddāmajaṭābhārabhrāntagaṅgāmbuśekharaḥ |
ādidevo haro nāma sṛṣṭisaṃhārakāraṇam || 84 ||
pātrapraveśādisūcakaṃ vākyaṃ dhruvā, yathā
maa—vaha—ṇimitta—ṇiggaa—maïnda—suṇṇaṃ guhaṃ ṇieūṇa |
laddhāvasaro gahiūṇa mottiāiṃ gao vāho || 85 ||
(mugavadhanimittanirgatamṛgendraśūnyāṃ guhāṃ nirūpya |
labdhāvasaro gṛhītvā mauktikāni gato vyādhaḥ ||)
abhidhitsitarāgaviśeṣaprayogamātraphalaṃ vacanamākṣip‍tikā, yathā—
paapīḍiamahisāsuradehehiṃ bhuaṇabhaaluāvaa/sasilehiṃ |
surasuhadettavaliadhavalacchihiṃ jaaï sahāsaṃ vaaṇu mahalacchihiṃ || 86 ||
(padapīḍitamahiṣāsuradehāyā bhuvanabhayalāvakaśaśilekhāyāḥ |
surasukhadātṛvalitadhavalākṣyā jayati sahāsaṃ vadanaṃ mahālakṣmyāḥ ||)
(14. prekṣyam —6)
prekṣānimittaṃ vācikādyabhinayarahitamāṅgikaikanirvartyaṃ prasthānaḍombalikādivākyaṃ prekṣyam | tatṣọdhā— lāsyaṃ, tāṇḍavaṃ, chalikaṃ, śamyā, hallīsakaṃ, rāsa iti | teṣu śrṛṅgārarasapradhānaṃ lāsyaṃ, yathā—
ucciu vālīyia panthahiṃ jaṃtaü |
pekkhami hatthaṃ hoi jaï loaṇavaṃtaü || 87 ||
(uccā pāliḥ priyaḥ pathā yāti |
prekṣe hasto bhavati yadi locanavān ||)
raudravīrapradhānaṃ tāṇḍavaṃ, yathā—
suavahavaïaru ṇisuṇiu dāruṇu rosavisaṭṭhapahāraruhirāruṇu |
jaliu jāṇaï ṇaru riusaṃtāvaṇu aṇalasariccha jaï hoi mahāraṇu || 88 ||
(sutavadhavyatikaraṃ niśamya dāruṇaṃ roṣavisṛṣṭaprahārarudhirāruṇaḥ |
jvalito jāyate naro ripusaṃtāpano 'nalasadṛśo yadi bhavati mahāraṇaḥ ||)
ubhayātmakaṃ chalikam, yathā—
ṇisuṇiu pacchā tturaaraü bhuṇḍi hiṃsi hasaṃti |
ṇiakaṃtaḍāḍhajualehiṃ puṇu puṇu ṇaaṇa valaṃti || 89 ||
(niśamya paścātturagaravaṃ śūkaryāḥ sahasā iti |
nijakāntadaṃṣṭrāyugale punaḥpunarnayane valataḥ ||)
lāsyameva devakinnaraviṣayaṃ śamyā, yathā—
vīhesi harimuhi avi hohi maṃ gale lehi saï |
kandaï riṭhṭhāsuramāriu kaṇṭhavaliu ṇa paï || 90 ||
{bibheṣi harimukhi api bhava māṃ gale gṛhāṇa svayam |
krandati ariṣṭāsuro māritaḥ kaṇṭhavalito na patiḥtvayā ||}
maṇḍalena hi yat strīṇāṃ gītaṃ/nṛttyaṃ hallīsakaṃ tu tat |
tatra netā bhavedeko gopastrīṇāṃ hariryathā || 91 ||
tad yathā—
caṃdaṇadhūsaraaṃ āulialoaṇaaṃ hāsaparammuhaaṃ ṇīsāsakilāliaṃ |
dummaṇadummaṇaaṃ saṅkāmiamaṇḍaṇaaṃ māṇiṇi āṇaṇaaṃ kiṃ tu karaṭhṭhiaṃ || 92 ||
(candanadhūsarakamākulitalocanaṃ hāsaparāṅmukhaṃ niḥśvāsaklāntam |
durmanasāṃ durmanaskaṃ saṃkrāmitamaṇḍanaṃ mānini! ānanakaṃ kiṃ tava karasthitam ||)
tadeva tālabandhaviśeṣayuktaṃ rāsaḥ, yathā—
aï dummaṇa dummaṇaā ajja kiṇo pucchāmi tumaṃ |
jeṇa jivijjaï jeṇa vilāso palihijjaï kīsa jaṇo || 93 ||
(ayi durmanaḥ durmanaska! adya kiṃ no pṛcchāmi tvām |
yena jīvyate yena vilāsaḥ parihriyate kasmājja ||)
(15. abhineyam —6)
daśarūpakaviṣayameva abhineyam | abhinayastu ṣọdhā—
āṅgikaḥ, vācikaḥ, āhāryaḥ, sāttvikaḥ, sāmānyaḥ, citra iti | tatra āṅgiko yathā—(urā. 2.10)
dordaṇḍāḥ k‍va nu dhṛtāṅgadāḥ k‍va nu śirānaddhau bhujau dvāvimau vaktrāṇi k‍va nu kāntimanti valimat k‍vedaṃ mamaikaṃ mukham |
vācastāḥ k‍va jitārṇavadhvanighanāḥ k‍vāyaṃ vacassaṃyamo helākampitabhūdharaḥ k‍va caraṇanyāsaḥ k‍va mandā gatiḥ || 94 ||
vāciko yathā—(ratnā. 2.1)
durvārāṃ madanaśaravyathāṃ vahantyā tanvaṅgayā yadabhihitaṃ puraḥ sakhīnām |
tad bhūyaḥ śiśuśukaśārikābhiruktaṃ dhanyānāṃ śravaṇapathātithitvameti || 95 ||
āhāryo yathā—
cūḍācumbitakaṅkapatramabhitastūṇīdvayaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ (urāca. 4.20)
sāttviko yathā—(māmā. 1.35)
vāraṃvāraṃ tirayati dṛśorud‍vaman bāṣpapūra— statsaṃkalpopahitajaḍima stambhamabhyeti gātram |
sadyaḥ svidyannayamaviratotkampalolāṅgulīkaḥ pāṇirlekhāvidhiṣu nitarāṃ vartate kiṃ karomi || 96 ||
uktānāṃ caturṇāmapi prayoge sāmānyaḥ, yathā—(māmā. 5.38)
rāhoścandrakalāmivānanacarīṃ daivātsamāsādya me dasyorasya kṛpāṇapātaviṣayādācchindataḥ preyasīm |
ātaṅkādvikalaṃ drutaṃ karuṇayā vikṣobhitaṃ vismayā— tkrodhena jvalitaṃ mudā vikasitaṃ cetaḥ kathaṃ vartate || 97 ||
hastādhyāyapadādhyāyayoḥ akathitāṅgikādyabhinayaviśeṣaścitraḥ, yathā—)
vyatikara iva bhīmastāmaso vaidyutaśca kṣaṇamupahatacakṣurvuttirud‍bhūya śāntaḥ |
kathamiha na vayasyastat kimetat kimanyat prabhavati hi mahimnā svena yogeśvarīyam || 98 || (māmā.9.54,10.8)
(16. adhyeyam —6)
vidhiniṣedhavyutpattiheturadhyeyam | tattu ṣọdhā—
kāvyaṃ, śāstram, itihāsaḥ, kāvyaśāstraṃ, kāvyetihāsaḥ, śāstretihāsa iti | teṣu uktipradhānaṃ kāvyaṃ, yathā—
yadi smarāmi tāṃ tanvīṃ jīvitāśā kuto mama |
atha vismṛtya jīvāmi jīvitavyasanena kim || 99 ||
vidhāyakādiśabdapradhānaṃ śāstraṃ, yathā—(bṛhatsaṃ 70.1)
snigdhonnatāgratanutāmranakhau kumāryāḥ pādau samopacitacārunigūḍhagulphau |
śliṣṭāṅgulī kamalakāntitalau ca yasyā— stāmud‍vahed yadi bhuvo 'dhipatitvamicchet || 100 ||
arthapradhāna itihāsaḥ, yathā—
hiraṇyakaśipurdaityo yāṃ yāṃ smitvā 'pyudaikṣata |
bhayabhrāntaissuraiścakre tasyai tasyai diśe namaḥ || 101 ||
śāstre kāvyaviniveśaḥ kāvyaśāstraṃ, yathā—
nāndīpadāni ratanāṭakavighnaśāntāvājñākṣarāṇi paramāṇyathavā smarasya |
daṣṭe 'dhare praṇayinā vidhutāgrapāṇisītkāraśuṣkaruditāni jayanti nāryāḥ || 102 ||
itihāse kāvyaviniveśaḥ kāvyetihāsaḥ, yathā—(māgha. 1.46)
sa sañcariṣṇurbhuvanāntareṣu yāṃ yadṛcchayāśiśriyadāśrayaḥ śriyaḥ |
akāri tasyai mukuṭopalaskhalatkaraistrisandhyaṃ tridaśairdiśe namaḥ || 103 ||
itihāse śāstrārthaviniveśanaṃ śāstretihāsaḥ, yathā—(mahābhā. 18.5.38)
dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ca bharatarṣabha |
yadihāsti tadanyatra yannehāsti na tat kvacit || 104 ||
(17. vākovākyam —6)
uktipratyuktirvākovākyam | sā ṣọdhā—
ṛjūktiḥ, vakrok‍tiḥ‍, vaiyātyoktiḥ, gụ̄dhoktiḥ, praśnottaroktiḥ, citroktiḥ iti | tāsu
ṛjūktiryathā—(amaru. 57, pṛ. 511)
bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣānmayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ || 105 ||
vakroktiryathā—
keyaṃ mūrdh‍nyandhakāre timiramiha kutaḥ subhru kāntenduyukte kāntāpyatraiva kāminnanu bhavati mayā pṛṣṭhametāvadeva |
nāhaṃ dvandva karomi vyapanaya śirasastūrṇamenāmidānī— mevaṃ prokte bhavānyā prativacanajaḍaḥ pātu vo manmathāriḥ || 106 ||
vaiyātyoktiryathā—
kuśalaṃ rādhe! sukhito 'si kaṃsa! kaṃsaḥ k‍va, sa k‍va, sā rādhā |
iti pālīprativacanairvilakṣahāso harerjayati ||107||
gụ̄dhoktiryathā—
keśava! yamunātīre vyāhṛtavānuṣasi haṃsikāṃ ko 'dya |
kāntāvirahabhayāturahṛdayaḥ prāyaḥ priye 'haṃ saḥ || 108 ||
praś‍nottaroktiryathā—(amaru. 71)
k‍va prasthitāsi karabhoru! ghane niśīthe prāṇeśvaro vasati yatra janaḥ priyo me |
ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle! nanvasti puṅkhitaśaro madanaḥ sahāyaḥ || 109 ||
citroktiryathā—
ko 'yaṃ kāmini! bhūṣaṇaṃ kitava te śoṇaḥ kathaṃ kuṅkumāt skūrpāsāntaritaḥ priye vinimayaṃ paśyāparaṃ k‍vāsti me |
paśyāmītyabhidhāya sāndrapulako mṛd‍na mṛḍānyāḥ stanau hastena pratinirjitenduravatāt dyūte hasan vo haraḥ || 110 ||
(18. praś‍nottaram —6)
vidagdhagoṣṭhīvinodahetuḥ paryanuyoganirbhedaḥ praś‍nottaram | tatṣọdhā— bahiḥpraś‍nam, antaḥpraś‍nam, bahirantaḥpraś‍nam, jātipraś‍nam, pṛṣṭapraś‍nam, uttarapraś‍namiti | teṣu —
bahiḥpraś‍naṃ yathā—(majjanmakaraḥ)
bhadra! māṇavakākhyāhi kīdṛśaḥ khalu te pitā |
velāndolitakallolaḥ kīdṛśaśca mahodadhiḥ || 111 ||
antaḥpraś‍naṃ yathā—
kāhamasmi guhā vakti praś‍ne 'muṣmin kimuttaram |
kathamuktaṃ na jānāsi kadarthayasi yatsakhe || 112 ||1
1. kathamuktaṃ 'ka+tha'—varṇābhyāṃ 'kadarthayasī'—ti kriyāpade vidyamānābhyāṃ muktaṃ tābhyāṃ hīnaṃ 'daryasi' iti yat tadevātrottaram |
bahirantaḥpraś‍naṃ yathā—
subhadrāṃ ka upāyaṃsta praś‍ne 'muṣmin ya uttaraḥ | ('nara' iti)
sa kīdṛkkapimācaṣṭe vyomni parṇasthitiḥ kutaḥ1 || ('vā'—para iti)
jātipraś‍naṃ yathā—(haimavāra—karañjinā)
kīdṛśā bhūmibhāgena rājā snāto 'numīyate |
prāṅgaṇaṃ kurutetyuktāḥ kimāhustadanicchavaḥ || 114 ||
seyaṃ gatapratyāgatajāti |
pṛṣṭapraś‍naṃ yathā— (saka. pṛ.303—4)
ko so joaṇavāo ko daṃḍāṇaṃ duve sahassāiṃ |
(kassa yojanapādaḥ ko daṇḍānāṃ dve sahastre |)
kā kālī kā madhurā kiṃ śukapṛthukānanacchāyam || 115 ||
uttarapraś‍naṃ yathā—
kiṃ vasantasamaye vanabhakṣaḥ pṛṣṭavān sapṛthulomavilekhaḥ |
uttaraṃ ca kimavāpaturetau kānanādatimirādapi kālam (lī) || 116 ||
(19. prahelikā —6)
praś‍na evānuttara prahelikā | sā ṣọdhā—
cyutākṣarā, dattākṣarā, cyutadattākṣarā, akṣaramuṣṭiḥ, bindumatī, arthaprahelikā ca | tāsu cyutākṣarā yathā— (vihaṅgikā hāreṇa)
payodharabharākrāntā saṃnamantī pade pade |
padamekaṃ na kā yāti yadi hāreṇa varjitā || 117 ||
dattākṣarā yathā—(śambaraḥ)
prarūḍhayauvanaḥ ko 'yaṃ kāntayānugataḥ sukhī |
vane prayāti niśśaṅkaṃ śabaraḥ sattvasaṃkule || 118 ||
cyutadattākṣarā yathā—
vidagdhaḥ saraso rāgī nitambopari saṃsthitaḥ |
tanvaṅgyāliṅgitaḥ kaṇṭhe kalaṃ kūjati ko viṭaḥ || 119 || (ghaṭaḥ)
1. vyom‍ni parṇasthitirvāyuto bhavati | sa narayuktaḥ 'vānara'—rūpaḥ kapimācaṣṭe |
ślokāderakṣaravyatyāsena kathanamakṣaramuṣṭiḥ | yathā—
atiḥ atiḥ anma alaṃ prīdya radya jadya phadya | melāmelā melaṃ melaṃ phasaphasaphasaphasaḥ || 120 ||
adya me saphalā prītiradya me saphalā ratiḥ |
adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me saphalaṃ phalam || 121 ||
yathāsthitasvarānusvāravisargasaṃyogasyoktārthasya ca ślokādeḥ kādivarṇasthāne binduviniveśo bindumatī | tadyathā—
tavāpavādaḥ pratyabdhi patākā pratisaṅgaram |
phalaṃ pratyadbha‍utopāyaṃ yaśāṃsi na tu na k‍vacit || 122 ||
atrārthe, {/?/ /?/}
nirbhedaḥ —
ṭhuṭhaṭhā ṭhuṭhaṭhā ṭhāṭhā ṭhuṃṭhuṭhe ṭhuṃṭhaṭhe ṭhaṭhā |
ṭhāṭhaṭhe ṭhāṭhaṭhe ṭhiṃṭhiṃ ṭhaṃṭhaṃṭhiṭhaṭhiṭhīṭhaṭhaḥ ||123||
udadhāvudadhāvājñā saṃyuge saṃyuge jayaḥ |
sāhase sāhase siddhiḥ sarvatra tava kīrttayaḥ || 124 ||
arthaprahelikā yathā—(pak‍vamāmraphalam) (saka. 2.358—365)
uttap‍takāñcanacchāyaṃ saṃdaṣṭadaśanacchadam |
sarasaṃ cumbyate hṛṣṭairvṛddhairapi kimujjvalam || 125 ||
(20. gūḍham —6)
gup‍takriyāpadādiprayogo gūḍham | tatṣọdhā—
kriyāgūḍhaṃ, kārakagūḍhaṃ, saṃbandhagūḍhaṃ, vastugūḍhaṃ, pādagūḍham, abhiprāyagūḍhaṃ ceti | teṣu kriyāgūḍhaṃ yathā—(na stha)
stanajaghanabharābhirāmamandaṃ gamanamidaṃ madirāruṇekṣaṇāyāḥ |
kathamiva sahasā vilokayanto madanaśarajvarajarjarā yuvānaḥ || 126 ||
kārakagūḍhaṃ yathā—
pibataste śarāveṇa vāri kahlāraśītalam |
kenemau durvidagdhena hṛdaye viniveśitau || 127 || (śarau)
sambandhagūḍhaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 3.108)
na mayāgorasābhijñaṃ cetaḥ kasmāt prakupyasi |
asthānaruditairebhiralamālohitekṣaṇe || 128 ||
vastugūḍhaṃ yathā—(dāsī asi)
pānīyaṃ pātumicchāmi śyāme kamalalocane |
yadi dāsyasi necchāmi na dāsyasi pibāmyaham || 129 ||
pādagūḍhaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 15.43)
dyuviyad‍gāminī tārasaṃrāvavihataśrutiḥ |
haimīṣumālā śuśubhe 'vidyutāmiva saṃhatiḥ' || 130 ||
abhiprāyagūḍhaṃ yathā—
jaï devareṇa bhaṇiā khaggaṃ ghettūṇa rāulaṃ vacca |
tā kiṃ sevaavahue hasiūṇa valoiaṃ asaṇaṃ || 131 ||
(yadi devareṇa bhaṇitā khaṅgaṃ gṛhītvā rājakulaṃ vraja |
tatkiṃ sevakavadhvā hasitvāvalokitaṃ śayanam ||) (saka. 2.366–370)
nirīkṣitamaneneha puruṣāyitalakṣma ca |
pādalākṣādikaṃ tena niyuṅkte māṃ na karmaṇi || 132 || iti |
(21. citram —6)
svarasthānavarṇagatibandhākāraniyamaścitram | tat ṣọdhā svarādiniyamabhedāt | teṣu— catussvaraṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 3.84)
āmnāyānāmāhāntyā vāggītīrītīḥ prītībhītīḥ |
bhogo rogo moho modo dhyeye vecchet kṣeme deśe || 133 ||
tristhānaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 3.89)
alinīlālakalataṃ kaṃ na hanti ghanastani! |
ānanaṃ nalinacchāyanayanaṃ śaśikānti te || 134 ||
dvivarṇaṃ yathā—(māgha. 19.66)
bhūribhirbhāribhirbhīrairbhūbhārairabhirebhire |
bherīrebhibhirabhrābhairabhīrubhiribhairibhāḥ || 135 ||
gaticitraṃ yathā—(māgha. 19.44) gatapratyāgatārtha(rdha)m
vāraṇāgagabhīrā sā sārābhīgagaṇāravā |
kāritārivadhā senā nāsedhāvaritārikā || 136 ||
bandhacitraṃ yathā—(māgha. 19.29) murajabandhaḥ
sā senā gamanārambhe rasenāsīdanāratā |
tāranādajanā mattadhīranāgamanāmayā || 137 ||
yāśritā pāvanatayā yātanācchidanīcayā |
yācanīyā dhiyā māyāyāmāyāsaṃ stutā śriyā || 138 || (deśa. 4) padmam
(22. śleṣaḥ —6)
dvayostantreṇābhidhānaṃ śleṣaḥ | sa ṣọdhā—
prakṛtiśleṣaḥ, pratyayaśleṣaḥ, vibhaktiśleṣaḥ, vacanaśleṣaḥ, padaśleṣaḥ, bhāṣāśleṣaḥ iti | teṣu —
prakṛtiśleṣo yathā—
tvameva dhātuḥ pūrvo 'si tvameva pratyayaḥ paraḥ |
anākhyātaṃ na te kiñcidatastvaṃ nopamīyase || 139 ||
pratyayaśleṣo yathā—
tasyā vināpi hāreṇa nisargādeva hāriṇau |
janayāmāsatuḥ kasya vismayaṃ na payodharau || 140 ||
vibhaktiśleṣo yathā—
viṣaṃ nijagale yena babhre ca bhujagaprabhuḥ |
dehe yonāṅgajo dadhre jāyā ca sa jayatyajaḥ || 141 ||
vacanaśleṣo yathā—
tanutvaramaṇīyasya madhyasya ca bhujasya ca |
abhavannitarāṃ tasyā valayaḥ kāntivṛddhaye || 142 ||
padaśleṣo yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.29)
arimedaḥ palāśaśca bāhuḥ kalpadrumaśca te |
bālevodyānamāleyaṃ sālakānanaśobhinī || 143 ||
bhāṣāśleṣo yathā—(rudraṭā. 4.15)
dhīrāgacchadume hatamududdharavārisadassu |
abhramadapprasarābharaṇuravikiraṇā tejassu || 144 ||
(23. yamakam—6)
bhinnārthekarūpā ca varṇasaṅghātāvṛrttiryamakam | tat ṣọdhā—
sthānayamakam, asthānayamakaṃ, vyapetam, avyapetaṃ, samudrakaḥ, pādayamakamiti | tatra pādānāmādimadhyāntāḥ sthānam | teṣu —
śabdasaṅghātāvṛtti sthānayamakaṃ, yathā—(kāvyāda. 3.34)
sālaṃ sālambakalikāsālaṃsālaṃ na vīkṣitum |
nālīnālīnavakulānālī nālīkinīrapi || 145 ||
asthānayamakaṃ yathā—(rudraṭā. 3.57)
kamalinīmalinī dayitaṃ vinā na sahate saha tena niṣevitām |
tamadhunā madhunā nihitaṃ hṛdi smarati sā ratisāramaharniśam || 146 ||
vyavahitaṃ vyapetayamakaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 3.29)
kamaleḥ samakeśaṃ te kamalerṣyākaraṃ mukham |
kamalekhyaṃ karoṣi tvaṃ kamalevonmadiṣṇuṣu || 147 ||
avyavahitamavyapetayamakaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 3.18)
ramaṇī ramaṇīyā me pāṭalāpāṭalāṃśukā |
vāruṇīvāruṇībhūtasaurabhāḥ saurabhāspadam || 148 ||
samudrako yathā—(pṛ॰dra. 362)
kāntāratarutalāsitamṛgayuvaracitāntarā harati vanāntā || 149 ||
pādayamakaṃ yathā—
kamalamaliramuñcadutpalakalikātaralolamutpalāśakānte |
kānte sma cakṣuralikulakalikātaralolamutpalaśakānte || 150 ||
(24. anuprāsaḥ —6)
varṇānāmanatidūrāntaramāvṛttiranuprāsaḥ | sa ṣọdhā— varṇānuprāsaḥ, sthānānuprāsaḥ, padānuprāsaḥ, nāmānuprāsaḥ, pādānuprāsaḥ, vyavahitānuprāsa iti | tatra—
varṇānuprāso yathā—
śiñjānamañjumañjīrakāñcīsañcāracāravaḥ |
ramayanti manaḥ kāntā nitāntaṃ yogināmapi || 151 ||
sthānānuprāso yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.53)
eṣa rājā yadā lakṣmīṃ prāp‍tavān brāhmaṇapriyaḥ |
tadāprabhṛti dharmasya loke 'sminnutsavo 'bhavat || 152 ||
padānuprāso yathā—
amṛtamamṛtaṃ candraścandrastathāmbujamambujaṃ ratirapi ratiḥ kāmaḥ kāmo madhūni madhūnyapi |
iti na bhajate vastu prāyaḥ parasparasaṃkaraṃ tadiyamabalā dhatte lakṣmīṃ kathaṃ sakalātmikām || 153 ||
nāmānuprāso yathā—
kṛtvā kṛtvā kalakalaṃ mārutena calācalaḥ |
mātargulugulāyante gajā iva ghanāghanāḥ || 154 ||
pādānuprāso yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.3)
rāgadveṣau yadi syātāṃ tapasā kiṃ prayojanam |
tāveva yadi na syātāṃ tapasā kiṃ prayojanam || 155 ||
vyavahitānuprāso yathā—
prakāśo yaśasā devaḥ prakāśo mahasā raviḥ |
dussaho dviṣatāṃ svāmī dussahastamasāṃ sa ca || 156 ||
caturviṃśatirityuktāḥ śabdālaṅkārajātayaḥ |
jātyādibhedataḥ padye gadye 'pyāsāmayaṃ kramaḥ || 157 ||
iha śiṣṭānuśiṣṭānāṃ śiṣṭānāmapi sarvathā |
vācāmeva prasādena lokayātrā pravartate || 158 ||(kāvyāda. 1.3,4)
idamandhaṃ tamaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jāyeta bhuvanatrayam |
yadi śabdāhvayaṃ jyotirāsaṃsārānna dīpyate || 159 ||
gatayastasya yāstistro drutamadhyavilambitāḥ |
layān padagateḥ prāhustān gīte gītavedinaḥ || 160 ||
rītayo vāṅ‌mayaprāṇā hṛdayaṃ tasya vṛttayaḥ |
racanāditrayaṃ mūrtiranuprāsastu jīvitam || 161 ||
uktayo daivataṃ chāyāmudrābhaṇitayo vṛtiḥ |
paṭhitiḥ śravyatā prekṣābhinayo 'dhyayanaṃ dhṛtiḥ || 162 ||
śleṣaḥ puṣṇāti sarvāsu prāyo vakroktiṣu śriyam |
vākovāk‍yena hṛṣyanti manāṃsi kṛṣatāmapi || 163 || (kāvyāda. 2.362)
vinayena vinā kā śrī. kā niśā śaśinā vinā |
vinā yamakacitrābhyāṃ kīdṛśīva vidagdhatā || 164 || (kāvyālaṅkāra 1.4)
gūḍhaṃ gūḍhacaturthādi vādināṃ darpaśāntaye |
praś‍nottaraṃ tu nāmnāpi vidagdhamukhamaṇḍanam || 165 ||
krīḍāgoṣṭhīvinodeṣu tajjñairākīrṇamantraṇe |
paravyāmohane cāpi sopayogāḥ prahelikāḥ || 166 ||(kāvyāda. 3.97)
yathāmati yathāyukti yathaucityaṃ yathāruci |
kaveḥ pātrasya caitāsāṃ prayoga upapadyate || 167 ||
yādṛg gadyavidhau bāṇaḥ padyabandhe na tādṛśaḥ |
pratimārgamiyaṃ devī vicitrā hi sarasvatī || 168 ||
saṃskṛtenaiva ko 'pyarthaḥ prākṛtenaiva cāparaḥ |
śak‍yo racayituṃ kaścidapabhraṃśena jāyate || 169 || (kāvyamīmāṃsā)
paiśācyā śaurasenyānyo māgadhyānyo nibadhyate |
dvitrābhiḥ ko 'pi bhāṣābhiḥ sarvābhirapi kaścana || 170 ||
kaścid gadyena padyena kaścinmiśreṇa śak‍yate |
nibaddha‍uṃ kaścana dvābhyāṃ kaścittu pathibhistribhiḥ || 171 ||
saṃskṛtenaiva ke 'pyāhuḥ prākṛtenaiva kecana |
sādhāraṇyādibhiḥ kecit kecana mlecchabhāṣayā || 172 ||
na mlecchitavyaṃ yajñādau strīṣu nāprākṛtaṃ vadet |
saṅkīrṇaṃ nābhijāteṣu nāprabuddheṣu saṃskṛtam || 173 ||
vadanti saṃskṛtaṃ devā prākṛtaṃ kinnarādayaḥ |
paiśācādyaṃ piśācādyā māgadhaṃ hīnajātayaḥ || 174 ||
ke 'bhūvannạ̄dhyarājasya rājye prākṛtabhāṣiṇaḥ |
kāle śrīsāhasāṅkasya ke na saṃskṛtavedinaḥ || 175 ||
nātyantaṃ saṃskṛtenaiva nātyantaṃ deśabhāṣayā |
kathā goṣṭhīṣu kathayan loke bahumato bhavet || 176 ||
śṛṇvanti laṭahaṃ lāṭāḥ prākṛtaṃ saṃskṛtadviṣaḥ |
apabhraṃśena tuṣyanti svena nānyena ghūrjarāḥ || 177 ||(kāvyamīmāṃsā)
brahman vijñāpayāmi tvāṃ svādhikārajihāsayā |
gauḍastyajatu vā gāthāmanyā vāstu sarasvatī || 178 ||
dvidhā prayuktena ca vāṅ‌mayena sarasvatī tanmithunaṃ nunāva |
saṃskārapūtena varaṃ vareṇyā vadhūṃ sukhagrāhyanibandhanena || (kusaṃ. 7.90)
etad grāhyaṃ surabhi kusumaṃ grāhyametanna dheyaṃ dhatte śobhāṃ viracitamidaṃ sthānamevaitadasya |
mālākāro racayati yathā sādhu vijñāya mālāṃ yojyaṃ kāvyeṣvavahitadhiyā tad‌vadevābhidhānam || 180 || (bhāmahā. 1.59)
giraḥ śravyā divyāḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ prākṛtadhurāḥ subhavyo 'pabhraṃśaḥ sarasaracanaṃ bhūtavacanam |
vidagdhānāmiṣṭe magadhamathurāvāsibhaṇitī nibandhā yasteṣāṃ sa khalu kavirājo vijayate || 181 || (bārā. 1.11)
(2. arthālaṅkārāḥ —24)
arthameva ye vyutpattyādinā bhūṣayanti te 'rthālaṅkārāścaturviṃśatiḥ | tadyathā—
jātiḥ sūkṣmaḥ, sāraḥ, samāhitaṃ, bhāvaḥ, vibhāvanā, hetuḥ, ahetuḥ, sambhavaḥ, virodhaḥ, dṛṣṭāntaḥ, vyatirekaḥ, anyonyaṃ, parivṛttiḥ, mīlitaṃ, vitarkaḥ, smaraṇaṃ, bhrāntiḥ, upamānam, anumānam, arthāpattiḥ, abhāvaḥ, āgamaḥ, pratyakṣamiti | tatra—
(1. jātiḥ)
nānāvasthāni jāyante yāni rūpāṇi vastunaḥ |
svebhyaḥ svebhyo nisargebhyastāni jātiṃ pracakṣate || 182 || (kāvyāda. 2.8)
arthavyakteriyaṃ bhedamiyatā pratipadyate |
jāyamānamiyaṃ vakti rūpaṃ sā sārvakālikam || 183 ||
svarūpamāśrayo heturiti tadbhedahetavaḥ |
te saṃsthānādayasteṣu sā viśeṣeṇa śobhate || 184 || (sa. ka. 3)
tatra — saṃsthānam, avasthānaṃ, veṣo, vyāpāra ityādayaḥ svarūpaṃ, mugdhāṅganāḥ, śiśavaḥ, tiryañca, hīnapātrāṇītyādaya āśrayaḥ, deśaḥ, kālaḥ, śaktiḥ, sādhanamityādayo hetuḥ (saka.3.7)| teṣu —
saṃsthānaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.70)
sa dakṣiṇāpāṅganiviṣṭamuṣṭiṃ natāṃsamākuñcitasavyapādam |
dadarśaṃ cakrīkṛtacārucāpaṃ prahartumabhyudyatamātmayonim || 185 ||
avasthānaṃ yathā—(saka. 3.8.2)
pādāvaṣṭambhanamrīkṛtamahiṣatanorullasad‌bāhumūlaṃ śūlaṃ prollāsayantyāḥ sulalitavapuṣo madhyabhāgasya caṇḍyāḥ |
