viśliṣṭaspaṣṭadṛṣṭonnataviralavalivyaktagaurāntarālā— stistro vaḥ pāntu lekhāḥ kramavaśavikasatkañcukaprāntamuktāḥ || 186 ||
veṣo yathā—(gāsa. 826 ve.)
ṣaṇapiṭṭhadhūsaratthaṇi mahuataṃbacchi kuvalaāhareṇa |
kaṇṇakaacūamaṃjari putti tue maṃḍio gāmo || 187 ||
(kṣaṇapiṣṭadhūsarastani! madhumadatāmrākṣi! kuvalayābharaṇe! |
karṇakṛtacūtamañjari! putri! tvayā maṇḍito grāmaḥ ||)
vyāpāro yathā—(māgha. 5.15)
agre gatena vasatiṃ parigṛhya ramyā— māpātya sainikanirākaraṇākulena |
yānto 'nyataḥ plutakṛtasvaramāśu dūrā— dud‌vāhunā juhuvire muhurātmavargyāḥ || 188 ||
mugdhāṅganā yathā—(gāsa. 2.45)
sahiāhiṃ bhaṇṇamāṇā thaṇae laggaṃ kusuṃbhapupphaṃ ti |
muddhavahuā hasijjaī papphoḍaṃtī ṇahavaāhaṃ || 189 ||
(sakhībhirbhaṇyamānā stane lag‍naṃ kusumbhapuṣpamiti |
mugdhavadhūrhasyate prasphoṭayantī nakhapadāni ||)
śiśuryathā—(bhāmahā. 2.94)
ākrośannāhvayannanādhāvan maṇḍalaṃ rudan |
gāḥ kālayati daṇḍena ḍimbhaḥ sasyāvatāriṇīḥ || 190 ||
tiryag yathā—(saka. 3.8.7)
liḍhavyastavipāṇḍurāgranakhayorākarṇadīrṇaṃ mukhaṃ vinyasyāgrimayoryuge caraṇayoḥ sadyo vibhinnadvipaḥ |
etasmin madagandhavāsitasaṭaḥ sāvajñatiryagvala— tsṛkkāntāhatidhūtalolamadhupaḥ kuñjeṣu śete hariḥ || 191 ||
hīnapātraṃ yathā—(saka. 3.8.8)
bhadraṃ te sadṛśaṃ yadadhvagaśataiḥ kīrtistavod‌gīyate sthāne rūpamanuttamaṃ sukṛtinā dānena karṇo jitaḥ |
ityālocya ciraṃ dṛśā karuṇayā śītātureṇa stutaḥ pānthenaikapalālamuṣṭirucinā garvāyate hālikaḥ || 192 ||
deśo yathā—(saka. 3.8.9)
imāstā vindhyādreḥ śukaharitavaṃśīvanaghanā bhuvaḥ krīḍāloladviradaradanārugṇataravaḥ |
latākuñje yāsāmupanadi ratiklāntaśabarī— kapolasvedāmbhaḥ—paricayanudo vānti marutaḥ || 193 ||
kālo yathā—(saka. 3.8.10)
kampante kapayo bhṛśaṃ jaḍakṛśaṃ go 'jāvikaṃ glāyati śvā cullīkuharodaraṃ kṣaṇamapi kṣip‍to 'pi naivojjhati |
śītārtivyasanāturaḥ punarayaṃ dīno janaḥ kūrmavat svānyaṅgāni śarīra eva hi nije nihnotumākāṅkṣati || 194 ||
śaktiryathā—(kāvyāda. 2.11, saka. 3.8.11)
bandhannaṅgeṣu romāñcaṃ kurvan manasi nirvṛtim |
netre nimīlayanneṣa priyāsparśaḥ pravartate || 195 ||
sādhanaṃ yathā—(saka. 3.8.12)
upanihitahalīṣāsārgaladvāramārāt paricakitapurandhrīsāritābhyarṇabhāṇḍam |
pavanarayatiścīrvāridhārāḥ pratīcchan viśativalitaśrṛṅgaḥ pāmarāgāramukṣā ||
(2. sūkṣmaḥ)
iṅgitākāralakṣyo 'rthaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sūkṣmaguṇāttu saḥ |
sūkṣmāt pratyakṣataḥ sūkṣmo 'pratyakṣa iti bhidyate || 197 ||
sa dvidhā— abhidhīyamānaḥ pratīyamānaśca | tatra —
abhidhīyamāna iṅgitalakṣyo yathā—(raghu. 6.12)
tāṃ pratyabhivyaktamanorathānāṃ mahīpatīnāṃ praṇayāgradūtyaḥ |
pravālaśobhā iva pādāpānāṃ śrṛṅgāraceṣṭā vividhā babhūvuḥ || 198 ||
sa eva ākāralakṣyo yathā—(raghu. 6.81)
sā yūni tasminnabhilāṣabandhaṃ śaśāka śālīnatayā na vak‍tum |
romāñcalakṣyeṇa sa gātrayaṣṭiṃ bhittvā nirākrāmadarālakeś‍yāḥ || 199 ||
sa eva ubhayalakṣyo yathā—(saka. 3.50)
tvadarpitadṛśastasyā gītagoṣṭhyāmavardhata |
uddāmarāgapiśunā chāyā kāpi mukhāmbuje || 200 ||
pratīyamāna iṅgitalakṣyo yathā—(gāsa. 5.16)
vāhittā paḍivaaṇaṃ ṇa dei rūsei ekkamekkassa |
asaī kajjeṇa viṇā païppamāṇe ṇaīkacche || 201 ||
(vyāhṛtā prativacanaṃ na dadāti ruṣyatyekaikasmin |
asatī kāryeṇa vinā pradīpyamāne nadīkacche ||)
sa eva ākāralakṣyo yathā—(gāsa. 2.80)
sāmaï sāmalīe addhacchipaloarīa muhasohā |
jaṃbūdalakaakaṇṇāvaaṃsabhamire haliaütte || 202 ||
{ś‍yāmāyāḥ ś‍yāmalatayā lāyate ardhākṣipralokanaśīlāyā mukhaśobhā |
jambūdalakṛtakarṇāvataṃsabhramaṇaśīle/karṇāvataṃsabhṛte hālikaputre ||}
sa eva ubhayalakṣyo yathā—(kirātā. 7.14)
prayacchatoccaiḥ kusumāni māninī vipakṣagotraṃ dayitena lambhitā |
na kiṃcidūce caraṇena kevalaṃ lilekha bāṣpākulalocanā bhuvam || 203 ||
(3. sāraḥ)
phalgunirāsena aphalgunirdhāraṇaṃ sāraḥ |
sa dvidhā— dharmarūpo dharmirūpaśca | tayoḥ —
dharmarūpo yathā—
dānaṃ vittādṛtaṃ vācaḥ || 204 || (pṛ.dra. 366)
yathā vā—(saka. 3.56)
poḍhamahilāṇa jaṃ jaṃ susikkhiaṃ taṃ rae suhāvei |
jaṃ jaṃ asikkhiaṃ ṇavavahūṇa taṃtaṃ raïṃ dei || 205 ||
(prauḍhamahilānāṃ yadyatsuśikṣitaṃ tad rate sukhayati |
yadyadaśikṣitaṃ navavadhūnāṃ tattad ratiṃ dadāti ||)
dharmirūpo yathā—(rudraṭa. 7.97)
rājye sāraṃ vasudhā vasudhāyāṃ pattanaṃ pure saudham |
saudhe talpaṃ talpe varāṅganā 'naṅgasarvasvam || 206 ||
yathā vā—
madhu ca vikasitotpalāvataṃsaṃ śaśikarapallavitaṃ ca harmyapṛṣṭham |
madanajanitavibhramā ca kāntā sukhamidamarthavatāṃ vibhūtayo 'nyāḥ || 207 ||
(4. samāhitam)
kāryārambhe sahakārikāraṇāvāp‍tiḥ samāhitam | sā dvidhā—
ākasmikī, buddhipūrvikā ca | tayoḥ —
ākasmikī yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.299)
mānamasyā nirākartuṃ pādayorme patiṣyataḥ |
upakārāya diṣṭyedamudīrṇaṃ ghanagarjitam || 208 ||
yathā vā—(kirātā. 2.54)
anuśāsatimityanākulaṃ nayavartmākulamarjunāgrajam |
svayamartha ivābhivāñchitastamabhīyāya parāśarātmajaḥ || 209 ||
buddhipūrvikā yathā—
kalpānte śamitatrivikramamahākaṅkālabaddhasphura— ccheṣa-syūta-nṛsiṃha-vakra-nakhara-protādikolāmiṣaḥ |
viśvaikārṇavatāviśeṣamuditau tau matsyakūrmāvubhau karṣan dhīvaratāṃ gataḥ syatu jaganmohaṃ mahābhairavaḥ || 210 ||
yathā vā—(saka. 3.105)
mūle pañca tataścatuṣṭayamiti straksaṃniveśaiḥ śiraḥ— puṣpairanyatamāvalokanamitairucchoṇitairarcite |
hastasparśavaśena mūrdh‍ni daśamaṃ mūrdhānamāropayan śambhoradbha‍utasāhasaikarasikaḥ kairna stuto rāvaṇaḥ || 211 ||
(5. bhāvaḥ)
abhiprāyānukulaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣo bhāvaḥ | sa dvidhā— sodbhedo nirudbhedaśca | tayoḥ sodbhedo yathā—(gāsa. 2.30)
sāloe c‍cia sūre ghariṇī gharasāmiassa ghettūṇa |
ṇecchaṃtassa vi pāe dhuaï hasaṃtī hasaṃtassa || 212 ||
(sāloka eva sūrye gṛhiṇī gṛhasvāmino gṛhītvā |
anicchato 'pi pādau dhāvati hasantī hasataḥ ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 2.100)
bhadda/geṇaha puloeha imaṃ viasiavaaṇā piassa oppei |
ghariṇī suapaḍhamubbhiṇṇadaṃtajualaṃkiaṃ boram || 213 ||
(bhadra pralokayemaṃ vikasitanayanā priyāyārpayati |
gṛhiṇī sutaprathamodbhinnadantayugalāṅkitaṃ badaram ||)
nirudbhedo yathā—(gāsa. 2.7)
golā—aḍa—ṭhṭhiaṃ pecchiūṇa gahavaï—suaṃ haliasoṇhā |
āḍhattā uttariuṃ dukkhuttārāe paavīe || 214 ||
(godātaṭasthitaṃ prekṣya gṛhapatisutaṃ hālikasnuṣā |
ārabdhā uttarituṃ duḥkhottārayā padavyā ||)
yathā vā—(saka. 3.140)
sālivaṇagoviāe uḍḍīyaṃ/vaṃtīa pūsaviṃdāiṃ |
savvaṃgasuṃdarīeṃ vi pahiā achīha pecchaṃti || 215 ||
(śālivanagopikāyā uḍḍāyayantyāḥ śukabṛndāni |
sarvāṅgasundaryā api pathikā akṣiṇī eva prekṣante ||)
hṛdyaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca bhāva eva | tayorhṛdyaṃ yathā— (gāsa. 916 ve.)
hiae rosuggiṇṇaṃ pāappaharaṃ sireṇa patthaṃto |
ṇa hao daïo māṇāṃsiṇīe thorassuaṃ ruṇṇaṃ || 216 ||
(hṛdaye roṣodgīrṇaṃ pādaprahāraṃ śirasā prārthitavān |
na hato dayito manasvinyā sthūlāśrukaṃ ruditam ||)
sūkṣmo yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.261)
kadā nau saṃgamo bhāvītyākīrṇe vak‍tumakṣamam |
avetya kāntamabalā līlāpadmaṃ nyamīlayat || 217 ||
(6. vibhāvanā)
prasiddhahetutyāgena hetvantaravibhānam |
yatra svābhāvikatvaṃ vā vibhāvyaṃ sā vibhāvanā || 218 ||
tayorādyā yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.31)
asambhṛtaṃ maṇḍanamaṅgyaṣṭeranāsavākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ madasya |
kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyāt paraṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede || 219 ||
yathā vā—(kāvyāda. 2.200)
apītakṣībakādambamasaṃmṛṣṭāmalāmbaram |
aprasāditasūkṣmāmbu jagadāsīnmanoharam || 220 ||
dvitīyā yathā—
ṇamaha avaṭṭhiatuṅgaṃ || 221 || (seba. 1.1) (dra॰ 3.60;7.201)
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 1.10)
vanecarāṇāṃ vanitāsakhānāṃ darīgṛhotsaṅganiṣaktabhāsaḥ |
bhavanti yatrauṣadhayo rajanyāmatailapūrāḥ suratapradīpāḥ || 222 ||
(7. hetuḥ)
pravṛttinivṛttyornibandhanaṃ hetuḥ | sa ṣọdhā—
pravartakaḥ, nivartakaḥ, prayojakaḥ, jñāpakaḥ, abhāvahetuścitrahetuśca | tatra —
pravartako yathā—
jitendriyatvaṃ vinayasya kāraṇaṃ guṇaprakarṣo vinayādavāpyate |
guṇādhike puṃsi jano 'nurajyate janānurāgaprabhāvāśca sampadaḥ || 223 ||
nivartako yathā—(śāku. 6.22)
prajāgarāt khilībhūtastasyāḥ svap‍ne samāgamaḥ |
bāṣpastu na dadātyenāṃ draṣṭuṃ citragatāmapi || 224 ||
prayojako yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.143)
mānayogyāṃ karomīti priyasthāne sthitāṃ sakhīm |
bālā bhrūbhaṅgajihmākṣī paś‍yati sphuritādharā || 225 ||
jñāpako yathā—(saka. 3.153)
gajjaṃte khe mehā phullā ṇīvā paṇac‍ciā morā |
ṇaṭhṭho caṃdujjoo vāsāratto halā patto || 226 ||
(garjanti khe meghāḥ, phullā nīpāḥ, praṇartitā mayūrāḥ |
naṣṭaścandroddyoto varṣartuḥ sakhi prāp‍taḥ ||)
abhāvaheturyathā—(kāvyāda. 2.247)
anabhyāsena vidyānāmasaṃsargeṇa dhīmatām |
anigraheṇa cākṣāṇāṃ jāyate vyasanaṃ nṛṇām || 227 ||
citraheturyathā—(amaru.34)
sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ, sā strī vayaṃ kātarāḥ, sā pīnonnatimatyayodharabharaṃ dhatte sakhedā vayam |
sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ, doṣairanyajanāśrayairapaṭavo jātāḥ sma ityadbhutam || 228 ||
(8. ahetuḥ)
satyapi sāmarthye 'nutpāditasvakāryo vyāhataśca heturahetuḥ | tayoḥ—
anutpāditasvakāryo yathā—
na viracitā lalāṭataṭalāsyakarī bhrukuṭi— rna paruṣahuṅkṛtena madhurasmitamantaritam |
na tava niśumbhasambhramavaśādapi dāruṇayā bhagavati ceṣṭayā kaluṣitaṃ vadanāmburuham || 229 || (saka.3.43)
yathā vā—(dhva. 1.13,14)
anurāgavatī sandhyā divasastatpurassaraḥ |
aho daivagatiścitrā tathāpi na samāgamaḥ || 230 ||
vyāhato yathā—(megha. 69)
nīvībandhocchvasitaśithilaṃ yatra yakṣāṅganānāṃ kṣaumaṃ rāgādanibhṛtakareṣvākṣipatsu priyeṣu |
arcistuṅgānabhimukhamapi prāpya rat‍napradīpān hrīmụ̄dhānāṃ bhavati viphalapreraṇā cūrṇamuṣṭiḥ || 231 ||
yathā vā—(saka. 3.46)
śambhoruddhanṛttakarmaṇi kare kaṅkālamādyaṃ hareḥ saṃghaṭṭasphuṭitendumaṇḍalagalatpīyūṣasañjīvitam |
tatkālapraṇate muradviṣi nave dṛṣṭvā vilāsaṃ śriyaḥ kurvatkopakaṣāyitena manasā mithyotplutīḥ pātu vaḥ || 232 ||
(9. sambhavaḥ)
prabalakāraṇakalāpadarśanādidamevaṃ bhavediti jñānaṃ sambhavaḥ |
sa caturdhā— vidhirūpo, niṣedharūpa ubhayarūpo 'nubhayarūpaśca | teṣu —
vidhirūpo yathā— (megha.46)
tvayyādātuṃ jalamavanate śārṅgiṇo varṇacaure tasyāḥ sindhoḥ pṛthumapi tanuṃ dūrabhāvāt pravāham |
prekṣiṣyante gaganagatayo nūnamāvarjya dṛṣṭī— rekaṃ muktāguṇamiva bhuvaḥ sthūlamadhyendranīlam || 233 ||
niṣedharūpo yathā—(kirātā. 16.23)
parasya bhūyān vivare 'bhiyogaḥ prasahya saṃrakṣaṇamātmarandhre |
bhīṣme 'pyasambhāvyamidaṃ gurau vā na sambhavatyeva vanecareṣu || 234 ||
ubhayarūpo yathā—(megha. 22)
utpaś‍yāmi drutamapi sakhe ! matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabho parvate parvate te |
śuklāpāṅgaiḥ sajalanayanaiḥ svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ pratyudyātaḥ kathamapi bhavān gantumāśu vyavasyet || 235 ||
anubhayarūpo yathā—(megha.51)
tasyāḥ pātuṃ suragaja iva vyom‍ni paścārdhalambī tvaṃ cedacchasphaṭikaviśadaṃ tarkayostiryagambhaḥ |
saṃsarpantyā sapadi bhavataḥ strotasi cchāyayā sā syādasthānopagatayamunāsaṅgamenābhirāmā || 236 ||
(10. virodhaḥ)
padārthānāṃ parasparāsaṅgatirvirodhaḥ | yathā— (saka. 3.60)
k‍va yuvatimārdavaṃ k‍va ca mahāhavadāruṇatā k‍va ca valayī karaḥ k‍va karidantajamuṣṭirasiḥ |
k‍va ca navayauvanaṃ kva kusumāyudhanisspṛhatā tava lalanāviceṣṭitaviruddhamaho lalitam || 237 ||
yathā vā—
digvāsā yadi tat kimasya dhanuṣā sāstrasya kiṃ bhasmanā bhasmāthāsya kimaṅganā yadi ca sā kāmaṃ paridveṣṭi kim |
ityanyonyaviruddhaceṣṭitamidaṃ paś‍yannijasvāmino bhṛṅgī sāndraśirāvanaddhaparuṣaṃ dhatte 'sthiraśeṣaṃ vapuḥ || 238 ||
viṣamam, asaṅgatiḥ, pratyanīkam adhikaṃ ca virodha eva | teṣu —
viṣamaṃ yathā— (kāda.)
diśāmalīkālakabhaṅgatāṃ gatastrayīvadhūkarṇatamālapallavaḥ |
cakāra yasyādhvaradhūmasañcayomalīmasaḥ śuklataraṃ nijaṃ yaśaḥ || 239 ||
asaṅgatiryathā— (saka. 3.62)
sā uppaḍī goṭṭhaühi || 240 || (dra॰ 8.05, pṛ.398)
pratyanīkaṃ yathā—(rudraṭā. 7.55)
utkaṇṭhā santāpo raṇaraṇako jāgarastanostanutā |
phalamidamaho mayāp‍taṃ sukhāya mṛgalocanāṃ dṛṣṭvā || 241 ||
adhikaṃ yathā—(raghu. 12.45)
eko daśarathiḥ kāmaṃ yātudhānāḥ sahastraśaḥ |
te tu yāvanta evājau tāvaddhā dadṛśe sa taiḥ || 242 ||
(11. dṛṣṭāntaḥ)
uktārthaprasiddhaye prasiddhatattulyārthapradarśanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
sa caturdhā— pūrvaḥ, uttaraḥ, samaḥ, viparītaśca | teṣu —
pūrvo yathā—(saka. 3.89)
ṇa uva varakoaṇḍadaṇḍae puti māṇuse vi emea |
guṇavijjae ṇa jāaï vaṃsuppaṇṇe vi ṭaṅkāro || 243 ||
(na punarvarakodaṇḍadaṇḍake putri ! mānuṣe 'pyevameva |
guṇavarjite na jāyate vaṃśotpanne 'pi ṭaṅkāraḥ ||)
uttaro yathā—(saka. 3.86)
hiaa tiracchīyaï saṃmuha || 244 || (dra. 8.09; pṛ. 399)
samo yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.350)
yāti candrāṃśubhiḥ spṛṣṭā dhvāntarājī parābhavam |
sadyo rājaviruddhānāṃ darśayantī durantatām || 245 ||
viparīto yathā—(murā. 1.21)
uparighanaṃ ghanapaṭalaṃ dūre dayitā kimetadāpatitam |
himavati divyauṣadhayaḥ kopāviṣṭaḥ phaṇī śirasi || 246 ||
(12. vyatirekaḥ)
sadṛśayorbhedakathanaṃ vyatirekaḥ |
sa ṣọdhā—ekavyatirekaḥ, ubhayavyatirekaḥ, sadṛśavyatirekaḥ, asadṛśavyatirekaḥ, svajātivyatirekaḥ, svavyaktivyatireka iti | tatra—
ekavyatireko yathā— (rudraṭā. 5.87)
sakalaṅkena jaḍena ca sāmyaṃ doṣākareṇa te kīdṛk |
abhujaṅgaḥ samanayanaḥ kathamupameyo hareṇāsi || 247 ||
ubhayavyatireko yathā— (kāvyāda. 2.183)
abhinnavelau gambhīrāvamburāśirbhavānāpi |
asāvañjanasaṃkāśastvaṃ tu cāmīkaracchaviḥ || 248 ||
sadṛśavyatireko yathā— (kāvyāda. 2.194)
candro 'yamambarottaṃso haṃso 'yaṃ toyabhūṣaṇam |
nabhā nakṣatramālīdamidamutkumudaṃ payaḥ || 249 ||
asadṛśavyatireko yathā— (kāvyāda. 2.199)
abhrūvilāsamaspṛṣṭamadarāgaṃ mṛgekṣaṇam |
idaṃ tu nayanadvandvaṃ tava tadguṇabhūṣitam || 250 ||
svajātivyatireko yathā— (kāvyāda. 2.197)
arat‍nālokasaṃhāryamavāryaṃ sūryaraśmibhiḥ |
dṛṣṭirodhakaraṃ yūnāṃ yauvanaprabhavaṃ tamaḥ || 251 ||
svavyaktivyatireko yathā— (saka. 3.91)
aṇṇoṇṇohiṃ sucariasaahiṃ aṇudiṇa vaḍ‍̣dhiia māṇu |
appaṇa vi ṇa hu mahu pi aha appāṇeṇa samāṇu || 252 ||
(anyonyaiḥ sucaritaśatairanudinaṃ vardhate mānaḥ |
ātmāpi na khalu mahānapi athātmanā samānaḥ ||)
(13. ayonyam)
parasparamupakāryopakārakādibhāvo 'nyonyam |
tattridhā—abhidhīyamānaṃ, pratīyamānam ubhayarūpaṃ ceti | teṣu —
abhidhīyamānaṃ yathā— (kusaṃ. 1.42)
kaṇṭhasya tasyāḥ stanabandhurasya muktākalāpasya ca nistalasya |
anyonyaśobhājananād babhūva sādhāraṇo bhūṣaṇabhūṣyabhāvaḥ || 253 ||
pratīyamānaṃ yathā— (gāsa. 2.61)
uddhaccho piaï jalaṃ jaha jaha viralaṃgulī ciraṃ pahio |
pāvāliā vi taha taha dhāraṃ taṇuaṃ pi taṇueī || 254 ||
(ūrdhvākṣaḥ pibati jalaṃ yathā yathā viralāṅguliściraṃ pathikaḥ |
prapāpālikāpi tathā tathā dhārāṃ tanukāmapi tanūkaroti ||)
ubhayarūpaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 2.93)
golāvisamoāracchaleṇa appā urammi se muk‍ko |
aṇuaṃpāṇiddosaṃ teṇa vi sā gāḍhamuavaụ̄dhā || 255 ||
(godāviṣamāvatāracchalena ātmā urasi tasya muktaḥ |
anukampānirdoṣaṃ tenāpi sā gāḍhamupagụ̄dhā ||)
anyonyacūlikā, anyonyabhrāntiḥ, anyonyaikatā cānyonyameva | tatrātra—
anyonyacūlikā yathā—(saka. 3.75)
śaśinā ca niśā niśayā ca śaśī śaśinā niśayā ca yathā gaganam |
bhavatā ca sabhā sabhayā ca bhavān bhavatā sabhayā ca vibhāti jagat || 256 ||
anyonyabhrāntiryathā—
jambūnāṃ kusumodare navamadhunyārabdhapānotsavāḥ kīrāḥ pak‍vaphalāśayā madhukarīś‍cumbanti muñcanti ca |
eteṣāmapi nīlakiṃśukadalairebhiḥ samānatviṣāṃ puṣpabhrāntibhirāpatanti sahasā cañcūṣu bhṛṅgāṅganāḥ || 257 ||
anyonyaikatā yathā—(māgha. 1.22)
praphullatāpicchanibhairabhīṣubhiḥ śubhaiśca sap‍tacchadapāṃsupāṇḍubhiḥ |
paraspareṇa cchuritāmalacchavī tadekavarṇāviva tau babhūvatuḥ || 258 ||
(14. parivṛttiḥ)
guṇadravyāṇāṃ vyatyayavinimayau parivṛttiḥ | sā tridhā—
vyatyayavatī, vinimayavatī, ubhayavatī ca | teṣu —
vyatyayavatī yathā—(gāsa. 2.6)
jo tīa ahararāo rattiṃ uvvāsio piaameṇa |
so c‍cia dīsaï gose savattiṇaaṇeṣu saṃkaṃto || 259 ||
(yastasyā adhararāgo rātrāvudvāsitaḥ priyatamena |
sa eva dṛśyate prātaḥ sapat‍nīnayaneṣu saṃkrāntaḥ ||)
yathā vā—(māgha. 11.64)
kumudavanamapaśri śrīmadambhojaṣaṇḍaṃ tyajati mudamulūkaḥ prītimāṁścakravākaḥ |
udayamahimaraśiryāti śītāṃśurastaṃ hatavidhilasitānāṃ hī vicitro vipākaḥ ||260||
vinimayavatī yathā—(kirātā. 7.35)
praś‍cyotanmadasurabhīṇi nim‍nagāyāḥ krīḍanto gajapatayaḥ payāṃsi kṛtvā |
kiñjalkavyatikaratāmradānalekhairutteruḥ sarasijagandhibhiḥ kapolaiḥ || 261 ||
yathā vā—(rāca. 2.7)
tasya ca pravayaso jaṭāyuṣaḥ svargiṇaḥ kimiha śocyate 'dhunā |
yena jarjarakalebaravyayāt krītamindukiraṇojjvalaṃ yaśaḥ || 262 ||
ubhayavatī yathā—(kirātā. 9.60)
locanādharakṛtāhṛtarāgā vāsitānanaviśeṣitagandhā |
vāruṇī paraguṇātmaguṇānāṃ vyatyayaṃ vinimayaṃ nu vitene || 263 ||
yathā vā—(saka. 3.83)
kiṃ citraṃ yadi devena bhūbhṛtaḥ karadīkṛtāḥ |
devo 'pi dāpitaḥ kiṃ tairna punaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ karam || 264 ||
(15. mīlitam)
vastunā vastvantaratiraskāro mīlitam | yathā— (saka. 3.126)
eṃto vi ṇa sac‍cavio gose pasaraṃtapallavāruṇacchāo |
majjaṇataṃbesu mao taha maataṃbesu loaṇesu amariso || 265 ||
(āgacchannapi na dṛṣṭaḥ prātaḥ prasaratpallavāruṇacchāyaḥ |
majjanatāmrayormadastathā madatāmrayorlocanayoramarṣaḥ ||)
yathā vā— (gāsa. 4.23)
piadaṃsaṇeṇa suharasa—muulia jaï se ṇa hoṃti ṇaaṇāiṃ |
tā keṇa kaṇṇaraïaṃ lakkhijjaï kuvalaaṃ tissā || 266 ||
(priyadarśanena sukharasamukulite yadyasyā na bhavetāṃ nayane |
tat kena karṇaracitaṃ lakṣyeta kuvalayaṃ tasyāḥ ||)
pihitam, apihitaṃ, tadga‍uṇo 'tadga‍uṇa itīmānyapi mīlitānyeva | teṣu — pihitaṃ yathā—
paaḍiasaṇehasabbhāvavibbhamaṃ tīa jaha tumaṃ diṭṭho |
saṃvaraṇavāvaḍāe aṇṇo vi jaṇo taha c‍cea || 267 ||
(prakaṭitas‍nehasadbhāvavibhramaṃ tayā yathā tvaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ |
saṃvaraṇavyāpṛtayā anyo 'pi janastathā caiva ||) (gāsa.2.99)
apihitaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 720 ve.)
diṭhṭhā i jaṃṇa diṭhṭho ālaviāe vi jaṃṇa ālavio |
uvaāro jaṃ ṇa kao taṃ cia kaliaṃ chaïllehiṃ || 268 ||
(dṛṣṭayāpi yanna dṛṣṭa ālapitayāpi yannālapitaḥ |
upacāro yanna kṛtastadeva ca kalitaṃ chekaiḥ ||)
tad‍guṇo yathā—(saka. 3.130)
goraṃgaü taruṇīaṇu joṇhaï ahisaraï siaṇevacchapaḍicchiu vallahavaddharaï |
tacchāahiṃ puṇu caliaü sāmalagattu tahiṃ maaṇu maṃtiahiṃ || 269 ||
(gaurāṅgastaruṇījano jyots‍nāyāmabhisarati sitanepaṃthyaparicchanno vallabhabaddharatiḥ |
tacchāyāsu punaścalitaḥ śyāmalagātrastatra madano mantryabhūt ||)
atad‍guṇo yathā—(saka. 3.131)
karkandhūphalamuc‍cinoti śabarī muktāphalākāṅkṣayā kruddholūkakadambakasya purataḥ kāko 'pi haṃsāyate |
kīrtyā te dhavalīkṛte tribhuvane kṣmāpāla ! lakṣmīḥ puraḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vīkṣya balo 'yamityupahitavrīḍaṃ śanairjalpati || 270 ||
(16. vitarkaḥ)
sandehanirṇayāntarālavartyūho vitarkaḥ |
sa dvidhā— nirṇayānto 'nirṇayāntaśca | tayoḥ —
nirṇayāntastridhā tattvānupātī, attattvānupātī, ubhayātmakaśca |
anirṇayānto 'pi tridhā mithyārūpaḥ, amithyārūpaḥ ubhayātmakaśca | teṣu —
nirṇayāntastattvānupātī yathā—(urāca. 2.29)
mainākaḥ kimayaṃ ruṇaddhi gagane manmārgamavyāhataṃ śaktistasya kutassa vajrapatanād bhīto mahendrādapi |
tārkṣyaḥ so 'pi samaṃ nijena vibhunā jānāti māṃ rāvaṇaṃ ā jñātaṃ sa jaṭāyureva jarasā kliṣṭo vadhaṃ vāñchati || 271 ||
atattvānupātī yathā—(vikra.1.8)
asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūc‍candro nu kāntaprabhaḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ |
vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ || 272 ||
ubhayātmako yathā—(śāku.2.9)
citre niveśya parikalpitasattvayogā rūpoc‍cayena racitā manasā kṛtā nu |
strīrat‍nasṛṣṭiraparā pratibhāti sā me dhāturvibhutvamanucintya vapuśca tasyāḥ || 273 ||
anirṇayāntamithyārūpo yathā—(megha. 14)
adreḥ śaṅgaṃ harati pavanaḥ kiṃsvidityunmukhībhi— rdṛṣṭocchrāyaścakitacakitaṃ mugdhasiddhāṅganābhiḥ |
sthānādasmātsarasaniculādutpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharan sthūlahastāvalepān || 274 ||
amithyārūpo yathā— (kirātā. 18.9)
ayamasau bhagavānuta pāṇḍavaḥ sthitamavāṅmuninā śaśimaulinā |
samadhirūḍhamajena nu jiṣṇunā sviditi vegavaśānmumuhe gaṇaiḥ || 275 ||
ubhayātmako yathā—(kirātā. 16.18)
māyā svideṣā mativibhramo vā dhvastaṃ nu me vīryamutāhamanyaḥ |
gāṇḍīvamuktā hi yathā purā me parākramante na śarāḥ kirāte || 276 ||
(17. smaraṇam)
sādṛśādṛṣṭacintāderanubhūtapadārthajñānotpattiḥ smaraṇam | tat — sadṛśādyathā—(rāca. 1.19)
adṛśyanta purastena khelatkhañjanapaṅktayaḥ |
asmaryanta viniḥśvasya priyānayanavibhramāḥ || 277 ||
adṛṣṭād‍ yathā—(śāku. 6.8)
munisutāpraṇayasmṛtirodhinā mama ca muktamidaṃ tamasā manaḥ |
manasijena sakhe ! prahariṣyatā dhanuṣi cūtaśaraśca niveśitaḥ || 278 ||
cintāyā yathā—(urāca. 2.27)
purā yatra strotaḥ pulinamadhunā tatra saritāṃ viparyāsaṃ yāto ghanaviralabhāvaḥ kṣitiruhām |
bahordṛṣṭaṃ kālādaparamiva manye vanamidaṃ niveśaḥ śailānāṃ tadidamiti buddhiṃ draḍhayati || 279 ||
ādigrahaṇātparaprayat‍nato yathā—(śāku. 6.21)
darśanapathamāyātā sākṣādiva tanmayena hṛdayena |
smṛtikāriṇā tvayā me punarapi citrīkṛtā kāntā || 280 ||
svap‍nasmṛtiḥ, pratyabhijñānaṃ ca smaraṇameva | tayoḥ —
svap‍nasmṛtiryathā—(visā. 1.15)
jāne svap‍navidhau mamādya culukotsekyaṃ purastādabhūt pratyūṣe pariveṣamaṇḍalamiva jyots‍nāsapat‍naṃ mahaḥ |
tasyāntarnakhanistuṣīkṛtaśarac‍candraprabhairaṅgakai— rdṛṣṭā kāpyabalā balāt kṛtavatī sā manmathaṃ manmatham || 281 ||
pratyabhijñānaṃ yathā—(urāca. 3.40)
gṛhīto yaḥ pūrvaṃ pariṇayavidhau kaṅkaṇadharaḥ sudhāsūteḥ pādairamṛtaśiśirairyaḥ paricitaḥ |
sa evāyaṃ tasyāstaditārakaraupamyasubhago mayā labdhaḥ pāṇirlalitalavalīkandalanibhaḥ || 282 ||
(18. bhrāntiḥ)
viparyayajñānaṃ bhrāntiḥ | sā dvidhā— atattve tattvarūpā, tattve atattvarūpā ca | atattve tattvarūpā tridhā— abādhitā, bādhitā kāraṇabādhitā ca | tāsu—
abādhitā yathā—(saka. 3.108)
mohavirame sarosaṃ thoratthaṇamaṃḍale suravahūṇaṃ |
jeṇa karikuṃbhasaṃbhāvaṇāi diṭhṭhī pariṭṭhaviā || 283 ||
(mohavirame saroṣaṃ sthūlastanamaṇḍale suravadhūnām |
yena karikumbhasambhāvanayā dṛṣṭiḥ paristhāpitā ||)
bādhitā yathā—(gāsa.3.63)
hasiaṃ sahatthatālaṃ sukkhavaḍaṃ uvagaehi pahiehi |
patthapphalasāricche uḍḍīṇe pūsavaṃdassiṃ/mmi || 284 ||
(hasitaṃ sahastatālaṃ śuṣkavaṭamupagataiḥ pathikaiḥ |
patraphalasadṛkṣe uḍḍīne śukavṛnde 'smin/vṛnde ||)
kāraṇabādhitā yathā—(saka. 3.110)
kanakakalaśasvacche rādhāpayodharamaṇḍale navajaladharaśyāmāmātmadyutiṃ pratibimbitām |
asitasicayaprāntabhrāntyā muhurmuhurutkṣipañ jayati janitavrīḍāhāsaḥ priyāhasito hariḥ || 285 ||
tattve atattvarūpāpi tridhā— hānahetuḥ, upādānahetuḥ, upekṣāhetuśca | tāsu— hānaheturyathā—(saka. 3.111)
so muddhamao maataṇhiāhiṃ taha dūmi tuha āsāhiṃ/dūmio haāsāhiṃ |
jaha saṃbhāvamaīṇa vi ṇaīṇa paraṃmuho jāo || 286 ||
(sa mugdhamṛgo mṛgatṛṣṇikābhistathā dūnastvadāśābhiḥ |
yathā sadbhāvamayīṣvapi nadīṣu parāṅmukho jātaḥ ||)
﻿
upādānaheturyathā—(vikramo. 4.39)
samarthaye yat prathamaṃ priyāṃ prati kṣaṇena tanme parivartate 'nyathā |
ato vinidre sahasā vilocane karomi na sparśavibhāvitāpriyaḥ || 287 ||
upekṣāheturyathā—(māgha. 3.51)
cikraṃsayā kṛtrimapatripaṅkteḥ kapotapālīṣu niketanānām |
mārjāramapyāyataniścalāṅgaṃ yasyāṃ janaḥ kṛtrimameva mene || 288 ||
bhrāntimān, bhrāntimālā, upamābhrāntiḥ, bhrāntyatiśayaśca bhrāntireva | teṣu — bhrāntimān yathā—
kapāle mārjāraḥ paya iti karāṁllẹdhi śaśina— starucchidraprotān bisamiti karī saṃkalayati |
ratānte talpasthān harati vanitāpyaṃśukamiti prabhāmattaścandro jagadidamaho vibhramayati || 289 ||
bhrāntimālā yathā—(saka. 3.115)
nīlendīvaraśaṅkyā nayanayorbandhūkabuddha‍yādhare pāṇau padmadhiyā madhūkakusumabhrāntyā tathā gaṇḍayoḥ |
līyante kabarīṣu bāndhavakulavyāmohajātaspṛhā durvārā madhupāḥ kiyanti bhavatī sthānāni rakṣiṣyati || 290 ||
upamābhrāntiryathā—(vikramo. 4.7)
hṛtoṣṭharāgairnayanodabindubhirnimag‍nanābhernipatadbhiraṅkitam |
cyutaṃ ruṣā bhinnagaterasaṃśayaṃ śukodaraśyāmamidaṃ stanāṃśukam || 291 ||
bhrāntyatiśayo yathā—(saka. 3.117)
diśyād dhūrjaṭijūṭakoṭisariti jyots‍nālavod‍bhāsinī śāśāṅkī kalikā jalabhramivaśād drāgdṛṣṭanaṣṭā mudam |
yāṃ cañcacchapharībhrameṇa mukulīkurvan phaṇālīṃ muhu— rmuhyaṁllakṣyamahirjighṛkṣatitamāmākuñcanaprāñcanaiḥ || 292 ||
anadhyavasāyo 'pi bhrāntireva | yathā—(saka. 3.119)
ubhau rambhāstambhāvupari viparītau kamalayo— stadūrghvaṃ rat‍nāśmasthalamatha durūhaṃ kimapi tat | ﻿
tataḥ kumbhau paścād bisakisalaye kandalamaye tadanvindāvindīvaramadhukarāḥ kiṃ punaridam || 293 ||
yathā vā—(saka. 3.118)
virahiṇijaṇaha daaṃteṇa ṇāvaï takkhaṇi chāijjaï aliṇivahehiṃ cetteṇa cūavaṇī |
taha tāsu vi maaraṃdehiṃ saṃdāṇiaï jaha ṇa klaṃbu ṇa aṃbu ṇa jaṃbū jāṇiaï || 294 ||
(virahiṇījanasya dayamānena pratibhāti nanu tatkṣaṇe chādyate 'linivahaiścaitreṇa cūtavanī |
tathā tāsvapi makarandaiḥ sandānyate yathā na kadambo nāmro na jambūrjñāyate ||)
(19. upamānam)
sadṛśāt sadṛśapratipattirupamānam | yathā—
tāṃ rohiṇīṃ vijānīhi jyotiṣāmatra maṇḍale |
samūhastārakāṇāṃ yaḥ śakaṭākāramāśritaḥ || 295 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca.1.45)
sarvaprāṇapravaṇamaghavanmuktamāhatya vakṣa— statsaṃghaṭṭād vighaṭitabuhatkhaṇḍamuc‍caṇḍarociḥ |
evaṃ vegāt kuliśamakarod vyoma vidyutsahasrai— rbharturvajrajvalanakapiśāste ca roṣāṭṭahāsāḥ || 296 ||
abhinayo 'pyupamānameva | yathā—(gāsa. 3.57)
vaïvivaraṇiggaadalo eraṃḍo sāhaï vva taruṇāṇaṃ |
ettha ghare haliabahū eddahamettatthaṇī vasaï || 297 ||
(vṛtivivaranirgatadala eraṇḍaḥ sādhayatīva taruṇānām |
atra gṛhe halikavadhūretāvanmātrastanī vasati ||)
etena pratibimbamudrālekhyādayo vyākhyātāḥ | teṣu —
pratibimbo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.11)
darpaṇe ca paribhogadarśinī pṛṣṭhataḥ praṇayino niṣeduṣaḥ |
vīkṣya bimbamanubimbamātmanaḥ kāni kānyapi cakāra lajjayā || 298 ||
﻿
mudrā yathā—(kirātā. 10.7)
sacakitamiva vismayākulābhiḥ śucisikatāsvatimānuṣāṇi tābhiḥ |
kṣitiṣu dadṛśire jiṣṇorupahitaketurathāṅgalāñchanāni || 299 ||
ālekhyaṃ yathā—
tavālekhye kautūhalataralatanvīviracite vidhāyaikā cakraṃ racayati suparṇāsutamapi |
atha svidyatpāṇistvaritamapamṛjyaitadaparā kare pauṣpaṃ cāpaṃ makaramupariṣṭāc‍ca likhati || 300 ||
athāsyopamābhedaḥ | ko bhedaḥ ?
ucyate—'padārthayorguṇaleśena sādṛśyapratipattirupamā' | yadāha— (kāvyāda. 2.14)
yathākathaṃcit sādṛśyaṃ yatrodbha‍ūtaṃ pratīyate |
upamāṃ nāma tāmāhuryathenduriva te mukham || 301 ||
upamaiva tirobhūtabhedā rūpakamiṣyate |
yathā bāhulatā pāṇipadmaṃ caraṇapallavam || 302 || (kāvyāda. 2.66)
yadaprasiddhau sādṛśyamuktibhaṅgena kenacit |
tatsādṛśyaṃ prakārāṇāmasya saṃkhyā na vidyate || 303 ||
tadyathā—(saka. 4.71)
dātāro yadi kalpaśākhibhiralaṃ yadyarthinaḥ kiṃ tṛṇaiḥ santaścedamṛtaṃ vṛthā yadi khalāstatkālakūṭena kim |
kiṃ karpūraśalākayā yadi dṛśoḥ panthānameti priyā saṃsāre 'pi satīndrajālamaparaṃ yadyasti tenāpi kim || 304 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 2.6)
sthitaḥ sthitāmuc‍calitaḥ prayātāṃ niṣeduṣīmāsanabandhadhīraḥ |
jalābhilāṣī jalamādadānāṃ chāyeva tāṃ bhūpatiranvagacchat || 305 ||
evamanye 'pyanyoktyādayo vaktavyāḥ | te cobhayālaṅkāre viśeṣeṇāgrato vakṣyante | teṣūbhayoḥ sādṛśyamivādayaḥ pratipādayanti | iha tu sadṛśena sadṛśaḥ pratīyata ityasti bhedaḥ | ﻿
(20. anumānam)
liṅgadarśanād liṅgijñānam anumānam | yathā—(rudraṭā. 7.57)
sāvajñamāgamiṣyan nūnaṃ patito 'si pādayostasyāḥ |
kathamanyathā lalāṭe yāvakarasatilakapaṅktiriyam || 306 ||
yathā vā—(rudraṭā. 7.60)
aviralavilolajaladaḥ kuṭajārjunanīpasurabhivanavātaḥ |
ayamāyātaḥ kālo hanta mṛtāḥ pathikagehinyaḥ || 307 ||
ko 'sya jñāpakād bheda iti ceducyate—'jānantaṃ prayuṅkta iti jñāpakaḥ; anu paścānmīyate anenetyanumānam | nanvidamapi jñāpayati, satyam | kiṃtvidamajijñāsumapi jñāpayati, sa tu jijñāsumeva | yathā—(gasā.6.42)
dīsaï ṇa cūamaülaṃ attā ṇa a vāi malaagaṃdhavaho |
ettaṃ vasaṃtamāsaṃ sahi jaṃ uk‍kaṭhiaṃ ceaṃ || 308 ||
(dṛśyate na cūtamukulamadya na ca vāti malayagandhavahaḥ |
eti vasantamāsaḥ sakhi ! yadutkaṇṭhitaṃ cetaḥ ||)
athavā pramitirūpaṃ phalamanumānam | yathā—
aï sahi vakkulajāviri, chuhihisi gottassa matthae chāraṃ |
ac‍caṃta—datta—diṭ‍ṭheṇa sāmi valisṇa hasieṇa || 308a ||
(ayi sakhi vakrollapanaśīle kṣapsyarina gotrasya mastake kṣāram |
atyantadattadṛṣṭena sāmi=ardha—valitena hasitena ||)(dra.jo.407)
aṃbāṇa maṃjarī ṇigaa ttia kassa ṇu kahemi poddāe |
cittapariattaṇeṇa puḍhamaṃ aṃhehi viṇṇāaṃ ||309||
(āmrāṇāṃ mañjarī nirgatā iti kasya nu kathayāmi putryāḥ |
cittaparivarttanena prathamamasmābhirvijñātam ||)(dra.rā.pṛ.621)
pramāṇarūpo heturjñāpakaḥ | yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.245)
avadhyairindupādānāmasādhyaiścandanāmbhasām |
dehoṣmabhiḥ subodhaṃ te sakhi ! kāmāturaṃ manaḥ || 310 ||
﻿
yadi vā upāttavyāpāro 'numānahetuḥ yathā—(saka. 2.28)
etāni nissahatanorasamañjasāni śūnyaṃ manaḥ piśunayanti padāni tasyāḥ |
ete ca mārgataravaḥ kathayanti tāpamālambitojjhitapariglapitaiḥ pravālaiḥ ||
anupāttavyāpāro jñāpakaḥ | sa tridhā—trikālārthaviṣayabhedāt | teṣu bhūtārthaviṣayo yathā—(kāvyād. 2.12)
kaṇṭhekālaḥ karasthena kapālenenduśekharaḥ |
jaṭābhiḥ s‍nigdhatāmrābhirāvirāsīd vṛṣadhvajaḥ || 312 ||
yathā vā—(māgha. 1.70)
sa bāla āsīd vapuṣā caturbhujo mukhena pūrṇendunibhastrilocanaḥ |
yuvā karākrāntamahībhṛduc‍cakairasaṃśayaṃ samprati tejasā raviḥ || 313 ||
vartamānārthaviṣayo yathā—(visā. 1.23)
parvagranthiṣu vīrudhāṃ sumanaso madhye 'ṅkuraṃ pallavā vāñchāmātraparigrahaḥ pikavadhūkaṇṭho/?/dare pañcamaḥ |
kiṃ ca trīṇi jaganti jiṣṇudivasairdvitrairmanojanmano devasyāpi cirojjhitaṃ yadi bhavedabhyāsavaśyaṃ dhanuḥ || 314 ||
yathā vā—(saka. 1.90)
maulau dhāraya puṇḍarīkamamitaṃ tanvātmano vikramaṃ cakrāṅka vaha pādayugmamavanīṃ doṣṇā samabhyuddhara |
lakṣmīṃ bhrūnikaṭe niveśaya bhava jyāyān divaukaspate— rviśvāntaḥkaraṇaikacora ! tadapi jñātaṃ hariḥ khalvasi || 315 ||
bhaviṣyadarthaviṣayo yathā—(mabhā. 2.3.13)
vātāya kapilā vidyudātapāyātilohinī |
pītā varṣāya vijñeyā durbhikṣāya sitā bhavet || 316 ||
yathā vā—(visā. 1.3)
gonāsāya niyojitāgadarajāḥ sarpāya baddhauṣadhiḥ kaṇṭhasthāya viṣāya vīryamahate pāṇau maṇīn bibhratī |
bharturbhūtagaṇāya gotrajaratīnirdiṣṭamantrākṣarā rakṣatvadrisutā vivāhasamaye prītā ca bhītā ca vaḥ || 317 ||
﻿
(21.arthāpattiḥ)
pratyakṣādyadhigato 'rthastathānupapadyamāno 'rthāntaraṃ gamayatītyarthāpattiḥ | yathā—
nirṇetuṃ śakyamastīti madhyaṃ tava nitambini |
anyathānupapattyaiva payodharabharasthiteḥ || 318 || (kāvyāda.2.218)
yathā vā—(saka. 3.171)
etadālokya lolākṣi rūpamapratimaṃ tava |
kalpayāmaḥ kalātattvagurutāmādivedhasaḥ || 319 ||
(22. abhāvaḥ)
padārthānāmavidyamānatā abhāvaḥ, yathā—(seba. 4.20)
saggaṃ apārijāaṃ kotthuhalacchirahiaṃ mahumahassa uraṃ |
sumarāmi mahaṇapurao amuddhaaṃdaṃ ca harajaḍāpabbhāraṃ || 320 ||
(svargamapārijātaṃ kaustubhalakṣmīrahitaṃ madhumathanasyoraḥ |
smarāmi mathanapurato 'mugdhacandraṃ ca harajaṭāprāgbhāram ||)
yathā vā—(raghu. 8.65)
dhṛtirastamitā ratiś‍cyutā galitaṃ geyamṛturnirutsavaḥ |
gatamābharaṇaprayojanaṃ pariśūnyaṃ śayanīyamadya me || 321 ||
(23. āgamaḥ)
āp‍tavacanamāgamaḥ | yathā—
na kañcidavamanyeta sarvasya śṛṇuyānmatam |
bālasyāpyarthavad vākyamupayuñjīta paṇḍitaḥ || 322 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 5.83)
nivāryatāmāli ! kimapyasau vaṭuḥ punarvivakṣuḥ sphuritottarādharaḥ |
na kevalaṃ yo mahatāṃ vibhāṣate śṛṇoti tasmādapi yaḥ sa pāpabhāk || 323 ||
(24. pratyakṣam)
aindriyaṃ mānasaṃ vā jñānaṃ pratyakṣam | yathā—(māgha. 10.3)
krāntakāntavadanapratibimbe bhag‍nabālasahakārasugandhau |
svāduni praṇaditālini śīte nirvavāra madhunīndriyavargaḥ || 324 ||
﻿
yathā vā—(māmā. 1.43)
paśyāmi tāmita itaśca puraśca paścādantarbahiḥ parita eva ca vartamānām |
ud‍buddhamugdhakanakābjanibhaṃ vahantīmāsaṅgitiryagapavartitadṛṣṭi vaktram || 325 ||
imāścaturviṃśatirarthasaṃśrayāḥ pṛthagvibhaktāḥ kavibhiḥ svalaṅkriyāḥ |
śrutītihāsaprabhavān viśeṣato mahāprabandhānupakartumīśate || 326 ||
anekadhā 'yaṃ kavibhiścirantanaiḥ prapañcito bhāmaha—vāmanādibhiḥ |
yato 'tra jātyādiralaṃkriyāgaṇo 'bhidheyatastena kṛto na vistaraḥ || 327 ||
athobhayālaṃkṛtayo manoharāḥ prapañcitā yadyapi pūrvasūribhiḥ |
tathāpi tebhyaḥ saviśeṣamucyate svarūpamāsāmiha tanniśamyatām || 328 ||
(3. ubhayālaṅkārāḥ —24)
śabdaviśeṣadvārako 'rthaviśeṣo yeṣu pratīyate te ubhayālaṅkārāḥ |
te 'pi caturviṃśatireva | tadyathā—
upamā, rūpakaṃ, sāmyaṃ, saṃśayaḥ, samādhiḥ, samāsoktiḥ, sahoktiḥ, samuc‍cayaḥ, tulyayogitā, leśaḥ, apahnutiḥ, aprastutapraśaṃsā, utprekṣā, arthāntaranyāsaḥ, dīpakaṃ, parikaraḥ, kramaḥ, paryāyaḥ, atiśayaḥ, ākṣepaḥ, viśeṣaḥ, śleṣaḥ, bhāvikaḥ, saṃsṛṣṭiriti | tatra —
(1. upamā)
prasiddha‍yanurodhenārthayormithaḥ pratīyamānābhidhīyamānabhūyovayavasāmānyayoga upamā |
sā tridhā— padopamā, vākyopamā prapañcopamā ca | tāsu
padopamā dvidhā— samāsopamā, pratyayopamā ca | tayoḥ
samāsopamā caturdhā— antarbhūtevārthā, antarbhūtasāmānyā, antarbhūtobhayārthā sarvasamāsā ceti | tāsu—
prathamā yathā—(rudraṭā. 8.18)
mukhamindusundaraṃ te bisakisalayakomale bhujālatike |
jaghanasthalī ca sundari tava śailaśilāviśāleyam || 329 ||
﻿
dvitīyā yathā—(gāsa. 3.13)
candasarisaṃ muhaṃ se amaasariccho a muharaso tissā |
sakaaggaharahasujjalacuṃbanaaṃ kassa sarisaṃ se || 330 ||
(candrasadṛśaṃ mukhaṃ tasyā amṛtasadṛkṣaśca mukharasastasyāḥ |
sakacagraharabhasojjvalacumbanakaṃ kasya sadṛśaṃ tasyāḥ ||)
tṛtīyā yathā—(saka. 4.3)
kamalakarā rambhorū kuvalaaṇaaṇā miaṃkavaaṇā sā |
kaha ṇu ṇavacaṃpaaṃtrī muṇālabāhū piā tavaï(dahaï) || 331 ||
(kamalakarā rambhorūḥ kuvalayanayanā mṛgāṅkavadanā sā |
kathaṃ nu navacampakāṅgī mṛṇālabāhuḥ priyā tapati(dahati) ||)
caturthī yathā—(rudraṭa. 8.20)
śaradindusundaramukhī kuvalayadaladīrghalocanā sā me |
dahati manaḥ kathamaniśaṃ rambhāgarbhābhirāmorūḥ || 332 ||
pratyayopamāpi caturdhaiva |
pratyayo hi kaścidupameye, kaścidupamāne, kaścitsāmānye, kaścidivārthe vidhīyate | tatra, upameye yathā—(saka. 4.5)
haṃso dhvāṅkṣavirāvī syāduṣṭrakrośī ca kokilaḥ |
kharanādī mayūro 'pi tvaṃ ced vadasi vāggmini ! || 333 ||
upamāne yathā—(saka. 4.6)
pūrṇendukalpavadanā mṛṇālīdeśyadorlatā |
cakradeśīyajaghanā sā svap‍ne 'pi na dṛśyate || 334 ||
sāmānye yathā—(saka. 4.7)
sūryīyati sudhāraśmiranāthati mṛtāyate |
mṛtasya kāntāvirahe svargo 'pi narakīyati || 335 ||
ivārthe yathā—(saka. 4.8)
eka eva hi bhūtātmā bhūte bhūte vyavasthitaḥ |
ekadhā bahudhā caiva dṛśyate jalacandravat || 336 || (upaniṣad) ﻿
vākyopamāpi dvidhā— padārthayorvākyārthayośca | tatra—
padārthayoścaturdhā— pūrṇā, lup‍tā, lup‍tapūrṇā, pūrṇalup‍tā ceti | tatra— upamānopameyasāmānyadharmadyotakānāṃ caturṇāmapi prayoge pūrṇā | yathā—(rudraṭā. 8.6)
kamalamiva cāru vadanaṃ mṛṇālamiva komalaṃ bhujāyugalam |
alimāleva ca nīlā tavaiva madirekṣaṇe kabarī || 337 ||
sāmānyadharmadyotakalope lup‍tā | yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.36)
na padmaṃ mukhamevedaṃ na bhṛṅgau cakṣuṣī ime |
na kesarāṇi kāntāyā imāstā dantapaṅktayaḥ || 338 ||
sāmānyadharmalope lup‍tapūrṇā | yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.16, saka. 4.11)
rājīvamiva te vaktraṃ netre nīlotpale iva |
rambhāstambhāvivorū ca karikumbhāviva stanau || 339 ||
dyotakalope pūrṇalup‍tā | yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.193, saka. 4.12)
tvanmukhaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca phulle surabhigandhinī |
komalāpāṭalau tanvi ! pallavaścādharaśca te || 340 ||
vākyārthayorapi caturdhaiva |
ekevādiśabdā, anekevādiśabdā, anivādiśabdā asādṛśyā ca | tatra— ekevādiśabdā yathā—(raghu. 6.60)
pāṇḍyo 'yamaṃsārpitalambahāraḥ klṛp‍tāṅgarāgo haricandanena |
ābhāti bālātaparaktasānuḥ sanirjharodgāra ivādrirājaḥ || 341 ||
anekevaśabdā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.45)
nalinyā iva tanvaṅgyāstasyāḥ padmamivānanam |
mayā madhuvrateneva pāyampāyamaramyata || 342 ||
anivādiśabdā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.49)
divo jāgarti rakṣāyai pulomārirbhuvo bhavān |
asurāstena hanyante sāvalepā nṛpāstvayā || 343 ||
asādṛśyā yathā—(māgha. 16.52)
prahitaḥ pradhanāya mādhavānahamākārayituṃ mahībhujā |
na pareṣu mahaujasaśchalādapakurvanti malimlucā iva || 344 ||
﻿
vākyopamāyā eva prakāraḥ prapañcopamā |
sāpi dvidhā— prakṛtarūpā vikṛtarūpā ca | tayoḥ
prakṛtarūpā caturdhā— samastopamā, ekadeśopamā, mālopamā raśanopamā ca | tāsu samastopamā yathā—(ridraṭā. 8.30)
alivalayairalakairiva kusumastabakaiḥ stanairiva vasante |
bhānti latā lalanā iva pāṇibhiriva kisalayaiḥ sapadi || 345 ||
ekadeśopamā yathā—(rudraṭā. 8.31)
kamaladalairadharairiva daśanairiva kesarairvirājante |
alivalayairalakairiva kamalairvadanairiva nalinyaḥ || 346 ||
mālopamā yathā—(seba. 1.48)
soha vva lakkhaṇamuhaṃ vaṇamāla vva viaṃḍa harivaïssa uram |
kitti vva pavaṇataṇaaṃ, āṇa vva balāīṃ se vilaggaï didaṭhī || 347 ||
(śobheva lakṣmaṇamukhaṃ vanamāleva vikaṭaṃ haripateruraḥ |
kīrtiriva pavanatanayamājñeva balānyastatasya vilagati dṛṣṭiḥ ||)
raśanopamā yathā—(rudraṭaṭīkā 8.28)
candrāyate śiklarucātha haṃso haṃsāyate cārugatena kāntā |
kāntāyate sparśasukhena vāri vārīyate svacchatayā vihāyaḥ || 348 ||
vikṛtarūpāpi caturdhaiva— viparyāsopamā, ubhayopamā, utpādyopamā, ananvayopayopamā ca | tāsu —
viparyasopamā yathā—(ratnā.)
yat tvannetrasamānakānti salile mag‍naṃ tadindīvaraṃ meghairantaritaḥ priye! tava mukhacchāyānukārī śaśī |
ye 'pi tvadnamanānusārigatayaste rājahaṃsā gatā— stvatsādṛś‍yavinodamātramapi me daivena na kṣamayate || 349 ||
ubhayopamā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.18)
tvadānanamivāmbhojamambhojamiva te mukham |
nilīnāṃ nalinīkhaṇḍe kathaṃ nu tvāṃ labhemahi || 350 ||
﻿
utpādyopamā yathā—
suvṛttamuktāphalajālacitrakaṃ bhavedakhaṇḍaṃ yadi candramaṇḍalam |
śramāmbubindūttaraśobhā tārakaṃ tato mukhaṃ tena tavopamīyate || 351 ||
ananvayopamā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.259)
tvanmukhaṃ tvanmukhamiva tvadadṛśau tvadadṛśāviva |
tvanmūrtiriva mūrtiste tvamiva tvaṃ kṛśodari || 352 ||
(2. rūpakam)
upamaivotpannasādṛś‍yāt tirobhūtabhedā rūpakam | tat ṣọdhā—
śabdapradhānam, arthapradhānam, ubhayapradhānaṃ, sāvayavaṃ, niravayavaṃ, saṅkīrṇaṃ ca | teṣu
śabdapradhānaṃ caturvidham— samastam, asamastaṃ, samastavyastaṃ, rūpakarūpakaṃ ca | tatra samastaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.259)
pāṇipadmāni bhūpānāṃ saṃkocayitumīśate |
tvatpādanakhacandrāṇāmarciṣaḥ kundanirmalāḥ || 353 ||
asamastaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.67)
aṅgulyaḥ pallavānyāsan kusumāni nakhārciṣaḥ |
bāhū late vasantaśrīstvaṃ naḥ pratyakṣacāriṇī || 354 ||
samastavyastaṃ yathā—
smitaṃ mukhendau jyotsnā te prabhāmbu kucakumbhayoḥ |
dorlatāpallave pāṇau puṣpaṃ sakhi nakhārciṣaḥ || 355 ||
rūpakarūpakaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.93)
mukhapaṅkajaraṅge 'smin bhrūlatā nartakī tava |
līlānāṭyāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭau sakhi! yūnā niṣiñcati || 356 ||
arthapradhānaṃ caturdhā— samastaviṣayam, ekadeśāviṣayaṃ, yuktimat ayuktaṃ ca | tatra samastaviṣayaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.69)
tāmrāṅgulidalaśreṇinakhadidhītikesaram |
dhriyate mūrdh‍ni bhūpālairbhavaccaraṇapaṅkajam || 357 ||
﻿
ekadeśaviṣayaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.71)
akasmādeva te caṇḍi ! sphuritādharapallavam |
mukhaṃ muktāruco dhatte gharmāmbhaḥ—kaṇamañjarīḥ || 358 ||
yuktimad yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.77)
smitapuṣpojjvalaṃ lolanetrabhṛṅgamidaṃ mukham |
na kāsyanandanaṃ subhru ! surabhiśvasitānilam || 359 ||
ayuktaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.78)
idamārdrasmitajyots‍naṃ s‍nigdhanetrotpalaṃ mukham |
jagannetrendurasmākaṃ kathaṃ tāpāya kalpate || 360 ||
ubhayapradhānaṃ caturdhā— śuddhaṃ, saviśeṣaṇaṃ, raśanā mālā ca | tatra
śuddhaṃ yathā—
vellitabhru galad‌gharmajalamālohitekṣaṇam |
vivṛṇoti madāvasthāmidaṃ vadanapaṅkajam || 361 ||
saviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.81)
haripādaḥ śirolag‍najahnukanyājalāṃśukaḥ |
jayatyasuraniḥśaṅkasurānandotsavadhvajaḥ || 362 ||
raśanā yathā—(rudraṭā.8.50)
kisalayakarairlatānāṃ karakamalairmṛgadṛśāṃ jagajjayati |
nalinīnāṃ kamalamukhairmukhendubhiryoṣitāṃ madanaḥ || 363 ||
mālā yathā—(u.rā.ca. 1.38)
iyaṃ gehe lakṣmīriyamamṛtavartirnayanayo— rasāvasyāḥ sparśo vapuṣi bahalaścandanarasaḥ |
ayaṃ bāhuḥ kaṇṭhe śiśiramasṛṇo mauktikasaraḥ kimasyā na preyo yadi paramasahyastu virahaḥ || 364 ||
sāvayavaṃ caturdhā— sahajāvayavam, āhāryāvayavam, ubhayāvayavaṃ viṣamaṃ ca |
sahajāvayavaṃ yathā—
papphuriaüṭhṭhadalaaṃ takkhaṇavigaliaruhiramahuvicchaḍḍa |
ukkhaḍidaaṃṭhaṇālaṃ paḍiaṃ phuḍadasaṇakesaraṃ muhakamalaṃ || 365 ||
﻿
(prasphuritoṣṭhadalaṃ tatkṣaṇavigalitarudhiramadhuvicchardam |
utkhaṇḍitakaṇṭhanālaṃ patitaṃ sphuṭadaśanakesaraṃ mukhakamalam ||)
āhāryāvayavaṃ yathā—
to kuṃbhaaṇṇapaḍivaaṇadaṃḍapaḍighaṭṭiāmarisaghoraviso |
galiaṃsuaṇimmoo jāo bhīsaṇaaro dasāṇaṇabhuao || 366 ||
(tataḥ kumbhakarṇaprativacanadaṇḍaparighaṭṭitāmarṣaghoraviṣaḥ |
galitāṃśukanirmoko jāto bhīṣaṇanaro daśānanabhujagaḥ ||)
ubhayāvayavaṃ yathā—(rudraṭaṭīkā 8.43)
yasyā bījamahaṃkṛtirgurutaro mūlaṃ mameti graho nityatvasmṛtiraṅkuraḥ sutasuhṛdjñātyādayaḥ pallavāḥ |
skandho dāraparigrahaḥ paribhavaḥ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ durgatiḥ sā me tavac‍caraṇārhaṇāparaśunā tṛṣṇālatā lūyatām || 367 ||
viṣamaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.80)
madaraktakapolena manmathastvanmukhendunā |
nartitabhrulatenālaṃ mardituṃ bhuvanatrayam || 368 ||
niravayavaṃ caturdhā— sādhāraṃ, nirādhāraṃ, paramparitaṃ vyatirekavac‍ca |
sādhāraṃ yathā—(seba. 1.22)
sohaï visuddhakiraṇo gaaṇasamuddammi raaṇivelālaggo |
tārāmuttāvaaro phuḍavihaḍiamehasippisaṃpuḍavimmukko || 369 ||
(śobhate viśuddhakiraṇo gaganasamudre rajanīvelālag‍naḥ |
tārāmuktāprakaraḥ sphuṭavighaṭitameghaśuktisaṃpuṭavimuktaḥ ||)
nirādhāraṃ yathā—
vaṇarāikesahatthā kusumāuhasurahisaṃcaraṃtadhaavaḍā |
sasiaramuhuttamehā tamapaḍihatthā viṇeṃtti dhūmuppīḍāḥ || 370 ||
(vanarājikeśahastāḥ kusumāyudhasurabhisaṃcaraddhvajapaṭāḥ |
śaśikaramuhūrtameghāstamaḥ—pratihastā viniryanti dhūmotpīḍāḥ ||)
paramparitaṃ yathā—
vavasāaraïpaoso. (seba. 1.14; dra. pṛ. 339) ﻿
vyatirekavad yathā—(śāku. 2.10)
anāghrātaṃ puṣpaṃ kisalayamalūnaṃ kararuhai— ranāviddhaṃ rat‍naṃ madhu navamanāsvāditarasam |
akhaṇḍaṃ puṇyānāṃ phalamiva ca tadrūpamanaghaṃ na jāne bhoktāraṃ kamiha samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ || 371 ||
saṅkīrṇaṃ caturdhā— sāvayavasaṅkīrṇaṃ, niravayavasaṅkīrṇam, ubhayasaṅkīrṇaṃ, śleṣānvitaṃ ca | sāvayavasaṅkīrṇaṃ yathā—(seba. 1.17)
raïarakesaraṇivahaṃ sohaï dhavalabbhadalasahassaparigaaṃ |
mahumahadaṃsaṇajoggaṃ piāmahuppattipaṃkaaṃ va ṇahaalaṃ || 372 ||
(ravikarakesaranivahaṃ śobhate dhavalābhradalasahastraparigatam |
madhumathanadarśanayogyaṃ pitāmahotpattipaṅkajamiva nabhaḥ sthalam ||)
niravayavasaṅkīrṇaṃ yathā—
dīho diahabhuaṃgo/viasaṃto raïbiṃbaphaṇāmaṇippahaṃ païraṃto |
avarasamuddamuvagao muṃcaṃto kaṃcuaṃ va ghammaa—āavaṇivahaṃ || 373 ||
(dīrgho divasabhujaṅgo ravibimbaphaṇāmaṇiprabhāṃ prakiran/vikasamānaḥ |
aparasamudramabhigato muñcan kañcukamiva dharma/ātapanivaham ||)
ubhayasaṅkīrṇaṃ yathā—(seba. 1.19)
dhuamehamahuarāo ghaṇasamaāaḍiḍhaoṇaavimukkāo |
ṇahapāaasāhāo ṇiaaṭṭhāṇaṃ va paḍigaāo disāo || 374 ||
(dhutameghamadhukarā ghanasamayākṛṣṭāvanatavimuktāḥ |
namaḥpādapaśākhā nijakasthānamiva pratigatā diśaḥ ||)
śleṣānvitaṃ yathā—(seba. 1.24)
pīṇapaohabaralaggaṃ disāṇaṃ pavasaṃtajalaasamaaviiṇṇaṃ |
sohaggapaḍhamaïṇhaṃ pammāaï/pavvāaï sarasaṇahavaaṃ iṃdadhaṇuṃ || 375 ||
(pīnapayodharalag‍naṃ diśāṃ pravasajjaladasamayavitīrṇam |
saubhāgyaprathamacihnaṃ pramlāyati/praśuṣyati sarasanakhapadamindradhanuḥ ||)
﻿
(3. sāmyam)
prasiddhasādharmyābhāve dyotakābhāve ubhayābhāve vā ukticāturyādaupamyapratītiḥ sāmyam | sā tridhā— prasiddhasādharmyābhāvaḥ, dyotakābhāvaḥ, ubhayābhāvaḥ | tatra prasiddhasādharmyābhāve yathā—(raghu. 6.67)
saṃcāriṇī dīpaśikheva rātrau yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā |
narendramārgāṭṭa iva prapede vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ || 376 ||
dyotakābhāve yathā—
naiko 'pi tvādṛśo 'dyāpi jāyamāneṣu rājasu |
nanu dvitīyo nāstyeva pārijātasya pādapaḥ || 377 ||
ubhayābhāve yathā—(sa.ka. 3.184)
na martyalokastridivāt prahīyate mriyeta nāgre yadi vallabho janaḥ |
nivṛttameva tridivaprayojanaṃ mṛtaḥ sa cejjīvata eva jīvati || 378 ||
asya ca sāmyotkarṣādibhirananta uktiprapañcaḥ | sāmyena yathā—(śāku. 1.16)
śuddhāntadurlabhamidaṃ vapurāśramavāsino yadi janasya |
dūrīkṛtāḥ khalu guṇaurudyānalatā vanalatābhiḥ || 379 ||
utkarṣeṇa yathā—(bārā. 2.17)
tad vaktraṃ yadi mudritā śaśikathā tac‍cat smitaṃ kā sudhā tac‍cakṣuryadi hāritaṃ kuvalayaistāśced giro dhiṅ madhu |
hā kandarpadhanurbhuvau ca yadi te kiṃ vā bahu brūmahe yatsatyaṃ punaruktavastuvirasaḥ' sargakramo vedhasaḥ || 380 ||
sāmyotkarṣābhyāṃ yathā—(visā. 3.27)
taraṅgaya dṛśo 'ṅgane ! patatu citramindīvaraṃ sphuṭīkuru radacchadaṃ vrajatu vidrumaḥ śvetatām |
kṣaṇaṃ vapurapāvṛṇu spṛśatu kāñcanaṃ kālikā— mudañcaya manāṅ mukhaṃ bhavatu ca dvicandraṃ nabhaḥ || 381 ||
upameyāpakarṣeṇa yathā—(rudraṭā. 8.78)
garvamasaṃvāhyamimaṃ locanayugalena vahasi kiṃ bhadre ! |
santīdṛśāni diśi saraḥsu nanu nīlanalināni || 382 ||
﻿
upamānāpakarṣeṇa yathā—
ekkoṇṇāmiamuabhaṃge vimalakavole vaaṇammi tua maacchi tiriñchaṇaaṇe |
ehu sasibibaü kalaṃgagāraü paṇḍara ukhittaü uppareṇa bhamāi aṇimañchaṇakhapparaü || 383 ||
(ekonnāmitabhrūbhaṅge vimalakapole vadane tava madākṣi tiryaṅnayane |
etacchaśibimbaṃ kalaṅkāgāraṃ pāṇḍaramutkṣip‍ta— mupari bhrāmayitvā nirmañchanakarparam ||)
ubhayāpakarṣeṇa yathā—(gā.sa.1.13)
ghariṇīe mahāṇasakammalaggamasimalii/maïli—eṇa hattheṇa |
chittaṃ muhaṃ hasijjaï, caṃdāvatthaṃ gaaṃ païṇā || 384 ||
(gṛhiṇyā mahānasakarmalag‍namaṣīmalinitena/malinena hastena |
spṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ hasyate candrāvasthā gataṃ patyā ||)
upamānasya sāmyāpakarṣo yathā—
anyato naya muhūrtamānanaṃ candra eṣa sarale ! kalāmayaḥ |
mā kadācana kapolayormalaṃ saṃkramayya samatāṃ neṣyati || 385 ||
anutkarṣāpakarṣaṃ yathā—(rudraṭā. 8.108)
magaṃ mṛgāṅkaḥ sahajaṃ kalaṅkaṃ bibharti tasyāstu mukhaṃ kadācit |
āhāryamekaṃ mṛganābhipatramiyānaśeṣeṇa tayorviśeṣaḥ || 386 ||
evamanyadapi yathā—(rudraṭā. 8.73)
kiṃ maraṇaṃ ! dāridrayaṃ, ko vyādhirjivitaṃ daridrasya |
kassvargaḥ ! sanmitraṃ, sukalatraṃ, suprabhuḥ, susutaḥ, || 387 ||
(4. saṃśayaḥ)
upamānopameyayoḥ atyantasādṛś‍yāt sandehaḥ saṃśayaḥ | yathā—(sa.ka. 4.75)
vālī bhaṃbhurabholī ullasia ṇiaṃsiṇī gahaṇaṃ suṇia vinikkantā ṇiddāe bhembhalī |
rāhu vi tīa muhu johaī puṇu johaī gaaṇu bhullalleo ṇa hu āṇaī doṇhavi candukaṃ vaṇu || 388 ||
﻿
(bālā atīva mugdhā skhalitanivasanā grahaṇaṃ śrutvā viniṣkrāntā nidrayā vihvalā |
rāhurapi tasyā mukhaṃ paś‍yati punaḥ paś‍yati gaganaṃ bhrāntimān na khalu jānāti dvayoścandraḥ kaḥ ||)
yathā vā—(saka. 4.79)
muhe maakhaliullāve ṇhāṇollae ciure veṇīaṃsaṇasāre samottiahāre ure |
kālāntare taralācchihu maaṇu/ṇa samullasaï māhaü puṇu tthaṇaguḍare ṇa muṇaï kahiṃ vasaï || 389 ||
(mukhe madaskhalitollāpe s‍nānotplute cikure veṇīnivasanasāre samauktikahāre urasi |
kālāntare taralākṣṇormadanaḥ samullasati māghe punaḥ stanagṛhe na jñāyate kutra vasati ||)
(5. samādhiḥ)
anyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ |
yathā—(saka. 5.357)
avaūhiapubbadise samaaṃ joṇhāe seviapaosamuhe |
māi ṇa jhijjaü raaṇī varadisāitapacchiammi miaṅkeṃ || 390 ||
(avagūhitapūrvadiśo samakaṃ jyots‍nayā sevitapradoṣamukhe |
mātarna kṣīyate rajanī aparadiśābhimukhaprasthite mṛgāṅke ||)
yathā vā—
vallahe lahu volantaï pattaï puṇu bahu bali kijjami tāmarasiṇi tujjha rosahu thirahu |
jeṇa ṇiraggalu jampaï kimpi ṇa jāva jaṇu tāva himeṇa visitti jhatthi puluṭhṭhatanu || 391 ||1
(vallabhe laghu vyapakrāmatyāgacchati punarbahu baliḥ kriye tāmarasāni tava roṣasya sthirasya |
yena nirargalaṃ jalpati kimapi na yāvajjana— stāvaddhimena viśīrṇā jhaṭiti pluṣṭatanuḥ ||)
1. atra rāghavaḥ—'mātṛkāsu bhūyasā apapāṭhaḥ |' iti | sādhu | mūlaṃ tu kimādhṛtamiti jñeyam | ﻿
melitamapi samādhireva | yathā—
deho vva paḍaï diaho kaṇṭhaccheo vva lohio hoi raī |
galaï ruhiraṃ vva saṃjhā gholaï kesakasaṇaṃ sirammia timiraṃ || 392 ||
(deha iva patati divasaḥ kaṇṭhaccheda iva lohito bhavati raviḥ |
galati rudhiramiva sandhyā ghūrṇate keśakṛṣṇaṃ śira iva timiram ||)
yathā ca—(7.57, 10.417)
pallaviaṃ via karapallavehiṃ || 393 ||
(6. samāsok‍tiḥ)
upamānopameyayoratyantaprasiddherupamānenaiva saṃkṣepato 'bhidhānaṃ samāsoktiḥ |
sā dvidhā — abhidhīyamānasādṛś‍yā, pratīyamānasādṛśyā ca | tayoḥ—
abhidhīyamānasadṛś‍yā yathā—
nālasya prasaro jaleṣvapi kṛtāvāsasya kośe ruci— rdaṇḍe karkaśatā mukhe ca mṛdutā mitre mahān praśrayaḥ |
āmūlaṃ guṇasaṃgrahavyasanitā dveṣaśca doṣāgame/kare yasyaiṣā sthitirambujasya vasatiryuktaiva tatra śriyaḥ || 394 ||
yathā ca—(bārā. 1.42)
indurlip‍ta ivāñjanena jaḍitā dṛṣṭirmṛgīṇāmiva pramlānāruṇimeva vidrumalatā ś‍yāmeva hemaprabhā |
pāruṣyaṃ kalayā ca kokilavadhūkaṇṭeṣviva prastutaṃ sītāyāḥ purataśca hanta śikhināṃ barhāḥ sagarhā iva || 395 ||
pratīyamānasādṛś‍yā yathā—
uttuṅgeṃ kṛtasaṃśrayasya śikhariṇyuc‍cāvacagrāvaṇi nyagrodhasya kimaṅga tasya vacasā ślāghāsu paryāpyate |
bandhurvā sa purākṛtaḥ kimathavā satkarmaṇāṃ saṃcayo mārge rūkṣavipatraśākhini jano yaṃ prāpya viśrāmyati || 396 ||
yathā ca—(bha.śa. 39)
kiṃ jāto 'si catuṣpathe yadi ghanacchāyo 'si kiṃ chāyayā saṃpannaḥ phalito 'si kiṃ yadi phalaiḥ pūrṇo 'si kiṃ saṃnataḥ |
he sadvṛkṣa ! sahasva samprati sakhe śākhāśikhākarṣaṇa— kṣobhāmoṭanabhañjanāni jagataḥ svaireva duśceṣṭitaiḥ || 397 ||
﻿
(7. sahok‍tiḥ)
dravyaguṇākriyādīnāṃ sahābhidhānaṃ sahoktiḥ |
sā dvidhā— sādṛś‍yavatī, asādṛś‍yavatī ca tayoḥ
ādyā (sādṛś‍yavatī) yathā—(seba. 2.14)
dhīraṃ va jalasamūhaṃ timiṇivahamiva sapakkhapavvaaloaṃ |
ṇaïsotte vva taraṅge raaṇāi va garuaguṇasaāi vahahaṃtaṃ || 398 ||
(dhairyamiva jalasamūhaṃ timinivahamiva sapakṣaparvatalokam |
nadīstrotāṃsīva taraṅgān rat‍nānīva gurukaguṇaśatāni vahantam ||)
dvitīyā (asādṛś‍yavatī) yathā—(seba. 5.7)
dhīreṇa samaṃ jāmā hiaeṇa samaṃ ahiṭhṭhiā uvaesā |
ucchāheṇa saha bhuā bāheṇa samaṃ galanti se ullāvā || 399 ||
(dhaiyreṇa samaṃ yāmā hṛdayena samamaniṣṭhitā upadeśāḥ |
utsāhena saha bhujau bāṣpeṇa samaṃ galantyasyollāpāḥ ||)
(8. samuc‍cayoktiḥ)
dravyaguṇakriyāṇāmekatra bahūnāmāropaṇaṃ samuc‍cayoktiḥ |
sā caturdhā— ekadyotakā, anekadyotakā, ekānekadyotakā, adyotakā ca |
ekadyotakā yathā—
kalāḥ pralāpā gatayo madālasā viśuddhavistrambharasāḥ samāgamāḥ |
tadaṅganānāṃ ramaṇīyatāṃ yayurvisarpilajjāvibhavāśca vibhramāḥ || 400 ||
anekadyotakā yathā—
aprākṛtassa kathamastu na vismayāya yasminnuvāsa karuṇā ca kṛtajñatā ca |
lakṣmīśca sāttvikaguṇojjvalitaṃ ca tejo dharmaśca mānavinayau ca parākramaśca || 401 ||
ekānekadyotakā yathā—
vicintyamānaṃ manasā 'pi dehināmidaṃ hi lokeṣu cakāsti durlabham |
niśā sacandrā madirā ca sotpalā priyānurāgo 'bhinavaṃ ca yauvanam || 402 ||
adyotakā yathā—
puraṃ trikūṭaṃ parikhā payonidhiḥ prabhurdaśāsyaḥ subhaṭā niśācarāḥ |
naro 'bhiyoktā ripavaḥ plavaṅgamāḥ kimatra vo hāsyapade mahad bhayam || 403 ||
